1b1(rgyud):
1b2(rgyud): na/ ma sa ldan
1b3(rgyud): ma ma dzi ma rmi byas ma
2a1(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma
2a2(rgyud): rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po la rnam par bzhugs te/ de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
2a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thog ma med pa sems dpa' bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ 
2a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ rdo rje 'khro bo mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i dang nges par brjod pa'i snying po ngas
2b1(rgyud): bshad kyis/ lag na rdo rje 'khro bo chen po'i 'khor sna tshogs pas rnam par bsgyings pa/ rnam par 'khrulnga pa rgyas par bshad kyis
2b2(rgyud): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/ de la bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ thal mo sbar rang btud
2b3(rgyud): pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsungs pa/ de nas gsang ba bshad byag// mdor bsdus
2b4(rgyud): pa de rgyas par min// dpal he ru ka dang yang dag sbyor// 'dod pa'i don kan sgrub byed yin// bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/ 
3a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma'i dba'i sdom// gsang ba mchog gi dges pa ni// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhags// mkha' 'gro
3a2(rgyud): kan dngos sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// mkha' 'go pa'i sdom pa yin/ 
3a3(rgyud): theg ma me dang tshul chen 'di// b+ha gar gnas shing skyes pa ste// dam spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// thog ma dbus mthar dwa/ 
3a4(rgyud): ma med// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba// shes rab thabs kyis kun sbyor ba// de la gang yang ji bzhin pa'i// gzugs sgra 'od kyi dag pa
3a5(rgyud): can/ gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yin// rtag tu nyes bral zhi ba ste// mkha' mnyam go 'phang byed pa yin// rang bzhin dag pa 'byung ba ste// rnam/ 
3b1(rgyud): 'byor ma'i bde ba ste// bzlas dang bsam gtan ldan pa dang // sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes kyis// de dag rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ gsang ba'i bdag
3b2(rgyud): po rab tu nyon// dbugs 'byin par yang mchog dag dang // de'i chu dang bcas pa dang // mkhas pas ri lu byas nas ni// pad ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la mchod
3b3(rgyud): 'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par la// pho nya rnams ni de mchod// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste/ mthar thug dngos grub thams cad 'byung // dga'
3b4(rgyud): ba yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang ni 'gyur par 'gyur/ rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang // bya nga chub sems dpa' mchod par bya// rang gi lha mi
3b5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan yang mchod par bya// mthong ba dang ni rig pa dang // dad pa ni ngan pa yis// sdig pa kun las gol 'gyur te// de ltar 'dal
4a1(rgyud): the tsom med// rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog/ dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed// bzlas dang bsam gtan dga' bas kyang // skye ba 'di
4a2(rgyud): la dngos grub 'gyur// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig gsang ba sbas pa bstan pa ste// // le'u dang po'o// / 
4a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings rdul rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba/ du 'khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ 
4a4(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungs pa/ chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang
4a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ dpa' bo chen po gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po tshor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du
4a6(rgyud): shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'ang byed rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
4b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi gtsog/ rdorje dang byug chen po dang / dpa' ba chen po gti drug rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po na brji dang / dpa' bo chen po sde rdo rje dang / dpa
4b2(rgyud): chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po phra dog rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po// 
4b3(rgyud): sardo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po nu rdo rje dang / dpa' po chen po me rdo rje dang / dpa' bo/ chen po rlung rje rje dang / dpa' bo chen po mkha' dbyings
4b4(rgyud): dang / 'di lta bu'i mchog chos kyi dbyings kyi mthasagatugs pa ma lus shing / lusapa med pa mtha' yas pa/ rnam par 'phro ba'i gsung ba'i
4b5(rgyud): snying po 'byung ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs pa/ 'dus pa gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje thod pa
4b6(rgyud): dam bu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po mche ba rnam par brtsigs pa dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lha dag dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpag
5a1(rgyud): med dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dang / dpa' bo chen po rdorje lus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang / dpa' bo chen
5a2(rgyud): po rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rab bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje bzang po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang / 
5a3(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mig mi bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje stobs po che dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin chen dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / dpa' bo chen po
5a4(rgyud): rdo rje na mkha'i snying po dang / dpa' bo chen po dpal gragasa'athung rdo rje chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / dpa' bo chen po rje
5a5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / 'di lta bu'i mchog dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis na mkha'i khams thams cad yongs su gang
5a6(rgyud): ba mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsung gi dam tshig gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ rang gi gsang ba'i
5a7(rgyud): dam tshig gsang ba'i b+ha ga las byung ba/ rnal 'byor ma dang / dpa' bo'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam chen po gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo gsod
5b1(rgyud): byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen po 'gugs byed ma zhes pa dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gar gi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma nas chen mo pad ma'i dra ba ma
5b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma ma chen mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje la ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen me rde rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / 
5b3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje gzugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab tu gtum ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gtum ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen
5b4(rgyud): mo 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo snang chen mazhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dpa' ba'i/ blo gros ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo me thung ma
5b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sa bsrungs ma zhes bya ba
5b6(rgyud): dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jigs byed chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'thung ma chen mo zhes bya ba dang // rnal 'byor/ 
5b7(rgyud): ma chen mo sngo bsangs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzang ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rta rnam zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo bya gdong mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor
6a1(rgyud): ma chen mo 'khor lo'i shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'tshong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'igi/ 
6a2(rgyud): cham zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab dpa' mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen po rab tu dpa' mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo/ 
6a3(rgyud): skyur ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo brtson 'grus chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu'i mdog sna tshogs pas na mkha' khams kyi mthar thug par/ hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ gar sna tshogs byed cing / 
6a4(rgyud): ring gi dam tshig 'khyud pa dang / btsum pa dang / snying rje chen po'i ro yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis gang bar mthong ngo // mthong nas bzhugs te/ dpa'
6a5(rgyud): bo'i mchog rnams kyis dam tshig rjes su dran no// dpa' bo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje phagami'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung zhing / shes
6a6(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyi rigs dang / gsang ba gsum pa 'di lta ste/ rdo rje ma mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo 'ug gdon
6a7(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma pa khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo phag gdong ma dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje sreg byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje po nya mo zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche
6a8(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta bu'i ma mo'i mchog thams cad kyis na mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/ rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyis
6b1(rgyud): su med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba/ dpal khrag 'thung shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig chen po rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig yin te/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa/ 
6b2(rgyud): bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung // 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje'i go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
6b3(rgyud): chen po rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / tshe rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje khrag 'thung dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang / rnal 'byor
6b4(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug chen po rna mchog dang / rigs drug po de ni yan lag drug tu dgod pa ste/ bsrung ba gnyis su med pa'i dmatshig gi mchog de nyid ni/ rithabs dang shes rang gnyis su med pa las byung ngo // 
6b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa bshad par bya ste/ dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo yang mi ni dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug/ 
6b6(rgyud): chen mo g.yo ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen po skrag byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo tsan ti ka ste/ 'di lta bus yang na mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yang dag par bsrung ba'i
6b7(rgyud): sbyor ba'i thugs gsang ba chen po ste/ de lta bu'i sna tshogs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lag pa thal mo sbyar te/ mos pa mchog gis spyi bo la gtugs so// de nas dam tshig chen po rnam par sgyings pa'i rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes
6b8(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te// rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas sems dpa' sna tshogs spros te phyung nas/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang bar byas te/ sna tshogs pas mdun gyi
7a1(rgyud): nam mkha' yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sna tshogs pa'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing / sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro// dga' ba
7a2(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang / mnyam pa bstan te/ khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsungs so// chu dang me dang rlung dang dbang chen gyi steng du/ sna tshogs pa'i ro'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs/ rin po che sna tshogs
7a3(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa de'i steng du/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po phyung nas spros te/ rdo rje chen po gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor chen po rgyal por sprul pa/ kun du
7a4(rgyud): bzang po chen po 'byung ba ste/ rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung nas/ brtan par bzhegs so// phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas rgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis bsdus pa/ zla ba dang / 
7a5(rgyud): nyi ma'i mdog ltar stug pa/ dril bu dang / rnga yab dang / rgyalamatshan dang / g.yer ka'i dbas mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rdo rje dam tshig gi srang bu/ chos kyi 'khor lor 'jug
7a6(rgyud): pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sho za dang / spyi byed dang / brjed byed dang / ma rungs po dang / shin du bdug pa
7a7(rgyud): dang/ ro langs dang / ro dang / re sregs dang / khyi dang / lce sbrang mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ba'i sgra pyid dang / al lo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ drim bu dang / tsang tiT
7a8(rgyud): sgra sgrogs pa dang / mgo gtum gar byed pas nye bar rgyan pa/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pan can/ dge ba'i las kyis sgrol ba/ sems can thams cad las snying rje'i ros phan 'dogs par/ rnam par 'khor bas skor ba/ pad
7b1(rgyud): ma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbar ba g.yas rkyang bas gnas pa'i lag pa'i thal mo sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos mchog zab mo tshul dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa ston pa/ sku lus chen po 'dzin pa/ 
7b2(rgyud): zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ nges par brjod pa'i bla ma chen po nye bar 'byung ba/ mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyal po/ da ba'i dra ba can/ chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan
7b3(rgyud): pa ston pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyis bde ba ster zhing ston par byed pa/ sems dpa' chen po legs so// lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig/ nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las
7b4(rgyud): zhu ba'i le'u ste// / gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor// gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba gsungs pa/ snying kar zla ba
7b5(rgyud): bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje phra mo rnam par sprul// bde gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni// mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i dra ba'i sdom// de ni gsang ba'i byin brlabs pa// snying po'i mchog ni
7b6(rgyud): legs par nyon// bla ma yi yang bla ma ste/ mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sdom// oM swa b+ha wa shud d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa shud d+ho ha~M/ oM shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mo ko haM/ oM badz+ra shud d+ha sarba d+ham
7b7(rgyud): badz+ra shud d+ha haM/ oM yo ga shud d+ho sarba d+harma yo ga shud d+ho haM/ oM dz+nyA na shud d+ho sarba d+harma shud d+ho ha~M/ oM sa ma ya shud d+ho/ sarba d+harma sa ma ya shud d+ho ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shu n+ya ta u nu ra ga na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad mo ko haM/ oM sarba
7b8(rgyud): ta thA ga ta su bI shud d+ho d+hamadz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mo kau tsa~M/ oM sarba man tra shud d+ho sarba d+ha ma man tra shud d+ho ha~M/ oM kro d+ha shud d+ha sarba d+ha ma kro d+hi shud d+ho ha~M/ oM tsi ta shud d+he sarba d+ha ma tsi ta shud d+ho ha~M/ oM bag shud d+ho sarba d+harma
8a1(rgyud): bag shud d+he ha~M/ oM ka ya shud d+hi sarba d+harma ka ya shud d+ho na/ oM dz+nyA na a mI ta shud d+ha sarba d+hamadz+nyA na a mri ta shud d+ho ha~M/ oM na mA sa ma ya shud d+ha sarba d+harman mA sa ma ya shud d+ho ha~M/ oM tsar+ya na
8a2(rgyud): shud d+ho sarba d+harma tsar+ya na ya shud d+ho haM/ oM tri yo ka ba r-i shud d+ha sarba d+harme tri yau ka pa ri shud d+ho haM/ oM a baM shi ka shud d+ha sarba d+harma a bi shaM ka ta shud d+ha hau/ oM pu tsa shud d+ha sarba d+harma pu tse shud d+ho ho/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a tA/ 
8a3(rgyud): ya pu tsa badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad mo ko ha~M/ oM man d+ha la shud d+ho sarba d+harma man d+ha la shud d+ho haM/ oM a ti tra ti shud d+ho sarba d+harma a pra ti shud d+ha haM/ oM bi ra shud d+ha sarba d+harma bi ra shud d+ho d+hi/ oM yo gi ni shud d+ha sarba d+harma yo ga~M shud d+ho
8a4(rgyud): au tad ta shud d+ha sarba d+harmA tad tra shud d+he haM/ he e ti he tra pa!ga ta sarba d+harma te tA pa gaM ho haM/ ru pi ti ru kA rA ba katA sarba d+harma ru bi ka rApa ko toha/ ka i tin swa tsing sI ta
8a5(rgyud): ka ra shud d+ha sarba d+hamidzI Ti ke ra shud d+ho ha~M/ oM b+ha ba shud d+ho sarba d+harmAn+thabashud d+ho tsA/ oM dzas shud d+ha sarba d+harma dz+nyA ma? shud d+ho oM e rang ra shud d+ha sarba d+harma a rad ra shud d+ho tsa/ oM
8a6(rgyud): bkra shud d+ha sarba d+harma wa krA shud d+hi haM/ oM a sa ma ti shud d+ha sarba d+harmA a sa ma ti shud d+hi haM/ oM sa sA sam b+he d+ha na shud d+ha sarba d+harma swam b+he d+ha na shud d+he n+te/ oM tA shA shud d+ha sarba d+harma tA shA shud d+ho D+ha/ i me ha shud d+ha saH
8a7(rgyud): d+harma mo ha shud d+ho ha~M/ oM ra ga shud d+ha sarba d+harma rag shud d+ho ha~M/ oM i ra ba shud d+ha sarba d+harma i ra ba shud d+hoH/ oM kha badz+ra shud d+ha sarba d+harma kha badz+ra shud d+ho ha/ oM tr-i tsakra ba ri shud d+ha sarba d+harma traM tsakra pa ri shud d+ho \u0f7f
8a8(rgyud): o ta kaM ni shud d+ha sarba d+harma ta ki ni shud d+hoH/ oM shud ku la shud d+ha sarba d+harma shad ku la shud d+ho haM/ oM ma tri shud d+ha sarba d+harma tri shung d+ho d+hi/ au pi tha shud d+ha sarba d+harma pi tha shud d+ha haM/ 'di ltar ji srid nye ba'i dungad khrod/ 
8b1(rgyud): bar thams cad rnam par dag par shes par bya'o// pu tsa o a/ gor/ d+hamaHka/ oM/ tri/ ko/ ka la/ ka hi pra grigaso su na sim ku/ su bcurnam par dag pa'i bdag/ pha rol phyin bcu yang de bzhin te/ 
8b2(rgyud): shes pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag/ bcu pa de dag rnam par sgom/ 'khor lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir// nyi shum bzhi'i bdag nyid dag nyid dathabs dang shes rab rnam grol bas// rnam 'byor ma'i yid dga' ba
8b3(rgyud): bcu rtsa bdun nam dag don// he ru ka ni mchog las byung // nges brjod chud ni bla ma'i bla// gsang chen mchog gi dam pa'o// shes pa bcu yang rnam par dag/ g.yon dang g.yas su skor ba yis// dgod cing mchog da
8b4(rgyud): ra ba bya// gang gis de nyid shes pa yis// bdar ni lnga pa bstan par bya// gang yang dbang skur med pa la// gzhanastong du de nyid mi bstan ci// nges brjod cud mas bla ma yis/ nadabang
8b5(rgyud): rgyur slongs dgal sbyin/ gzhan du thobs spro ba dang / rgyal dang rmongs dang rab tu la/ mnar med 'jugachen po dang / nang nangur de ni srung bar 'gyur// mi shes glegs 'amaganas/ 
8b6(rgyud): thobs// ngan pa des pag tu 'dzi/ pam mog rims dang dug pa 'ang // mkha' 'gro gdun gyis gces par 'gyur// mi mun bgegs dang tshogs bdag gis/ theg sa cing dmyal bar srung bar 'gyur/ srid
8b7(rgyud): 'bad pa thams cad kyis blama'i slob na rims bzhin du/ cid rab tu smras nas ni// myur du sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur// rnams thams cad rings bzhin du/ nges rjod chu kyi ma pa bzhin/ kyi
8b8(rgyud): nal 'byer ma sbyor ba/ gaganyis su med pa'i ye shes 'gyur// des zag tu byang chub ste// mchog ni ngas par rnyed par 'gyur/ mo'i bu mo 'di 'dra spangs/ dag gi dam tshig mo zhes shing // dag cing mag ste rang bzhin
9a1(rgyud): can/ mi srun snying rje med pa dang / brkam chags sor sna che ba dang // sbyar zhing ngan la phra dog can// skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang // rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang // 'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang / 
9a2(rgyud): bya sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring ba yin/ spros byed ma dang mdzes sdug blang // gzugs sdug gnon pas rnam par rgyan/ sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems// gtul shugs gtan shing dam tshig shes// dbang
9a3(rgyud): ning chags bral ngo tsha shes// nga rgyal med cing ser sna med// sngags pa rang gi skyed pa ste/ rig ma gtul shugs khyod kyis long // phyag rgya lnga ni rtag tu 'chang // mgo la thod pa'i rgyan yang byas/ 
9a4(rgyud): thod pa dang ni khA tra 'dzin// thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs/ rtag tu ma ha mangs za// thams cad btung bas nyos pa dang // ro'i gdan la 'dug pa dang // lpags
9a5(rgyud): pa chen po gos su gyon/ rigs kyi bza' ba zos nas ni// zhagadang khrag gis tshim pa dang // gang gi yul du 'gro ba dang // rtag tu chags pas mi gnas shing // rtag
9a6(rgyud): tu dud khrod spyod byed la// yang na nags la gnas pa dang // nyan thos 'jig rten dman pa yi// ye shes gti mug gis khyab pa// nyan thos yongs su longs spyod pa'i// gtsug lag khang du gnas mi
9a7(rgyud): byaHji ltar skyes bu dbul po bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje gar gyis rnam par rol// rtag tu dur khrod la gnas shing // dri chen sha chen zas su za// myos byed btung bar/ 
9a8(rgyud): ldan pa yis// dpa' bo'i gtso bos rtse gcig pa'i// sems kyis rab tu sgom par bya// phyag rgya chen po ma rnyed na// g.yeng ba thams cad rnam spangs pa'i// de ni ye shes 'byung gnas te// shes rab pha rol/ 
9b1(rgyud): phyin pas byung // gzung dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i// gnyis su med pa nyid la gnas// rtse gcig sems ni byas nas kyang // sgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas nas// bde la dga' ba dngos grub 'byung // shes rab tha
9b2(rgyud): kyi go cha'i rim// phyag rgya che dang nges par rol// sgom pa mchog tu gyur pa yin// rnam grol sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste// g.yas
9b3(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin thabs yin no// sgom pa'i ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni// sa bcu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed// thog ma'i dngos grub rnal 'byor ma// gnod sbyin klu'i bu mo dang // gzhan yang
9b4(rgyud): sna tshogs dri za mo// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag spyod// de nyid gsang // / ba'i mchog 'gyur ba// a li ka li rtag tu// / sgom// rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad de bzhin
9b5(rgyud): rnam par rtag/ dpa' bos rnga rnams bston pa yin// rnal 'byor pa'i lag g.yon gyis// dpa' bos ma yi be yis ni// brda' rnams dang ni 'jug par bya// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig
9b6(rgyud): rten gsum// 'gro kun g.yon pas byung ba yin// rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bo nyid// 'dzub mo rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// gung mor pad ma gar dbang gnas// srin lag dpa' bo dngos grub
9b7(rgyud): can tha ma la ni mi bzang sku/ sen mo'i ngos la rta mgrin gnas// g.yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni// dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad// lag 'thil po nya 'dus pa'i mchog/ rgyab tu shin du
9b8(rgyud): nges byas te/ brda' ni lnga po bstan par bya// sgrub pa po yis shes par gyis// sa ni sbyin zhes bya bar bshad// chu 'khams ma ma ke ru bshad// me ni gos kar mo ru bshad// rlung ni sgrol ma dag tu
10a1(rgyud): glegs// 'od byed ma ni stong pa ste// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin// dbus su dpa' bo thams cad ni// mkhas pas rgyang tu gshegs su gsol// gsang ba 'di ni ming
10a2(rgyud): bstan cing nga/ rab tu 'bad te sba bar bya// de ltar brda' yis dbang po rnams// de dang lhan cig bza' ba za// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// phan
10a3(rgyud): tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi// sna tshogs brda' ni bshad par bya// mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid dang // pho nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid dag/ sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// de dag thams cad bshad pan
10a4(rgyud): btaras ris dang ni sku gzugs dang // de bzhin bris dang dam tshig dang // sku mdog dang ni khyad par gyis// gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa// sna tshogs sngags
10a5(rgyud): kyis mdzes pa yis// phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de/ lha'i dam tshig yid 'ong ba// rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs mchog/ dbang po sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i// rnal
10a6(rgyud): 'byor ma ni lnga dag 'dus// mkha' 'gro ma la yang dag 'dus// rang rig sna tshogs mchog dam pa// bla ma rgyud pa'i bka' bzhin du// slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir// bdag pa'i las la shin du mkhas
10a7(rgyud): sngogs dang rgyud la legs par bslangs// gzhan yang rgyud rims cho ga dang // nges brjod bla ma'i las mkhas// sngags pa mtshan nyid rtogs pa yis// sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang // rnal 'byor ma'i spyod pa/ 
10a8(rgyud): dang / mkha' 'gro ma'ang de bzhin te// phyi rol ma mo'i phyag rgya dag/ phag mo yi ni rigs las byung // dpa' bo kan gyi spyod pa dang // 'khor lo'i spyod pa shin du bslabs// phyi'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug/ mtshan nyid spyod pa
10b1(rgyud): ngag la mkhas// he ru ka dpal rigs las byung // dge ba'i spyod pa dag la bslabs// yul gyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang // slob dang spyod pa dag la mkhas// rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud spyod dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya che ba// bya ba'i rgyud
10b2(rgyud): kyi dbye ba'i rim// thams cad rgyad rnams rnam par shes// 'grub pa'i lung dang bstan chos dang // mdo sde skye rabs de bzhin te// bla na med pa'i spyod pa dang // shes rab pha rol phyin la byung // phyi rol bstan ces yongs la mkhas
10b3(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa slob dpon mchog/ sbyor ba'i sgom pa ldan pa dang // yid gnyis med pa nyid kyis ni// bza' ba thams cad bza' bar bya// yi ge brgya pas thams cad du// gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nas ni/ 
10b4(rgyud): rang gi bzhi ldan par ni// gcig tu spel nas bzlas par bya// rtag tu 'phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla// don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bla ma las kyang bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba
10b5(rgyud): sdom/ gsang sngags 'dzin pas go cha dang // snying po dang ni nye snying dang / gsang sngags chen pos rjes su bsrung / dkyil 'khor shin du mdzes pa la// yi ge'i dkyil 'khor legs bkod
10b6(rgyud): nas/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bskyed// 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad do// ma mo rnams kyi dam pa mchog/ gsang ba dga' ba sbas pa ste// gsang sngags thams cad bsdus pa yin// gsang sngags/ 
10b7(rgyud): kun gyi gnas yin no// 'gro ba byung ba 'angam mos khyab/ de nyid 'di ni mi bstan cing // dngos grub 'joms par 'gyur ba yin// sgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med// skye
10b8(rgyud): 'gros 'di ni bsgoms tsam gyis// rdo rje sems dpo'i go 'phang ba rnyed// byams pa'i go cha bgos pa de// snying rje chos kyi go cha yin// shes rab bsgoms pas ldan pa yin// nyon mongs bdud ni rnam
11a1(rgyud): par spangs// phyi rol chen pos bsrung ba dang // rdo rje zhal bzhis rnam par mtshan// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// kha sbyar gsum gyis rdo rje mtshan// thams cad mchog gi
11a2(rgyud): bsrung ba che// dngos grub thams cad rab tu rtsol// bka'i 'khor lo bsrung ba che// pur bus dgyegs med dngos grub 'gyur// bsrung ba mchog ni 'di dag gis// sgrub pa po la dngos grung rdol// rdo rje phur/ 
11a3(rgyud): bus ra ba dang // rdo rje yi ni dra ba dang / steng gi bla re dga' ba yis// bdug pa'i bdud ni skrag byas nas// mi bsod gsod pa med pa yin// rang gi rang sems thul ba yin// bdag gis sems ni bcings
11a4(rgyud): pa yin// gang la gang gis gsod pa yod// mnyam pa'i du sems ni dri yin to// gru bzhi pa ni byug pa yin// can dan dkar po lus yin te// mnyam par gzhag pa nyid yin no// 
11a5(rgyud): me tog bzod pa rnal 'byor pa// 'bad pas gtor ba yin parabashad// rang gzhan dag pa 'dug pa ste// mnyamapa'i sgom pa 'dug pa yin// nges par brjod pa'i rgyung bla ma chen po lnga/ 
11a6(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa'i le'u ste// gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gros/ de khon nyid kyis gsang gsungs pa/ 
11a7(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nges brjod rgyud ni bram bla ma yi// bla ma rgyud pas bshad pa bzhin// phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog dam pa// rtog pa med cing spyod pa med// 
11a8(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par spangs// tshes grangs med cing skar ma med// bslab pa'i chog yod ma yin// gtsang sgra med cing mi gtsang med// dag pa'i bya ba'ang yod ma yin// dus dang cod las rnam par grom// ngan rje
11b1(rgyud): spyod pa rnam par spangs// rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor ba yis// sems can kun gyi don bya byed// ri yi sul dang rtsi dang // chu dro chen po'i phyogs dag dang // rgya ma tsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang / shing gcig dang ni dge
11b2(rgyud): ba'i gnas// ma mo'i khyim 'am dur khrod dam// sna tshogs dbyen pa'i sa phyogs sam// lha khang ngam ni mchod rten nam// khyim 'am gzhi mdo dag tu ni// sgrub pa po yis sbyor bsgribs nas// 'dod pa kun gyi/ 
11b3(rgyud): 'bras bu ster// gnas ni rtag pa byas nas kyang // yod ni gang du gaga' ba der// sna tshogs bde mchog dam pa ni// de ru bsgrubs nas dngos grub 'gyur// sems sbyor med pa nyid la ni// du mar bye ba'i sgom pa
11b4(rgyud): ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis ni// sa ni byug pa byas nas kyang / bzod par phyin pa'i me tog gis// 'bad pa yis ni gtor bar bya// sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong gdan// mnyam par/ 
11b5(rgyud): gzhag pas rgya cher bya// sbyin pa'i pha rol dmigs nas su/ gcig sems ni byas nas kyang // tshangs pa'iganas bzhi gzham yas kha // bsdu ba'i dngos po byas nas su
11b6(rgyud): dge ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni// sems can kun gyi don yang bya// phyi dang nang du ltas nas ni// chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid// byang chub tshogs kyi mchog dam pa// sems can rnams la rab tu gnas
11b7(rgyud): rang gi snying kha mkha' dkyil du// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas par sgom// de nyid de steng mchog gyur pa// ye shes lnga po zhi ba yis// sna tshogs 'od zer gsal ba yis// rnam par 'phro ngas kun du khyab// dngos kyu
11b8(rgyud): gu 'a pa da kyi kyis mapa ri pa na nas ge ma ni na das shA kyil ma man ni yang kyis gapa sa// da
12a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang // byang chub sems dpa' dang ni bla ma'i rtse// lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni// bdag gis mchod cing brjod par bya// sangs rgyas spros te sprul pa'i mchog/ khro bo'i rgyal
12a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor mas// 'gro ba'i rigs drug sems can rnams// sangs rgyas gnas su dgod par byed// na mkha'i dkyil ni kun khyab pa'i// mchog de mthong nas bsdus nas su// thams cad gsum la skyabs su mchi// byang / 
12a3(rgyud): chub mthar thug par du ni// sems can lus gyur pa rnams// sangs rgyas go 'phang de la gzhag/ de la sgrub pas gsol ba gdab// dge ba'i las las byung ba la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rmongs pa'i gzugs can// 
12a4(rgyud): nga rgyal dang // gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes de bzhin no// bruM oM ho haM hUM he/ de'i rnam par snang mdzad dang // rdo rje nyi ma gar dbang phyug/ rdo rje rgyal pos khyab pa yin// rdo rje sem
12a5(rgyud): dpa' mchog de bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// he ru ka/ dpal rdo rje yin// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang reg pa yid de bzhin// oM hUM traM a khaM haM/ gti mug dang ni zhe sdang dang / 
12a6(rgyud): de bzhin 'phra dog 'dod chags dang // ser sna dang ni rmongs pa nyid// skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje'o// sa dang chu dang de bzhin te// rlu dang na mkha' nyid dag go// laM mo baM ha~M Sha/ ltung byed ma dang gsod ma dang // 'gugs
12a7(rgyud): byed ma dang gar dbang dang // pad ma'i dra ba mo lha mo// nam mkha' mnyam na mkha' lta bu'o// de ltar gzugs dang khams dang ni// skye mched rnams ni rnal 'byor mas// gzugs kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni// yongs su dag par
12a8(rgyud): shes par bya// chos kun gzugs kyang yongs dag ste// de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro// sngags kyi sku ru 'gyur ba yin// bdag ni khrag 'thung gyur nas ni// sems can kun gyi don yang byed// he ru ka yis go 'phang // 
12b1(rgyud): mchog gathob nas sems can ma lus pa// 'di la 'jog cing dgod par byed// oM swa b+ha ba shud d+ha swarba d+harmA swa b+ha wa shud d+ho haM// lan gsum du ni zla bar bya// dngos med butun tshogs phyogs bcu ru// snying po'i phreng ba sgo bar
12b2(rgyud): byaHdes na snying po de mthong nas// dra ba ra ba de bzhin te// rdo rjes sa srogs byin gyis brlabs kyis bla re mda' yi dra ba dang // rdo rje me ni 'bar bas bskor// pha rol ring nas dgod par bya// oM me 'di ni badz+ra b+ha ba badz+ra b+han d+ha d+haM// oM/ 
12b3(rgyud): badz+ra pra ba ka ra b+h+rUM baM hU~M/ oM badz+ra ban tsa ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra bi tra na hUM khaM hUMHoM badz+ra sha ra dza la D+haM She nAM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la na la rka hU~M hU~M b+h+rUM/ khrag 'thung ye shes 'khor lo ni// gtso bo bdag do 'bar ba dag/ de mthong nas ni legs
12b4(rgyud): bar ru// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// dag pa'i shol dang zla mdog 'dra// phyag rgya che dang mnyam par ldan// shes
12b5(rgyud): rab dkyil dkrung legs par bzhugs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mi spyod pa ni dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams thamasacad yongs su rdzogs// thams cad mtshan nas mtshan pa yin// dpe byang
12b6(rgyud): kun gyis rgyan pa ste// thod pa khA traM kha 'dzin cing // rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin mdzad cing // dbang chen bde ba'i go 'phang bzhugs// gar zhing ser la ljang khu ste// zhal gdong gnyis po rnam
12b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// lugs su 'byung dang thog tshul gis// de yis khro bo brgyad dang spro/ rdo rje drag po na la rka/ rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin te// thangs spyod rdo rje gnod sbyin dang // rdo rje nag po stostabs po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed/ 
12b8(rgyud): ces bya ba// khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod// sngo zhing ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang khu du ba'i mdog can te// dkar zhing gnag la gur gum mdog/ rab 'jigs thod pa'i dbu rgyan can// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug
13a1(rgyud): thams cad na ra'i rus pa yi// rgyan gyis bsdud pa rab tu 'bar// g.yas rkyang ba'i zhabs kyis ni// sna tshogs pad ma'i nang bzhugs shing // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// 'jig
13a2(rgyud): rten skyong ba brgyad po dag/ zhabs kyis mnan par rnam par bsam// thod pa dang ni khA taM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'chang // thams cad dril bu cang te'u 'dzin// shes rab bde bas legs par
13a3(rgyud): 'khyud// dam ra ser dbu skra dag gis rgyan// mche ba rnam brtsigs 'jigs pa can// stag gi lpags pa gos su snams// 'jigs pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te// des ni bdag nyid rgyan du byas// rdo rje/ 
13a4(rgyud): hUM mdzad rnam par sgom// khro zhing 'bar la g.yon pa dang / drag cing 'jigs pa rnam par 'gyur// rgyan rnamasad kyis ni legs par rgyan// g.yas rkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs
13a5(rgyud): lcags kyu zhags pa khA traM 'chang // dril bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin/ mgo bo'i do shal sku la gsol// zod pa'i phreng ba'i sku rigs can// bdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og mnan/ 
13a6(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// khro bo gnyis po rnam par sgom// de nas steng du bsam pa ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par sgom// gtsug tor rdo rje 'og tu/ 
13a7(rgyud): ste/ dkar la sngo ba'i mdog can yin// thod pa dang ni khwa traM 'dzin// 'khor lo dang ni mdung 'dzin cing // zhags pa lcags kyu dril rdo rje// g.yas rkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs// phur bu khro bor
13a8(rgyud): byas nas su// de ni phyogs bcur rnam par spro// de la bka' lung sgom pa ni// dgegs ni myur du med par gyis// gsang sngags rjes su dran nas su// phyogs bzhi dag tu mnyam par gzugs
13b1(rgyud): mthe bong sdig 'dzub sbyor ba yis/ phyogs bcu dag tu se gol btab// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni hU~M hU~M phaT sha ra du'o// oM g+hi na g+hi na hUM hUM phaT byang du'o// oM g+h+r-i na b+ha ya g+hi na b+ha ya hUM hUM phaT nub tu'o// oM
13b2(rgyud): a na ya ho b+ha ga ban badz+ra hUM hUM phaT lho phyogs su'o// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// bgegs kun gyi ni klad pa la// rdo rje phur bu dgod cing gnan// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yin// oM g+ha g+ha g+ha
13b3(rgyud): ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+Ta bi ga ni hUM phaT/ kyi li ya kyi la ya sarba pa paM hUM phaT// hUM hUM badz+ra ki la badz+ra d+ha rod ad dz+nyA pa yA ti/ ka ya bag tsi ta badz+ra kyi la ya hUM phaT/ pur bu rdo rje khro bo ru// ltas nas yongs su
13b4(rgyud): rtag par bya// lugs su byung dang bzlog pa yis// dngos grub rdo rjes btung bar bya// oM badz+ra mud ka ra badz+ra kyi lA ya a ko ta ya hUM hUM phaT// mkhas pas rdo rje khro bo'i tshig/ gas
13b5(rgyud): sngags tshig 'di drag tu bzlas// oM kha badz+ra btIg badz+ra hU~M ke ra badz+rahUM phaT// oM badz+ra tsan d+ha badz+ra hUM phaT// oM badz+ran lA na badz+ra hUM hUM phaT// oM badz+ra Sh+Ti sha badz+ra hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kun d+ha la/ 
13b6(rgyud): badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra yak+ka badz+ra hUM phaT// oM badz+ra ka la badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA bA la badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bI ra b+ha hUM phadz+ra// oM u shrI Sha tsakra wa ra ti badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA tA lA badz+ra hUM/ 
13b7(rgyud): phaT/ bka' 'di dag gis bsgrubs pa yis// de ma thag tu bgegs med 'gyur// mang sa rkang dang zhag kha chu// shu kra rag ta lhan cig sbyar// rnal 'byor pa yis ri lur byas// zos
13b8(rgyud): nas dngos grub nges par 'gyur// sngo zhing ser la ljang khu ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad rang byas te// ser zhing nag la ljang khu dang // dud ka ser la ser skya dang // dkar zhing ser ba ljang khu dang / 
14a1(rgyud): dmar zhing ser la ljang khru dang / de ltar bdag po bsgoms nas ni/ mi bskyod dbu rgyun dam tshig can/ bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin par dgyen/ 'di ltar khro rje
14a2(rgyud): thams cad kyang / dam tshig las ni 'gal mi byed// 'di ltar sna tshogs du ma yis/ gtso bo'i bka' ni bla mar gyis/ garnal 'byor pa ni gar gnas so// bgyogs rnams thams cad med
14a3(rgyud): par mthong // gcer bu 'am yang na mi gcer ram// skra grol thal bas yan lag byugs// 'di ltar ji srid ngal ba'i bar// 'khor lo dag gis bzlas pa bya// stong pa'i ye shes rdo rje ni/ 
14a4(rgyud): dad pas dan zhing mnyam par gzhag/ oM dz+nyA ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa ad mo ko hUM/ oM a ni mi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa/ ad ma ko haM/ oM pra ti hi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa/ 
14a5(rgyud): ad ma ko haM// smig rgyu tsam gyi ye shes ni// sems tsam du ni rnam par brtag/ 'di ni mkha' mnyam lta bu yi// chos dang chos min nyid yin no// 
14a6(rgyud): na mkha' gos pa med pa ltar// dngos po med cing dmigs su med// gang du snying gi khar sbyar dbus gnas gsal/ phra rab rdul lta bur rang byung myos pa'i sems 'jug pa/ khams/ 
14a7(rgyud): gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyir 'gro ba/ gsal ba'i chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ dbang po g.yo ba'i rta kun nang du des sbyor ba'i// ye shes rgyal ba ma
14a8(rgyud): lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa/ khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni 'gro ba yi// mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra bar dri med dpal du gyur// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rjes dran pa// sems
14b1(rgyud): su du gog 'i / kyi dgal rdzunas sas byed nam / sem zhes rnams kya
14b2(rgyud): shin du rgom pa goms bsdus// 'bar ba 'din mi com thong // rab tu snying la gnas pa yis// zin ma gcig pu mi ge mod// skyes bus den sgom gyur na// legs skye bar 'gyu
14b3(rgyud): mo/ bdag ni snying rjes par 'dogs pa smon lam dang gis 'ong ba dang / mthong nas ji srid 'ogatun 'azla ba'i dkyis 'khor dbus sun drirje sems dpa
14b4(rgyud): kun mkhyen pa// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dpa ldan pa minanas dang bzhi// rlungadakyil 'khor rnam par bas / yig ya
14b5(rgyud): slong phyub na pa 'ang sa mtshan parabod pa'i sa khyab pa dmigs
14b6(rgyud): de yi steng du yi ga rab me'i dkyil 'khor mchog dang / gru gsum pa la dmar ba'i mdog/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar bas khyang / nyi ma'i bye ba'i 'od mtha' yas/ 
14b7(rgyud): rdo mtha' mar sgom par bya/ de mi steng du du nyid ni/ yi ge pa mchog sas byung // du sha ra'i mdog 'dra ba bzlum 'od zer 'breng ba can/ de yi keng du
14b8(rgyud): sa'i dkyil 'khor// sam las byung ser ba ste/ zur bzhi pa la rdo rje mtshan/ 'od raserakhyad pa 'khregs/ 
15a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor de steng sgom pa ni// ri rab lhun po mchog gyur pa// zur bzhi pa la rin chen bzhi// rtse mo brgyad kyis ni rnam par mdzes// yi ge gsum las legs par
15a2(rgyud): 'byung // 'od zer gzi borjid mchog dam pa'o// de yi steng du bsam pa ni/ bum ni dkar po las byung ba'i// de steng 'khor lor bcas pa dag/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsam
15a3(rgyud): zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// brta' babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan// dra ba dra phyed kyis mdzes shing // ba den phreng bas rnam par rgyan// zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud 'tshams rnams
15a4(rgyud): surdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan cing // pi yi dkyil 'khor thig gtab po// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// brgyad po'i dkar po'i mdog can la// de yi dbus su pad ma phye/ 
15a5(rgyud): sna tshogs 'dab ma brgyad pa la// lte bau ge sar gyis khyab pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rig mar bcas// dkar po ser po de bzhin te/ 
15a6(rgyud): dmar dang ljang khu zhal bzhi pa// zhi zhing rgod dang khro ba dang // rnam par 'gyur ba shin du 'jigs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// mdung dang dra sta cang te'u// dri gug thod pa khA tAM khA// tshangs
15a7(rgyud): pa'i lpags gos su bsnams pa// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dag/ phyag ni bcu gnyis de bzhin to// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs// dbu rgyan thod pa'i dpyod pa na can/ 
15a8(rgyud): rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dpe byad mtshan dang yang dag ldan// thugs kyi ye shes dam tshig can// dpyod pa na rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab de// phyag rgya lnga po/ 
15b1(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs// rigs kyi dbye ba phye nas nas ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mchog/ bde ba chen pos sbyor sa sbyor bas// sku ni gnyis su mod par mim// mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sku// 
15b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo ni dpa' dang // rnal 'byor ma dang bcas pa 'byung // g.yas g.yon rkyang skum tshul gyis bzhugs// dkar sngo ser dmarare zhal mdog ste// 'khor lo dril bus 'khyud pa'i
15b3(rgyud): phyag/ sngar gyi rdo rje sems rdzogs pa'i// phyag mtshan rim pas 'dzin pa yin// thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ni// mgo yi phreng ba rlon pas bsdud// zla ba phyed pa rab 'dzin pa// zhal bzhi mche ba rnam
15b4(rgyud): par brtsigs// spyan gsum pa phyag bcu gnyis// tshangs pa la srogs zhabs kyis gnon// na ru'i rus pa'i rgyan cha can// rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya drug gis
15b5(rgyud): rab brgyan pa// stag gi lpags pa bgos pa/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mas pang du mkhyud pa/ skul thod pa dang / bdug pa la sdig 'dzub kyis 'khor lo 'dzin pas mkhyung
15b6(rgyud): pa/ byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril ba/ bde ba dang dgyes par mos pa/ khams dang phung po dang / skye mched rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ sa'i khams ni lam ste/ ltung byed ma'o// chu'i khams
15b7(rgyud): ni ma ma ste gsod byed ma'o// me'i khams ni ram ste 'gugs byed ma'o// rlung gi khams ni ya ma ste gar gyi dbang phyug mo'o// na mkha'i khams ni khaM ste pad ma'i dra ba ma'o// ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / 
15b8(rgyud): sngo ba dang / dud ka dang / sngo ba'o// gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad te/ oM mdog dkar po'o// tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje rin chen te/ oM gser gtso ma'i kha dog lta bu'o// 'du shes hri sti pad ma
16a1(rgyud): gar gyi dbang phyug dmar ba'o// 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po ho ho ljang khu'o// rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ hUM dkar po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de khe
16a2(rgyud): na nyid hi mdog nag mo'o// mig la byA ma ste gti mug rdo rje dkar mo'o// rna ba hAM zhe sdang rdo rje ste nag po'o// sna ni kham pa dog rdo rje ste ser ba'o// ngag chags pa rdo rje ste/ a dmar po'o// reg ni ser/ 
16a3(rgyud): sna rdo rje ste hUM ljang khu'o// skye mched thams cad dbang phyug rdo rje ste haM dkar po'o// lus ni hU~M dkar ba'o// ngag ni ang ste dmar po'o// yid ni oM ste sngon po'o// de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi bar gyis
16a4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs cing dmigs so// de la shar gyi 'dab ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog sngon po'o// lho phyogs 'dab ma la/ lam ni ljang khu ste sngo sangs so// nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la
16a5(rgyud): dum skyes ma dmar po'o// byang gi 'dab ma la gzugs can ma gser gyi mdog ser skya zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa/ phyogs kyi gos 'chang ba/ g.yas rkyang bas gan+d+ha
16a6(rgyud): pa 'jigs pa'i zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan po/ thod pa dang khA taM khaM dang / cang de'u dang / bri gug 'dzin pa zhal gdong rjes su chags pas gnas pa/ dgyes pa'i chags pas/ 
16a7(rgyud): lta zhing reg pa'o// 'tshams bzhir bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa'i steng du byang chub sems kyis gang bu'i snod bzhi gzhag go/ shar du pre ta pu rir stobs chen dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma nag po/ byang du gri ha de
16a8(rgyud): ba tar/ rdo rje rin chen dang / tum skyes ma ser mo/ nub tu so'u ri shwar d+ha mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma dmar mo/ lhor su ba rna di sar na mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo go cha ljang khu'o// mer na ga rar dpal
16b1(rgyud): khrag 'thung dang rab dpa' mo dmar po'o// bden bral du sin dur pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste/ zla ba dang ser skya'o// rlung phyogs na ma ru ba ter rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur pon
16b2(rgyud): dud pa'i mdog can/ dbang ldan du ku la tar rdo rje dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen po dkar po'o// stobs po che la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba
16b3(rgyud): phyag gnyis pa ni 'khor lo dang / dril bus 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan khra tI ka dang / cing de'u 'dzin pa/ phyag rgya lngas rgyan pa/ g.yas rkyang bas bzhugs so// 'khor lo shugs can ma
16b4(rgyud): la sogs pa'i lha mo ni gdong gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ thod pa dang sdig 'dzub 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum pa/ drag po'i gzugs can/ skra grol
16b5(rgyud): ba lcer bu gnyis su med par sbyor bas mnyam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi gos can/ mgrin pa'i nor bu dang gdub bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna tsa dang / tshangs pa'i skud/ 
16b6(rgyud): pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo bo'i 'phreng ba dang / g.yer ka sa 'og dpag byas pa/ shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i sgor kha gdong ma dang / bug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong me dang
16b7(rgyud): phag gdong ma dang rnams so// me dang / bden bral ba dang / rlung dang / dbang ldan du ni go shin rje srog ma/ gshin rje pho nya mo dang / gshin rje che ba mo dang / gshin rje 'joms ma rnams so// ji ltan
16b8(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma bzhin du kha gdong ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba'ang de bzhin no// 'tshams kyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa yid 'phrog pa'i tshul can// yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhags// drag po chen po thugs
17a1(rgyud): rjes sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o// dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang / dpral bar 'khor lo'i phreng ba can no// 'di dag ni skra'i 'khor lo sa 'og na gnas pa'o// bcom ldan
17a2(rgyud): 'das dkyil 'khor la bzhugs te/ dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa chags pa'i mig gis lta zhing / sna tshogs ro'i bcud kyis bde ba chags pa'i bde ba chen po ste/ de ring du
17a3(rgyud): ni bdag gis rnyed// a la la ho dgyes pa che// bde ba chen po de nyid yin// bder gshegs lha ni shin mdzes// klu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// dga' ba'i srid dag las grol ba// bder gshegs pa dag
17a4(rgyud): pa che/ dkyil 'khor du rnam par rtag/ mngal skyes klu yi dbang 'gyur ba// rnal 'byor kha cig 'dod pa yin// mngal skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste// ye shes dkyil 'khor ltas nas ni/ 
17a5(rgyud): mchod dang bstod pa byas nas bzhugs// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor/ ba yis// dngos dang dngos med rnam par sgom// rnal 'byor ma yis ma nor bar// bzlas pas khri 'am 'bum du bzlas/ 
17a6(rgyud): skye ba can gyi lus grub ste// mkha' la spyod pa the tsom med// oM shri ka ya Ta ka ru ru lum bruM hUM phaT/ d+ha ki dz+wa la saM b+ha ra swA hA/ snying po'o// oM bruM haM ho bruM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM/ 
17a7(rgyud): bab+hu dad d+ha ni/ n+yai bi ro tsa ni ye bruM hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po'o// oM bruM sarba b+hud d+ha d+ha ki ni/ ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM shrI ma hA ba la k+ShaM hU~M hUM phaT/ oM ma tsakra be gaM hUM hUM phaT/ oM haM rang na badz+ra haM hUM hUM/ 
17a8(rgyud): phaTaHoM khan d+ha ro ha~M hUM hUM phaT/ oM ha hi ya grI ba hi hUM hUM phaT/ oM su'u 'di ni ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM hUM a ka sha ga ra ba hUM hUM phaT/ oM tsi krA bar mi ni ye hUM hU~M phaT/ oM ki li shri he ru ka kai li hUM hU~M phaT/ oM su bi ni hU~M/ 
17b1(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM mi li pra ma na ra te shA ra mi li hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma tA pa la hUM hUM phaT/ oM tsi li be ro tsa na tsi li hUM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra wa ra ti ni ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM di li badz+ra swad tA di li hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bi rgya hUM hUM phaT/ oM ka kA/ 
17b2(rgyud): s+ye hUM hU~M phaT/ oM u lu ka se hUM hU~M phaT/ oM oM sho na s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM su ga ra s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma de te hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma du tits+tsha hU~M/ oM ya ma da Sh+Ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha ni hUM hU~M phaT/ oMT+Ta ki ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ 
17b3(rgyud): oM la me hUM hUM phaT/ oM khan d+ha ri he hUM hUM phaT/ oM ru si ni hU~M hUM phaT// mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro la sogs la/ thog ma pad ma dag gis ni// mchod pa bya zhing sngags kyang bzlas// rtag tu bdag/ 
17b4(rgyud): nyid lnga po dag/ 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// zhi ba dang ni dbang nyid dang // rmongs par bya dang gnod pa dag/ sku yi/ mkha' 'gro byed pa ste// dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig
17b5(rgyud): can dag langs dus su// yan lag drug du sgom bya ba// rnam dag ye shes mig gis ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams lha// oM bru~M na ma snying ka la/ oM swA hA mgo la/ oM haM spyi gcig la/ oM pa/ 
17b6(rgyud): shad ta hi ga cha'o// hU~M hU~M ho mig la'o// phaT haM yan lag kun gyis mtshon no// dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang ljang khu dud ka dang // yid kyis mdog drug rnam par sgom// oM haM oM/ sangs rgyas mkha'
17b7(rgyud): 'gro ma ste lte ba la'o// oM hUM ya mi ni ste snying ka la'o// oM mo rmongs byed ma ste kha la'o// hriM hraM g.yo byed ma ste mgo la'o// he hU~M skrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o// phaT na ma tsan d+ha ka ste/ yan lag thams cad kyi
17b8(rgyud): mtshon cha'o// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ mkha' 'gro rnams ni bzhugs nas kyang // rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad 'di yis rnam par brtags// 'chi med ye shes lnga bzang zhing // ji ltar bde
18a1(rgyud): bar gnas par bya// rdo rje dam tshig can mchod nas// dus bzhi dag tu bsnyen pa bya// sku yi sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste// / bzhi pa'o// // de nas
18a2(rgyud): gzhan bshad bya ba// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgoms te// sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par sgom// brgyad pa dmar po'i mdog can la// nang gi 'dab ma snga ma
18a3(rgyud): bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' bla med pa// gsung gi rdo rje rnam par sgom// gdong bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis// g.yas rkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs// pad ma'i mkha' 'gro mas 'khyud cing / 
18a4(rgyud): rtag tu bde ba che la bzhugs// pad ma'i dril bus mnyam par da 'khyud// dbang phyug chen po'i lpags pa ni// phyagaganyis dag gis rkyang bar gnas// lhag ma snga ma'i rim pa bzhin/ 
18a5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i mthar thug ga k+Sha zhabs 'og gnas par rnam par lta// dmar zhing sngo ba de bzhin ser/ g.yon pa dkar sa spyan gsum pa// ral pa'i dbu rgyan dag
18a6(rgyud): grigis brgyan// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la mdzes// zla ba phyed pa'i chung ba dang // sna tshogs pad ma rnam bkod cing // mche ba rnam par gartsigs pa dang // 'jigs pa'i zhal ni rnam 'gyur zhing // 
18a7(rgyud): sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// stag gi lpags pa gos su bsgoms// mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba can// mgul rgyan gdub bu rna cha dang // mgo mo'i phreng bas rgyan// mchod phyin thogs dang thal ba ste/ 
18a8(rgyud): phyag rgya drug du rab tu grags// de dag pha rol phyin drug ste// phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab pa'o// de yi pang na bcom ldan ma// pad ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rang mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa
18b1(rgyud): gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste// dum pA'i rgyan gyi ske regs can// phyag g.yon thod 'dzin 'khyud pa dang // bdug pa bdud kyi khrag 'chang zhing // pad mar gra'i phyogs kun du// bdug pa kun las sdig
18b2(rgyud): 'dzub byed// drag cing bskal pa'i me yi gzi// zhal nas kyang ni khrag 'dzag cing // byin pa gnyis kyis rnam par 'khril// bde ba chen po'i thugs rje'i bdag/ mkha'i 'gro mo tshogs sngar bshad bzhin
18b3(rgyud): pad ma la sogs phyogs bkod na// dngos grub thams cad rab tu rtsol// sngar bshad mdog tu gnas pa ste// 'on kyang mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo// dum skyes ma ni de bzhin nag/ lha mo gnyis po mdog de
18b4(rgyud): bzhin// phyag g.yon khA traM thod pa dang // g.yas pa cang de'u gri dgug 'dzin// 'tshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // 'chi med lnga po'i bum steng du// byang chub sems kyi stod kyang gzhag
18b5(rgyud): gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar du ka ma ru par myug gu can dang // sa bsrungs ma he ru ka ra ba'o// byang du oM tra nar rdo rje rel pa can dang // 'jigs byed chen po ste dmar ba'o// nub tu tr-i sha ku/ 
18b6(rgyud): nini dpa' bo chen po dang // rlung gi shugs can ma ste nag pa'o// lhor ko la la na rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang // chang mthung ma ste gnam mdog ljang ku'o// me'i phyogs na ka ling kau na rab bzang dang // sngo gsangs mi ste
18b7(rgyud): ser po kar skya'o// bden bral du lam pa ka na rdo rje bzang po dang // rab bzang ma ste dkar ba'o// rlung phyogasaM su ka ne ci na 'jigs byed chen po dang // rten mo ste ljang khu'o// dbang ldan du ni hi la ma la ya nA mris
18b8(rgyud): mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste/ gnam mdog sngo gsangs so// gsung gi 'khor los sa la spyod pa'o// myug gu can la sogs pa'i dbang po ni// zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ 
19a1(rgyud): ral ba'i dpyod pa na can/ phyag gnyis na pad ma dang dril bu 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag ni khA traM kha/ g.yas na cang de'u phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas rgyan pa/ g.yas rkyang ba'i gnas pas
19a2(rgyud): bzhugs pa'o// dpa' bo la spogs pa snga mo bzhin no// lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa thod pa dang ldan pa/ sdig 'dzub pad ma can gyis mkhyud pa/ mgul rgyan dang / gdub bu dang / dpung
19a3(rgyud): brgyan dang / rna cha dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgrin pa'i rgyan dang / thod pa'i phreng ba dang / mgo ljags dag gis sku rags can// sgo bsrungs la srogs sngar bshang bzhin// gshin rje sreg srogs lha mo
19a4(rgyud): rnams// 'tshams bzhi sngar ltar shes par bya// dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang // bral bar pad ma'i phreng ba can/ phung po skye mched khams rnams kun// sku gsung thugs su rnam par rtag/ 
19a5(rgyud): sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin// yi ge rnams ni gdod cing sgom// thugs ni a ste dmar po yin// gsung ni oM ste dkar por bshad// rdo rje sku ste hU~M yin no// nam mkha' zla ba lta bu'o// dkyil
19a6(rgyud): 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang // thams cad sbyor zhing bsgoms pas su// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// dbang skur bas ni bzhugs par bya// thams cad byung ste them nas su// thams cad sgom zhing bsam par bya/ 
19a7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis// spro bsdu dag ni sbyor bar bya// // oM shr-i bag a ro lig hUM phaT/ hUM d+ha ki ni dza la sa~M pa ra swA hA/ snying po'o// oM a ro l-ig hraM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM pad ma d+ha ki ni hr-i/ 
19a8(rgyud): hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po'o// oM sarba pad ma d+ha ki na~M/ e a hUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM d+ha ki ni ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM la me hUM hUM phaT/ oM kha na d+ha ro hi hUM hUM phaT/ oM ru bi ni hUM hU~M phaT/ oM phaT/ oM gu ri ka phaT
19b1(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/ oM e ra ba ti hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM de ha badz+ra Ti la da ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM mahA khe ra bi hUM hU~M phaT/ oM pa tsa ma hA bi ra ba tsa ts+tsha hUM phaT/ oM ba yu be ke d+hu hU~M phaT/ oM bkra badz+ra d+b+ha/ keka ra wa kA ba sa ru dir an tra ma la a bam
19b2(rgyud): mai b+hu hUM phaT/ oM su ra d+ha krI ye hUM hU~M phaT/ oM gI na su g+ni b+ha tAg+ni nas/ b+hA b+ha la ga b+hu d+hi ga sar sam b+ha/ tardza ya tardza ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ga sha ma dwe ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM a gad ta ya badz+ra ba tra a gad ta ya hUM hU~M phaT/ oM su dad/ 
19b3(rgyud): tre hUM hU~M phaT/ oM hri ma hA be ra ba hi hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ha ya kar ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM d+hi bi ru b+hak+ka dz+ye hUM hU~M phaT/ a kha kha a na ne hUM hUM phaT/ a~M ka ka s+ye hUM b+h+rUM patsa/ oM u lu ka s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM sha na se hUM hU~M phaT/ oM su ga ra sha~M hUM hUM badz+radakhri/ 
19b4(rgyud): a mi hA ra d+ha dz+nyA baT/ e ya ma du hUM hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma dang Sh+T+r-i ts+tsha d+hU phaHoM ya ma ma tha ni dzu dz+nyA brdo rje dmatshagis mchod nas// bzlas pa'i tsheg rab tu bya// dgug pa dang rgyas pa/ 
19b5(rgyud): nyid/ sna tshogs las ni 'grub par 'gyur// chos can yid 'ang gyur pa de/ ngag gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// mchog dang bar ma thams cad dang // tha ma thams cad mthar gnas la// de la ba/ 
19b6(rgyud): cad gnas pa ste// sna tshogs las ni 'grub par 'gyur// sna tshogs 'dul ba'i mchog dam pa// 'dod pa'i chags pas rjes su chags// 'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa dag/ bdag nyid chen po sgrub pa bo// de yi ngas
19b7(rgyud): gnas pa ldan// rnachags padas mdzes gnas na// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ b+har du nga rdzogs chos kyi bdag ba ba ches rnam pa bcugs// langs pa'i dus su dam tshig ni/ hrI
19b8(rgyud): chu bza' zhing // chos kyi phung po rdzogs gyur nas// rig pa'i rgyal por la sogs 'gug/ oM a snying ka la/ nam chi mgo la/ swA pas ro leg sgra gtsug la/ b+ho shad cig tsha la'o// dz+ha ts+tsha tsaM rig la 'o/ 
20a1(rgyud): phaT ha mtshon cha'o// chos rdo rje dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rta mchog ste dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / dkar ba dang / 
20a2(rgyud): sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / gur gum mdog dang / ljang khu ste bye brag go// oM pad ma'i mkha' 'gro ste lte ba la'o// oM a yaM pad ma'i ya mi ni dang / hri mo pad ma'i rmongs byed ma dang / hr-i hI pad ma g.yo byed
20a3(rgyud): ma dang / phaT haM pad ma can d+hi ka dang / snying ka dang / mgo bo dang / spyi gtsug dang / mig dang / yan lag kun la ste/ chos kyi mtshon cha rnams so// dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang
20a4(rgyud): khu dang / dud pa'i mdog can no// bzlas pa'i dus su dgod pa ste// ji ltar bde bar byed par bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams da kyis// go 'phang gnas shing bzhugs pa yin// mnyam pa/ 
20a5(rgyud): gzhag pas dod 'byung ba// rtse gcig dmig pas blang bya ste// rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis// chos rnams thams cad rab tu rtag/ rdo rje chu dang rnam snang dang // sbrang rtsi dmar rkang lhan cig sbyor/ 
20a6(rgyud): lce yi dam tshig sbyor ba yis// snying po ye shes de nyid do// bdag po dbu rgyan la bsgoms la// ci bde bar ni bza' bar bzang // lha yi gzugs su gyur nas su// 'dod pa'i lha yi bdag por skye// bza' ba/ 
20a7(rgyud): mo'i btung ba yis// nad dang rgas pa rnam par spangs// sems can rjes su chags pa yis// lha mo'i klu 'dis skul ba yis// byang chub chos rnams thams cad kyi/ sems can rnams ni bla med mdzad
20a8(rgyud): brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yis// thugs rjes bskyed cing bstan par mdzad// gsad pa'i chos ni bstan kyang // rang gi dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji lta bar ni bstan pa
20b1(rgyud): byaH ji lta bar ni bstan pas grol// de nyid rnal 'byor mas bskul nas// sna tshogs du ma mang po yis// dam tshig mchod pa ngo mtshar chad// mig phyid nas ni bstan pa ni// a pa ra ta ru su ra ta su kha// b+ha ha su/ 
20b2(rgyud): khad tA so khyA ma sa// sa ma ya ra ya ho/ su ra ta so khyA pa ti sa ma tsa ri ta/ su g+ha taM shan ta ma ya pra bi kur ba// su ra tad pa pad ma dz+wa le pra be dzem/ su ra tod su kha pad ma dze le pra be nan ta nar ta/ su kha sa dan/ su
20b3(rgyud): tan pad ma dza le/ pra ti ma d+ha ma d+ha su ra taM/ byai shwa dza le ho ha hUM ha ha ho// dza la ma hA su kha te dze/ ma ra ya ma ho/ su ra khe du su ka ba bi bi da de dza mu pra dza ya te dzA ra ha ha ha he/ ba ra ha sa su kha ho hU~M he ho su ra te tr-i ra ra ga su kha ti/ 
20b4(rgyud): rI dza sa ra shri ra ti ho/ pa ra ma he tu ma hA su kha hau/ su kha ma nu so nar ra/ par me shwa ra ho/ ho b+ha ga b+ha na ma hA su kha khaM hU~M ho/ ba hu ba bi ta sha dzA lA ti pri sha mo sha ma ho/ su ra ti su khams ga tsang tra sa ra ma ma ha su kha
20b5(rgyud): su kham nu 'grin to/ su ra hi/ ud taM sa na tI/ su khaM a ro lig a ma su khaM g+ho d+hA ho// / glu 'di dag ni blangs kyis// rga shing bde bar yang dag 'dus// bde ba chen pos yid 'dod pa/ 
20b6(rgyud): dngos skyob kyang ni thob par 'gyur// 'khor tshogs chen po byin brlabs nas// dkyil 'khor chen po dgyes pa che// pad ma 'dra ba'i sdom pa yin// / nges par brjod pa rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ 
20b7(rgyud): le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// gzhal yas rtsegs pa'i dbus dag tu// 'khor lo'i mchog ni dgod par bya// sngon po'i mdog can
20b8(rgyud): gzi brjid che// gsang ba las byung brgyad pa yin// de yi dbus su pad ma ni// sna tshogs pad ma ge sar can// 'dab ma brgyad du bshad pa ste// rnam dag gdan du byas pa yin// de yi dbus su zla ba sgom// der ni zla
21a1(rgyud): ba'i khyad par ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// lha mchog grol zhing bzhengs par 'gyur// oM hU~M ma hA su kha a la la la ho// ma hA su ra ta s+t+waM/ su ra ta su kha bi yo ga su ra ta/ ud tam
21a2(rgyud): bo de su khaM su kha ma nu sid d+ha ho/ su ra to ba so khyA ma ya oM a hUM ho/ g+ho g+ha b+han ma hA su kha ud d+hA ra ud ta ra/ sarba ud ma mo khya ma ya hUM a la la la tse// ma hA su ra ta traM/ pa ra ma su kha a ma le tu bi mi ud
21a3(rgyud): ta ma dza la su khaM/ a la la la ho/ su ra to so khya ma ye// bcom ldan bde chen po ni// 'khor dang bcas par mnyam par bzhengs// thugs kyi 'khor lo zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas rkyad
21a4(rgyud): g.yon skum pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// spyan gsum pa/ mche ba rnam par rtsigs pa/ sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / serarA ba dang / dmar ba'i zhal rdo rje dang dril bus mkhyud pa// khyab 'jug
21a5(rgyud): gi mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa/ khyab 'jug gi lpags pa rlon pa rkyang nas phyag gzhan gnyis na bsnams pa'o// zhes/ sku'i mkha' 'gros gsungs so// thod pa'i phreng ba can mgo'i
21a6(rgyud): phreng ba 'chang ba// mgo bo'i phreng ba'i sku rigs bcings pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// zla ba byed pa'i rgyan yang 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rje dpyod pa na gnon// stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnams
21a7(rgyud): phyag rgya drug gis rnam par rgyan// mdun gyi mkha' 'gro ma ni zhal gcig pa// phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu dam bus rgyan pa/ skye regs can/ phyag g.yon pa thod pa thogs
21a8(rgyud): mas mkhyud pa/ g.yas pa rdo rje sdig 'dzub can// skye rigs g.yer ka'i sgra sgrogs pa chos kyi sgra ni yid 'ong // de bzhin 'byung po bye ba yang // chos kyi dbyings de stong pa yin// mnyam pa nyid dang so sor
21b1(rgyud): rtog/ bye ba byed pa yang de bzhin sgom// sbyor ba mchog ni dam pa ste// rnam dag legs par brtags nas su// mnyam nyid chos kyi ro gcig bya// 'khor lo la ni rnam par lta// shar gyi 'dab mar mkha'
21b2(rgyud): 'gro dang // lho phyogs la ma de bzhin te/ nub phyogs tu ma skyes ma dang ni// byang phyogs gzugs can ma dang bzhin// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu'i mdog can mchog dam pa// thod pa dang ni/ 
21b3(rgyud): kha tra 'dzin// cang de'u gri gug de bzhin te// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams sgyur// gcer bu ska gol 'jigs pa can// g.yas rkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs// 'dod pa'i chags pas legs mos// 
21b4(rgyud): cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur dang // nu ma rab rgyas dga' ba 'dzin// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// phyag rgya lnga yis rgya yis btab// 'tshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis gang ba dgod// de steng byang
21b5(rgyud): chub sems das kyis ni// yongs su dag par gzhag par bya// thugs// kyi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su// pu li ra ma la ya na// thod pa'i dam bu can dang ni// rab gtum ma ste dkar po'o// byang
21b6(rgyud): du dza lan da ra na keng rus chen po dang // gtum mig ma ste ser po'o// nA tu u rgyan ni keng rus can dang // 'od ldan ma ste dmar ba'i/ lho phyogs su ar bu ta na mche ba rnam par gartsegs pa dang / snang chen
21b7(rgyud): ma ste ljang khu'o// me'i phyogs ko ta ba rir rgyan lha dgra dang / dpa' bo gros ma ste na mkha'i mdog can no// bden bral nar me sha ra na 'od dpag med pa dang / mi thung ma ste dkar skya'o// rlung gi phyogs na de ba'i ko tan rdo rje 'od
21b8(rgyud): dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste ljang khu dang mu tig lta bu'o// dbang ldan du ma la ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste pad ma dang ser skya'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo na mkha' la spyod pa'o// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i
22a1(rgyud): dpa' bo ni gdong gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i dpyod pan can/ thugs rjes khro zhing 'jigs pa/ rdo rje dang ni dril bus phyag gnyis 'khyud// g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis na/ 
22a2(rgyud): kha traM kha dang / cang de'u 'chang ba/ phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan pa/ g.yas rkyang bas bzhugs so// rab gtum la spogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa sdig 'dzub kyi thod pas mkhyud pa/ spyan
22a3(rgyud): gsum pa/ ser skya'i gzugs can no// skra grol ba gzugs pa/ gnyis pa gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan// phyogs kyi gos can rnam par rol// mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdub bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / 
22a4(rgyud): rna cha dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo bo'i phreng ba dang / g.yer ka'i sku rogs can/ gre dang zur gyi lha mo rnams/ kha gdong gshin rje sreg la sogs// ji ltar mkha/ 
22a5(rgyud): 'gro'i gdong bzhin du// kha gdong la sngogs de bzhin no// 'tshams rnams lha mo de bzhin te// gzugs gnyis 'dzin cing / 'od 'phro ba'o// phyag sngogs de ltar bsgoms na ni// dngos
22a6(rgyud): grub thams cad rab tu rtsol// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang sbyar// skom pa rtse gcig byas nas ni// bdag mod pa yi go 'phang gnas// snying po ye shes dam tshig ni// skyur
22a7(rgyud): pos 'dod pa kun gyi phyir// sku gsung thugs la rnam bkod nas// sangs rgyas mchog ni rnam par spro// rtag tu dam tshig sbyang bya zhing // ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi'i chu// dam tshig mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// chog
22a8(rgyud): bzhin du zlas pa bya/ oM shr-i tsid ta d+ha ga d+hi ga a kha~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ Da ki dza la saM ba ra swA hA/ snying po'o// oM hU~M hri ha ha hUM hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ oM badz+ra d+ha ki ni b+h+yo hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ki ni ye badz+ra
22b1(rgyud): brna ni ye hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM d+ha ki ni ye hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM la me hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM khan d+ha re he hUM hUM phaT/ oM ru bi ni hUM hU~M phaT/ oM ka ra khan d+ha ka pa li ni ka ra hUM hU~M phaT/ oM pra tsan heH
22b2(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/ oM ku ru ma hA ka ka la ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM tsan d+ha kri ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM ban d+ha kAM ka la b+han d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM pra bA ba ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM ta sa ya bi ga ta dang Sh+Ti na tra sa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA na se hUM hUM phaT/ 
22b3(rgyud): oM kro d+ha ya su ra be ri ni kro d+ha ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM bi ra mi ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM hriM hUM hU~M phaT/ oM kha ra ba ri hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM tra badz+ra pA pa hra hUM hUM phaT/ oM lang kra sha ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM pheM badz+ra d+ha hA pa~M badz+ra hUM hUM phaT/ oM 'dru ma
22b4(rgyud): ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM ka ka s+ye hUM phaT/ oM u lu ka s+ye hUM hU~M phaT/ oM shA na s+ye b+hu hU~M phaT/ oM su ga ra s+ye hU~M b+h+rU~M phaT/ oM ya ma hA d+hi dz+dza hUM phaH/ oM ya ma d+hu ti hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya dang ShAM hUM hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma/ 
22b5(rgyud): ma tha ni hU~M hUM phaT/ zlas pa sgom par ldan byas nas// spro dang bdu ba'i rim pa yis// bsngags pa myur du 'grub pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa go 'phang brnyes// mnyam pa de'i dam tshig mchog/ thugs kyi/ 
22b6(rgyud): rnyed pa'i khyab pa la// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod// mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob 'gyur// 'di ni khams gsum thams cad ni// go 'phang la mchog la legs par bzhugs// langs pa'i dus su dam tshig can// 
22b7(rgyud): yan lag drug bcu sbyor bar spyod// oM he snying ka ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' dkar ba'o// na ma hi mgo la ste/ rnam par snang mdzad ser po// swA hA hUM spyi gtsug la pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug ste/ zla ba dang ser skya'o// bshad
22b8(rgyud): de go ste go cha ste he ru ka na mkha'i mdog can no// hUM hUM ho mig la ste/ rdo rje nyi ma gser bcom lta'o// phaT haM ni yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha ste/ rta mchog ljang khu ser skya'o// oM bang lte ba la ste/ rdo rje mahA
23a1(rgyud): 'gro na mkha' dang ser skya'o// hUM yaM snying ka la ya mi ni dkar ba'o// d+hi mi kha la ste rmongs byed ma dmar ba'o// hri hriM mgo la ste/ g.yo byed ma ser po'o// oM hUM hUM spyi gtsug la ste skrag byed
23a2(rgyud): ma sngon po'o// phaT phaT yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha ste// tsan d+hin ka dmar ser ro// ji ltar bde bar cho ga bzhin du spyad cing gnas so// 'gro ba du ma'i bstan pa la// thugs kyi rdo rje tshul can 'ad
23a3(rgyud): gnyis med sbyor ba mtha' yas pa// srid pa kun gyi dngos por granas// dri ma med cing nga rgyal med// yi ge med cing brjod du med// // nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// 
23a4(rgyud): thugs kyi sdom pa bla ma'i bsnyen bkur gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog gyur pa// 'dod pa'i gsang ba kun ster ba// 
23a5(rgyud): sbas pa'i gsang ba dbang grub rtsol// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i/ phyir// sgrub pa po'i don ni bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dedabus su ni// pad ma'i 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// sna tshogs
23a6(rgyud): mdog can ge sar bcas// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster// de yo dbus su yi ge ts+tsha/ rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dpe byad kun gyis rnam par
23a7(rgyud): rgyan/ dgyes pa chen po'i sbyor ba yis// gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ byang chub kyi rgyud las ni// byang chub zla ba dri med pa// de mthong lha mo langs nas ni// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis/ 
23a8(rgyud): skul/ hU~M rol cig rol cig dgyes pa ho// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni// bde ba chen po'i ro nyid las// 'di nyid du ni bzhengs su gsol// a la la ho dgyes pa che// khyod ni bde ba'i mchog yin te/ 
23b1(rgyud): khyod kyi zhal ni khums tsam gyis// bdag gis 'dir ni rol cig rnyed// kye ma ho bcom ldan bde chen dgyes// oM rdo rje sems dpa' legs dgyes khyod// ro dang ro mchog thams cad te// dgyes pa
23b2(rgyud): chen po bde ba rnams// rtag par dngos grub kun las yang // rol cig rol cig lha mo la// rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad dang // bcom ldan rdo rje chen po ni// lha yi pad ma dgyes la rol// hU~M oM la
23b3(rgyud): la ho dgyes pa che// bcom ldan 'dod pa dgyes pa khyod// 'dod pa'i dngos grub legs par rtsolnga// dpang ma mchog la dgyes par rol// oM u la la ho dgyes pa che// tshogs kyi bde bas dus rtag tu/ 
23b4(rgyud): rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pa yis// pad ma'i zhal mchog bye ba yas// pad ma la ni rol par mdzad// ji ltar bung bas sbrang rtsi bzhin// lha rnams pad ma nyid la rol// kye ma
23b5(rgyud): grogs po dgyes chen 'dir// rdo rje mchog ni bde bar sbyor// dus kun bde ba 'dir mdzod cig/ di ring dus ni 'di nyid du// yang dag byang chub 'dus pa yin// a la la he
23b6(rgyud): dgyes pa che// bde chen kun du dgyes mchog rol// a la la ho dgyes pa che// klu 'di dag gis bskul nas su// mnyam nyid las ni bcom ldan dpal// sdoms pa'i rdo rje bzhengs par 'gyur/ 
23b7(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas par gzigs nas ni// bcom ldan 'das ni zhal bzhi pa// sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang khu'i zhal te/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas rkyang bu 'jigs
23b8(rgyud): byed chen po dang // dus mtshan zhabs 'og tu mnan pa// phyag gnyis na rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pas// dam tshig rdo rje phag mo la mkhyud pa/ phyag gnyis kyis tshogs bdag gis gsang ba 'dzin pa/ 
24a1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i gsum paM na cang de'u// bzhi pa na dgra sta/ lnga pa ni gri gug/ drug pa na rdo rje'i mdung bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gyi gsum pa na rdo rje khA traM ka/ bzhi pa na khrag gis
24a2(rgyud): bkang ba'i thod pa/ lnga pa na rdo rje zhags pa/ drug pa na bdud bzhi'i mgo bo bsnams pa'o// ral pa'i dpyod pan gyi rgyan cha can/ dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'dzin/ 
24a3(rgyud): mgrin/ dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan// 'jigs pa'i mche ba rnams bsgyur zhal/ me skyeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// stag gi lpags gos su bsnams// na ra'i mgo'i phreng ba 'dzin// mgrin/ 
24a4(rgyud): pa nor bu gdub bu rna cha dang // mgo bo'i nor bus rnam par rgyam/ tshangs pa'i skud pa zel ba ste// phyag drug tu rab tu grags// de yi pang na bcom ldan ma// dam tshig rdo rje phug me/ 
24a5(rgyud): ni/ sku mdog de dang 'dra bar bya// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ sbyin gnyis pa la skra grol po// gcer/ bu skye regs 'og phag gis rgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pa na mkhyud pa/ 
24a6(rgyud): ste/ bdud kyi khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa/ g.yas pa ni sdig 'dzub rdo rje dang bcas pas sdig 'dzub phyogs bcur byed pa/ bskal pa'i me'i gzi brjid can// khrag lu dgyes/ 
24a7(rgyud): shing zhal nas 'dzag/ byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par mkhyud// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can// chos kun gnas ni dge ba yis// a li ka li las byung ba// rnam par rtog pa med pa ste// chos dang // 
24a8(rgyud): chos min rnam par spangs// pad 'dab lha mo dgod pa yis// dngos grub thams cad rab tu rtsol// mkha' 'gro ma dngal ma dang // tum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// g.yon phyogs skor ba'i dgod/ 
24b1(rgyud): yis rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub rtsol// nag cing ser ba'i de bzhin dmar// ljang khu drag po'i gzugs can de bzhin te// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// spyan gsum g.yas rkyang gnas
24b2(rgyud): pas bzhugs// gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste// bdud bzhi zhabs kyis mnan pa dang // chags shing zhen pas myos pa dang // thod pa dag gis dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lngas na rnam par rgyan// nag cing la
24b3(rgyud): ldang ba dang // shin du 'jigs shing snang mig can// ser zhing nag la ljang khu ste// snying rje'i ro na yongs su rdzogs// dmar zhing nag la ldang ba dang // skyeg pa la sogs nyams kyi 'khor// ldang zhing gnas
24b4(rgyud): la ser ba dang // 'dzum zhing 'phro bas 'jigs pa dang // zod pa ni khwa tAM 'dzin// g.yon pa cang de'u gri gug ste// mgo bo/ rdo rje mdung g.yas na// 'tshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // dum
24b5(rgyud): pa bdud rtsi lnga yi chus// yongs su gang ba'i steng du yang / de byang tshing sems kyi gang stong gra zhag/ kha gdong la srog lha mo rnams// g.yas rkyang ba'i rnam pas bzhugs// nag dang
24b6(rgyud): sngo gsangs dmar skyer skya// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can la// skra grol ba yis rnam par rgyan// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// gcer
24b7(rgyud): bu yi dgas gdan du gnan// 'dod pa'i snying rjes rnam par myos// g.yon pa ra mgo khA traM ka/ g.yas na thod pa gri gug go// 'tshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // gshin rje sreg srogs mkha' 'gro ma// zhal
24b8(rgyud): gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yas rkyang ba'i gnas bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la yi dgas gdan// skra grol ba yang rab tu 'jigs// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// gtse
25a1(rgyud): bu sna tshogs gzugs can la// dga' zhing bde bas rnam par myos// g.yon pa thod pa khA traM ka/ g.yas pa cang de'u di gug ste// g.yon nas bskor zhing dgod byas na// 'tshams kyi
25a2(rgyud): dngos grub rtsol bar 'gyur// kha gdong la srogs skor dgod la// g.yas nas skor zhing dgod par bya// khams dang phung po skye mched rnams// sku gsung thugs su rnam par sgom// snga bshad pa yi sbyor
25a3(rgyud): yis te cho ga bzhin du dgod par bya// dbang chen dang ni chu dang ni// me dang rlung gis dkyil 'khor gyi// de yi dbus su dkod pa ni// sa srogs bzhi po dag yin no// ltung byed ma dang gsod ma nyid/ 
25a4(rgyud): 'gugs byed ma dang gar byed dag/ de nyid na mkha'i khams yin te 1pad ma'i dra ba stong pa yin// gzugs ni rnam par snang / mdzad yin// tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin// 'du shes gar dbang rgyal
25a5(rgyud): ste// 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin// rnam shes rdo rje sems dang / ste// bder gshegs kun nyid he ru ka/ mig ni gti mug rdo rje ste// chag narna ba ni zhe sdang rdo rje yin// snan
25a6(rgyud): ser sna rdo rje ste// lce ni chags pa rdo rje yin// lus ni 'phra dog rdo rje'o// skye mched kun ni dbang phyug rdo rje'o// hUM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste// a zhes bya ba gsung du 'gyur// oM ni sku yi rdo rje ste/ 
25a7(rgyud): he ni ye shes rdo rje yin// lus srogs rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad rnam par sgom// bde ba'i chags pa'i bcom ldan 'das// chags pa med pa'ang de bzhin te// ye shes 'gro
25a8(rgyud): lo de mthong nas/ mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang skur// rjes su chags pa'i sbyor ba dag/ 'jug pas mnyam pa'i bcud du 'gyur// dngos dang dngos med rnam bsgoms nas// spro dang sdu ba'i
25b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra bI ro tsan ni yai swA hA/ oM sarba b+hud+ha DA gi ni ye badz+ra wa ra na ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ phag mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra d+ha gi ni hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM la ma ni hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM khan dA ro hi hUM hUM phaT swAH
25b2(rgyud): oM ru bi ni hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ga ka s+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM u lu kaM s+ye hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sha na s+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM su gA ra s+ye hUM hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma da d+hi hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma du ti hUM hU~M phaT/ 
25b3(rgyud): ya ma dang hU~M ts+tsha padz+raM/ oM ya ma ma thani hU~M tsAb smre dang bsdu ba'i dngam ze'i sbyo ba yis// rlom pa'i mchog/ mchog ni sgom par bya// 'drin la 'byor ma rnams kyi// mchog
25b4(rgyud): gsang ba spros pa yin// bcu drug ma ni mangs rdzogs pa// sngags dang gsang sngags kun gyi gtso// sgom pa'i dus las langs nas ni// go tshe gnyis ni rnam par dgod// oM he rdo rje sems/ 
25b5(rgyud): dpa' snying ka la// na mi hi rnam par snang mdzad mgo bo la// swA hA pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug spyi gtsug la// bo Sha Ta he khrag 'thung ste dpung pa la// hUM hU~M ho rdo rje nyi ma ste mig la// paT haM rta mchog ste// yan/ 
25b6(rgyud): lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o// oM baM rdo rje phag mo ste// haM yaM ya ni ste snying ka la'o// hri hr-i g.yo byed ma ste lce la'o// hraM maM rmongs byed ma ste mgo la'o// hUM hUM skrag byed ma ste/ spyi gtsug la'o// phaT haM tsan d+hi ka/ 
25b7(rgyud): ste/ yan lag thams cad mtshon cha'o// 'di ltar dngos dang dngos med mnyam// thams cad chos su ro gcig ste// mnyam pa nyid las rnam par bzhugs// mnyam pa'i ye shes lnga po 'di// rnal 'byor dam tshig
26a1(rgyud): can gyis spyos/ smras padi mas dus gsu nas zla / 'dini gsung ba'i mchog yin te// gangs yang ni bstan miH/ nges par brjod pa'i rgyud tham
26a2(rgyud): rdzogs pangam yid 'jig/ gnyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// bad ma'i rgyal po rnam par byasam// lte bar sna tso gA rdi ste// rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa'o// de la lte ba'i dbus su no// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khar/ 
26a3(rgyud): gyis mtshan pa// de ste a l-i kA li ste// dbus su re ka stong pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gis khyab// bdag nyid khrag mthung mchog nyid te/ zhal gdong lnga pa phyag
26a4(rgyud): bcu gnyis// spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba ste// g.yas rkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs// g.yon rkyang ba yang de bzhin bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus
26a5(rgyud): mtshan nyid// zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bri// stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnams// thugs rje khro bos rnam par rol// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// ral pa'i dpyod po na rgyan du thogs/ 
26a6(rgyud): zla ba byed pa spyi gtsug la// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mnan// sgeg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// mI mgo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// zod rlon phreng po rnam par rgyan// mgul rgyan gdub bu rna chang
26a7(rgyud): zed pa'i phreng bas dbu la rgyan// tshangs pa'i skud pa thal ba ste// phyag rgya drug rnam par sgom// phyag gnyis thod pa dril bu yis// pog mo la ni rnam par mkhyud// phyag gzhan gnyis pa dag gis ni/ 
26b1(rgyud): 'jig byed chen po'i lpags rnon bsnams// g.yas pa'i phyag ni gsum po la// rdo rje gsor zhing ba dan gsum 'dzin pa// phyag bzhi pa la mdung rtse lnga pa// lnga pa la gra ste drug pa la rdo rje dang
26b2(rgyud): cang de'u rnams so// g.yon pa'i phyag gsum pa la// rdo rje tsul tr-i bzhi pa la rdo rje nags pa// lnga pa la gri gug/ drug pa la drag po mgog pang du bcom ldan 'das ma/ phag mo la mkhyud
26b3(rgyud): par gnas pa/ de yang phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba gcer bu dum bus rgyan pa'i skye regs can// phyag g.yon pa la byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i/ thod pa snams
26b4(rgyud): pas mkhyud pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i sdig 'dzud kyis/ bdug pa kun la phyogs su sdig 'dzub byeng cing / dri gug 'dzin pa/ bas pa'i me'i gzo brjid can/ khrag la dgyes shing rang
26b5(rgyud): 'dzag po// byin po gnyis kyis legs par mau khril// bde ba'i mchog ni dab pa'o// drag po'i gzugs can rnam par 'gyur// thugs rje chags pas rnam par
26b6(rgyud): rlol/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dad+ya r+m+mAn+d+ha nAn// byen klu dpal rnam+ba pan+d+ha sgom// kun ma mdog ser skye ser ba dang // dpar dang ltung khu nyid yin no// khro dang bzhad dang sgeg pa dang // rnam pa
26b7(rgyud): zhi bar ldan pa dang // khams dang skye mched dang phung po dang // reg pa'ang de bzhin sgom pa ste// mkha' 'gro la ma de bzhin te// dum skyes mi dang gzugs can ma// phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa/ 
26b8(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs// dkyil mo dkrung ni byed par bzhugs// phyogs kyi gos can mchog yin no// thong ba'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// skra grol ba yis rnam par gyon// lha mo phyag rgya lnga 'chang
27a1(rgyud): zhing / 'dod pa'i rnam rol rab tu ster// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni// byang gi phyogs su rnam par dgod// dkar dang ser ba de bzhin no// dmar dang ljang khu chags pas myos// thod pa dang ni khwa
27a2(rgyud): traM 'dzin// dril bu cang de'u gri gug 'dzin// 'tshams bzhi dag tu bum pa bzhi// ye shes lnga yis yongs bkang ba// thod pa 'o mas yongs bkang ba// bum pa'i steng du gzhag par bya// g.yon nas bskor zhing
27a3(rgyud): dgod nas kyang // ye shes sems dpa' dgugs nas su// mchod dang bstod dang bzhugs par bya// yid ngag lus la bkun nas ni// go 'phang mchog ni sgom par bya// hUM a oM ni rnam par sgom// gsang sngags
27a4(rgyud): ji bzhin bzlas nas ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu rtsol// oM shri badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/ DA ki ni dz+wA la saM b+ha ra swA hA/ 8 oM hri ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra
27a5(rgyud): b+he ro tsa na hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba khyAd+d+ha Da ki ni ye hUM hUM swA hA/ lha mo'isnying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o// oM d+ha ki ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM la me hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM khan d+ha ro he hUM hU~M phaT/ oM ru bau ni hUM hUM/ 
27a6(rgyud): paT/ 'khro bo'i sprul pa smos nas ni// 'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par bya// sgom pa bzlas par ldan pa yis/ bdag gis spros dang bsdus pa bya// khams gsum ma lus kun du yang // lus ngag yid gsum
