74a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor mni rab tu bshod// bsnyen pas dka' drin rtsol mdzad de// thogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu bkrug// lha mo mkha' sbyong sa'i go 'phang rnyed// de'i phyi rol gsung 'khor la// shar tu pi wang stangs thabs can/ 
74a7(rgyud): byad du klong bu stangs thabs can// nub du rdza rnga che stangs thabs// lho ru rdza rnga'i stangs thabs ste// sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang ku// me rtsegs rdo rje gzhang ma ste// rdo rje skyeg mo rdo rje glu// rdo rje gar te dmar ba dang / 
74a8(rgyud): sngo dang ser dang lang ku'o// de dag zhal cig phyag bzhi pa// lcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // thod pa'i ni 'phreng ba can// spyan gsum pa la yid 'ong ba/ thod pa dang ni khA tI 'dzin// tsha me rngam lag pa'i stangs
74b1(rgyud): thabs kyis// rdo rje dril bu stangs thabs nan// khrig ma mnyam par byas nas ni// pad+ma pad+ma ma bkod pa'i skangs thabs can// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni// 'dud pa dang ni nye 'dun pa// de dag 'od dpag med dbu/ 
74b2(rgyud): brgyan// sku'i 'khor lo'i shar du ni// me tog byang du bdug pa ma// nub tu mar me lho ru dri// ser dang dud ka dmar dkar po// me long ro dang reg dang chos// me phyogs la sngogs 'tshams su ste// zla ba'i mdog can
74b3(rgyud): dmar ljang dkar// de dag can ni gsum pa ste/ gtsor bu dbu skra grol ba dang // zhabs kyis kun tu gar byed cing // phyag tu mchod pa thogs nas ni// thod pa khA ta~M ga 'dzin cing // cang te'u de ni phyag na snrums// thong
74b4(rgyud): pa'i ni 'phreng ba can// lha mo de dag 'dung dang // nye ba'i 'dus dur khrod dag yin te// rnam par snang mdzad dbu brgyan byas// sgo rnams rdo rje lcags kyu dang // rdo rje zhags pa rdo rje sgrogs// rdo rje dril
74b5(rgyud): bu de bzhin te// sngo dang ljang dang dmar dang ser// shar drang nub dang bya na/ lho'i phyogs kyang de bzhin no// me la sogs pa'i 'tsham su ni// gshin rje sreg la sogs pa dag/ dmar dang sngo dang / 
74b6(rgyud): dung ka ser// thod pa dang ni khA traM gA/ rang gi 'tshan ma cang te'u dang // gri gug mgo bo 'tshang // spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// gcer bu gar gyi gnas pas bzhugs// / thams cad phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan/ 
74b7(rgyud): zad pa dag ni 'phreng ba dang // rang gi rigs kyi thod pa can// ci lnga'i rim pas rjes su gnas// di ya snying dkar ye shes sems// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum// gtso bo bdag po sgom par bya/ 
74b8(rgyud): dkar dang mi dmar dang sngo ba yis// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma lhan cig/ ci lta bu yis sgoms pas na// rjes su bstan pa'i sgoms pa las// ye shes lca gas kyu dag gis ni// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas na// 
75a1(rgyud): ci lta'i rim pas mchod dbang skur // gcig tu sdus te sgoms nas su// ci lnga'i rim pas sgoms nas ni// ye shes bzlas pa dag kyang bya// spro ba dang ni sgrub yin// 'thor 'thung rim pas byas pa'i/ 
75a2(rgyud): slob dpon gyis ni bzlas par bya// oM a hU~M hUM// 'di lta bu'i rim pa yis// grangs med par ni byas nas su// ci srid skyo bar ma gyur par// snying gI dmu 'khor lo ni// mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas par bya// dung rten
75a3(rgyud): 'phreng ba blangs nas ni/ sdom pa mchog gi bzlas pa bya// oM shwa badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM hU~M phaT/ Da gi ni dza la sa b+hA ra swahA// oM badz+ra ba ra di hI hUM phaT/ oM Ta gi ni hA hUM phaT/ oM la me hUM hU~M phaT// oM khan d+ha ro he hUM hUM phaT/ oM/ 
75a4(rgyud): ru lI ni hUM hUM phaT// oM ge ru ru hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM tsu'u ra~M hu~M hUM phaT// oM pra mo hi hUM hUM phaT/ oM be ta li hUM hUM phaT/ oM su ka si hU~MphaT/ oM nai rI li hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ga sma ri hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M hU~M phaT/ 
75a5(rgyud): oM he ru kaM sana? ni ba hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra bI ni hU~M hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra/ ban she hU~M hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra mri tang ke hUM hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra mr-ing+ku dza hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM de s+ye hU~M hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra li s+ye hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ga/ 
75a6(rgyud): te hU~MhU~M phaT// oM badz+ra ni rI te hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra pu sau shwe hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra du b+he hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra di bi hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+rI di pe hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra g+han t+ne hUM hU~M badz+ra oM nu ba badz+re hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM sa pa ta badz+ri hU~M hU~M phaTad
75a7(rgyud): gno d+hi badz+ra hU~M hU~M phaT/ A~M ho ra~M sa~M badz+ri hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM s+pha raM sha~M badz+re hU~M hU~M phaT/ i d+hirma d+ha du badz+ri hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ri a g+hu shi dza dz+dza hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ba shi hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra s+pho ta ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra a pre sha ho hreM hU~M hU~M phadz+ra
75a8(rgyud): a ma hrI hU~M hU~M ba~Mdz+re/ oM yam du Ti hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM la ma dang hU~M hU~M ya/ oM ya ma ma pa ni hU~M / dmatshig can gyi tshig dag pas// mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzlas// nang gi bdag nyid skyong
75b1(rgyud): ldan pas/ na shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can// rang gi thams cad rig pa'i lus// gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa'i bdag/ khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pa// 'gro ba gsum por bcas pa ni// he ru ko ra ni
75b2(rgyud): byas nas kyang // sa rnams gsum po ma lus par// thams cad der ni smras nas kyang // sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas// 'di ni rnal 'byor cho ga ste// 'khor lo sgoms pa'i zlas pa ste// rang gi lha'i sbyor ba
75b3(rgyud): yis// rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ban// dam tshig can nyid langs dus su// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// mkha' 'gro dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// kun la gsol
75b4(rgyud): ba gdab par bya// khro bo bde ba'i dbyes pa yis// longs spyod las ni 'byung ba yis// rab rmongs ma yin parnyen byas nis// bde ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te/ ra ma he na
75b5(rgyud): Tan su ra A/ ma \u0f7f su hUM ba ra// dzI au naM ga ma la su hU~M// a la li la'o// su ra a mu tA mra b+h+yAM/ nam hUM si dz+dza su ma dzA i n+yo dza la maH/ A i I A raunau/ 
75b6(rgyud): e ru \u0f7f/ mus/ bi ya nu tA// sur a su hu de byi pA lAT e nI/ dz+wal su du bas pa maro ba tso/ mat+na su tu ma dzA mr-i hU~M/ mo kya ba lag kha u tu tru su d+h+waM ya sa?NAM/ 
75b7(rgyud): um dze su du mi// i du la lo/ oM mo ku sutrUM/ gas mi bka/ u r+b+ha ta na/ nab pa dang ni/ rnyeng 'dutsa man su hUM/ oM mi nga ba yi
75b8(rgyud): hU~MHa ri b+hi a ge ba~M u ra u/ 'di yis mgon po skul na sen/ dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste/ snyan zhing 'jam pa mgrin pa'i dbyangs/ dpyid kyi rgyal po'i sku blangs pas
76a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dri ba dri med rnams// gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yin// rdo rje pad ma yid 'ong ga/ sbyor ba dngos grub thams cad 'grub// dgyes pa 'di yis bskul na ni// bde ba
76a2(rgyud): chen po stsol ba yis// sbyor ba'i ni dus dag tu// rdo rje can gyis cha la sbyor// thog ma dbus dang mthar thug par// yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags bzla// 'khor dag tu ni rten byas te// dpa' do
76a3(rgyud): dang mkha' 'gro ma// 'od ni kun gyi gsang sngags te// khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// thams cad snying kar brtan byas te// bsgoms pas thams tan par 'gyur// ga la te// 
76a4(rgyud): bdag nyid dngos grub 'dod// dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin// oM badz+ra he ru kA sa mya ya/ ma nu pa la ya// he ru ka tr-i tang te na pa niSh+Tha tri d+ho me b+ha ga/ su pa
76a5(rgyud): sho me b+ha ga a na rag to mo b+ha ba/ sarba si dad+hi me pra yang tshwa sarba karma ma su me/ tsid tri shri yang ku ru hAM ha ha ha ho ba ga baM/ badz+ra he ru ka ma me murba dzA hi ru ka b+ha wa ma hA sa ma/ 
76a6(rgyud): sad tu oM// / 'dis ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing // yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa// phyir zlog pa ni gang yin pa// bcu drug 'dab ma la bkod cing // rjes su bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun/ 
76a7(rgyud): bdag gis bsgom zhing bstan par bya// rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis// ci ltar bde bar gnas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di 'dra snyoms nas ni// khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te/ 
76a8(rgyud): dpa' bo dang ni bdag nyid de/ de ltar srid pa'ang stong pa yin// bsgoms pas bdag nyid yang dag gnas// 'dir ni dga' thub bshad pa med// phreng ba med cing sngags kyang med// gzung / 
76b1(rgyud): dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang / cho ga'i rim pa'i gzhi yang med/ rnal 'byor phyag brgya byed pa'ang med/ g.yas rkyang zhabs kyis gnas pa'ang med/ rdo rje chen po rdos 'dzin pa// rang 'byung dngos grub kan
76b2(rgyud): 'dzad pa/ 'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa med// bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya// zla ba'i dkyil khor gang du ni// lte ba'i dbus sa rna par bsgom// yi ge gnas kyi mchog gyur pa/ lha'i gzugs
76b3(rgyud): su sgom pa ni// de 'i dbus su rnam par bsam// sku gsung thags ni 'dus pa can// de ni lus las 'das gyur te// sems kyi dngos po tsam nyid do// chags pa med cing chags bral med// chags bral dang ni
76b4(rgyud): ldan gyur pa// snying gi pad ma'i dbus su ni// brtags pas legs dpar rnyed pa ni// yid kyi thugs ni rdo rje'o// rnal 'byor ma kun bud med yin// phyag rgya mchog du bshad pa'o// zla ba'i steng du/ 
76b5(rgyud): rgya phyed rgyan// ye shes sems kyis bsams nas ni// mchog tu spyod par bya ba med// bla ma'i man ngag lam dang ni// sems ni mchog tu 'bud pa yis// 'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas
76b6(rgyud): de ni// 'jig rten du mas mi rtogs te// sbyor dang rnam bral byas nas ni// go 'phang tsocig pus khyab pa yis// 'di ltar byang chub 'bras bu rnyed par dga' ba ste// dang po dbyangs kyi yi ge las
76b7(rgyud): byung ba// gzhan yang stegs na bzhung lugs log pa'i blo gros de nyid ni// mo ni shes rab long ba'i 'jug bzhin 'bras bu med// nges par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// sku
76b8(rgyud): gisung thugs kyi rim pa'i le'u ste// nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// thod pa sangs rgyas mchog dam pa// de nyid ster ba kun gyi mchog/ dngos
77a1(rgyud): grub thams cad rab rtsol ba// gsang ba legs par snga bya zhing // gang gis su la'ang mi bstan to// de nyid mchog gi sgoms pa bzung // rnal 'byor ma'i snying la gnas// gnang bar brtan
77a2(rgyud): ba ra swa bya zhing // bla ma'i ngag na sgom par bya// dur khrod gnas ni yid 'ong ba// bsgrub po yis nges rten pa// skyed pa'i rim pa'i spor ba yis// sa dang gnas kyi rim pa dag/ rdo rje lte ba'i dbus su ni// yag ge hU~M ni
77a3(rgyud): sgoms par bya// de yis khyab par bdag nyid ni// sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog/ gnas med zhi zhing dag pa ste// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs yin// e ling ka ling las rang byung // gnyis med mchog tu zhi
77a4(rgyud): kha ste/ phyag gnyis pa la zhol cig pa// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par da brgyan// 'dzam bu mdog can mnyam par khyab// 'od zer 'phreng bas kun du 'khrigs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu brgyan
77a5(rgyud): can// spyan gsum pa la bzhad pa'i zhal// sems dpa' kun gyi sgom pa ste// gnyis med chos ni bla na med// stag gi pags pa gos su ma nas// na ra'i pags pa steng du rkyang // 
77a6(rgyud): thod pa dang ni khA tAM 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can// 'go'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de'i phyag g.yon gnyis pa ni// thod pa rkang gis gang ba la/ 
77a7(rgyud): sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// ye shes mchi med lnga sregs pa// khA tr-i gi ni lha'i rnal 'byor// thod pa'i dpal po rnal 'byor ma// g.yas pa mi 'jigs dag pa ste// 'jigs pa ma lus
77a8(rgyud): mi 'jigs grol// gdug cing 'jigs pa ma lus kun// 'dir ni zhabs kyis gnon por mdzad// zla ba phyed pa zhi bo 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mdzad// rdo rje 'phreng bas dpal
77b1(rgyud): bar mdzad// rkang brgyan yid 'ong rgyan cad can// sna tshogs pad ma 'dab brgyad kyi// lte ba'i dbus nas bzhengs pa ni// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ chags pa zhe sdang zhabs kyis gnon// ye
77b2(rgyud): shes sems dpa' de gzugs can// yi ge hUM las byung bar sgom// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i snying kra ru// he ru ka ni rnam par sgom// gsung gi 'khor lo kha la bsgom// sku'i 'khor lo lnga ma
77b3(rgyud): bzhin// sngo dang ngame ru dang dkar ba dang // byeg drug pa la zhal gsum pa// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams sgyur// thod pa dang ni khwa tr-i 'dzin// rtse gsum
77b4(rgyud): pa dang thod pa 'chad// rang rig lus dang yang dag 'dus// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas// dkyil 'khor bzhi/ da pa'i dbus dag tu// yi ge gsum rdzogs las 'byung ba// 
77b5(rgyud): thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan// gnas la sngogs pa'i rim sbyor ba/ sdom pa gsum gyi mdog dam pa// mkha' 'gro ma dang la ma dang
77b6(rgyud): dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma dang // pad ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod// thod pa bzhi po mchog yin te// mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog ser// lam pa la sha' mdog/ dum skyes pa ni// 
77b7(rgyud): sngon po ste// gzugs can ma ni dmar la 'bor// thod pa dang ni khA tAM 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te// sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// kha gdong la sogs
77b8(rgyud): mkha' 'gro bzhi// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ldang kra rba ga po'i gzugs can no// 'tshams su gshin rje sreg la sogs// rab 'jigs shin du 'jigs pa ste// thod
78a1(rgyud): ba dang mi khA tAM 'dzin// mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bani ldan te// cang te'u dang ni gri gug nyid// bdud ni bzhi po'i snying na bzhugs// spyan gsum po la skra grol ba// phyogs kyi gos
78a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa ste/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i nga brgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// me ling ro dang dri dang ni// reg gi mchod pa bzhi po ste// so bcu dag gi rim pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi sgra
78a3(rgyud): ba yis// phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun// byang chub phyogs kyis rnam par dag/ ka la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi// mgo la bi nam dus mnon pa ste// gsal byed hU~M gnyis dang yang sbyar// mthar na
78a4(rgyud): phaT dang rab tu sbyor// dpa' bo kun gyi gsang sngags ni// 'dod pa'i 'bras pa thams cad ster// gsal byed dmakha' 'gro ma'i ming // mthar ni hUM hUM phaT/ yin to// 'di ltar
78a5(rgyud): rab gtum mkha' 'gro ma// sngags de nyid 'bar ba ste/ ra// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// hU~M a i 'di ni rab du gas pa ste// pad mo'i 'dab la mkha' 'gro ma// 
78a6(rgyud): ga sal byed skyes bu dang bcas bya// hU~M na gnyis pa nyid yin te// mekhas pas phaT mthar ni paT dang skyer// khwa gdong la stsogs gsang sngags ni// ya ra la wa// gsal byed
78a7(rgyud): dang ni bcas po ste// mthar ni hUM dang bi N+Di dang sbyar// gshin rje sreg ma la stso gas b+hA// shaShas / gsal byed pa ni hU~M gnyis dang // phaT dang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// dbus su/ 
78a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thong ba yi// gsang sngags de bzhin rjes su dran// oM oM a/ I aM/ UM uM/ e e oM au/ AM I/ Sha satwa// / sa dang phung bo skye mched la/ 
78b1(rgyud): go cha rnams ni smra bar bya// ye shes 'khor lo dam chi gdag/ mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par byas// mchod pa bzhi pa'i gsang sngags rnams// rang ming gsal byang hUM byas te// 'di ltar da
78b2(rgyud): 'khor dgA dang sbyar// sangs rgyas thong ba las byung ba// rdo rje brgyan ni brkos paste// thams cad tsam pa bzhin du sbyar// 'thor mthung du ni rab sbyar bas// gsang sngags bzlas par bya/ 
78b3(rgyud): dang sdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa dang // 'dir ni cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// dus bzhi na tu sbyor nas su// dam tshigo 'khor lo'i zlas pa bya// dam tshi go mchog
78b4(rgyud): dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig can gyis gsang sngags kun// / sangs rgyas thod pa mchog yin te// mnyam porabazhag sbyor ba yis// 'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag/ 
78b5(rgyud): dam tshig rtag tu skya bya zhing // ye shes mchi med lnga'i mchog yang na rang ming zlas pa ste// sngags kyi de nyid bzlas por bya// oM shri b+hu d+ha ga ba li kr-i a hUM
78b6(rgyud): nA dzI la saM b+ha ra hUM phaT swa hA// 'di na yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog/ rlul 'byor ma'i ye shes mchog/ gang du dam tshig nyams pa la// sbyor ba dang ni sbyin par byar
78b7(rgyud): zhi bar gyur na bla med pa// rnal 'byor ma yis dbang yang skur// dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis// phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya// yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang // bla mo la ni gsol
78b8(rgyud): ba ba dbo// bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste// dam tshig les ni 'gal zhing nyams// bla ma mgon pos skya bas mdzod cig/ gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid
79a1(rgyud): can 'gro ba'i rtsol skyabs su mchil/ de ni the tsom med byas nas// nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur/ nges par rjong pa'i rgyung bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig ldan
79a2(rgyud): pa sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste// // le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dga' ba// gsang sngags kun ni skyed pa dang / 
79a3(rgyud): 'gro ba'i gnas/ ni dang 'gro ba dang // rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun// sangs rgyas kyi ni gnas mchog rnams// mi zad gnyis med rnam par dag/ thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med/ 
79a4(rgyud): a'i ye shes las byung ga/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// spyan gsum pa ma thugs rje'i nyams/ phyag brgya che dang yang dag ldan// rang
79a5(rgyud): bzhin dag cing dri ma med// ral pa zla phyed dbul brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mtshan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu brgyan can// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par rgyan// sems dpa'i
79a6(rgyud): dkyil mo krung gis bzhugs// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// ral gri lcags kyu phyag na snams// rin chen zhabs pa mdzes par 'dzin// dngos grub
79a7(rgyud): thams cad rab tu stsol// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal// rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka ru// 'khor lo gAm+bu kyi mchog kyang sgom// hU~M las thugs kyi 'ag
79a8(rgyud): lo ste/ de'i phyag mtshan sngo ba dang // a las gsung gi 'khor lo ste// de'i phyag mtshan dmar zen// oM las sku'i 'khor lo ste/ de'i phyag 'tshan dkar po yin// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma ma/ 
79b1(rgyud): stor/ gA sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med// ram las phyag brgya chen po ste/ !wA kha'i dbus su rnam par bsam// i las bA dag pad ma ste// byang chubo zla ba dri ma med// u ni sIng kar bas
79b2(rgyud): po ste// e ni mgo la rnam par dgod// e ni spyi bo ga tsugasau tu dgod/ oM ni mig tu dgod pa ste// oM ni go char byas nas su// a ni 'dun gyi mtshon cha'o// l-i las lha mo spyan yin te// ri las dam
79b3(rgyud): tshig sgrol ma sta/ la las lha mo gos dkar mo// ri la sa rin chen yang dag 'byang // rin chen sgron dang ye shes sgron// dkar zhing pa la ga' mdog/ dmar zhing 'dzum bu'i chu po'i mdog/ zhal gsuM
79b4(rgyud): pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum bgyes pas rnam par myos/ thams cad phyogs kyi gos can te// rang gi thabs dang / mnyam par ldan// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dang // pad ma dpar
79b5(rgyud): po raro chen dang // rdo rje dri lo bu lhan cig sbyar/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// ral dri 'da' dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ bcu dang dgug pa 'dzin pa ste// mtshon rnams thams cad yongs su
79b6(rgyud): rdzogs// thod pa yis ni cod pan can// sna tshogs pad ma'i dbus su na// sems dpa'i dkyil mo krung du bzhugs// de dag go ru bgod pa ste// dbus su gtso kho'i zla ba'i gdan// zur la mchod pa/ 
79b7(rgyud): la sogs bzhi// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol gra/ zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// me long dang ni bi wa dang // dri dang dung ni bcud kyis lend
79b8(rgyud): chang gas btung ba lag pas mchod// gzhan du ci ltar bdag po bzhin// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ dkyil krung phyed par legs par bzhugs// la go ba'i snyim pa thal
80a1(rgyud): mo yis// mchod pa lag tu thogs nas ni// 'di lta'i cho gas thams cad mkhyen// a li de nyid dri ma med// gsang ba mchog gi rnying dga' ba// rdo rje sems dpa' dpar ro// 
80a2(rgyud): yin// sngags kyi de nyid cho ga dag// swa gosu nga thags su yang dag sbyar// oM shri ma hA badz+ra sad tra a// oM hUM d+ha gi ni dza lA se b+ha ba swA hA// / oM sing d+ha lo tsa na li A hU~M swa hA// oM sa ma ya ter du
80a3(rgyud): re ra e a hU~M swa hA/ oM ba da ma b+ha be bA naM da ra pa sau mi li e hUM swA hA/ oM rad na ku la ke rang na dza li ni ri e hUM swa hA// oM ru ba badz+rI b+hau// oM sha ba ta badz+ri hUM// oM g+han d+he badz+ra bau// oM ra sa
80a4(rgyud): badz+ra dr-i// / thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas par sdom// a li rba rje gsang ba che// sems can kun gyi snying la gnas
80a5(rgyud): gang gis dngos grub kun gsang bya// de'i gsang ba/ bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa yis dus bzhi ru// bzlas dang sgom pa ldan par bya// som nye thams cad pa spangs
80a6(rgyud): nas ni// sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan// ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas ni// dam tshig can gyis mchog dbang skur// de gcig tu ni sim nas su// spro dang sdus pa'i spyod/ 
80a7(rgyud): ba yis// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad rdo rje 'dzin lta bu// 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa'i dus gsum po// da ltar sems can gsum pa la/ rdo rje sos
80a8(rgyud): dpa' go 'phang gnas// mthar thug dga' ba dag pa'i bdag/ thog ma med pa'i mchog yin no// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i
80b1(rgyud): be'u// / nyi shu rtsa bdu pa'o// / de nas mchog gi cho ga bshad// 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa ni/ mang gi ye shes las byung ba// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che// zhal drug
80b2(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa ste// sku mdog dkar mo dri ma med// spyan gsum rdo rje dkyil krung can// phyag rgya drug ni 'bar bas brgyan// mi skyod pa'i cod tsaM pan can// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zla ba
80b3(rgyud): ched pa bzhi pa 'dzin// ral pa'i thor tshugs bcings pa ste// dkar dang sngo dang dur smigs nyid// sngo dang ljang ku de bzhin te// steng gi zhal ni zhi ba ste// lha'i dngos grub 'bras bu stsol// rdorje
80b4(rgyud): dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri bo ti 'dzin pa ste// ud pa la dang lcags kyu nyid// ye shes lus can rnam parasgom// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ni// 'khor lo'i dbus
80b5(rgyud): su rnam par sgom// snang bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis/ ci ltar rdo rje sems dpa' ltar// gsang sngags 'di ni rjes su dran// 'jam pa'i rdo rje gsang ba ni// gsung
80b6(rgyud): gsum ye shes dam tshig can// dpa' bo rnal 'byor rtsa sbyor ba'i// oM shri ma ha su kha many+dzu badz+ra a maM hUM// ra gi ni dza la sam ba ra sa twa// rang gi dbang skur byas nas ni// brtul
80b7(rgyud): zhugs chen pos gsang sngags bzlas// gsang gsung 'khor lo spros nas ni// khams gsum dag ni bslu bar bya// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// gang gis su la 'ang
80b8(rgyud): stan mi bya// nges par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bsgrub pa'i le'u ste// nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rje// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ yi ge dgu pa
81a1(rgyud): bsgrub pa ste// kwa'i ye shes las byung ba// bdug pa thams cad zad byed pa// zad byed mkha' 'gro zad byed cing // rnam rtog zos shing zad par byed// mkha' 'gro mnyam stong
81a2(rgyud): ba las byung ba/ na mkha' longs spyod za byed cing // zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis po// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams sbya ro// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// gdug pa'i bdud ni zad
81a3(rgyud): byed cing // 'jigs byed dang ni 'jigs byed mo// kha sdu bzhangs kyis mnan pas bzhugs/ stag gi pags pa gos su mnams// mgo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgya na// thod pa'i
81a4(rgyud): 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// / sna tshogs rdo rje rul pa mnan// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par rtsigs// 'jigs
81a5(rgyud): byed rab tu phyer 'jigs shing // sngo dang dud ka ljang ku dang / ko dmar dang / ljang la ser poro// drugapa dag ni bong bu'i mgo// steng gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs// thal
81a6(rgyud): ba sprin gyi mdog can la// gdug pa thams cad rab 'jigs pa// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// bgyes pa'i longs spyod longs spyod cing // pang du rdo rje phag mo ni de mdog steng zhal phag
81a7(rgyud): mgo ste// gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan// skra grol ba dang phyogs gos can/ byin pa gnyis byas mnyam par 'khri'o// thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos// 
81a8(rgyud): thod pa dang ni kha traM 'dzin cing // tshangs pa'i pags pas ma nams pa ste// rdo rje mdung dang cang te ru dang // gri gu gzod pa mgo bo dang // phyag tu ral dri phyar ba ste/ drag po gdug/ 
81b1(rgyud): pa kun 'joms pas// snying kar ye shes la ba' 'gron// kha gdod la sogs yongs kyi si khyam/ 'khor 'ang brgyud dbus dag tu// g.yon nas g.yas su bskor nas ni// dur khrod
81b2(rgyud): drang na nye dur khrod// mkha' 'gro mchog ni dgod par bya// yaM r-i laM waM shAM ShaM aM aM// ye shos 'khor lo mkha' ShA mo 'gro dgod// zhag bdun bar du snyoms nas ni// gang yang mthun ni zhi ba'i/ 
81b3(rgyud): rim/ chu 'gram dang ni dur khyod du// bsgoms pas dngos grub nges par rnyed// 'phrog pa dang ni bsod byed cing gang du las ni ci 'dod pa// mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor los grub// las
81b4(rgyud): 'dir yi gnyis dpyod ma byed// sngo dang pa la sha'i mdog// dmar dpa bzhi pa ser po ste// ga zin/ rje sreg stsogs bzhi pa ni// sna tshogs mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal
81b5(rgyud): dmar sngo dang dud ka sten bya zhal mdog dkar po mchog tu mdzes thams cad gsum pa'i zhal/ skra grol pA la phyogs gos can// kha gdong g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal/ 
81b6(rgyud): 'ug gdong zha la yang de bzhin te// gsum pa khyi'o zhe la gdong yin// g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal gdong ni// drag po'i gzugs can cho ga bzhin// gshin rje sreg stsogs zhal gdong
81b7(rgyud): kha sngon dang g.yas pa gnyis de bzhin// thug re snga mo rta dang ni// seng ger dang blang ma he// gzhan yang dom gi zhal yin te// thams cad kyang ni mnyam par bya// thong ba dang ni
81b8(rgyud): kha waM 'dzin/ gzhags pa lcags kyu phyag na sngams/ zil bu cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu brgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// yi dgas gdar/ 
82a1(rgyud): la gyis bzhugs// mi'u thung la skye gnas ring // mche ba rnam par rtsigs pa'i zhal// thugs rje'i ro yin rnam par mos// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// bsgom zhing rab tu
82a2(rgyud): sgom par bya// hUM a oM// 'di ni gsang bar bshad pa ste// rdo rje pad ma 'khor lo dbus// ye shes 'khor lo snying ka ru// mkha' 'gro'i yi ge 'khor lo ni// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ 
82a3(rgyud): mchod cing thim par rnam par snyam// mnyam par gzhag nas yi ge rnams// cho ga bzhin du gsang sngags bzla// rang gi mthor mthun byas nas su// gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes smr-i// oM/ 
82a4(rgyud): shri kA Da ga badz+ra a k+Sha tAM// Da gi dza la saM bA ra hUM phaT sUt+ma/ thog ma gsal byed mring dang hUM// mthar ni phaT dang rnam par sbyar// mkhar 'gro zla bas bshad pa'i// 'dod pa'i
82a5(rgyud): 'bras bu thams cad rtsol// mchog 'di dag ni gsang ba ste// / su la yang ni basbyin mi bya/ zhig bdun gyis ni dab 'gyur te// rtse gcig pa yis bsgoms rus ni// 'khor
82a6(rgyud): lo gsum gsang mkha' 'gro ma'i// dngos grub myur du thod por 'gyur// nges por rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// // k+Sha'i mkha' 'gro ma'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste// 
82a7(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba// a li mkha' 'gro spro ba be ste/ a li ye shes la ba byung ba// a li mkha' 'gro mchog dam pa// zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu
82a8(rgyud): drag/ sman gsum 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gcig sa// g.yas rkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching // thod pa'i 'breng bas rnam par/ brgyan// 
82b1(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rjes spyad gtsug tu mnan// dpral ba la ni rdo rje 'phyeg/ sngo gi bags pa gos su snrums// phyag brgya drug gyis sku la brgyan// rnam par rdzog pa 'jigs byed nyid
82b2(rgyud): sred dang 'phra dogo mtshan nyid ni// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzod// gdul dka' thams cad gdul mdzad cing // bgyi gos kyi mgo ba'i 'phreng ba can// sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes
82b3(rgyud): dkar ba'i mdog can rnyed pa 'phreng // lha'i gzi bar+t+ti 'bar kha can// sngo zhing se la du ka dang // g.yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te// ljang gu dmar dang ser skya ste// g.yon pa'i zha la yang
82b4(rgyud): sna tshogs mdzes// steng gi thal ka spyan mdog bzhim// chags shing rjes su tshi gas pa sa lha// thugs rdza ro nau yang dag rdzogs// sku lus ldem zhing 'jo bag can/ 
82b5(rgyud): i la mkha' 'gre ma'i ska// phyag gnyis pa la gAcer bu'i lus thod pa'i 'phre ba bas dbul brgyan// skra grol ba'i yis rnam par myos// spyan gsum nag po 'jigs
82b6(rgyud): pa can// de'i mdog ce na sku rnyog can// byin ba gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas// rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan// lha mo'i ku tsa btsir ba'o// ci lta// 
82b7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgyar ldan/ mtha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin sbyar// phyag gnyis drag ni brkyang bya lo// khyab 'jug pags pa snams pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha tAM 'dzin// ral gring
82b8(rgyud): ni thod pa 'chang // mdung rtse gsum bA cang te'u nyid// dgra sto lcags kyung de bzhin te// nags pa tshangs pa'i mi ge bo dang / gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid// snying dkar rtsibs ni bcu gnyis
83a1(rgyud): pa'o// 'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes// de'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang // phyagro brgya de bzhin te/ 
83a2(rgyud): du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// yi ge i'i rigs las 'byung ba'o// byang phyogs su sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// yi ge I las byung ba ste zhugs pa'i// nub
83a3(rgyud): phyogs su na mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mapar 'gro ma// yi ge e dang sbyar bar bya'o// lho phyogs su gnas kyi mchog ces bye ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// yi ge AM las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o/ 
83a4(rgyud): me'i phyogs la sogs pa 'tshungs su mkha' 'gro mA// bzhi bgod par byas ste// thog ma mche ba'i mchog ces bye ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// ye ge u dang sbyar bar bya'o// bden bral
83a5(rgyud): du drag po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge u dang sbyor ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su dpa' bo'i mchog ces bya/ kha'i mkha' 'gro ma// ye she sraM au dang sbyar bar bya'o// dbang / 
83a6(rgyud): lhun du khro bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// yi ge au dang sbyor bar bya'o// de bzhin du 'dir 'tshangs bzhir ni dbang ldan phyogs la dgod pa'i yi ge ri'i las dngos grub
83a7(rgyud): gyi mchog ces bya bar mkha' 'gro ma// yi ge li las dur gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro mo// ye gre ra las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang // yi na
83a8(rgyud): lus gtum po'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkhar 'gro ma dang // mkha' 'gra ma de dog kun gyis yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag/ zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// thams cad stsan
83b1(rgyud): ma su ma nyam hA zalang sa dgar po thams cad zhal snong nga bkyis med bge/ gakho tsanI dang gangs pa'i zhab gnyis ni mangs pa rnam par bsgom par bya bas pa za
83b2(rgyud): par rtsol ba 'apapa ni 'aM dzin cang te rung bani gri bug mchog/ bdu ngabang po mapa pa kun/ snatsho bar zaro ba bya baM mdzan sna
83b3(rgyud): ma 'i hUM rje nga dus dro 'o// du rdzu brje'i bos yongs su rdzo gsapa ba rgya lnga m-i 'dzir ba
83b4(rgyud): rgya po phre cad pa ni rdzobs bya rje bsung du
83b5(rgyud): yim sku'i rdo rje ste rdorje ba ma dus 'dor ro'adi mtsha tu gsang ba ste rnab 'byor skyo ba cho rdo rje phengs dpa sungs pa ste/ rdo rje snang
83b6(rgyud): ra po ga pa thom kho lo spyongs patham cad dang / ye shes 'kho por mthogacig pu chos kyi ro yang smoshes bzlas par
83b7(rgyud): ra gi snga nas kyis mdzar mthung bya// nang gi sbyo gyu dag 'a'ong lon cho ga bas spyodatshur re mdzang na ba shAr rang gyu rgya la ba bcu mchog dang
83b8(rgyud): sa rdo rjeb ni bcu ro kun pa// rang du ga' pa ji mched/ rod bye pa dang / 'od 'phrog/ byung dmango du drub nga du so dang mi yo
84a1(rgyud): rlo bo bachos kyi hrIn/ nud zer ba da'i she ldam rdza sa ni 'ju gnyis gdor 'o po za par yong 'gyes pa chen po nga mchog ces bya ba'i
84a2(rgyud): rje'in dpya'i ba'i su gas ra kyibasal byed hU~M byas de de ba mthabani pa dang bster kyi gas thos pasang sngangs rangs
84a3(rgyud): bag don dpyor/ d+hu 'aM m+'u zung ka nga rnam par k+Sha / che che 'khor lo rjong nas/ ci ro du bsdus de tshung ba bya// dang bde sa byi nas ci du dang // ma rab par gas bsde sna ba
84a4(rgyud): gis 'thor 'thung bya d+han spyon bzla bya/ oM shri shA lI dza saM dutrU~M bA // srid bAm dus rnams cad
84a5(rgyud): po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ chos rang babang rdzogs banasadang ni// sbyor ba mi ni bdag cing rnams// sems can kham sa kyi nang du gzhag radra bi lA'i sbyor ba yis/ dang
84a6(rgyud): sbyor zhing mchod bAng bya// ma mA par ma gzhag sems kyis ni/ sdo ni rab pang sbom byas de/ gsang sngabs glonas ni chos na chos bcig rimi stong pa yi ru chos ni
84a7(rgyud): dedag med nyid yin te rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni/ kau rje su brtag par bya ba'i na/ konges par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// bsang ba chen po 'gas pa a li'i ma khar
84a8(rgyud): snang pa ste/ le'u sum bcur ro// de nas sbyor ba shar bya ga/ sna tshogs par byi dang phyu ba mchog// thams cad mchog ste/ rnal 'byor che/ 
84b1(rgyud): chen po logs stsogs pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsgom zhing rab du sgom par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ si oM R+R-i las rdo rje 'byung // de nyid yongs gyur
84b2(rgyud): bdag nyid de// gsal byed mkho' 'gro mchog gyur pa// sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog// thams cad rigs kyi mchog dam pa// zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis// spyan gsu
84b3(rgyud): pa la g.yo ba'i sgra// zla ba byed pa bzhi pa 'dzin// zod pa'i 'phreng bas sdud pa ste// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu' la 'chang // spyi gtsug ral pa 'ching ba ste// phyag rgya drug gis sku la mtshan// lha'i
84b4(rgyud): rgyan gyis sdud pa ste// bskal ngan mu stegs can rnams no// zhabs kyi ping mos 'og tu mnan// lta ba lnga'i rim pa dag/ g.yas rkyang pa'i zhabs kyis mnan dkyil
84b5(rgyud): drung byed pa'i gang zhabs can// zhab sa drug gyis ni rnam bar rgyamo// khyab 'jug gi ni sngags pa snams// mgo bo 'phreng bas rgyan pa ste// rdo rjes lha mos rnam par 'jud// 
84b6(rgyud): gai tsIr bu 'og pag skye reg can// skra grol ba la spyan gsum can// mchu rang mchu ni rnam pra cer zhing // rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril// byang chub yan lag gnas btsir zhing // byin pa
84b7(rgyud): gnyis kyis mnyam por 'khril// thugs rje cha gso ba'i ro'isra bde// tshangs pa'i pags pa'i yan lag ni// phyag gnyis ngag gis brkyang nas 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha traM 'chang // dag
84b8(rgyud): phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs// mdung rtse gsum dang ral gri dang // cang te'u dang zhabs pa lcags kyu snrums// da kar sngo dang ldang ba nyid// ser dang dud ka dur smigs te// g.yon pa
86a1(rgyud): gams pa'i dos du sa dang ga/ sa' 'gro ni gnyis pa slob/ don rdzos kyi mchog ces rna yI rdornas pa 'byo nyid ni// mi ge trai las yang dag 'byung
86a2(rgyud): g.yon gyi phyogs su dgod par bya// yi ge saM las nges 'byung ba// rgya mtsho'i mchog ces bya ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gnyis ni// sna tshogs mdog can sna tshogs zhal// spyan gsum pa la bzhin/ 
86a3(rgyud): rnams sbyararo// dkyil krung phyed pos gnas pa ste// zhabs ni gar drong bcas pa'o// zhal lnga po la phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan dag/ zhabs
86a4(rgyud): kyi 'og tu mnan nas bzhugs// mgrin pa dag ni grug po la/ phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can skragrol ba// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i skye rags can// rkyang
86a5(rgyud): gtub g.yer ka'i si la sgra can// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par rgyan / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// a li ka lI mchog dam pa// rdo rje gsor zhing ba sdigs 'dzub kyis// gnyis
86a6(rgyud): pa suM med pa'i rnam par brgyan// thod pas gnyis med rnam brgyan te// zhabs pa lcags kyus phyag ni snrums// thod pa dang ni gri gug mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbur brgyan can// dngos grub
86a7(rgyud): thams cad ra brtsol ba// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dbus su// 'khor lo gsum gri thabs kyis bsgom// A~M gyi ye shes mkha' 'gro ni// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ste// sku gsung thugs/ 
86a8(rgyud): kyi mkha' 'gro ni// rang gi snying ka ra de dag sgom// sngar bshad sbyor ba'i rim pa yis// gnas la spogs pa'i rjes rim pa// de ru bsam zhing rnam sgoms te// gsum pa'i rim pa rje su sro// des ni
86b1(rgyud): dngos grub gnyis med pa// ma khal 'gro ma dang lhan cig bsgom/ pa/ ye shes 'khor lo'i ro rnams ni// snyoms la gsang sngags bzlas pa byA// oM shri sra ma// bong T+wAM ga oM a/ oM hUM Ta ga ni/ 
86b2(rgyud): dz+wa la saM b+ha ra au sA hA// / au hri dar mo ud d+ha mi/ mAhA badz+ra dz+ra kyi ni ya drA hUM phaT swa hA// oM e sa ga ri ud ta me// ma hA badz+ra DA gi na ye sI hUM phaT/ kags ga sum ye shes bzlas nA
86b3(rgyud): ni// dpa' blo mkha' 'gro ma bzlas bya// gsal byed rang ming hU~M gnyis dang // mthar ni pheM T+wAM dang sbyar bar bya// gas pa gsum 'khor lo sgoms nas ni// gsum pa bsdu zhing bsgoms nas ni// rim
86b4(rgyud): tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis// b+ha ga'i dbus su sgom par bya// byang chub zla ba dri ma med// thugs kyi 'khor lo la ni gsum gtso bo dgra ni gsu yin te// mkha' 'gro ma gsum gsum
86b5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro// sdud cing bskyed par mdzad pa ste/ kha gar rdo rje phag mo ni// gsang ba gsum tu rnam par bsgom// de nyid sgom/ lte pa'i sbyor ba yis// des ni nga rgyal rnam spangs nas// 
86b6(rgyud): dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// de bzhin pa sgom dang bzlas pa bya// rtag tu dam tshigs skyong tshwa zhing // 'o ma sna tshogs las byung ba// bram ze che dang sbrang rtsi dang // ma ha mA sa mnyam ldan pa// 
86b7(rgyud): de nyid gsum gyis mngon sngags te// bza' ba dag ni bza' bar bya// 'du 'ji maud cing sred pa med de/ yongs su bzung ba'i 'khor yang med// longs spyod min pas longs spyod pa// 
86b8(rgyud): 'chi ba med pa'i zas bza'i zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang sten// longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing // rnal 'byor sgom pa'i skom yang btung // gzhan du gang yang po dung ba min// nang go bdag
87a1(rgyud): nyid sbyor ldan pas// rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas// bcom ldan 'kha' 'gro sil ga/ rnal 'byor ma ni nyi pi la// thabs ni pi le bar shes bya// shes rab nye
87a2(rgyud): ba'i pI la ba// grong khyer nyid ni sa lo nya de// grong gi mthar ni nyi pi la// zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba// pi la dang ni nye mi yin// skad cig sbyor ba pi li ba// rga ba nye ba'i pi la ste// mthu stobs du mar ldan
87a3(rgyud): par ni// skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin// ba shu thams cad bza' bya zhing // lta ba shos thams cad dag kyang de sgrub bya// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dus nas// dus la mthun pa 'dus nas byas nas// klung dang gar dang
87a4(rgyud): bza' bang ngo // 'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya// rtog pathams cad rnam spangs nas// de mchog mchog ni spyad pa spyodanges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla las// gsal byed
87a5(rgyud): mkha' 'grub pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa'i le'u ste// sum bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yo bshad bya ga/ dngos grub sbyor ba'i rim pa ste// mkha'
87a6(rgyud): 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro sbyor// dam tshig mchog ni sdom pa yin// chos rnams kyi ni sdom pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba che// mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas pa// dkyil 'khor dam tshig mcho
87a7(rgyud): dam pa// de'i dbus su 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// dbus su nyi ma'i ba dan yang mdzes// a li ka li mnyam par ldan// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// dpe'
87a8(rgyud): byad bzang po rgya bcu sa brgyan// byin gyis rlabs pa byas nas ni// rang gi sa bon las skyed de// yi ge hi las yang dag 'byung // dus mtha'i me ltar rab tu 'jigs// zhal gyis mche ba
87b1(rgyud): rnams par rtsigs// spyan gsum lcags ni spyod pa'i zhal// gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og gnan// khro bo dang ni bskrad pa'i zhal// skal ba'i mtha' yang 'khrug pa ste// rul pa'i ning dbu brgyan
87b2(rgyud): can// zhabs rkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 'jigs byed chen po'i zhabs pa yis// rkyad par sku rigs bcings pa yin// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu brgyan
87b3(rgyud): can// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'chang // pral ba la la ni rdo rje 'phreng // khro bo mthong nas rnam por rnag/ lho rnams thams cang tshar yang gcod// keng rus can gyis brtul zhugs 'dzin// mchi/ 
87b4(rgyud): ba mtsho bar byed pa'i mchog/ gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon / phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// sna tshogs brgyan// na gyis sdud pa ste// phyag drug pa la zhal lnga pa// sna tshogs
87b5(rgyud): roro bcung mchog can// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang dkar po bzhi pa ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan paso// phamo yis ni sku lus khyab// lha chen pags pa 'dzin mdzad cing // 
87b6(rgyud): bla re tshul du brkyang bar mdzad// thod pa dang ni kha tra~M 'dzin// drug pa 'am ni cang te'u// zhabs g.yom dang ni dus mtshan mnan// g.yas pa yis ni 'jigs byed de// zhabs kyi 'og tu man/ 
87b7(rgyud): mdzad tsong // rmongs shing rab tu myos par mdzad// rdo rje phag mi dri mdog can// skra grol ba dang gcer bu ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu'i rgyun can// dum bu'i rgyan gyis skye rigs can// byin
87b8(rgyud): pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// mgril par 'khrud cing myos pa ste// de'i phyag 'tshan phyag rgya snams// dri gug cang te'u mchog kyang 'dzin// drug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo'// 'di 'drar rdo
88a1(rgyud): rje mkha' 'gro ni// mkhas pa sa re'u mig dbus su dgod// shar tu sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste// byang tu las kyi mkha' 'gro yin// nu ba du pad ma'i mkha' 'gro ste// lho ru rin ce na/ 
88a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro yin// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba dang // ljang dang ni ser pa'o// 'khor lo dril bu mnyam par ldan// g.yas rkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yin te// sgom pa lnga yang de nyid do// 
88a3(rgyud): me dang bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan dang ni bzhi pa ru// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro las mkha' 'gro// pad ma mkha' 'gro rin chen mkha'// bzhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum pa la skra grol
88a4(rgyud): ba/ thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag brgya lnga'i rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog can// mgo'i 'phreng bas rnam pa rgyan/ 
88a5(rgyud): thod pa dang ni kha tr-i 'dzin// rdo rje mda' la stsogs pa brgyan// bzhags pas lcags kyu phag na 'dzin// 'dod pa thamasacad rtsol mdzad cing // thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs// thugs rje'i
88a6(rgyud): 'dod pas rnam par myos/ cung bzung ngo tsha'i mig zur dang // dgyes pa rtsol bas bde ba skye// dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs su khyab// du ma'i gzugs sdugA ma// rdo rje mchu dang 'od byed na// 
88a7(rgyud): rnga gdong dang ni drag po'i gdong // rdo rje drag mo sten glegs ma/ rdo rje pa nya rdo rje sen// rdo rje gzhon nu ma de bzhin// kam po ci yang de bzhin te// rdo rje ro li dris ma dang ni// rdo rje ma mo de bzhin te/ 
88a8(rgyud): ma dang // 'jigs byed zhal/ zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te// khro gnyer can dang sna tshogs gzugs// rdo rje dri gug de bzhin te// rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang ni// sgyu 'phral lha mo grags byed dang // 
88b1(rgyud): na lar gyi rang ser skya ma// rdo rje 'bar ma thul sbyor ba// rdo rje 'jigs byed ma nyid dang // dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro ma ni de dag kun// spyan gsum pa la zhal
88b2(rgyud): rnams sbyar// gro sum bu 'cha bral sgyu gral po// thod pa'i 'phreng ba smra rnam par brgyan// rgya murams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// phyogs kyi dos
88b3(rgyud): can gar mchog ste// 'gro'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thams cad ro'i ba dan la bzhugs// sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// thong po dang n-i kha tra ga 'dzin cing // zhags pa lha gas kyu
88b4(rgyud): phyag na bsnams// rdo rje mchog ni gsor mdzad cing // dril bu dang ni cang te'u mchog/ zhal gsus dpa' bzhi skyeg pa ste// thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs// s+yan ni zur gyis gzigs
88b5(rgyud): mdzad cing // dgyes pa'i ro yis rtsol bas g.yo// dngos grub thams cad rtsol mdzam cing // grub pa po kun rjesu chags/ zla ba drug sgoms bsgrub pa po// mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor/ 
88b6(rgyud): lo 'thung // yod gnyis med par dngos grub mchog/ mkhal 'gro thob bar byed pa yin// dus 'dir dem thag tu snang // mkha' la spyod par blo tsam med// nang gi pho brang de ljang ni/ 
88b7(rgyud): re'u mig dgu stsogs sgo dang bcas// slar ni lha mo bzhi bkod na/ mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ster// phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri// snam bu mtshams bzhi de ru nilnga ma nyi
88b8(rgyud): dgong bya zhi // mkha' 'gro ma stsogs phyogs 'tshams su// zur bzhi pa la sgor bzhi pa// phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu rtag// sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// 'dod pa'i
89a1(rgyud): 'bras bu thams cad ster// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// zur gyi tshar ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud 'tshams rnams// rdo rje rin cen gyis brgyan pa// phyi rol
89a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thig btab po// de'i nang re'u cig dgu// sgro rnams dang ni bya ba ste// 'di ltar mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma// dra ba'i sdom pa stong paM ste// byang chub phyogs ni sum bcu bdun// 
89a3(rgyud): chos kyis rnam par dag pa yin// dbu su sa na bcu gsum ste// phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas// dur khrod dang ni nye du khrod// 'di ltar sbyor bas rnam par dag/ sdom po mchog ni bsgor
89a4(rgyud): par bya// de ni thugs kyi ye shes te// ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma// phung po khams dang skye mched la// cha gnyis po sbyor bar bya// ye shes mchog gi sdom pa ste// gas
89a5(rgyud): ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod// phyed dang byed du rnam par dgod/ mkhar 'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus// dam ga rnal 'byor 'byung ba tshe// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas na/ 
89a6(rgyud): zhabs tshol byas nas bzhug par bya// ye shes chu'i dbang bskur nas// gtso bo dag rnam par sgom// bdag med chos kyi ro kun ni// dram tshig mchog ni dri ma med// baspu'i khung bu thams cad na
89a7(rgyud): las// dam tshig gsang ba gsum spros nas// sems can ma lus dam tshig gis// mkha' 'gro ru ni rab gnas bya// 'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang // gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya// 
89a8(rgyud): sngon du 'gyur ba'i mkha' 'gro na// byin rlabs gnas su dgod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje theg chen de// mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs// sdom pa mchog ni bzlas pa'i sa// bla na med/ 
89b1(rgyud): ba'i go phang ster/ dus bzhi dag du mi dgod par// skyo ba med par rtag tu bsgom// lugs su byung dang bzlog pa yis// 'khor lo'i mchog ni rnam par spro// bu spu'i khung bu las mdun du/ 
89b2(rgyud): bde mchog sros nas mchod par bya// rdo rje gsum nau dbang bskur nas// 'gog pa'i 'khro bo rnam par sgom// ye shes 'khro bo lan cig tu/ srin gyi 'brug sgro lte bur bzla// 'gro zhing 'ong ba'i
89b3(rgyud): kha'i sbyor ba yis/ mi sgra rdo rje brtul zhugs che/ zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // 'bru dang stobs ni 'grub 'grub 'gyur te// g.yo' zhing ldog pa byed pa dang // kwa 'khrug cing g.ye dang bzhugs pa dang
89b4(rgyud): nang med par ni nad yod med// nang yod pa ni nad med byedade ltar bsgom pa byas nas ni// lngas 'di the tsom med pa yin/ nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas bsgom dang bzlas
89b5(rgyud): lnga dga' ba dang // dam tshig bzlas la dga' dogs pa med tepar tshe yang brtan// 'dri lngar rang gis cho gas bzlas// swa tas rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug/ der
89b6(rgyud): ni da ma Ni ga 'khor lo nA mkhas pa sa sgoms mchod zla bar bya shugasang sA gA sa 'ang+ga dag bshad pa ra bya// au shrI badz+re da ga a hi hUM// DA gi ni dza lA swa b+ha ra/ o shr-i 'bud d+ha
89b7(rgyud): d+ha.A pU hU~M Da gi dza lA saM b+ha ra hUM hU~M phaT swa hA/ au shre garma pat+sa ga yaM ShaM hUM/ DA gi ni dza la saM b+ha ra hUM hU~M phaT swa hwA da/ au shri pad ma d+ha ga a hIHhUM/ tra gi ni dza lasaM b+ha ra hUM hU phaT swa/ 
89b8(rgyud): oM shri reng ni Da ga au hUM// Da gau nau dzaM la saM b+ha ra hU~M hU~M phaT swarbA// / me kha'i 'gro bzhi pa de dag dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang la ma dang / du ma skyes ma dang / gzugs cin ma
90a1(rgyud): 'grin pa mnyam par stsol ba ste/ byin lte ba gnyis kyis legs par brgyan// de'i mdog dang phyag+sa drang zhal// phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par sgo ma/ 
90a2(rgyud): lha mo mngon du byasma nas ni// snying po gsang sngags so so yin// oM shri badz+ra ba ra dI rbaM d+h+waM d+hU baT+Ta swan+na// oM shriDA gi ni Da~M paT sUt+ma/ oM shri la me lA~M hU~M b+h+rUM phaT swahA// oM shri khan ra hoSh+T+r-i b+h+rU~M hU~M pa ahA
90a3(rgyud): oM shrI ru bi ni hUM hUM hU~M phaT swAt+ma// 'di ltar lnga po'i bdag nyid 'tshams kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sA gr-i sa~M yin no// oM shr-I 'bud d+ha DA gi ni hUM hUM phaT swarbA// oM shr-i kAr ma Da gi ni hUM hU~M phaT swarbA/ oM shrI bi ng+ga ma
90a4(rgyud): DA gi ni hUM hUM phaT saMhA// oM shrI rang na DA gi ni hUM hUM phaT swa hA/ sgor ni mkhar 'gro ma'i sngags// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thamasacad ste// bzhi po sna tshogs mdog can ste// ci bzhin/ 
90a5(rgyud): rigs kyi kun la khyab/ oM hU~M hUM ru be hUM hU~M pheM oM d+b+ha suM ru se hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dun ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM pra maka ri hUM hUM phaT/ shir phyogs kyi snam bu la lha mo ba
90a6(rgyud): dgod pa s+t+wa~M// sku lus kar paM mi dog ce ni la// de'i gis sngags pa shad gi yin/ oM badz+ra b+haT+Ta ba~M nr-i Sh+Ti hU~M hU~M baT/ oM 'gror ma hU~M hU~M paH/ oM badz+ra gau ni hUM hU~M phaT/ 
90a7(rgyud): so ni hUM hUM g+ha// lho phyogs kyi ni snam du lu lte mo bzhi por dgod par bya// sku mdog dag ni ser ba ste// de'i sdigs su bshad pa ste// oM badz+ra tu ni hU~M hUM phaT sarbA/ oM ni gi ni hUM
90a8(rgyud): hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kr-I ma ri hUM hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kaM bo tsam hUM hU~M phaT// nub phyogs kyi snam bu la lha mo bzhi po ska mdog dmar po can gyi sngags yan no// oM badz+ra ba ta li hUM hUM phaT// 
90b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra sa'i kA hUM hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra gran+da dA ri hUM hU~M phaT// oM bi ma pa dA ti hUM hUM phaT/ byang gi sne bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang ku ste// de'i gsang sngags bshad pa yan// oM tsan
90b2(rgyud): d+hashre kha ro rA hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM bri ku na na ti hUM hU~M phaT/ oM byi shwa rU pa hUM hU~M phaT+Ti/ oM rAdz+ra kaN+ya ya hU~M hU~M phaT// dbyung ldan la stsogs pa'i 'tshams bzhir// lha mo bzhi po// / gzugs
90b3(rgyud): gnyis pa'i me de ge tsan+da te// de'i sngags bshad pa'o// oM badz+ra shai kha le hUM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ma ye hU~M hUM phaT// oM badz+ra ya sha skaM rI saM hU~M hU~M phuT// oM badz+ra na la ra kaM hUM hUM phaT// sgo rjes
90b4(rgyud): su lha mo bzhi po sna tshogs kyi mdog tsam drag po'i gzugs dang ldan pa ste// de'i sngags su bshing pa la// shar du oM dzA be gri li dz+nyA hUM hU~M phaT// lhor oM shri badz+ra dz+wa li ni
90b5(rgyud): hU~M hU~M phaT/ nub du oM badz+ra kun d+he le hUM hU~M phaT// byang du oM ba/ dz+ra bI ra bi ho hU~M hU~M phaT// thams cad byed mthar du ni/ shri sbyar zhing mchog ro ma pa bzhin// sngags pas de
90b6(rgyud): lcer zla sa nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni br-i ba yi// sdom pa'i dngo sa grub thob pa ste// zla ba grag gi de dbang 'gyur// gcig tu byas te bsdus nas ni// rnal 'byor cha chen mo gzi/ 
90b7(rgyud): rjid can dra ba'i mchog ni grub par 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad ni// khri'am 'bum du zlas nas ni// gsong sngag sre rgyal po 'grub pa yin// snying po dag ni/ 
90b8(rgyud): zlas pa yis// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'grub cing // rang nyid ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur// gzham gyi lugs su bzhugs 'gro zhing // mi snang ba dag thob nas ni// rnal
91a1(rgyud): chen po rnam par spyod// sna tshogs gzugs su 'dzin pa yin// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// dam tshigs gi sdom pa 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal
91a2(rgyud): po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste// sum bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ga/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro cho ga'i rim// sdor bshud sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yi/ 
91a3(rgyud): lung stsogs pa'i rim pa bya// rnal 'byor lung ni mi shes pa// sangs rgyas mu skye gas mkhan yin te// rtag tu lus na spang mi bya// dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing // sangs rgyas chos
91a4(rgyud): dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su 'gro// shes ra rab pha rol phyin dmigs nas// rnal 'byor gyi ni dngos grub 'grub// gcig chur 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 
91a5(rgyud): bdag gI lus ni rnam par bsam// sngo zhing drag la bzhin rnas sgyur// gdum zhing 'jigs la 'jigs par mdzad// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// ral pa zla phyed skye
91a6(rgyud): tsug 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa gnon// thod ba'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyam rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// ba~M hU~M las byung sku lus can// phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan
91a7(rgyud): steg gi pags pa gos su snams// dkyil 'khor phyed par legs par gnas// spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can// mgrin pa bzhi la zhal bzhi pa// bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag/ 
91a8(rgyud): ldan// stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog/ gdug pa kun kyi thod pa'i 'phreng // dus mtha' las byung do shol can// gdug pa kun ni zhi bas 'og gnon// nyon mongs 'jigs byed ma go// 
91b1(rgyud): bro dang // sred pa gti mug 'phra dog ste// dus mtshan do ni kha sbub lo// gdug pa'i 'gyegs ni 'jigs pa can// thams cad zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon// na mkha' dang ni skye bu dang // dka rA dang
91b2(rgyud): ni dmar ba dang / mra ljang dang du dA ka mchog gi zhalnga// rdo rje dri lwa ba mnyam ldan pa// pag mo drang ni pang pas la byung // kun tu gnyis med sbyar ba yas// chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig tu// sbyangs pa yon
91b3(rgyud): tan+da zhes bya ba// dpal gyi bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje he ru ke nyid yin// thod pa dang ni khwa T+wA~M 'dzin// chos kyi 'khor lo khar sil dang // ldum zed mdung dang zhags pa dang // lcags kyu'i mgon
91b4(rgyud): cang te'u dang // g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag drug gris// na rarI pags brkyang nas snam sa// sha rA du me tang ki dang dma?/ bi ki/ ratsa kI dang pu kya sri/ b+hu khA tra ki dang shu ba ra// d+hi pa
91b5(rgyud): dang sa ma ri// lha mo brgyad po de dag ni// ci bzhin rim pas rje sa su dgod// ser dang sngo dang de bzhin dmar// dud pa'i nI mai drog can te// dmar dong ljang da'i dud ka'i mdo ga// brgyad pa
91b6(rgyud): dkar po nyid yin no// sgo rnams su ni dgod bya ba/ khrag 'thung rdo rje gtum ma dang / rdo rje sring mchog ma pa ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed drag mo ste// gdul dka' thams cad// rtsal mdzad cing
91b7(rgyud): thal ba spyan mdog lwa gu dang // dA mar dang sngo dang lhag par 'jigs// brgyad pa'i dbus su chos kha ra sa la// thod pA cang te'u gri gugau ste// dpung pa'i steng du gos 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams su na
91b8(rgyud): lha mo bzhi// thod pa dang ni kha traM ma 'jigs pa// chos kyi cang te'u khar sel 'dzin// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// yi dgas gdan gyi steng du ni// dkyil krung phyed pa'i gar gis bzhug
92a1(rgyud): bsod snyoms pa dang chos gros gsum// phyis drang len dang cog pu pa// gzhi ni gzhan du stanA gcin pa// TI gab med dang shing drung pa/ non pa dang ni dung khrod pa/ 
92a2(rgyud): phyag dar khyod dang bying pa ba/ b+h+ring nga gci lta'i ril pa yis// sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnam dge sbom// ye shes mnyam po'i dam tshig sgom// ro gcig tu ni rnam par sgom// oM shri ma hA su la// / badz+ran
92a3(rgyud): ro ru k+Shu~M a hU~M hU~M phaTa~M swAhA// oM mA hA trA~M ga~M hU~M hU~M phaT// oM To badz+ra Do pa hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ma~M radzA kItrU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ba~M du ga si hUM hUM phaT/ oM kha T+wA~M ki hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM kaM sha wa ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM dz+dzaH/ 
92a4(rgyud): pra ri hUM hU~M phe Te/ oM saM sa ma ma rI hU~M hU~M phaTad ki ma ha~M hU~M hU~M phaTe/ oM ba~M badz+ra tsan d+hi hrISh+Ti na oM hU~M hU~M badz+ra dek+Sha sI hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM bI badz+ra b+hai ra 'i hUM hUM phaT/ de kun gcer
92a5(rgyud): sgyu zi'i gI/ spyan gsum pa lnga zhi ba ste// mche ba rnam 'i spyod cing // phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus bri rkyen/ khrong pa'i'i phreng ba'ing rdur brgyan nas/ bzang dang ni dang snying rje
92a6(rgyud): sgeg pa dang ni rngam pa dang // drag cing 'khro dang nyams can te// bzlas dang sgom pa spro zhing sngo// lus ngag yi la 'dre bar gnas// sems can mos pa sna tshog snga pa/ gra dul ba'i thabs
92a7(rgyud): kyis bde ba yis// yul la yongs su spyong phran// bla mod ye shes 'bras bu mthob// sems can thams cad 'dri'i sa ba / 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis// ye shes 'bras rdzu
92a8(rgyud): spyod pa yin/ ga'ang ni sems can thams cad kyi/ mchog gi go 'phang thob bad nges papa brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma mas/ spang ba'i yo mngon 'askyed ba 'i lu'u seM/ 
92b1(rgyud): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba// char dbab cho ka ra rim pa ni// pad ma 'drab ma brgyad mchog gi lte ba ge sar bcas pa la// de'i dbus/ 
92b2(rgyud): su rdo rje che// mche ba rnam rtsigs 'jigs pa can// brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gau sum 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs// rdo rje mchog ni gsor mdzad cing // sdigs 'dzub zhabs par ldan pa dang / 
92b3(rgyud): thod pa dang ni khA tAng 'dzin// lcags kyu dang ni mdung snoms zhing // dbang po'i 'phagos pa mnams shing 'dzin// cang teru dang ni brgyad par bshad// g.yas rkyang pa'i zhabs kyis ni// chu lnga 'dzin
92b4(rgyud): pas myos pas mnan/ zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par brgyan// phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan // thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa gosu
92b5(rgyud): snams// zod pa'i 'phreng ba'i cod pan mchog/ mchus gan na zhal ga do rnams smyo zhing // khro ba rwa lte zhing 'dzi/ pas gzigs// 'ang ba brgyad l-i gru brgyad bri// mtha' yas
92b6(rgyud): dang ni nor rgyas dang // 'dzag po pad ma pad mche// dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu// dpa' bo dang ni rnams yin te// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ldang // sor dang drug po'i mdog can te
92b7(rgyud): ljang ku dang ni ser po ste// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs par// 'jigs pas dka' drim spong bar byed// skrag pas lta zhing gnas pa'o// bcom lda/ 
92b8(rgyud): ska lu sa sngon po can// 'jigaso shing rab tu 'jigs par mdzad// g.yas pa du do ka dmar po ste// g.yon pa ljang gu du da ka'o// steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding gdong // zhal ni rnaMs
93a1(rgyud): sgyur zhing 'jig pa'o// nyi ma dmar ba'i grazi'i brjid can// nyi ma bcu gnyis nyi mnyam khyod// phag mo dag gis mgul 'khrud cing // byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ 
93a2(rgyud): yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// bde chen mchog na bcu gnyis pa// gri gu gi tshangs pa'i mgo' bo dang // rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan// lA mo bcud ni rnam par 'tshir// gnor
93a3(rgyud): bu dbu skra grol ba dang // spyan gsum ba la sku rigs can// 'dzam bu chu bo mchog kyi sku// gnyis su med par sbyor bar gnas// kru ni re ba gi chung mar gnas// chu la drang chung ma rA bcu
93a4(rgyud): pa dag/ chu lha'i lus ni dro kar pro can// dka' drin dag ni slong bar byed// snying kAr ye shes 'khor po dang / de mdog phyag dang zhal yang skyed// de'i snying hU~M ni nang hU~M / 
93a5(rgyud): cing // lus ngag yid kyis de bzhin nyid // klu'i rang swA de drug la/ hUM hUM nI hUM mi rnam par dgod gas sngags rgyal po'i cho ga ni// khro bo'i tshi gA lA
93a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya// chu bo'i 'gre ma 'am rgya mtsho'am/ khron pa'am klu'i mtsho dang ni rdzA ngi byA lteng ka rnams su ni// blo tsan khro bo'i zlos pa bya/ yang na klu'i gnas su na/ 
93a7(rgyud): pa bzlas ma dag la 'jug/ oM shri badz+ro he he ru ru kaM hU~M pheM na ga khar shwe ba yA hUM// DA gi dzA sau ba ra phaT swahA// 'di dgra sgoms te khri tsam ba// bdus bzho dgA tu stong du'o/ 
93a8(rgyud): zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // sa rnams kun tu 'bab par 'gyur// dam tshig snyim srog mchod dus su// klu dang dar ni nyi ldan pas/ 'o ma dang ni bza' zhi jeb tu
93b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas ni klu rgyal bzlas// 'o ma 'khrus kyi cho ga yis// 'o ma'i sbyin srog sreg krugs bya// 'o ma'i shing gi ya ma shing bya// 'o mar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya// bum
93b2(rgyud): pa 'o mos yongs su ga nga// me rtsogs 'tsham da phyogs rnams su// 'o mar becas pa'i ge tor mau skrin// oM aM a nan ta ya// hU~M ni hU~M swahA// oM sarbaHsuM khe hU~M naM hAM sa hA/ 
93b3(rgyud): oM tr-i tA gla ka hU~M ni hU~M sa hA// oM a pad ma hU~M ni hUM sahA// oM maM ma hA padad+ma ma hUM ni hUM swA hA/ oM shAM Sha pa la hU~M naM hU~M swAhA// oM kaM ga ra ko ta hUM ni hU~M sahA// oM oM A nan ta pa
93b4(rgyud): hUM ni hUM swa hA/ iM hUM bau ba ru na ya// na ge ti me ta ye na// kaM par sha ba ya// hU~M na hUM sa hU~M// // 'di zlas khro bo dnga? bcas pas// kun gis zlas
93b5(rgyud): pa khri tsim bya// 'o ma 'brasa? snying zas su bza'// dbang po brtul zhing yodras mi s+the bri gzugs spangs bse dngon gsum du/ khri tsam bzlas nas mngon du 'gyur// 
93b6(rgyud): mngon sum du dngos grub cing // smras pra tsam gyis char 'phebs te// 'dri lta'i the tsomi ma byed cig// rdul snod kyi nang yungs dang chu thags te// de la nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i bar du/ 
93b7(rgyud): yongs su bzlas te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chung dang 'o ma sres pas khrus byas te// chu 'azam gyis sbrus pa las// klu'i gzugs byas la// nub tu maH
93b8(rgyud): sta na te// 'go bo dgu la chu sa dbang skur te// de nas chu bo'aM nang du gzhug go// de mo thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing // 'dzam bu'i gling du kun tu tshwa ra// 'bab pa
94a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing // nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed// sems can thams cad bde reg gnas// phan tshun khro bol gzugs can te/ 
94a2(rgyud): bdag snyoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// rang gi snying kha kho nar ni// rdo rje he ru sgoms pa yis// char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur// ri'i steng du de 'dzegs te// rtse gsu
94a3(rgyud): pa la yongs pozlas ma// ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro// cang te'u las yongs su bzlas na// mched pa'i mi rengs par 'tsho ma ro// zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na
94a4(rgyud): 'gugs par byed do// thod pa la yongs su bzlas na// khrag 'gugs par byed do// dgra sta la yongasu bzlas ni// bsod par byid do// kha tr-i ka la yongs su bzlas ma zhi bar 'gyuraro// / 
94a5(rgyud): gri gug la yongs su bzlas na// 'jig rten gsum du// rgyu ba bsod par byed do// mgo bo la yongasu bzlas na/ shi ba yongs su slong bar byed do// rdo rje gsor zhi pa yong su
94a6(rgyud): bzlas na// sa 'og gi dngos grub du 'gyur ro// dral bu la yongs su zlas na// mi dga' ba 'gugs par 'gyur ro// glang po che'i lpags pa la yongs su bzlas te// bting mkhar snang
94a7(rgyud): la 'bur bar 'gyur te// dpag tshad stong phrag brgya ra 'gro zhing slar la ldog go// phyag rgya drug la yongs su zlas na// pha rol gyi mdun du ma snang bar 'gyur ra
94a8(rgyud): sa steng du ni kun sbyong nying // ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur// nges par rjod pa'i pa'i rgyud bla mo'i bla ma las/ char 'bab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste// sum bcu zhi ba'o// 
94b1(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ gsang ba mchog ni 'dir 'dus nas// skad cig gis ni bdag sgoms na na he ru ka dpal gzugasu bya/ sngo zhing drag po rnam
94b2(rgyud): sbyar ba/ drag po spyan gsum zhal drag mchog/ zla ba phyed par ral pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la// thong ba'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje 'phreng bas rnam par
94b3(rgyud): rgyan// sku la mgo ra shul can// phyag rgya drug gyis rnam par brgyan// sdug gi pags pa gos su rnams/ pa gra mo yis ni sku la brgyan// nabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste/ 
94b4(rgyud): grayas pa ser la dung ba'i mdog/ po yin pa dmar la ljang ku'o// steng gi zhal ni// rta gdong sku// dkar zhing sprin mdog dag cing 'jigs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan
94b5(rgyud): mi mtshun btsir ba ste/ rgyal ba'i ljags pa gros su bsdams// mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs 'dzin cing // thod pa dang ni kha tAM 'dzin// rdo rje 'tshan gyis rgyan pa ste/ zhags pa lcags
94b6(rgyud): kyi phyag ni snams// cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin/ gri gu gzhags pa de bzhin te// phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang // zhabs gcig tu ni rnam
94b7(rgyud): por bsgom// glang po'i gdong dang byi'u yaM gdod// seng gi'i gdong yang de bzhin te// dang po khyi'i gdong yin te// gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin// gsum pa phag gi gdod
94b8(rgyud): yin te// bzhi mkha'i gdong can no// gnas kyi bdog ni chos kyi bdag/ sna tshogs gzugs ni chen po 'dzin/ mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste// thams cad mkhyen cing thams
95a1(rgyud): cad ga/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'cha// bzhin mom shing rnam bsgom de// sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen dzin/ bdag nyid chen po rnam par chom/ 
95a2(rgyud): par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// sna tshogs gzugs sgrub pa'i le'u ste// sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bya ba// phag mo'i mchog ni sgru ba pa
95a3(rgyud): ste/ skyed pa'i rom pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid sgom zhing rnam par bsgom// sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzir/ sku lus li gri dang 'tshungs pa// me tog ban du kul+yA bu// zhal ga sum
95a4(rgyud): pa la phyog drug ma// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sems dpa'i dkyil mo krung gis bzhugs / thod pa'i phreng ba ling bu brgyan can// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par
95a5(rgyud): ldan// dbu sku mdzes pas 'khril pa ste// thams cad zhal mchu rnams bcing zhing // mda' dang gzhun 'dzin pa ste// rna ba'i'o mthar thug 'gengs par byed// thod// 
95a6(rgyud): pa dang kha traM 'dzin 'dzin// lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste// pad+ma me demar po'i dbus bzhugs shing // 'dod pa thams cad rab tu rtsol// yang ni phya gA mi bcu gnyis pa/ zhal drug lha mo/ 
95a7(rgyud): sku lus 'byung // steng gi zhal ni pA gargod gdong // drug po'i gzi'i brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi'i// shar gyi 'dab la rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog/ g.yon pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dam tshig man
95a8(rgyud): nub kyi phyogs su rdo rje gzir rdzing mchog/ lho'i phyogasu rdo rje rin chen mchog/ me'i phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog / bden bral phyogs su rdo rje rigs mchog ma// rlung gi phyogs su
95b1(rgyud): rdo rje grub mchog ma/ gdabang ldan phyogasu rdo rje thal mchogs// skye mardo rje 'bar mchog ma// rdo rje gzib brjid mchog sa ste// rdo rje khro bo mchog ma dang / rdo rje mche ba mchog ma/ 
95b2(rgyud): lha mo de dag thams cad kyang dmer khri'i mchog can zhal gsum po// b+hag drug pa la spyan gsum pa// sems dpa'i dkyil mo krung du bzhugs// nga'u sna ngas mi grol ba snye// thams
95b3(rgyud): can brgyan gyis rnam rgyan cing // rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rlung gi lus kyis thabs la 'khril/ zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang // rkang pa dang ni khu du 'dzin// gru bzhi dge du 'da' bcu dgug/ yongasu
95b4(rgyud): 'grengs pa gnas par gzhag/ sno ru ga yas rkyang zhabs kyi sa bzhugs// gcer lu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zham/ thams cad yid ni gdan la bzhugs ni/ rdo rje gsor zhing
95b5(rgyud): bsdigs 'dzu dang // zhags pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ gzhan yang phun gsum dag du yang / ji ltar 'khor sogs phya ga 'tshal lo// de snying ye shes lha mo ni/ 
95b6(rgyud): gsung thug snga dang bcas pas bsgom// ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyar bya yis// chos kyi ro nI mnyam par thim// ye shes bzlas pa smros nas ni// cho ga'i rim pas yang dag sku// dam/ 
95b7(rgyud): tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis// zla ba de nyid 'grub par 'gyur// oM shri badz+ra bA rA hrI a baM hUM hUM phaT s+yAn+na/ oM shri badz+ra huh+ya ud// di me hUM hUM phaT s+yAd// oM shrI badz+ra sa ma ya~M u da~M mi hU~MH
95b8(rgyud): phaT swAhA// oM shri badz+ra te dza ud ta me hU~M hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM shriM badz+ra red na u ta me hU~M hU~M phaT swAh+la// oM shri badz+ra dz+nyA na u ta me hUM hU~M pha Te sAt+ma/ oM shriM badz+ra b+hi t+ya ya u ta me hUM hUM pha / 
96a1(rgyud): a shrI badz+ra sid d+ya ud mi hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA// oM shri badz+ra bi ta li ud te me hU~M hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM shri badz+ra dz+wa la ud twa ma dz+nyA hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM shri badz+ra a mr-i te u ta me he'u hU~M hU~M phaT phaTaswAH/ 
96a2(rgyud): oM shri badz+ra kro ta ud tra me br-i hUM phaT/ oM shri badz+ra dang shwA u ta me ho hUM phaT// / 'di dge tsi lnga ra ra ma~M pa yis// sgom pa dang ni badz+ra saM bai byaM// spu dang spro ba byas nas ni chos rnam saM kun da
96a3(rgyud): chos can ni// rang gi lha'i sbyor bas bdag/ sems can thams cad rab tu brtag/ rnal 'byor gnas ni chos yin te// gsang ba gsum la rab tu bzhug/ gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te// 
96a4(rgyud): chos kyang de bzhin de lta bu// bdag med chos ni chos yin te// chos las chos ni yod ma yin// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// gsum gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog
96a5(rgyud): ces bya ba'i le'u ste// / sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor ma drA/ ga cho ga rim// pad ma 'dra ba lnga bris nas ni// lte ba ge sor
96a6(rgyud): khyab par ni// de'i dbu su phag mo ni// dmar zhing sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug mdzes// spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyogs
96a7(rgyud): kyo gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ dkyil krung byed pa'i gar dang bcas/ phyag rgya drug gis sku rgyan cing // mgo'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// gdug pa'i bdud ni thams cad dang // dus mtshan la
96a8(rgyud): sgrub byas pa la// zhabs kyis kyang ni mnan par bzhugs// dmar dang / sngo la ldang ba ste/ kau sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par brgyan// thod pa dang ni kha traM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu
96b1(rgyud): phyag na sngams// mgo dang ni dri gug 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad rab tu rtsol// snying kor ye shes dam tshig ni// sku gsung thugs su sbyor las byung // ba shar phyogs lha mo ya mi ni// g.yon
96b2(rgyud): du skor nas rnam par dgod// rmongs byed ma dang bskor byed ma// skrag byed ma dang tsa na dri ka/ spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// zhal gcig po la phyag bzhi pa// sngo dang / dkrar dang / ser ba ste// ldang
96b3(rgyud): gu dud pa'i mdog can re// zod pa dang ni Sha tra~M 'dzin/ dril bu cang ti ru gri gug dang // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu brgyan can// phyag rgya la sa rnam par brgyan// phyog kyi gos can gar gyi mtshan
96b4(rgyud): mgro'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mi skyod pa'i cod pan can// thugs rje'i nyams kyis bde ba ste// gnyis so// sbyor bar mnyam par ldan// rdo rje sems stsogs
96b5(rgyud): de nyid// phag mo dang ni rdo rje sems// yang min dang rnam snang mdzad/ rmongs byed ma dang pad ma'i gur// skyed phyed ma da khrag 'thung ste// skrag byed rdo rje nyi ma dang // tsan drik+ka dang rta ma/ 
96b6(rgyud): ste// rdo rje sems sku dkar po ste// rnam par snang mdzad ser po yin// pad ma gar dbang dmar po ste// he ru dpal sngon po rdo rje nyi ma ma dmar po skye// rta mchog drag ni ljang ku'o// yang na/ 
96b7(rgyud): so sor sgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum pa ste/ phyogs drug spyan ni gsum pa ste/ phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan// rdo rje dram bu zong Shakha tra~M/ ral gri cang te'u man/ 
96b8(rgyud): po 'chang // rnama'i pags pa snams gar dang bca so// rnam snang la stsogs dpa' bo kun// zhal ci go pa la phyag bzhi pa// zod pa dang ni khA traM dang // cang te'u dril bu mtshan pa'i mnag/ 
97a1(rgyud): yang na thams cad phyag bcu gnyis// zhal gdong drug pa bsgom par bya// de dzA ga gra sang sA ga sa 'di yin te// oM shri baM daM hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shri hr-i yaM hUM hUM pha sa/ 
97a2(rgyud): oM shra hraM moM hUM hUM phaT swA hA// oM shr-i hr-i hri saM hUM hUM phaT swA hAkA/ oM shri hUM hUM saM hUM hU~M phaT dza~M AH/ oM shri parba phaT swA hA// / de dag ni rnal 'byor ma dru ga gi sngags so// oM shri haM baM hUM phaT swAhA/ 
97a3(rgyud): au hr-i b+h+rUM b+huM phaTe sAhA/ oM swa tra hi hUM paT+Ta/ kau ai ro ta sha ta he hUM phaT sAhA/ au hUM nAM hau traM hUM phaT sAhA// oM paT haM hr-i phaT swAhA// 'di ni rapa' bo drug gi sngags// baR+Sha sa ba dang na
97a4(rgyud): sgoms tsam gyis// 'khor lo drug gi mchog drub cing 'khor lo sgyur ba thob pa ste// 'khor los sgyur drug rgyal byor 'gyur// mi 'pha ma rgyal ba yang dag rdzogs
97a5(rgyud): stobs chen rtsol mchog rnyed pa yin// phyag 'tshan drug la rtag mchog cing // cho ga bzhin du mngon sngags / no// de ni myur du grub nas ni// rnal 'byor rgyal po mtsham kyang
97a6(rgyud): thob// mi snang la stsogs grub nas no// khams ngag tu rnam par spyod// 'gro ba drug gis sems can sgrol// sgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs// yang na 'khor lo zur
97a7(rgyud): drug la// bde ba chen po rnam snang mdzad/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'chang rgyalnga po/ 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag po ni// gur gum gyin mdog lta bu / gzi' drangs 'bar ba' 'od can te/ 
97a8(rgyud): phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang ngo gro// rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'o// g.yas dang g.yan gyi phyo gos kyis 'khyu pa/ ral gri po te kha // thod pa
97b1(rgyud): lcags gyu zhags pa dang / ud pa la cang te'u 'dzin/ gur gum 'dog dang sngo ba dang // dmar dang ljang gu steng zhal dkar// chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa stesems can
97b2(rgyud): khams ni rab grol byed// nar phyogs g.yon skor dgod pa ni/ yan lag drug du dpa' bo dag/ mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig cas// rdo rje sems dang ba ga mo dang // rnam
97b3(rgyud): snang mdzad dang yang m-i ni// bang ma'i gar dang rmongs byed bcas// khrag mthung ma dang skyong byed pa// rdo rje nyi ma bsgrag byed ma/ rta mchog can dri ka dang bcas/ de dag dre ru dgod
97b4(rgyud): pas// 'jam pa'i rdo rje rang nying grub// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba drang / sngo dang dmar dang dkar dang ljang // ku// bdun po na mkha'i mdog can la/ ljang dang dung kha'i mdog
97b5(rgyud): tsan+da de// de lnga'i sku mdog rnam par sgomazhalnga gcig paphyag bzhi po// lha mo rnams ni phyag bzhi pa'o/ thod pa dang ni gri gug 'dzin// dpa' bo thong pA kha traM ga/ rang gi
97b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshan gnyis med sbyor// dril bu lha ma gcig yang dag ldan// cang te'u dag ni 'dzin pa mchog/ spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs nAn/ 
97b7(rgyud): tho pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ mgo bo do shal 'dzin pa ste// thams cad yi dgras steng du bzhug so// dbus su 'jigs byed dus mtshan gnon// lnga mo byin pa gnyis kyis
97b8(rgyud): 'khril// ska grol ba tshos gos tsan// snying ra kar ye shes dam tshig sde// sku gsung thugs su rnam par sbyor// go cha gnyis pa yang dag sbya// gnas kyi 'khor lo snyoms/ 
98a1(rgyud): nas ni// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgod// gsang gsum gyi snying dkar gnas// kha gdong la spogs mkha' 'gro ma/ oM phyi rol sgo ru rnam par dgod// zur du ga
98a2(rgyud): gshed la stsogs// thams cad gcer bur rnam par sgom// sngar bshad mdogra phyag 'tshan ni// ya dgas gdan la yang dgra bzhags// g.yas rkyang pa'o zhabs kyi sa mnan// dr-ig po// / 
98a3(rgyud): sgra ni grol ba ste// thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba can// rang gi phyi dang nang du yang // pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag/ sgom zhing rab tu sgom par bya// spro zhing sdu ba'i sbyor ba yas// gas
98a4(rgyud): ba'i 'khor lo'i zlas pa bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma zlas nas// sgom zhing rab tu sgom par bya// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'aMng tshogasaM spros nas/ 'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par bya// 
98a5(rgyud): nang ni bdag nyid snom pa yis// 'khor lo ga sum gyis sgom nas bzla// de nyid gsumau drang sngags lhan cig/ dnga? khro dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// hUM d+h+waM phaT ni mtha' bu ste
98a6(rgyud): lo gsum gi bzlas pa bya// rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du nI/ dam tshig can gyis de bzlas bya// oM shri man dzu badz+ra a hUM maM hUM phaT sa hA/ oM ha badz+ra sa da dA hAM n+daM paM TaM swarbA/ aM
98a7(rgyud): hUM pa Tu swAny+dza/ au te be ro tsa nad+h+r-ir+t+r-i phATaswAhA/ au tr-i yo yA ma ni hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ mr-id+b+h+yAM d+b+h+yAM swa hI pa da mai nA ra ti shr-I ra hUM hUM phaT+ra sAh+ma/ oM maM mo ha ra daM trUM hUM phaT swA hI/ au
98a8(rgyud): ka hUM hUM phaT swAtwA/ oM dz+riM hraM saM tsau ma ni hUM hU~M baT swA hA/ oM hUM hU~M hi badz+ra su r+g+ha hUM hU~M pheM Ta swA hA/ oM hUM hUM sa traM sa me hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM phaT haM bai ra ma shA/ 
98b1(rgyud): e pra Tu phaT tsan d+ho ka hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM kaka s+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ sau su lu ka s+ye hUM hU~M phaT swAt+ma// oM shA nI s+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA// oM su ga s+ye hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ye ma da hI hU~M hUM phaiMT+Ta/ oM
98b2(rgyud): ma ru ta hUM hUM ba Ta swa / oM ai ma daMshr-I nAM hUM bAH/ tshi yi mi mthi ni hUM hUM ShaT// g.yon dang g.yos kyi le kaM gnyis su cho go gnyi sa bo dgo dri nas ni// grwa
98b3(rgyud): bA ru/ lAs rnams thams cad byed pa yin// the tsom med pAr las bya sran// nges par dngos gru ba gzhan du min/ yang na mgron po sa bcu'i dbyung // pha rol phyin po bsku la gnas
98b4(rgyud): sbyin drang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes radrug bya ste// thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dnge ye shes ngag gA se dag par gis / rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 
98b5(rgyud): 'ong byed pa dang 'od phreng can/ sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur/ ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chasa? kyi sbyin!/ 'di yis rnam mar dag pa sgrom!gshin rje
98b6(rgyud): gsheng ba stsogs bzhi po ni// 'u phags pa'i ban pa rnam par sgom// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang // 'gog pa dang ni lam rnams te/ bcom ldan 'jam bu'i rdo rje pa // chos kyi
98b7(rgyud): dbyi ngas kyis rnam dag ste// ye shes rang gi ngo bo yin// 'di ltar rnam par dag pa sgom// gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i lam gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba ste// rnal 3
98b8(rgyud): stobs kyis gsang ba mchog/ sgra ba pa sa rjes su bstan pa dang // ci bzhin bdag pa'i dbye ba dang // bla ma'i lus las legs par slabasada'adi ltar cho gra gnyis med
99a1(rgyud): sbyor ba'i dam tshig nyid yin du// dngos grub kun gyi thabs kyi rgyud// rna ma'i byor thugs kyi gsang ba ste// las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu ster// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma
99a2(rgyud): las/ gnyis su myed pa'i go cha'i sbyor ba skyed pa'i le'u ste/ sum+b+hi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ brdzu'u ni mchog tu bsang ba ste/ 
99a3(rgyud): brje'i ni yongs su mi shes par// sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi bgrub ste/ 'di ni nges par shes pa ni// dngos grub 'grub par the tsom med// da zhes bya bar skyer bur bshad// dI zhes bya ba bud med yin/ 
99a4(rgyud): bu zhes bya ba gnan pa yin// kasuM zhes bya bza ba nyid/ ma zhes bya bam rU bsha du// ma zhes bya ba chung ma nyid// d+hI zhes bya ba sri ma yin// bI zhes bya ba mdzar bar bshad// lu zhes bya
99a5(rgyud): bu mo yin// sring zhes bya ba khrag du bo shad// sa na ni/ ba'i bdung ba yin// pe zhes bya ba thug pa ste// pi zhes bri ba ngo bzhin na/ pa zhes bya ba za ba yin// b+hu zhes bya ba 'dris pa yin// 
99a6(rgyud): bI zhes bya ba dur khrod yin// du zhes bya ba ro yin no// nr-i zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma// gA zhes zla ba la ma yin// hriM zhes bya ba gzugs can ma// ku zhes bya ba mkha' 'gra mA/ tsa me
99a7(rgyud): ro ha nyid// dza zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis// pa zhes bya ba gsong par smra// sa zhes bya ba legs 'ongs yin// maung zhes bya ba nya yin la/ byo zhes bya ba bza' ba yin// spro zhes
99a8(rgyud): bya ba btung ba yin// gang ni 'gro da dang grod min yin// ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin// sa zhes bya ba gzhan min 'gro// ra zhes bya ba khyo med do// du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo// su zhes bya bo skal
99b1(rgyud): bzangs so// rna zhes bya ba skal ngan ma// sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can// a zhes bya ba dam tshig med// A zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin// ni zhes khyab ma 'ongs yin// so zhes bya ba chags pa
99b2(rgyud): yin// 'di dag yi ge'i brda' yimed// dbang skur dus su rnal 'byor pas// bza' dang bza' min smin par phye// drobang skur ba ni mchog yin te// dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang // dam tshig
99b3(rgyud): can gyi dam tshig dus// dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang // dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya// ma dang pal sbyin mi bya// nges par brjod para'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rnga'i le'u ste/ 
99b4(rgyud): susu bcu rtsa bamyed ro// den su gzhan yang mid byug gang gis zhes bcom gyis ni
99b5(rgyud): pa po yis dngos grub thog/ bud med par rtsa ltar/ dkar ni pad ma'i 'ang bo ltar dkyus ring mig/ d+ha grA gos ni drakar m+b+ha dga'/ can dran ser badz+ro
99b6(rgyud): sbyin// de yang bza pa'i rjes 'tshar 'gyur/ thams cas ud ba swa wA ts+tsha ng+yas// dri 'dugs ni stsol dam+WAr/ u pa la phun po'i dri dang yong pas/ de ni dag pam bamang batshal 'gro/ 
99b7(rgyud): med ba kar 'dra' mdog gang // rtag tu pad ma'i rtsa ba 'dri// de yang de bzhin dpa' bo'i blo// dmar zhing ser skya'i bud med gang // gzugs bzang gos ni dmar ba dang // ma la kA
100a1(rgyud): dang ud pa la dri// da ni rdo rje'i rags byung yan// ser zhing ldang ba'i bud med gang // gos ni kar la dga' ba dang // mgo' la me tog dri dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa rig
100a2(rgyud): rjes 'gro yas// bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar// de mdog can gyi gos 'chang zhing // rtag tu ga bur dri dang ldan// rnam snang ra gis kyi rjes su 'gro zhing / rnal 'byor ma'i rigs rnams ni// 
100a3(rgyud): de ltar mdun pos ngas bshad pa// g.yon pa'i kun skyong la rtag dga'// rang rgya kha dog yang dag reg/ rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang // kha dog drug du 'gyur ba yin// rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba
100a4(rgyud): dang // rang rig las byung tshag tu smra ba// g.yon nas 'gro ba'i bud med gang // rnal 'byor pa la g.yon la brtag/ lag pa g.yon gyis mtshon pa dang // g.yon nas lta ba rna bar
100a5(rgyud): lha// lha mo rnams dang dga' smra bo// de ni dam tshig ldan par/ bshad// bud med gang byas de nyan cing / rigs kyi sa bon rab tra smra// rigs kyi bya ba ma sgo pa ste// rang gi
100a6(rgyud): bstan bashrad ma 'dor la// rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos// de ni dam tshig ldan pa bsha do// phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'che'o ga/ g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu 'dud// lha mo rnams dang kun
100a7(rgyud): smra ba// de na nges par nges par 'gro// the bong g.yon pas sa la ni// rkang pas rI mo 'dri byed cing // mgo ni sdug par byed pa dang // zur gyis lbu zhing lag pa ston// sgrub pa po la khyad par dun
100a8(rgyud): de yis rapa rigi dran pa dang // mkhur ba 'am oM sgo dag dang ni// sna dag tu ni thal mo ston// zung gyis lta zhing lan cig sngags// zlos shing rig la rnam par lta// bang ba'i 'gro ba'i rnal
100b1(rgyud): ma'anges par dam tshig can yin no// de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// bdud lu la rnams yang dag 'byung // ya ma na dang skrag byed ma// 'od ldan 'gra/ 
100b2(rgyud): mo 'jigs gzugs ma// kun du spod pa ba su ra// rnal 'byor ma'i rnam pa bdun// mdor sdus rang mtshan bshadra pa yin// gzugs can ma dang tsum pa'i kA// la ma yo dus 'gyur byas
100b3(rgyud): bca' mo// mi ldog e ga'i lha mo no// mkha' 'gro ma ni zadun du bshad// mngon par zhen pas lta ba dang // smin ma 'degs par gang byed cing / sngon bzhin gzugs ni sdud byed pa/ 
100b4(rgyud): phyir ni 'jigs par byed pa dag/ gzag can ma na yin par bshang// gnyis med dbang pos bsten pA bya// sdug pa yang ni mi sdug pa// byin pa 'khyud tsang tsum na// de ni
100b5(rgyud): tsum pa ka ra zhes bya// mkha' 'gro'i mchog kyang de nyid yi na// zlas mi lnga bar zur du lta// khro gnyis dang nri gdang dag dang // sman ma sgyur zhing sdig 'dzu pa dang // 'di ni gan
100b6(rgyud): yang dbugs mi 'byin// 'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa// 'di ni la ma yin par bstan// phag dang dred dang byi la dang // lce sbyang rigs dang ha dag dang // thams cad der ni 'jigs byed pa//
