127b7(rgyud): yan lag pur bya 'dra// a wi kawi zhes brjod gi/ rgyud lamags sring ston 'am yi// 'dug pa'i sgras stsogs pasan/ srid mus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid// bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das/ @
127b8(rgyud): pa'i mchang po bang skur ma// gang chen pos yang dag sungs// sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa yin// de sar de nyid 'acu bzhin// 'dir klusan pan pa shad sa yin// mchog dang
128a1(rgyud): spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing // skye dang dga' bar bde gshegs kyis// rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur// de ltar
128a2(rgyud): ga ldan byas nas// dngos grub thams cad rab rtsol// zla ba nya las stengs du// 'di ltar rnal 'byor pos sgoms na// de'i sa bsod nams gyur pa yos// lA klu mi la sgrogs pa kun// de'is
128a3(rgyud): bsod nams gang 'gyur des// bdag gzhan ying dag ye shes ldan// bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam// klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis// mthar sa longs spyong thob 'gyur ba 'am/ 
128a4(rgyud): yang na 'khor lo sgyur ba 'thog/ rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe// dpal ldan khrag mthung la stsogs mkha' 'gro ma// la gA na me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan pa
128a5(rgyud): ngar sna tshogs pa// sna tshogs klu'i mchod pas mchod/ mchi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di// mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas su khyer// de'i dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa// sa
128a6(rgyud): snying de ni rnyeng bar dka'// nges par marjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i tha mams/ gas dzo mo ge bskyed pa'i le'u ste// lnga bcu rtsa drug pa// / de na so gzhams
128a7(rgyud): bdag nyid nye ru kar byas nas// rigs nga ni shan pa mo blangs nas// me tog la sogs gang ba par phyin nga dpa' bo chen thos bdug spos dbul// phas la phyogs mor me
128b1(rgyud): bcang te'u dril bu brdung bar bya// klu dang gar gyis mchod par bya// lha'i rol mo'i bye drug dang / 'phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// lus ni phyag brgya drug dang ldan// a li ka li mnyam byas te/ 
128b2(rgyud): sde mtshan la ni thim par bya// bzhi bzhi du ni shes byas la// thub pa'i mchog gis rgyas par bya/ de nas dpa' bo btu bar bya// don 'dod thams cad sgrub byed pa// bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang
128b3(rgyud): lnga pa'i yang ni lnga pa dang // lnga pa'i ni bzhi pa dang // dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // mthar gnas pa'i bzhi pa dang // de nyid kyi na gnyis
128b4(rgyud): pa dang // sume bcu pa ni yang dag zung // shA drug pa dang ni// de bzhin pan byed byed ba sum bcurtsa gsum dang // dab pa'i dang po nyid dag dang // mthar
128b5(rgyud): gnas pa'i gsum pa dang // dang po'i ni gsum pa nyid/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// bzhi pa'i ni lnga pa dang // lnga pa'i yang bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa'i dang po gang // gnyis
128b6(rgyud): pa'o ni gsum po dang // gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang // lnga pa'i yang lnga pa dang // dang po'i ni dang po dang // de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang // de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa// gsum pa'i dang
128b7(rgyud): gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ nga/ bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang yin dang // u sa ma'i ni gnyis pa nyid// dang ba'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad
128b8(rgyud): la'anga'// dang po'i ni gsum pa dang // lnga pa dang ni bzhi pa dang // de bzhin sum bcu rtsa gcig blang // bcwo lnga pa ni nyid dag dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin du
129a1(rgyud): bzhin nyi shun drug pa da // yi ge sum bcu na gnyis pa/ sus sgra yin pa ma nyid// sum btsun gnyis pa nyid dang // lnga pa'i yi ni bzhi ba dang // gnyis pa'i yin bzhi pa dang / 
129a2(rgyud): lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // gnyis pa'i yin bzhi pa dang // lnga po'i no bzhi pa dang / u sA yi ni gsum pa dang // gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// a nu rtsa'i dang po dang de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ 
129a3(rgyud): An dA rtsa'i gnyis pa dang // de bzhin yang ni sume bcu pa/ lnga pa'i yi ni dang po dge/ u sma'i ni dang po nye ba/ de bzhin yi ge brgyad nyid dang // bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // u shwa'i dang
129a4(rgyud): gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgya dang pa gdang por gnyis pa slong gang yin dpe/ gsum pa'i dang pa nyid dag dang dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang // bzhi 'jo bzhi pa
129a5(rgyud): gang yin dang // ud rtsa'i gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i yang lnga nye ba dang // yi ge bya'i de nas blang // dang po'i ni bzhi pa dang // de nas brgyad pa nyid dag dang // bzhi pa
129a6(rgyud): lnga pa gang yin dang // lnga pa'i 'ang lnga pa dang / de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun dang // bzhi pa'i bzhi pa dang // slar yang nyi shu rtsa bdun po// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// nyi shu lnga pa yang dag b+hU / 
129a7(rgyud): sum bcu rtsa gsum nyid ngag dang // bzhi pa'i ni bde ba dang // lde bu yi nr-i lnga ba dang // bzhi pa'i ni lngab dang// dang po'i ni ring po nyid dag dang / de bzhin nyi shurtsa bdun pa/ An d+ha rdza
129a8(rgyud): dang/ de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa u swa yi ni gnyis pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu ma drug pa'o// mam mtshan dang bo ngang/ mam gnas pa'i gnyis pa nyid// gnyis pa'i yi ni da
129b1(rgyud): dang drug pa'i ni gnyis pa nyid// thog ma'i ni dang po dang / bya mthar gnas pa'i gnyis pa nyid// gnyis pa'i ni dang po dang // bdun pa'i na gnyis pa dang / drug pa'i ni gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i ni lnga pa dang / 
129b2(rgyud): bzhi pa 'as ni sbyar bar bya/ ga mthar gnas pa'i bzhi phye dang / lnga pa'i ni lnga pa la// bzhi pa'i ni gnas su bya// lnga pa'i ni thog ma la// steng du sbyar cing bcing bar bya/ u spu'i na gsum pa la// mthar gnas pa'i thog ma dang / 
129b3(rgyud): bzhi pa'i ni thog ma la// gzi'i brjid can gyis ga dan du gla/ bdun pa yin gsum pa dang // drug pa'i yang na de bzhin te// dang po'i na mkha' khams yin te// thog ma dag ni blangs nas// lnga pa dang ni bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa
129b4(rgyud): yang de bzhin te// thog ma yang ni sdus nas blang // bdun pa'i ni dang po dang / oM A sma yi ni bzhi pa blang // bdun pa'i nr-i bzhi pa dang // rdo rje sems dpe bye ba yin/ usma sha'i bani ba dang / nyi ma'i ni bdan du byas/ ba shAr/ 
129b5(rgyud): pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ me'i 'og du sbyar bar bya/ thig le dang na yang dag sbyar/ ma'i ni gnyis pa dang / de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa dang / drug pa'i ni gnyis de bzhin/ bcu gcig pa dang nyi shu gnyis/ gsum // 
129b6(rgyud): dang po blangs nas ni/ bzhi pa'i ni ga sum pa dang / u sma'i ni bzhi pa dang / lnga ba'ikho zhi pa dang / n+ye ny+tsi shu rtsa gcig dri blangs nas/ gnyis pa'i ni dang po dang // lnga pa'i ni thog ma dang / gnyis pa'i ni yi ge drug/ lnga pa'i/ 
129b7(rgyud): ni bzhi pa la/ mkha' la dang ni de bzhin no// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de blangs nas/ slar yang bsdu ba bshad po yin/ u spu'i ni gsum pa dang / mthar gnas pa'i gnyis pa nyid// lnga pa'i ni bzhi pa la/ nyi mas smar yang
129b8(rgyud): gdab bar bya/ yi ge nyi shus btab nas ni/ bcu drug pa sa yis bstan du byas/ 'og ta mi'i gzi'u brjid can/ lnga po'i ni lba ba dang / mthar gnas pa'i gsum pa dang / lnga pa'i mo gsum pa dang / drug pa yi nigasu/ 
130a1(rgyud): pa dang / mthar gnas pa'i bzhi pa dang / nyi shu rtsa lnga pa yis dbyed/ ba'i pa sbyi ni lnga pa dang gnyis pa'i yang gsum pa dang / nyi me'i dbu yis rnam par dbye/ u swa yin pa'i ba dang / dang po'i gsum pa
130a2(rgyud): gzi rjid kyis ni bdan du byas/ bdun pa'i ni bzhi pa dang / bco lnga sa yis bdan gnyis gyi/ byagasus ma'i rigasu pa nyid/ lnga pa yi ni thog ma lnga/ bcu drug pa'i bdan du byas/ nyi shu rtsa gcig de'is blangs bzhi pa'i
130a3(rgyud): thog ma dang / mthar gnas pa'i gsum pa dang / gsum pa'i ni gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i ni dang po dang / lnga pa'i ni bzhi pa dang / gsum pa'i ni gsum pa dang / dang po'i ni gsum pa dang / us+tha'i dang po dang / mthar
130a4(rgyud): gnas pa'i gsum pa nyid/ nyi shu rtsa gcig de bzhin te/ nyi ma yis ni mnyam par gzhag/ lnga pa'i ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa'i ni dang po de// gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ gzo rjed kyis ni gsal bar
130a5(rgyud): byed/ mthar gnas thog mar byin ta ste/ de yang bcu drug pa yis gdag/ gnyis pa yau gsum pa dang / de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug nyid// dang po yi ni gnyis pa dang // tho ga ma yi yang gsum pa
130a6(rgyud): dang / bzhi pa'i yang thog ma dang // thog ma yin dang po dang po dang // bcu cha u sma'i bzhi pa dang // nyi shu rtsa bdun gdan du byas// ya rdzogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang / nyi ma
130a7(rgyud): ni gzi byin can// gsum pa yi yang gsum pa dang // bcwo lnga pa yis gdan du bya/ gnyis pa yi yang gsum pa dang // gsum pa yang lnga pa dang // na mkha'i steng du bshad pa
130a8(rgyud): yin te dpa' bo yang ni btu bar bya// nyi shu lnga pa gdan du bya// sku ni legs par btu bar bya// dbang chen yis ni gdan du bya// u sma ni yang bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / 
130b1(rgyud): ye tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang // sum bcu rtsa gsum de bzhin te// lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang // de nas kyang ni btu bar bya// gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin te// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / 
130b2(rgyud): mthar gnas pa'i gsum pa dang / 4)/ usmA yaM naM gaM su d+ha pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// bdun pa'i ni bzhi pa dang // drug pa'i ni gsum pa dang / lnga pa'i yang bzhi yang bzhi pa dang // drug pa yang gsum
130b3(rgyud): pA dang / gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi pa ste/ ke ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ tA sa ya tra sa ya/ k+She b+ha ya kro b+ha ya/ dr-i tro/ hra tra pyaM pheM bo// paT phaT// da ha da hA/ partsa pa tsa/ ba kA ba kA/ ba sa ru
130b4(rgyud): ti ra/ an tra ma ma/ a ba la bI ni/ g+h+ri ne g+h+ri na/ sa pa sau ta la/ g+ha ta pu dz+nya g+ha sar pi ma pa/ dwe ta rdza ya to dza ya/ a kad Da a kAng Da/ hAM hr-i/ dz+nye dzI/ kl-i k+saM/ haM haM/ hau haM/ hU~M hUM/ ki li ki li/ si li si li/ 
130b5(rgyud): hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi la/ hUM hUM/ phaT paTe// ka rigs pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags te/ bya ba thams cad sgrub byed pa'o// 'di las shri ta tu mchog gyur pa'o// 'jig rten gsum na yod min te/ dpal ldan khrag/ 
130b6(rgyud): mthung sngags shes na/ gzhan dag snying po med rtsar mtshungs/ rtsa ba'i sngagasu bshad pa yin/ nges par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge bdu ba'i rdo rje rgyus kyi cho ga'i le'u sten/ 
130b7(rgyud): lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // gzhan yang gzhan yang nyi shu gnyis/ snying po yig bAd+ya na nye snying po// ya stsogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang / de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyis/ yi ge bar ma dor byas pa/ 
130b8(rgyud): du la gtsug ni nyaM ru / dang drug dang mam sbyar ba/ re'u rig drug sgom pa ste/ te bu ka'i bdag por 'gyur/ yig ga cig tu yang dag gnas/ oM na ba sas non+da te/ hU~M d+ha maT 'dza ngas
131a1(rgyud): ldan/ bsgrub pa pos snying par shes par bya/ dang po snying ka nyid du ste/ gnyis pa spyi bos shes par bya/ gsum pa spyi rtsug dag tu sbyar/ bzhi pa go char gyur pa yin/ lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste/ drug pa
131a2(rgyud): mtshon cha zhes byar 'dod/ de nas g.yangs yig bcu gsum nyid/ yi ge gnyis pa nyid dang / sbyar/ gAyangasu yig bcu gcig yang dag sbyar/ yi ge drug pa brgyan par bya/ dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa nyid dang ni/ yi
131a3(rgyud): ge bdun pa nyid kyang sbyar/ dbyang yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ mkhas pas yi ge brgyad pa sbyar/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa dgra sbyar ba/ yi ge dgu pa brgyan par bya/ dbyabs kyi yi ge gnyis pa nyid/ yi ge bcu gnyis pa/ 
131a4(rgyud): dang sbyar/ dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni/ yi ge nyi shu gcig pa bzung / mkhas pos yi ge bcu bzhi pa/ yi ge nyi shu pa dang sbar/ dbyangs kyi gsom pa nyid dag ni/ yi ge bcwo lnga po dang sbyar// dbyangs yig bcwo lnga yang
131a5(rgyud): dag ldan/ yi ge bcu drug mdzes par bya/ dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan cing / yige bdun pa du ni 'dod/ dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ni/ yi ge bcwo brgyad pA ru sbyar/ dbyangs rapag gi no gnyis pa nyid/ yi ge nyi shu
131a6(rgyud): gcig par sbyar/ lnga pa'i lnga pa nyid dang ni/ phyi mo'i lnga pa dang yang sbyar/ yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar/ dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar/ sde tshan dang por blangs nas ni/ yi ge nyi shu lnga par/ 
131a7(rgyud): sbyar/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par/ yi ge nyi sha ma drug 'gyuraro/ yi ge nyi shu brgyad dag ni/ yi ga bcwo lnga pa dang sbyar/ gsum po'i dang por yang dag ldan/ 'og gi cha ni me dang bcas/ de bzhin dbyangs ma yig gnyi
131a8(rgyud): bau sbyar/ yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ yi ge gsum bcu rtsa ge cig par/ dbyangs yig gnyis par dag dang sbyar/ yi ge sum bcu gnyis pa dang / dbyangs riyig gnyis par ldan/ par bya/ yi ge sum bcu rtsa gsum pa/ 
131b1(rgyud): mar yang dag ldan par bya/ phyi mo bzhi pa nyid dang ni/ yi ge sum bcu bzhir ldan pa'i/ 'dod pa'i don kun 'grub byed yin/ phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid kun ni/ sum bcu bdun par yang dag ldan/ mkha' 'gra ma rnams grub byed yin
131b2(rgyud): sum bcu rgyud pa nyid dag ni/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang / sbyar baM/ las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa ni/ 'di nyid yin par the tso mo med/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni/ me dang 'og tu bsgrub par sbyar/ bzhi bcu gsum pa nyid dag ni/ 
131b3(rgyud): dbyings yig lnga pa nyid dang sbyar/ yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni/ dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar/ dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag dang / bzhi bcu rtsa drug par ldan pa/ dpa' bo thams cad mchod byed cing / bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid
131b4(rgyud): ni/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'dod/ de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/ dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis/ mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod/ lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig
131b5(rgyud): gnyis pa dang / sbyar ba/ lha rnams thams cad grub byed pa/ de nyid yin par the tsom med/ de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa 'ang / dbyangs yig bcu bsum pa dang sbyar ba/ yi ge rnams las 'dir mchog ste/ dgra rnams nges par
131b6(rgyud): gsong byed yin/ sde mtshan pan las rang nyid do// yig lnga bcu rtsa drug pa/ dbyangs yig drug pa dang ji sbyar/ an d+ha rmo'i bzhi pa dang / dbyangs yig gnyis par bsgyur bar bya/ de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ dngos grub tham/ 
131b7(rgyud): cad sgrub pa yin/ yi ge lnga bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur/ yi ge drug bcu rtsa gnyis nyid/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbya ro// 'di nyid mchog ni yin par bshad/ de bzhin drug bcu rtsa gnyis po/ dbyung yig gnyi
131b8(rgyud): pa ro sbyar ba ni/ mkha' 'gro ma'i mchog tu 'dod/ yi ge drug bcu rtsa gsum nyid/ dbyangs yig bcu gcig dag dang ldan/ mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchog yin/ drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'/ 
132a1(rgyud): phye ba dag/ dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan/ grub sbyin thar pa chen po'o// yi ge drug bcu rtsa lnga pa/ me la gnas par yang dag ldan/ dbyangs yig gsum pa dang / sbyar ba/ dngos grub kyan sprin der gshegs gsum
132a2(rgyud): yi ge drug bcu rtsa drug yang / dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba/ bya ba kun la grub sbyin par/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ yi ge drug bcu rtsa bdun pa/ yi ge gnyis par yang dag ldan/ rnal 'byor ma'i dgos pa kun/ 'di
132a3(rgyud): nyid byed pa the tsom med/ drug bcu brgyad pa nyid dag las/ der ni yi ge sbyar bar bya/ 'og gi tshor ni rtag par bya/ yi ge bdun bcu rtsa gcig pa/ yi ge gnyis par yang dag sbyar/ yig kun la mdzes pa ni/ 'di nyid yin par the tsom med/ 
132a4(rgyud): bdun bcu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni/ dbyangs yig gnyis par sbar ba dag/ gdod nas grub yin par ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs/ yi ge bdun bcu lnga pa nyid/ ma mo drug pa dang ldan par/ 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog yin te/ dge bI
132a5(rgyud): kun la dam pa yin/ bdun bcu rtsa drug pa nyid ni/ dbyings yig gnyis pa dang ldan yin/ 'og tu me deng ldan pa las/ gzhan dag mdzes pa yod ma yin/ yi ge bdun bcu rtsa bdun pa/ der ni d+ha dang sbyar bar bya/ mkha' 'gro ma'i mdzes par 'dod/ 
132a6(rgyud): bdun bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa/ dag dang sbyar/ rgyu'i mchog ni yin par 'dod/ yi ge rgya bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ bzhi pa'i mtha' yis khyab par dbye/ gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te/ dngos grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o/ 
132a7(rgyud): yige brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis pas/ de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar/ phyi ma'i ni lnga pa la/ de bzhin yig dgu bcu pa/ ma mo'i ni lnga pa dang / dgu bcu rtsa gcig yig yon/ ma mo'i ni gnyis pa dang / yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa/ dbyangs yig
132a8(rgyud): gnyis par ldan pa'i/ yig chu bcu rtsa dgu pa/ bdug pa thams cad skrag byed pa/ ma mo kun gyi bde ba'i gnas/ dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu sum pa/ yi ge gnyis pa dag dang ldan/ ma mo rnams ni bcu sum nyid yige lnga pa dag dang sbyar 'jug pa
132b1(rgyud): thams cad 'khrug byed de/ mkha' gro ma ba ba'i gnas/ dbyangs yig bcu pa'i ba'i sa ni/ yig brkyang ba dag dang sbyar/ bco lnga pa las rab tu sbyar/ dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa nyid ni/ yig dgu pa dag dang sbyar na steng du thig le sang / 
132b2(rgyud): rag gnas/ yi ge dag ni sgrub pa ste/ mkha' 'gro ma'i khyad par yin/ dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang / sbyar/ steng du byin dus rnam par brgyan/ dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig pa/ yi ge bcu gsum pa dang skur/ 
132b3(rgyud): thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ 'byung po kun ni skrag byed cing / bsgrub pa po ni dga' ba yin/ dbyangs kyi yig lnga pa la/ yi ge sum bcu rtsa gnyis sbyar/ dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag dang / yi ge sum bcu gsum dang skA ra/ 
132b4(rgyud): ma mo gnyis pa nyid dag dang / yi ge sum bcu rtsa bzhir sbyar/ dbyangs kyi gnyis pa dag dang ni/ yi ge sum bcu drug dang sbyar/ dang po'i ni gnyis pa dag/ yi ge sum bcu bdun dang sbyar/ dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa ni/ yi ge bzhi bcu pa dang / 
132b5(rgyud): sbyar/ ma mo bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ yig bzhi bcu gcig dang sbyar/ dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par bsgyur/ dbyangs kyi gsum pa dag dang nI/ yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi dang sbyar/ ma mo gnyis pa nyid dang yang / 
132b6(rgyud): yi ge bcwo brgyad dag dang / sbyar/ dbyangs kyi yige gnyis pa dag yi ge bzhi bcu chu dang sbyar/ dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ yi ge lnga bcu gnyis pa sbyar / phyi mo lnga pa nyid dag ni/ yi ge lnga bcu gsum dang sbyar/ yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ 
132b7(rgyud): thig les kyang ni rnam par rgyan/ yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ thig les kyang ni rnam par rgyan/ dbyangs kyi yig gnyis par sbyar/ yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa/ thig les mgo la mnan par bya/ dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dang / yig drug bcu lnga dang sbyar/ 
132b8(rgyud): phyi ma gnyis pa dag kyang ni/ yig drug bcu bdun dang sbyar/ bdug pa'i dngos grub kun grub cing / sgrub pa po la dpal yang rtsol/ dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa dang / yi ge 'dun bcu pa dang sbyar/ thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ bye mo'i
133a1(rgyud): ni bzhi pa'i sa/ yi ge bdun bcu gcig dang sbyar/ phyi mo'i bcu bzhi dag dang ni/ yi ge 'dun bcu gsum dang sbyar/ de bzhin bcwo lnga pa dang sbyar/ dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni/ yi ge bdun bcu bzhi dang sbyar/ phyi ma'i
133a2(rgyud): yige gnyis pa dang / yi ge bdun bcwa lnga dang sbyar/ thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ phyi mo'i ni gnyis pa 'ang / yi ge bdun bcu brgyad dang sbyar/ thi ga le gnyis kyis yang dag brgyan/ phyi mo'i tshe gnyis pa yang / yo ge bdun
133a3(rgyud): bcu bdun dang s+tha ra/ ma mo'i bzhi pa nyid dang ni/ yig bdun bcu brgyad dang sbyar/ thig le mgo la mnan par bya/ dbyangs yig zhi pa dag kyang ni/ yig bdun bran dgu dang sbya re/ thig le sgra yis bskyed pa ste/ thig lde kyang
133a4(rgyud): na rnam par brgyan/ dbyangs kyis yig gnyis pa dag/ yi ge drug bcu pa dang sbyar/ 'og steng gi ni yi ge grang / dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad pa ste/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngagasu/ mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya/ dngos
133a5(rgyud): grub kyang ni gnas yin zhing / mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa ya na/ dpal ldan khrag mthung lha rig rgyal/ glags pas grub pa don yod pa/ oM dang por sbyar bar bya/ hUM hU~M phaT ni mthar sbyar ba/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang stahA/ 
133a6(rgyud): tid grub pa thams cad grub byed yin/ de nas rang gis bdag nyid kyis/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i/ 'khor lo bde mtshig yin par 'dod/ swA hA ra po ma sa la dza ni/ gi Ta Ta pa hUM hUM/ 
133a7(rgyud): kaM ru ru he he/ ye dza ba shrI oM/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i bo ni/ ma byung 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro// Tab hUM hU~M hU~M ha hri a~M/ yi ge bam dang yang dang ni/ yi ge ma~M dang ho nyid dang / hU~M dang phaT ces bshang pa ni/ oM ba~M badz+ra bA ra hi/ hUM ye
133a8(rgyud): mi ni/ hi mi mo ha ni/ hri hri sa tsa la ni hUM hUM sang ra sa ni phaT phaT tsan ti ka/ rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu grags/ re'u mig drug la rnam par sgoms/ nges par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i tha ma las go tshe'i snying po sgom
133b1(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste// / lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang lha mo'o/ snying po blangs med bshad par bya/ oM badz+ra be ro tsa ni ye hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ lha mo'i snying po'i sbyor ma ni/ bcu gsum la
133b2(rgyud): ni bdag nyid dge/ pad mo'i dbus su bag mo ste/ 'dab ma ste la ni lha mo dgod/ sgo bzhi dag gis phyogasu ni/ lha mo'i snying po rnam par sgom// oM las byung ba'i rta ga dong dang / rdo rje snying pos gdug pa'i sgra/ drug po yang ni g.yom
133b3(rgyud): dang / mi 'phrog pa dang dri med ma/ mi 'phrogs dang ldan lnga mo/ sregs lugs ma dang phaT byed ma/ rang byung ma dang bcu gnyis ste/ lha mdzad g.yos pa'i gtso bo yin/ rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba/ dngos grub thams cad gtso la mdzad pa/ 
133b4(rgyud): sngo dang ser dang dmar ba dang / ljang ku steng zhal dkar po ste/ spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams sgyur/ mche ba rnams par rtsigs dpa ste/ g.yas rkyang bzhug tu shing thod 'phreng can/ gsum pa rlong
133b5(rgyud): zhing skra grol ba/ mchog gi chos gos 'dzin ste/ rong thabs dang / sbyor bas gnas/ 'jig byed tsa mun d+hI ni 'jigs pas myos/ zhanakyis 'og tu gnon par zhugs/ zod pa dang ni kha trug mdung dang
133b6(rgyud): gri gug cang te'u dang / rdo rje dril bu zhags pa dang / lcags kyu tshangs pa'i 'gro dang ni/ dgra sta dang ni sdig 'dzub dang / na ra'i pags pa steng du rgyan/ sku rigs dang ni gsung brgyan dang / phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ sangs rgyas lnga'i/ 
133b7(rgyud): bcod pan can/ thugs rje'i 'khro gnyer 'jigs pa ste/ 'dab la lha mo thams cad dgod/ ma mo dag ni brgyad pa ste/ ser dang ljang dang me dmar ba dang / lho ni sngo ba'i mdog can te/ me phyogs dmar la du da kA ste/ sngo ba dang ni dkar
133b8(rgyud): ba dang / dbang ldan du ni dgod pa ste/ spyan gsum pa la skra bkrol ba/ phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ dkyil kyang byed pas legs par zhugs/ thod pa'i ni dbu rgyan can/ phyogs kyi gos can bzhin
134a1(rgyud): rnams sgyur/ thams cad yi dgas gdan la zhugs/ thugs rjes chags pas rnam par myos/ rdo rje mchog ni gar mdzad cing / thod pa rag ta sa bkang ba dang / dril bu cang te'u sgra yang sgrogs/ lha rnams
134a2(rgyud): dga' bar byed pa yon/ sgo rnams su ni/ sgo srungs te/ dbang po'i steng du rnam par zhugs/ g.yas kyang ba'i zhabs kyis zhugs/ spyan gsum pa la dbu skra rjes/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu brgyan can/ 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spyad pa ste/ 
134a3(rgyud): thong pa dang ni kha traM 'dzin/ rdo rje mgo bo rnams/ thams cad rnam sbyar gsus pa 'chang / thams cad mgo'i 'phreng bas rgyan/ sngo dang ljang dang dkar po ste/ ser zhing phyag bzhi mdog gnyis pa/ cer bu pad ma'i rgya yang che/ rang gi rigs kyi dam
134a4(rgyud): brgyan can/ thams cad rung thabs gnyis pa ste/ bcu gsum tho na/ darnam par sgom/ snying po mchog ni rloms pa yin 'dod pa thams cad rab tu bkrol/ nges pa rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sngags dang lha mo
134a5(rgyud): snying po sgom pa'i bstan pa'i le'u ste// / lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod ba ste/ gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ myur du dngos grub byed pa'o// 
134a6(rgyud): sa'i cha ni mnyam nyid 'ong / tsan ca ngan gyis mi nye bar sku/ dri bzungs dri ljon sa la ni/ me tog bsil ma gcal bkram zhing / spos kyi dri yis nyams dga' bye/ bdag gi bya ba kun byas shing / phyogasra bcing ba ni byas nas su/ de nas
134a7(rgyud): rdzas rnga'i sa ni bcing byas te/ re'u mig bzhi bcu dgu zlum la/ yig phyi mo dgong bar bya/ der gnas pa las dpa' bo mi/ 'dod pa'i ngor ni 'grub byid btu/ rim bzhin 'byung dang rin min pas// dbyangs deng yige sgrub pa pos/ thub pa de'i thabs
134a8(rgyud): tA'agyur bar/ re'u migasum bcu gnyis pa zang / lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya/ btu byed pa yang dag blang / nyi shum bzhi pa'i byed/ re'u mi gsum bcu drug pa blang / gsum pa yis ni khyad par byed/ de nas sum bcu gnyis pa blang / lnga pa yis ni khyad par
134b1(rgyud): bya/ de nas nyi shu lnga pa bzung / nyi nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis yang dag blang / re'u mig bco lnga pa yir ldan/ lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas/ mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod / re'u mig gi bcu dgu pa/ me'i bu dang yang dag ldan/ re'u mig/ 
134b2(rgyud): gsum par rnam par dbye/ ya mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la/ re'u mig sum bcu rtsa drug dang / yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger 'gyur/ slar yang yi ge de dag nyid/ 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ de nas rang byung blangs nas su/ re'u dathig las ni lnga par sbyar/ 
134b3(rgyud): spyi bor thig le dag dang sbyar/ don grub byed ces bya ba'i/ tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad/ re'u mig bcu dgu pa nyid la/ nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i phye/ gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan/ sum bcu bsum pa legs blangs te/ re'u mig ni gnyis pa skar
134b4(rgyud): nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan/ mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod/ de bzhin nyi nu gcig pa nyid/ de bzhin nyi shu grub pa yin/ lan gnyis zlas pa'i tshig tu ni/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag ste/ de nas go rims zlog pas zung / re'u mig/ 
134b5(rgyud): las na dang po nyid/ bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ de bzhin bco lnga pa dang / sbyar/ chos ngon 'dod dang mthar pa'i yang / tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshang / re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang / re'u mag sum bcu drug pa nyid// 
134b6(rgyud): de bzhin nyi 'u drug pa dang / sum bcu gsum pa yang dag blangs/ re mgo bcu gsum pa'ir ldan/ re'u mig las ni bcu pa nyid/ go rims bzlog zabs sgrub pos blang / re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa/ re'u mig nyi shu gsum
134b7(rgyud): ba la/ gnyis pa dag ni yang dag ldan/ steng du thig les brgyan par bya/ de nas chu'i sa bon bzung / brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te/ me'i bu yis khyad par dbye/ yi ge hUM phaT mtharu sbyar/ 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya/ sngags tshig bzhi
134b8(rgyud): yis rnam par rgyan po/ oM ni sku la gsal byed yin/ hUM dang phaT ni mthararu sbyar/ rigs rgyal 'khor lo rgyur ba'i sngags/ 'di ni ma byung 'gyur mi 'gyur/ de nyid sbrus dang dpal mchog dang / bad ma tshig rdo rje 'jigs byed du/ 'gro/ 
135a1(rgyud): bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ sku brgyad dang ni bcings pa ru/ dkyil 'khor srung ba'i don du ni/ gdug pa kun la khyad par tu/ 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang / brtan mi dgos par mchi bar 'gyur/ shwa chen dag gis
135a2(rgyud): thams cad du/ rdo rje yang ni med par bshad/ rnal 'byor thun mong brjod pa ni/ dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bu sked pa'o// oM suM b+ha ni staM b+ha ni hUM hUM phaT/ A~M g+hi na gI na hUM hUM phaT/ A~M g+ni na pa ya g+hi na pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ AM a na ya h+ye
135a3(rgyud): b+ha g+ha ban badz+ra hUM hUM phaT/ 'di ni gdug pa thams cad tu/ 'jigs byed mi zad par bshad do// namakha'i khams kyi sa'i mchog pad ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom/ gdug pa thams cad nges par
135a4(rgyud): gnon/ phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan/ zhal brgyad pa la bzhin rnams sgyur/ zhal gyi mche ba rnam par rtsigs/ thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ thams cad kun gyis rnam par
135a5(rgyud): sAd/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug/ sku lus drag po'i thums rje'i nyams/ g.yas rkyang ba'i gnas pa yin/ dbang ldan gyis ni thod pa gnon/ u ma mchog gi ku tsa ga non/ 'khros pa'i spyan
135a6(rgyud): gyis rnam par gzigs/ sku ni mgo bo dI shal can/ mgo'i 'phreng bas dbu la bcings/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can/ 'jigs rten gsum rgyal de nyid de/ lcags kyu sdig 'dzug che ba ste/ bral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas/ 
135a7(rgyud): thugs ka dpral ba phyag rgya ste/ bgegs ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ thor ba dang ni kha tAM 'dzin/ ral gyi ljags kyu 'chang ba ste/ mdud pang mgo bo cang te'u dang / na ri'i pags pa'i steng du ni/ phyag ni bcu drug de bzhin no// 
135a8(rgyud): stag gi pags pa gos su mnams/ rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku/ sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang / dbar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes/ dkar dang sngo dang ser ba dang / steng gi zhal ni dmar po ste// spyan gsum
135b1(rgyud): pa la dmar ba'i spyan// 'khro po bzhi dang yang dag ldan// las rnams thams cad byed pa ste ge/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngo// skyod pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni// mi g.yo ba'i rdo rje ste// sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang // dud ka dur smigs
135b2(rgyud): sres pa yin// mche ba rnam par rtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// g.yas pa'i yi ni zhabs kyis ni/ bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon// na ra'i rus pas sku rgyan cing // sna tshogs khro bo rigs kyang spro/ 
135b3(rgyud): thod pa dang ni kha traM 'dzin// rdo rje sdig 'dzub rkyang ba ste// rang gi thabs dang gnyis med 'khyud// khro bos blta bas gzigs mdzad cing // dril bu phyag 'tshan yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba yin// 'jig
135b4(rgyud): rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya yis// khro bos thams cad bcings pa ste// stag gis lpags pa gos su snams// spyan gsum mi bzang 'jigs pa ste// thod pa dbyug to mda' dang ni// ral gri dril bu de bzhin te/ 
135b5(rgyud): gzhan du rdo rje dril bu dang // thabs dang 'khro bo'i rigs rjes 'gro// 'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub mchog/ sku gsum
135b6(rgyud): thugs su sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor dngos grub mchog dam pa// sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ yi ge'i dkyil 'khor sgom par bya// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ni hUM hU~M phaT/ oM g+ni na g+ni na hUM hUM phaT/ 
135b7(rgyud): oM g+ni na pa ya grI pa ya hU~M hUM phaT/ oM a na ya ho b+ha ga wan badz+ra hUM hUM phaT/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams mthong nas/ thams cad skyed par rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba ste/ 
135b8(rgyud): kha sbyar lnga pa ngo bo nyid// rnal 'byor 'grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// snying po mchog gi sgom pa yin// de bzhin khyi dang phag gi sha/ zangs kyi gtsug phud can de bzhin// mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la// 'ba' sbyin sreg
136a1(rgyud): gtor ma bya// ma lus bus pa med 'grub cing // rgyal srid thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur// dung dang nya phyis mu tig ste/ gsum char tshul byung yin no// chos kyi ye shes lus can gi/ thod
136a2(rgyud): pa la ni su zhag smod/ dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba mtshang/ zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas/ dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang yin par bshad/ nges par brjod pa'i rgyad bla ma'i bla ma las/ srung ba zhal bzhi par byin
136a3(rgyud): gyis rlabs 'khra bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje rgyus kyis bris pa/ dze hUM mdzad skyed pa'i le'u ste// drug bcu pa'o// // / de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba
136a4(rgyud): sde mtshan brgyad nin mo sgom pa mkha' dbyings pad ma'i dbu ngas gnas pa'o// khrag mthung rdo rje rnam par sgom/ zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa/ spyan gsum shin tu dmyur po skye
136a5(rgyud): gA yas kyang bya'i zhalabs kyis zhugs/ zhul rnams sgyuzhing 'jigs pa ste/ 'tsho ba rnam par rdzogs pa'irnam med spyod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rkyen/ drag po rdzul byed pa
136a6(rgyud): 'dzin/ sna tshogs rdo rjes dbul gnan/ rel pa'i khe cod pan 'dzin pa ste/ phyag rgya drug gis mtshan gyis brgyan/ skrag gi pags pa gos su marnams/ rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams/ 
136a7(rgyud): ska la thod pa'i do zhal can/ thugs rje'i nyams kyis khyad par nyos/ dkar dang sngo dang sprin gyi gzugs/ sku ni sgeg cing lde ma khag can/ g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal dag ni/ dpa' bo dmar
136a8(rgyud): ma ldang ba dang / hud kyi yi ni mdog can no// rdo rje dril lus mnyam ldan pas/ rang gi rig dang yang dag 'khril/ tshangs pa mdzad cing nye bar mdzad/ rgyab tu nges par 'dzin pa yin/ 
136b1(rgyud): thod pa kha tr-i ga 'dzin cing / mu dang dang cang te'u gri gu ga dang / thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa ste/ bcom ldan hreM las nges byung ba/ 'jigs khyed rang gi chung mar bcas/ zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbar// shar
136b2(rgyud): 'a'adab lha mo dgod bye ba/ ce sr-id lho phyogs de bzhin te/ me la sogs pa'ang dgod par bya/ de srid dbang ldan spogs te bzhin/ a li mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ pad ma'i na mkha' 'gro ma/ gtum
136b3(rgyud): pa'i 'kha' 'gro ma dang ni/ 'dod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dag ste/ dkar dang dmar dang ser ba no da/ sngo ba'i mdog canA/ lho phyogaso// dmar dang dud ka ljang ku'o// ser po dbang ldan yang dag ldan
136b4(rgyud): a'i mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ ! sa'i mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ sha'i mkha' 'gro ma brgyad sa/ de kun spyan ni gsum pa ste/ zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad

136b6(rgyud): rjes 'khro bo'i bzhin/ drag po yul 'khrug byed pa ste/ 'dod pa 'i don kun grub byed yin/ 'gro ba thams cad spro byed// thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin/ thod pa na drang na kha tri 'dzin/

136b8(rgyud): ste/ mkhas pas kyang ni sgom par bya/ sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba'i bdag/ de me thag tu ma rnams 'khrug/ oM A kau tsa ta pa sha hU~M hUM phaT/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba'i bdag/ ma lusaH
137a1(rgyud): snyed 'di yis 'grub/ sde mtshan 'kha' 'gro dam pa mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbu su sgom par bya/ a shra kaM ka tsa ra sa d+ha/ ta pa kaM ba sa ta tha/ sa ba na dza/ ya ma b+ha taM/ tsa/ shar b+ha tsa taH/

137a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ a la be dang nga sha le bdag/ ske ba mun pa'i nang gnas shing / ba sha b+ha krA ya te niR+ya/ rtag tu lba bshos zos nas ni/ skad cig gis ni mkha' spod 'gyur// 'di la yid gnyis spod pa med/ 
137a4(rgyud): nges par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sde mtshan gyi sbyor ba'i le& ste// // drug bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bya ba/ rnal 'byor mchog gis ga raM de bya//

137a7(rgyud): kun/ mkha' lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can/ gsung gi 'khor lo sku phya gdong / sku'o 'khor lo seng ge'i gdong / khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa dang / kha'i zhal gdong de bzhin te/ DUr la gshin rje
137a8(rgyud): sreg stsogs te kun/ ma he ri dgas zhal gdong yin/ dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang / sman gsum mig ni shin tu dmar/ 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog gyur pa// stag sA la thams cad zar par
137b1(rgyud): byed rnam 'byor blo gros dngos grub dang // rnal byor 'chog ni ster bar 'gyur/ de rje theg pa'i man ngag dang / ngag ni dngos grub rab tu ster/ mthos pa'i chos bsnyon pas/ sems can rnam sa ni hring bas grol thun med

137b7(rgyud): gang dag gar gnas pa/ bza' ba yang ni bza' bar bshad/ 'gro dang mi 'gro de bzhin te/ bdung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur/ mA dang bu mo sring mo dang / rang gi gnyen dang cho mo dang / blo ldan ci ltar 'dod pa m+bi/ 
137b8(rgyud): phyag rgya phyag rgya chen po 'gyu ba// gar da'i mkha' 'gro rnams ning/ myur du 'gugs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ mchog nyid yang ni gas ba ste// su la yang ni brjod mi bya// nges par rjod pa'i rgyud tha ma'i rnam
138a1(rgyud): las ci ltar 'dod pa'i bung bu'i mdzad pa/ dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste// drug bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bya ba/ mkha'

139b8(rgyud): dA gau naM dzi la a ba ra e hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su khaM kho khaM dA gi ni dza la sa ba ra a hUM pha swA hA/ de dag ni mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying po la gsang sngags te/ 'di ni ye shes kyi snying por 'gyur ba yin no/

140a2(rgyud): pas sgoms pa byas nas su/ dam tshig gis ni legs dbang sgyur/ sna tshogs mchod pa rnam par sgom/ dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang / go 'phang dran nas dbang yang skur/ sna tshogs phun
140a3(rgyud): sum 'tshogs po mchog/ de bzhin 'khyud dang tsum pa dang / ba ga ling ga'i sgor ba dag/ ye shes sgro na ma dam pa'i mchog/ shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya dag/ rnam par lta zhing nges par brtag
140a4(rgyud): dga' ba dang po ye shes ste/ mchog tu dgo'ab mnyam par sbyor/ dam pa'i rga ba grub pa che/ mthar thugs dka' ba k+Sha med yin/ sbyor ba ring ni rab sbyor dang / sbyor chen dang ni ye shes sbyor//

140a7(rgyud): den so gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ ye shes zla ba rnam par sgom/ a'i yi ge las byung ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ kha ba kun t+ya'i
140a8(rgyud): mdog lta bu/ dag pa'i shes dang / mtshungs pa'o// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi pa ste/ baspyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams/ sna tshogs pad ma zla drabs zhags/ stong pa'i ye shes las byung ba/ zla
140b1(rgyud): ba byed pal ba 'ching / thod pa'i yi ni dbu brgyan can/ rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs// rdo rje dkyil mo krung gis zhugs/ rang rig lus dang sbyor bar gnas/ snying rje chags pas mngon gyur pa
140b2(rgyud): dkor zhing sngo la dkar ba'i zhal/ rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin can/ rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ lha mo mra cha ni rnam btsir ste/ rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang / kha traM ga dang thod pa 'dzin/ yi ge a rAng nyi bus zhugs
140b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom/ i las rdo rje rgyu 'phrul lo// e las chos kyi rdo rje ste/ oM las sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul ma lha mo bzhi po de dag ni de'i zhal mchog 'dzin pa'o// sgra grol ba la mig mchod snying rje chag
140b4(rgyud): bas rnam par myos/ rang gi thabs rang lhan cig bcas/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ sna tshogs yo dgas steng du sgom/ gtso bo shes rab dkyil mo krung / thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ phyag+sa/ 
140b5(rgyud): rgya lnga'is rnam par brgyan/ rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ mdung dang gri gug phyag na snrums/ thod pa kha taM kA 'dzin cing / dngos grub thams cad rab tu rtsol/ ci lta dpa' bye'i rnal 'byor bzhin
140b6(rgyud): de'i mchog dang phyag mtshan/ 'dzin/ lha mo bzhi'i kha sbyar gsang / snying po sbyor ba mchog yin no// gsang ba mchog ni dges pa na/ thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu zhugs/ gsang ba kun gyi mchog nyid te/ mkha'
140b7(rgyud): 'gro ma'i snying po mchog/ 'di ni gsang bces dam tshig/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin// u ni snying dkar sgom pa ste/ u ni mgo bar de bzhin no// oM ni spyi gtsug dag tu ni/ oM ni mig tu dgod par bya/ 
140b8(rgyud): a na go car sgoms pa ste/ a ni mtshon tu rnam par dgod/ sku gsang thugs su sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid kyang ni sgom par gnas/ ye shes dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ bla med mchod dang dbang yang skur/ mnyam pa/ 
141a1(rgyud): dam tshig sbyor ba yis// chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yin/ dngos po kun ni ro gcig sde/ gnyi su med pa'i mchog grub pa/ dam tshig thun mtshams bani ru ste/ dus bzhi dag tu rnam par sgom/ kha sbyar ba ni
141a2(rgyud): sbyor na ni/ thun pa ni lo ni rnam par bsam/ snying rjes kun la 'gro bya zhing / cha med par ni rnam par sgom/ thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ shes rab cha med rjes su 'gro/ rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyor/ bdag
141a3(rgyud): nyid rdo rje baMdag po yis/ 'grang du med pa'i bzlas pa ni/ ye shes zlas pa yin par bshad/ zlas pa ye shes sgom pa ste/ sbrul pa rgyag ni spro ba'o// de bas dam tshig byas zlas pa ni/ cho ga bzhin du zlas pa bya oM A
141a4(rgyud): oM A/ i I/ u su e e/ oM o/ IM A hUM swAt+ma// dung chen 'phreng ba blangs nas ni/ rtag tugasang sngags rgyal po bla/ dag byed bsod nams chen po b+ha
141a5(rgyud): dag zhing nyesapa 'joms pa yin/ sdug sbal thams cad 'jobs byed cing / bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu ster/ gas/ sngags kun gyi ston pa ste/ rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogasu/ mkhara'/ 
141a6(rgyud): 'gro ma'i snying po'o// bgyes par bde ba la byung la/ lha mo bzhi po'i dga' ba ste/ rnal 'byom dbang phyug mchog tu brtse/ rigs kyi bcom ldan 'das/ rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ nges par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i tha/ 
141a7(rgyud): ma las/ lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba'i/ kha sbyor gyi le'u ste/ drug bcurtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa'i/ gdug pa thams cad zad byed pa/ ma rungs phyi dang nang 'jogs pa/ 
141a8(rgyud): namakha'i stong pa lta bu las/ yi ge kA las mngon byung zhing / mkha' 'gro'i dra ba bde mchog ni/ phyag gnyis pa la zham gcig pa/ gaM spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal g.yas rgyang zhabs kyi bzhugs pas/ 
141b1(rgyud): mtshungs 'dud kyi dgra gnon nIng/ phyag rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas/ zong pa dril bus yang dag 'khyud/ thong ba'i dbus yid 'ang ba'i/ rdo rje mchog gi rnam par mtshan/ ye shes bdud cas yongs gang ba
141b2(rgyud): lag pa g.ya sra par gzhag nas ni/ sna tshogs pa'i sku lus la/ phyag rgya drug gis sku yang brgyan/ zhal gdong mche ba rnam gtsigs shing / spyi gtsug thod pa'i rgyan du byas// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor
141b3(rgyud): mtshan/ zla ba byed pa ral pa can/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rkyen can/ rdo rje 'jigs byed skom pa ni/ yongasu dgu pa blo gros can/ 'bogs par bka' ba 'bigs byed cing / ma lus la
141b4(rgyud): dag bcos byas te kau rnam rtog ma lus rol pa ste/ byams pa snying rjes lus rgyun cing / rnal 'byor mdzes pa ci bde/ gnas/ gzhan yang grong rka'i dur khrod dag/ ro langs 'byung po
141b5(rgyud): sprin po ni/ sna tshogs pa'i sgrang 'byin cing / so byer khrag gis sa khyab/ 'di lta'i gnas su rnal 'byor sgrub/ yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang / 'di la phyag rgyad rnam par sgom/ dkar skyo dmar rang
141b6(rgyud): ser lo/ zhes dag sgyur zhing 'jigs par byed/ bdubar ro cheg/ cang te lu mgo bo gri gug thogs/ sna chog ste phyag la spyod pa'i ljags/ hi hU~M hU~M dang/ baT ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing
141b7(rgyud): dpa' byo ga spro'i rigs mdzad pa/ gdul ga thams cad gtul mdzad cing / sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ blo zo'i sprin ni/ mkhas pas spro/ byas ma latan dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i phyir/ khro mo'i ni sur sgrub
141b8(rgyud): dam tshig bzo zhir bzlal bar bya/ dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas zla/ mnyam par gzhag cing bzlas nas su/ chos rnams ma lus sgom par bya/ oM a kA hUM phaT/ srid gsum sdig pa zad byed cing
142a1(rgyud): 'tshems med lnga yang zad par byed/ sdug sngal thams cad zad byed cing / srid pa dag kyang sbyor byed/ sbyor ba yi ni mchog dam pa/ blags pa tsam gyis/ nges par 'grub/ gdug cig gnod byer sems
142a2(rgyud): can dang / ma rungs pa la chags pa dang / log par lha dang bcas pa lnga/ 'di rag nges par bkal bar bya// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i brgyan rnams spro/ khams gsum dag ni sgrol bar byed/ sngags las sngags kyi mcho
142a3(rgyud): dede ni mi dang bcas pas lan cig bzlas/ oM phaT che ge mo b+ha ya phaT/ k+ka hUM phaT// bdag nyid khro bo'i sems kyis ni/ mangs za zhing cer bu dang / skra krol ro la gnon pa dang / nags pa lcags kyu phyag gis
142a4(rgyud): 'dzin// gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du ni/ khri phrag stong tu bzla bzhi sgom/ rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du bya/ khams gsum po dag bsod par 'gyur/ mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor bcas pas/ tha ba/ 
142a5(rgyud): yang ni rnam par bsam// bdag nyid rdo rje mkha' thogs pa'i// khro za/ yi snying du zhugs par bya// snying dang rgyu ma rkang pa rus/ sha dang khrag rnams 'bral byed cing / 'tshams mad lnga rnams
142a6(rgyud): byed pa dang // gdug pa can rnams bsang par byed// gakha' 'gro lta bar zhugs nas ni// mkha' 'gro ba dang lhan cig sbyor/ rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas/ gzhag bdun gyis ni thebs par 'gyur// bsam
142a7(rgyud): tan byas pa mi byin ni// gdug pa bdag gis par 'gyur/ rnam spyod dang mtshan byed du/ mas 'di dag sa 'dug par bya// bya blo sgrogs byas pa mis/ gshin rje'i phyog su kha bams te/ 
142a8(rgyud): khyim bya'i stan gyi sbyor ba yis// me'i gsang sngags bzla bar bya/ hUM phaT raM raM raM/ 'tshams med 'di zhes bya ba// raM r-i r-i hUM phaT/ ci bzhin bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis// nyin zhag bcu bzhi ngag gis ni// 
142b1(rgyud): rdorje rje 'dzin mchog yin na yang da/ mchi bar yang ni the tsom med// gal te sdig can zlar log na// 'di la zhi ba'i las rnams bya// gsang sngags bzlas pa cher byas ni sa// 'dis kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// 
142b2(rgyud): oM sAhA/ a a oM/ a mu khaM la lA bi ra hra bA bi shan ti ta sa s+ye shan ti ba lan tu Ta/ oM a oM swA hA/ 'o ma btung zhing gos dkar gon// zhi ba'i gnas kyis stong nyid gnas// dkar po'i dris kyang lung
142b3(rgyud): byug go / bya rol khyi dang byi la dang // na ku la'i sha rnams na// thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te// 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// nges par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// khro bo 'jigs byed chen po yi
142b4(rgyud): bdag po'i kha sbyar gnod pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// srid pa'i nang na skye ba bdun// sna tshogs pa shu yi dam tshig ni// lha'i gzugs can
142b5(rgyud): yI 'phrog pa// lha'i lus can bIza brjid dpal// nA ba shu'i nang ni rgyal po yin// bskal bzang yod 'ong bder gshegs dang sla'i myu gu de bzhin ring / mig gis rgyugs ring mig kya
142b6(rgyud): dmar// pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i gzugs// de yi lus la bdul rab 'byung // lus la lha'i dri 'byung zhing // kha yi dbugs ni ga pur dri// ldan pas sbrang ma brtag tu 'khor// gcin rang phyis
142b7(rgyud): kla rtsi dro// tshig ni 'jam par 'gyur ba dang // lag pa dang rkang pa 'jam// ud pa la'i dri dang ldan// skra dkar gnyer ma las rnams grol// lus kyang snang zhing gnyen pa dang // snying dang thod pa lte ba da/ 
142b8(rgyud): des na ro tsa ru ru 'gyur// dri bdun ngang pa'i 'gro su 'gro// snying rje'i khas ma kha can yin te/ dkon mchog sum la rtag tu dang // skyon dang tshal khrims rag dang ldan// 'di 'dra'i rnal 'byor pas rtog cu
143a1(rgyud): mchi ba med la sbyin sreg cing // srog chags sna tshogs bdug pa dag/ gang yang rung ba zad mi gzhag/ de ni mtshan mo rmam mthong bar / mi snang ba'i dbang phyug mchog/ 'di 'dra
143a2(rgyud): sngagasapas rtogs nas ni// bdag gis spangs te sbyin pa skyed// dri chen chu dang byang chub sems/ kA ba khas pas blangs tre ri yul gyi 'alcags sum gyis ni rnam dkris te/ blo dang ldan pas sgrub par bya
143a3(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni rab skur nas// nye ba'i snying po lan bdun bzlos// de 'di lag tu phyin nas ni// sbyin pa 'di yis bdag pa byin// de ni de ma thag tu yang // mi 'khrul pa'i bya ba rnyed// de ni bden
143a4(rgyud): par mkhyen na su ni// mnyam par gzhag ste sgrub par bya// gzhan yang las rna rnams rab bshod bya// dngos grub sgrub pa'i mtshan dam pa// do ni spyi lo'i sgra can nas// gzhan yang dur 'gro'i sku
143a5(rgyud): dang ni// de sdes theg dgur byas nas su/ ni gang gis mgul du mching byas pa// de 'dra ba'i gzugasu bya// sna tshog/ gzugs kyang byed pa yin// de yi ro tsa blangs nas ni// de la he
143a6(rgyud): ka dpal dri// mngon sum zo bo dngos gyi ba ni/ he ru ka dpal byedang ba yin// rkang bcas ro tsa blangs nas ni/ 'byung po sgra dang bcas sres na// tshe ma'i ri lus byas nas su// mngon par sngags
143a7(rgyud): te cho ga bya// mkhas pas rgyal ba'i myib lwa/ lcags rgya yos ni rnam dkris nas// lag pa ga/ yon pas da blangs te// the bo sbas pa'i khu tshur gyis// khu tshur de ni mgror gzhag nas// rem
143a8(rgyud): thag tu snyun ma rengs// rang gi lag gis dpung gnyis blang mnako rang skra bzhags pas blangs nas thogs// g.yas pa lcags kyu thogs nas ni// the gu lnga yis rnam par bkri// phyogs gar nor
143b1(rgyud): yis gang ba yi// de sa phyogs mtho blang bar khyid rgyu bkod cing steng 'jug ga/ bsngags bzlas nas ni mkha' la dpyod// / oM badz+ra a swaM pa hU~M/ ba hUM a ba ra na du khe tsa tri sAhA/ 
143b2(rgyud): nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos// yi gor 'dod ci yong rung // de dag thams cad myur du 'gro gas// khyim ni gang bar yongasu mthong // mang sa dag ni zos nas su// lha yi lus su gyur
143b3(rgyud): pa yin// rnal 'byor rdo rje'i lus gyur te// des ning ni ba dbang du byed// ru ba grog bzhin blangs nos// skra dang sre sra nos de'i sgril te// the gu'i cho ga bzhin du ni// sgril nas zhags pa dag tu bya// g.yas
143b4(rgyud): rkyang nas ni 'khros nas gnas// gang gis ming ni bzlas brjod da kyis// zhags pa btab nas de ma thag/ lha po mo'i gug/ shing de mdun gnas// de yi rus pa'i phye ma yis// mkhas
143b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// 'di la dkyil 'khor dngos grub ni/ ci 'dod pa ni de la gnas// gzhan yang rgyun du byas pa na// rdo rje mtshan gyis mdzes par byas// chub gyis mcho
143b6(rgyud): mchod phyir thogs// de rus brdar ba'i tsan dan gyis// byug pa'i brtul bzhugs mdzin pa ni// mkha' la skyod par 'gyur ba yin// sgrub pa til mar chen po yin// mig sman nges par byas nas ni
143b7(rgyud): grib mo yang ni mthong mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor zhag gis skus nas ni// mtshan mo 'ang nyi ma lta bu ra 'gyur// rnal 'byor rkang dge zlos nas ni// tshim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// ci ste dag
143b8(rgyud): par mi bya zhing // yid bzhungs dran pa 'brel bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor sngon gyis skye ba dran// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur ba yin// rgyu ma phye mar byas nas su// mkhas pas grib ma la yang skom// glang gri/ 
144a1(rgyud): mgo la gzhag pa na// de ma thag tu dbang du 'gugs// sngags pas pu pu zos nas// de ma thag tu nad med 'gyur// rkang pa blangs nas sau stan na// cha re gyi rgyan ni 'phebs par byed// blo ldan gsang ba
144a2(rgyud): blangs nas skam// tsan dran dmar po dang sres nas// de ni phye mar byas nas su// bud med gang la byin nas ni// 'dod pas gsungs pa'i byed med dgadabang du 'gyur to ma ngag bzhug byed// dbus mo'i rus pa ki
144a3(rgyud): la yan/ sor ni bcu gnyis tsha ra tsamra zhig/ gang gi ming bcas smras pa yi// de yi rigs rgyud med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor byi ba zos nas ni// ngag gi dngos grub drag tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma ha hri dang zos
144a4(rgyud): nas ni// sems ni thul ba nyid du gyur// se yi rgyal po bzhi de dag/ steng 'og dag ni blangs nas kyang // zung ba gshog pa dang 'i tshub mo'i 'dab ma brtul ba dang na rdul 'dis
144a5(rgyud): sgrub pa byas na ni// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i// rmongs rtsa rnams phyemar byas pa'i// bud med thams cad skams gyur pa'i// rab byung me tog go ro tsa na/ a lag ta dang gur gum gyis
144a6(rgyud): theg sngags pas sbyar na ni// 'khor los sgyur dbang dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mi 'bras phye ma yis// pha rol sde ni 'byor par gyur// nu ma zos pa tsam gyis ni// de ma thag tu 'o ma 'gugs// rnal 'byor/ 
144a7(rgyud): mtshan ni zos tsam gyis// bud mang sa bon mod la 'gugs// rnal 'bor so dang sen mo'i phyir// gang gi ming gis 'gro la gtong // grub pa brgyad po grub pa yin// pha dang bu ni yin na yang // rnam par/ 
144a8(rgyud): snang bar byas par gyur// ma phye byas pa sbyar ba yis// kha ni gnod par 'gyur ba yin// sna che byas pa sbyar ba yis// dbugs ni gnod par 'gyur ba yin// rna ba'i sbyor bas 'on par 'gyur/ 'gro// 
144b1(rgyud): bo'i lcags pa mngon pa stegs te// kha'i drung du mngon bzlas nas// lha rnams kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur// thod pa i ni sbyor ba yis// rag ta 'gugs par byed pa yin// thod po'i kha ni sgrub pa yis// gnod par byas/ 
144b2(rgyud): pa kho na yis// in tra ba ru ro tsa na// de gnyis gcig tu sres byas nas// gang la thig le byas gyur na// dbang po'i gnas ni mthong bar 'gyur// ro tsa na dang mya smras dag/ lhan cig du ni byug pa yis// thub pa
144b3(rgyud): med pa'i stobs gyur te// pha rol dag ni gnod par 'gyur// bu ta na tsa li ro tsa na// lhan cig du ni bye byas nas// bud med gang la phyis rtor na// de ni 'dod pas myong 'gyur te// de srid 'tsho'i bar du gan sred
144b4(rgyud): ro tsa na dang 'bam po gnyis// lhan cig du ni skus pa yis// 'byu bo kun dang 'byung po rnams// ci bgyi zhe sa nI sgra bzhin du/ de yi chung du 'khod par 'gyur// ci 'dod pa ni ster+ra byar 'gyur// ro tsa na
144b5(rgyud): dang ji dran ci// lhan cig tu ni phyis byas te// shi ba'i mig dang mog sman sbyor// skal par gnas kyi bar du ni// mtshe/ bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// kri ka na dzA li ro tsa na// cig dag tu ni cher
144b6(rgyud): byas nas// na ga ma de lhan cig du// rilu du ma byas nas kyang // rdo gzi brjid dang sres nas// mig gi sman ni byas gyur+ya pa// nor skyong gi ni glang po dang // mngon sum du ni gnas nas kyang // de la bdag
144b7(rgyud): gis bzhon nas ni// glang chen 'khor lo ni mang po// gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyuraro// pha rol sde ni 'jogs byed cing // gzhan gyi yul dbang byed ci bI// ci 'dod pa ni sbar bar 'gyur// 'gram ma tran
144b8(rgyud): ni ro tsa na// lhan cig tu ni sbyar ba yis// rig byed rgol ba med par 'gyur// rma bya'i 'khris pa'i ro tsa na// ri bong khrag dang lhan cig da/ ri lu lan ni dkar tsam gyis// ri lu dag tu sgrub byas nas// rma bya/ 
145a1(rgyud): 'jug mas bcings nas ni// bung ba bzhin du 'phur 'gyur te// lha rnams 'gugs pa'i dngos grub cing // rig pa 'dzin par 'ongs par 'gyur// de'i lan ni ka tsam gyis// ci ltar bzod
145a2(rgyud): pa ster bar 'gyur// lha'i zhal med khang 'phrog cing // lha'i bu mo'ang 'gugs par 'gyur// 'dod na dbang ni skyed byed cing // mi 'dod sems can don yang byed// 'jug ma mthur ltas byas nas ni// gter
145a3(rgyud): rnams kyang ni mthong bar 'gyur// blangs pas byin pa'i pha rol phyin// yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin// sa 'og gter gyi sgo dag dang // 'jug ma skor ba byas nas ni// sgo chags nas ni 'jug par/ 
145a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ ra lha min bu mo lhan cig rol// lhan cig bcud dang bcud kyis len// 'brog cing des ni zos 'gyurate// 'dod pa'i lha'i gzug su 'gyur// grub pa'i rdzas ni blangs pa yis// sems
145a5(rgyud): can don ni byed cing 'gro// de nas yan lag lnga pa yis/ cho ga dag tu 'gyur ba ni// spu dang lcags pa sha dang ni// rus pa dang pa blangs nas// dri chen chu rang shu tra dang // 'tshal
145a6(rgyud): rnams ngag ni lhan cig du// ri lu byas nas sgrub par bya// lcogs gsum yis ni rnam pa sgribs nas// kha'i nang du smras nas ni// na mkha' la ni 'gro bor 'gyur// ro tsa na dang lhan cig tu// 
145a7(rgyud): khams gsum gyis ni rgyal chen 'gyur// nges par byed pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// skye bdun pa'i phyugs chen sgrub kyi le'u ste// / drug bcu rtsa drug pa'o// ka/ de nas glanan
145a8(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba// rang gi phyogs kyi yig sbyor ba// rang gi chos kyi yi ger sbyor// bdag med ches ni yang dag skom// rang chos yi ge mchog dga' ba// chos kyi sku las rang byung yin// 
145b1(rgyud): sa las byung ba// chen chen mkha' 'amo rnam par sgom/ wi tri a las des byung ba/ bdam mkha' 'gro dam pa rlos ha mas rgyu sna tshogs mkha' ni rnam par sgob/ mas
145b2(rgyud): kyi mkha' 'gro ma nyid de// snang lus rnal 'byor ma ra// rdu las lnga lo srul spyod/ mas spyod pa med do pa lamal po nyid kyi med / dpa' mo brtsamam
145b3(rgyud): yin no// sa las sgrib pa kun sel ba// ga las thos kyi glang po yin/ dz+hal lo shes btog kyang yin/ ma lal blo grom po zang ba/ dadrams thogs pa tshogs rje ste/ mas pa
145b4(rgyud): kun 'dren pa// sa las ngan song kun 'joms pa// dza las rab can gyi 'od// rtsoms zla ba'i 'od yin te/ deraM las byung ba rin chen 'od/ mes rdo rje 'od kyang min/ 
146a1(rgyud): b+ha la sa mthu chen thob pa ste// sunA su dAn yin no// na ma bzang skyong nyid san te/ seM las blo gros rgya mtsho'o// kun tu bzang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'jig rten mtshan pa
146a2(rgyud): sa snying ngo po// phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang // namamakha'i snying po na mkha'i mdzod// sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang // spos kyi glang po nyid yin to// mi zad par ye shes tog/ spobs pa brtsegs pa ma
146a3(rgyud): yin te/ mya ngan kun 'joms nyid yin no// ngan song kun 'dren nyid dang ni// dra ba zla ba rin chen dang // nyis rdo rje 'od mchog ste// su d+ha na dang mthu chen thob/ rgya mtsho dang ni bzang skyong ngo // de dag sngon
146a4(rgyud): nyid grub pa ste// phreng ba'i gsang sngags rnam par sbyar// de dag dam tshig tu bshad rje/ nidangos grub kyi ni grub pa rtso li rdo rje pho nya ma nyid dang // skul byed dang ni rin chen sgron// rdo rje nyi
146a5(rgyud): de ba'on te// ro langs rdo rje bzhodu ma/ partsi dang de bzhin ted/ sangs rgyas ma byang chub ma bzhin// se shes sgron dang rdor 'jigs ma/ 'dri chen pa rang rgyal byed ma// sgrol sa
146a6(rgyud): dang ni gos dkar mo// spyan dang mo sa ki'i mchog/ rgyal mtshan so sor zang ma dang / karma byor \u0f7fnor khrod ma// lu mu brgyud dang phyir zlog ma// lha mo gtsug tor rjod 'jobs ma// dngos grub
146a7(rgyud): pa yaM lha mo ste// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad rtsol// gsal khyod mi dang bcas par ni// mtha ma ni paM hUM phaT swai rau bar bya// tha ma ra swA hA mnyam par bya// sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu brtsol/ 
146a8(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dang rta mchog rgyal// dgegs ni gnon par mdzad pa yin// shes rab maHru byed bzhi po ni// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin// 'dod rgyal dbyig ston stobs po chen/ brgyar
146b1(rgyud): bra mi g.yo grags pa ste/ khro bo chen po sdom rtsub pa// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon na/ dkar ma sngogs dam tshig lcemo khrag mabung lha mo brgyad pa yin// sngar bshad mkha' 'gro ma rnam
146b2(rgyud): te/ khro bo brgya dang gnyis med gnas/ rno brgyad dang ldan pa'i sngags// ming dang yang dag skur bar bya// gsal byeda.oM ni kun tu yang // mthar ni hUM phaT swA hA ra sbyar// gsal byed mi dang / 
146b3(rgyud): hUM dang ni// thar ni phaT dang sAhA ra sbyar// gzugs dang sgra'i lha mo dang // dri dang ro'i lha mo ste/ 'dab ma bani lo sbyar bar bya// phyogs kyi gos can sna grol // reg pa'i reg pa'i rdo rje
146b4(rgyud): glags// gnyi su med par yang gnas/ dbus su khrag maN+Da snor ni/ gro rig pas brda za 'gyur// snying po tshom+b+ha kyi dbyings su grags shes ra
146b5(rgyud): rol phyin las byung // ye shes sems dpal gnyis med bzhugs/ rdo chos kyi dbyings ma ste// gnyis med mnyabye ba'i ye shes ni// chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs pa'o// de ni
146b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i gsang ba'i de nyid mchog/ rdo rje can ni yang dag bcol/ che ba'i mchog ni 'dus pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog sbyor ba rgyud kyi rjes 'grangs pa// 'grod dang 'grong min rnal
146b7(rgyud): ma// rig pa'i rgyal ga yin pa ste// ro mkha' 'gro nyur zad cing sgyu 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud yin no// rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud// gsang ba'i rgya mtsho rgyud yin no// nges brjod brgyad ni
146b8(rgyud): bla med pa 'dus pa mchog ni bshar ba yin// tsi ru yang bas me lo'i khyad par gyis/ sems can rjes 'byung ba'i rgyur// 'dus pa mchog gi ram pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub 'ja
147a1(rgyud): bu ste/ rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshad pa// byang ba chub sems dpa' du ma dag/ ci ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni// bdag po nyid du bya ba yin// ci ltar las kyi rjes mthun par// nges brgyud
147a2(rgyud): kyi rnam par dag/ rdo sgrub pa po yis la// nges rjod rgyud kyi las rnams bya// yid kyi dgos pa kun spangs te// gnyis su med pa'i sgom pa nyid// theg pa chen po dam ma mchog/ dngos grub tshe dang / 
147a3(rgyud): ldan par 'gro// de nas phyag mtshan mchog bshad bya// gzugs rang mdog gi cho ga'i rim// yi ge he las nges byung bye// bdag nyid he ru ka som bya// sku lus dkar la drag shul che// 
147a4(rgyud): mche ba rnams rtsigs 'jigs pa ste// spun gsum pa la zha lalnga pa// phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste// thod pa phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// ral pa zla phyed dbul mchi na na sna
147a5(rgyud): tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya drug gi sku lus brgyan// stag gi bags pa gos su sngams// mgo bo donal gyis brgyan po// dkarA dang ser dang de bzhini dmar// ljang
147a6(rgyud): steng zhal sngo ba'o// bshang dang dpa' rang sgeg pa dang // rngam dang ni dang drag ma s+ho// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje rig pas mnyam med gnas// rgyal ba'i lpags pa ma
147a7(rgyud): kyang 'dzin// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu rtsol// thod pa dang ni kha tr-i 'dzin// rdo rje chung phyag mchog ste// g.yas rkyang ba'i gnas pa yis// bdud bzhi po ni zha bas 'gre gtse// 
147a8(rgyud): reg pa'i rdo ldang ba dang // r+ya kar ba'i ma ngas kyi gzugs can la// ldeng dang sor dang dmar ba dang // dkar ba g.yon pa'i zhal gdong ste// steng gi zhal gdong sngo la
147b1(rgyud): skrasgra grol ba ni rnam par nyos/ seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya can// byin pa yi gnyis kyis rab tu 'khril// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can kun gsum shing du dmar ba ste// rdo rje thod dru bar mnyam
147b2(rgyud): bar ldan// dril bu cang te'u gyis rgyan pamadung dang kha traM phyag na sngams// chugase pa chen po me'i 'od// phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams// gtul dka' thams ca drug tu
147b3(rgyud): mdzad cing // sna tshogs sems can gdul bar mdzad/ thugs rdo su nyams ni songasu rdzogs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus snang // sna tshogs pad ma'i dkyil nA bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni
147b4(rgyud): du sa mtshan dag/ ba nabs kyis gnon phyir rnam par skom/ 'khor kun yang ni zhal gsum pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// drag cing zhi bye nyid yin te// rigs gsum
147b5(rgyud): gyis ni che ba'i gzugs// rigs gsum gis ni phyag mtshan 'dzin/ lha mos dbye ba'i gzugs can ni/ dam tshig gnyi su med par sbyor// thams ca dra yi dab gdan
147b6(rgyud): la bzhugs/ g.yas rkyang kha'i zhabras kyis gnon// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// shes rab thabs ni rnam par sgom// 'tshams rnamasu ni bum pa rags
147b7(rgyud): thod pa zla bas yong gang ba// zur rnamasu ni sgo srungs te ci ltar mdog ni chanam su// g.yas khwa'i gnas pa yis/ 'jig rten skyong ba zhabs kyis gnon// thod pa'i phreng ba'i nga
147b8(rgyud): brgyan can// thugs rje khro bas rnam par gnon// dkar mo la sngogs mdog sbyar ba// ci ltar g.yas pa'i zhal rim bzhin// phyag rgya rom pa'ang de bzhin no// lugs 'byung lugs las/ 
148a1(rgyud): zlog par ni// 'khor sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya// rdo rje pad ma'i dbusu yang // rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil ni// rang gi byin brlabs mtshang ba'i mchog

148a4(rgyud): brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las// bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge las skyed pa'i rang bzhin// byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste// // drug bsurtsa bdun pa'o// 
148a5(rgyud): de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba// bdag nyid cho ga'i sgom pa'i rim// ma ma ki dang spun dang ni// lha mo/ sgrol ma gos dkar mo// 'od zer can dang 'jam pa la// lha mo
148a6(rgyud): skul byed pa 'dzin ma// rang gi sa bon las byung ba// phyag bcu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum pa la g.yas rkyang zhugs// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyis zhug
148a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil mo krung gis gnas// rig byed bzhi'i zhal gdong ste/ phyogs kyi gos can riji ga dan// skra grol gyi la 'jigs pa skye/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can
148a8(rgyud): bas ltas shing thugs rje'i nyams// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// de nyid ye shesau mchog las byung // so so yang dge sbyor ba'i bdag/ de nyid ye shes gdon mi za// khro bo wA
148b1(rgyud): gzugs can ni// dpa lo ngang nyid las byung ba// khro mchog mkha' 'gro 'byung ba yang // gos pa med par ldan mnyam pa'i ro/ bdag po nyid du sbyar bar bya// bdag nyid sgom pa nyid srin no// gan// 
148b2(rgyud): par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// sgom zhing rnam par sgom par bya// khra ba'i khro bo rdo rje can// snying bka'i pad ma'i dbus bu ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs rje can// 'di ni nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing nan
148b3(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems// 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas// 'di nyid kyis ni mchod pa nyid// mchod 'os thams car mchod pa yin/ gang zhig 'di la rtag lha ga
148b4(rgyud): de ni rgyal ba'i mchod pa gzhing // nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis// de rnal 'byor rdo rje can tu 'dod// de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis// yod 'dod rnams kyi lus la kho don mchod
148b5(rgyud): pa lnga yis sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob paragang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod// dngos med bzhi la dgod pa yis// 
148b6(rgyud): lha'i gzugasu sgoms pa yis// mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po che ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub po'o// gsang sngags de nyid snyan pa yis// bstan pa tsam du legs byung badzin/ 
148b7(rgyud): rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam yang dag skyes pa na// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// nyi shu rtsa bzhir che ba yi// gAs sngogs 'di nyid la gnas te// de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid// 
148b8(rgyud): skyo bya de nyid can gyis ma ni// gal te de nyid me du gyur na// de yi 'khrul pa ci zhi bya// 'on te de nyid ldan gyur na// de la 'khrul pa ci zhing yod// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas mchog rnams/ 
149a1(rgyud): rten pas dri ma med par 'gyur// yang na mi nub bdag med pa'i// mi yi gnas ni skrag par bya// nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni/ sems can bsam pa'i dbang bgyis te// bsam btan
149a2(rgyud): las gzhan bde med phyir// de bas bsam btan mchog la gzhol// rnal 'byor la ni phyir rol 'khor// ngo yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur// de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni// rnal 'byor
149a3(rgyud): rol pas gnas pa la// dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can// rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni/ thugs rje thugs rdungs ring po nas// rdo rje rnal 'byor can dag gzigs// de rnams dgos pas/ 
149a4(rgyud): dngos grub mchog/ ci 'dod pas ni rtsol bar 'gyur// de ni rje btsun ye shes kyang // rab tu 'bad de sgrub pabya// sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan// spyod dang brtul zhugs
149a5(rgyud): dpyad pa yi// dpyod dang brtol zhugs 'dir spongs la// de nyid rtul zhugs lar dga' kyang // gong yang ru ba'i zas gnas pa// rnam pa de byes rtul zhugs can// bsam

149b1(rgyud): 'gro kun don ni byed pa kho// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni// mngon gyur 'di la the tsom med/ spyod pa 'di la nges par ni// ci skad bshad la der 'gyur bas// sems ni dag par gyis cig ces// /

149b3(rgyud): snying khar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor// thugs kyi rdo rje nang sbyar te// gzhan yang rdo rje dgod par bya// chos kyi dbyingasu rnam par la rtog/ rang gi na mkhar sbyar nas su// gzi brjod gzugs ni 'dzin par snyam
149b4(rgyud): gang gi chos kyi yid dgod pa// rang dang rang bzhin dri ma med// rang ni sgom pa'i sbyor ba yi// rang gi chos kyi yi ge sgom// gzi brjod gzugs ni 'bade bas bde ba gtogs par gyis/ 
149b5(rgyud): gzhan gyi gzugs kyis sgom pa la// yid kyi gti mug grubapa yin// dbang po gzhan ma sgom par bya// bde babade la rnam par thar// gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya//

149b8(rgyud): yis// stong nyid ye shes brtag tu sgom// legs so bya ba rnams byin nas// brgyur sked pa'i sbyor ba las // le gso le gso ye shes che// nges par brjod pa mchog ga mchog
150a1(rgyud): legs so rdo tshul drag go// sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin rab// leg so gnyis med sbyor ba ni// mchog dang mchog ni grub pa la// log so zhes par nges par sbyor// 'do

150b4(rgyud): zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// dang po bum dpung dang 'khrel pa yi// skye pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te// rten dang rten pa'i sgom pa sa ni/ snod bcud bzung 'dzin rnam rtog pa// spang phyir nga yis gsungs pa

150b6(rgyud): ni/ mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// kha dog nag po e 'bros las// gru gsum rgya chen bting rings thos man/ gru gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dus gsum 'joms pa dgongs pa'i don// logs ni
150b7(rgyud): rnam pa gsum yin te/ lus ngag yid gsum las byung ba'i// mi dge bcu 'joms dgongs pa'i don// chos kyi sku ni dri med kyis// rang bzhin gyis ni kun la khyab// de phyir rgya chen dgongs pa'i don// 'phags pa/ 
150b8(rgyud): nyan thos rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // chos kun rtogs pa ma yin pas// gting rings pa ru dgongs par bshad// de nas thugs ka'i hU~M las kyang // hUM spros pa lus rdo rjer 'gyur// rdo rje
151a1(rgyud): gur du gyur pa yang // dang po'i tshe'i bar chod dang / gnyis pa thar pa'i bar chod te/ bgegs ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// phyi'i bgegs dang nang gi bgegs// phyi yis tshe yi bar chod byed// 
151a2(rgyud): nang gis thar pa'i bar chod byed// bar chod rnam pa gnyis bsrungs pa// rdo rje gur gyi dgongs pa'i don// yang las byung ba'i gong dang 'dra// dbyings ni zla gam lta bu ste// rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang
151a3(rgyud): mi rtag pa ni skye ba dang // dbang du byed pa dbang gi don// ba dan bzhi'i dgongs pa yang // chos rnams dus gsum gnas pa yi// dgongs pa yin pa nga yis gsungs// ram las me'i dkyil 'khor ni// 
151a4(rgyud): zur gsum drag po dgongs pa yin// rdo rje rtse gsum sku gsudon// ba~M las chu'i dkyil 'khor te// zlum po spros pa bzhin du gsungs// bum pas chos sku'i yan lag bzhin// lam
151a5(rgyud): las gser gyi sa gzhi ste/ gru bzhi rgyas pa'i rang bzhin kyis// rdo rje rtse lnga ye shes lnga// de steng ri rab rtse mo brgyad// rnam thar brgyad kyi dgongs pa yin// snod bcud rnam
151a6(rgyud): rtog mi mang ba'i rtag dur khyod brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yon// go rims bzhin du dgongs par byed// de re'i bye brag rtog kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// gnyen po'i stobs ni yongs su rgyas// 
151a7(rgyud): shing ni rim bzhin rtag tu dgod// rtag rtog mi dge bcu'i don// 'joms pa'i rtags su chos skyong dgod// 'dod pa gas zhe sdang ma rig pa// bdug pa 'joms shing klu brgyad dgod// thugs rje
151a8(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa'i// gzugs brnyan gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis// lus ngag yid kyi sems can gyis// don mdzad phyir na char sprin dgod// nang dang gsang ba de bzhin no// de bzhin mthar thug zhi ba la/ 
151b1(rgyud): snyan nas rgyud pa shes par bya// de nas nang du gzhal yas khang // bruM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad te// rtsibs brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyis dngos// yongs su gyur pa rnam snang sku// phyi nas lta bas nang du gsal
151b2(rgyud): de bzhin nas phyi ge sa la ba// thams cad gcig tu snang ba'i don// rin chen sna lnga sku'i don// kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga'i don// khru bzhi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir gsungs// logs bzhi bsdu bu'i dngos po ste/ 
151b3(rgyud): sgo bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// ga ba brgyad ni rnam thar brgyad// bdud bzhi ye shes bzhi'i don// ta ra na la sogs pa kun// stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs// de nas snam bu bdag rnams
151b4(rgyud): ninya pad ma'i sa bon dbyangs las skyes// 'dod chags la stsogs nyon mongs kyis// ma gos rtags su pad ma'i gdan/ do steng nyi ma zla ba ste// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi bda'/ 
151b5(rgyud): dang po'i ro ni nga bdag gam// rnam rtog min phyir gsungs pa yin// yan lag bzhi ldan gtso bo'i don// 'khor lo re re gdan du sbyin// gtso bo'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir// dgos pa'i don dang / 
151b6(rgyud): bcas pa yi// rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa yi// de nas lha rnams smyos pa ni// skye bo bzhi'i tshul yin te// skad cig las 'byung bsdus pa'i tshul// dper na chu rlung las ni nya// rkyen las skyes pa dod bsher
151b7(rgyud): tshul tedaper na nyi ma pad ma bzhin// skye sgro bzhir bsdug sgong skyes tshul// dper na rdo la zangs bzhin no// sbyor ba las skyes mngal skyes tshul// ya ra la sreg cing mar la bso// dper na spra tshil las ni gzugs
151b8(rgyud): pho brang rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs// rjes su skyes pa he ru ka/ dbang skur bcom ldan mi skyod pa// bstod pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan yin// bdud rtsi myang ba'i 'od dpag med// mchod pa don yod grub pa yin// 
152a1(rgyud): yan lag las byung ba yi// dngos grub don ni khyad par 'phags// de nas bzlas pa sgom pa dang // dbang po rab 'bring tha ma ste// rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa ste// bzlas pa yis ni bya bar gsungs/ 
152a2(rgyud): 'bring gis spyod pa yab yin// tha ma dbu ma'i spyan la 'jug/ dbus ma'i spyan la rtag gyur na// sum bcu rtsa bdun rdzogs par sgo// 'bring gis kyang ni de bzhin te// gnas pa rtswa dang g.yo ba rlung // dkod pa sems
152a3(rgyud): dang dman pa dbyings// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug chos dang yan lag bdun// 'di ni bstan pa shin du zab// gong du bstan pa thams cad kyang // rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya// re re la yang bzhi bzhi
152a4(rgyud): ste/ du ba'i tshul ni shin du zab// phyi dang nang gi sngags kyi don// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyi'i don// phyir las ltos na nang yin te// de nyid gsang ba gsang ba'i don// las su rung ba mthA
152a5(rgyud): phyin don// nang du dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ni// phung po khamasadang skye mched ning // de yi lha ru byin brlabs pa// lA dang drug la sum bcu bdun// g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo srogs
152a6(rgyud): pabla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// sum bcu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba// yongs su ma rdzogs ji ltar lags// skyed pa zhes ni ji ltar lags// de yi rim pa ji ltar lags// gzhan
152a7(rgyud): yang rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang // thun dang 'thun mtshams ji ltar lags// lhas spyod zung du ji ltar 'jug/ dpa bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// sum bcu rtsa bdun
152a8(rgyud): yang yang rgyu// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed// de phyir 'bras bu sngon 'gro ba'o// rgyu nyid gtso bor gyur pa yin// he ru kar gyur gcig pa yang // rgyud rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ste// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa
152b1(rgyud): bzhi sgrogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyu nor ba las ma yin te// grolas nas ni myu gu sa min// ma tshang ba ma yin te// 'byung nyams sa pa las myu gu med// rgyu med pa las ma yin te// na mkha'i me tog
152b2(rgyud): las ni dri// rgyu de rkyen med pa las min// nags sregs las rlung med bzhin pa// de ltar yan lag bzhi ldan pa'o// las ni dang po'i rnam rtog spangs// lha'i rnal 'byor ma gnas pas// skyed pa zhes ni gsungs
152b3(rgyud): pa yin// phyi dang nang du ma yi cha// de yi rim pa bshad pa yin// rten gyi dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang // khyams dang blang ba med pa dang // bla gab bcas dang rnam pa gsum// mos pa'i dbang du gsungs pa yin// 'khor lo/ 
152b4(rgyud): bzhi'i dbye ba yis// thun bzhi ru ni gsungs pa yis// 'tshams kyang bzhi ru ni shes par bya// dbyug gu chu tshod 'pho ba dang // thun brgyad sgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ thun dang 'tshams ni nyams par
152b5(rgyud): gsungs// 'tshams na rnal 'byor pas// dbang po 'bring dang tha ma yin// lha rnams rdzogs par spro byas la// mar me gtsulas gnyis kyi tshul// lta ba zhes bya mnyam gzhag ste// rjes thoH/ 
152b6(rgyud): spyod pa ru ni bshad// skyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa la// rgyan drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnang // gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel pa la// rgyan dang bdud rtsi spyod pa gnang // rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs// pad ma'i rigs
152b7(rgyud): dang las kyi rigs// spod pa gnang bar nga yis gsungs// shes rab ye shes dbang brel la// gong du gsungs pa 'thun mong ste// khyad par phyag rgya'i spyod pa yi// gnang ba mi ldan spyod pa dang // spyod pa mi ldan lta ba
152b8(rgyud): gnyis// 'di ni gsang gsang dam sri ste// mnar med sems can dmyal ba ste// de phyir lta med spyod pa spang // srin po rag sha spyod pa'o// spyod med lta ba rnams spangs te// dka' thub gis ni lus gdungs shing // 
153a1(rgyud): phung srogs rnam snang la srogs pa'i// brnyas pa rnyog ge skam po yin// lta spyod zung du 'jug pa yang // glang chen bzhengs nas mnyam par bzhengs// glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam pa bzhugs
153a2(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bdud rtsi zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi spyod pa ji ltar legs// de yi phan yon ji ltar lags// rgyan la stsogs pa'i don rnams ga na?// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// 
153a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// bdud rtsi rnam pa gsum du gsungs// dang po'i phyi'i bdud rtsi ste// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la// lcags lnga ni dkod pa ste// brgyad dang bcu gnyis dang por 'dzag
153a4(rgyud): si la mi skyod mud kam blang // bcu gnyis bcu drug dang por 'dzag/ he ku ka dang rnam snang dang // lud skam snying por blang bar bya/ yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo // brgyad dang bcu bAc+doM lnga la// thabs dang
153a5(rgyud): bzang po'i dus su gsungs// seng ge'i gzugs su ni dkar la bzang // lus ngag sdom zhing nyes pa med// 'di ni/ sha ri'i sgrub pas snyen// glang po glang po chen po ste// ke ta ke Ta
153a6(rgyud): rgyud gnyis las// kla rtsi la srogs 'byung ba'i sha// ba'i TI go wang ldan pa'i sha/ rta ni rta yi rgyal po ste// khu dog dkar min ngo mar min// dbyibs dang kha dog mi 'gyur sha/ lus ngag yid la/ 
153a7(rgyud): mkhas pa brtag/ bzang po'i snod ni dum bu cig/ de'i nang du sgrub pa ste// bang rim tha ma'i mtshan ma ni// 'brar dang bud dang dro ba rnams// mtshan ma phyi'i yin par bshad// gzhan skyes don dang dga'
153a8(rgyud): sel cing // skad ma phyin na don grub ste// skad byung bas tshangs par 'gyur// ngag gi bdud rtsi rang 'byung yin// dri can+ya bu dgu lam nas gnas// 'dzeg pa'i bdud rtsi rgyun chad nas// til gyi 'bras bzhin
153b1(rgyud): gang ba ste// a ba 'du ti dbugs chung la// steng gi drug pa'i rgyu ba ni// si la ga phur dbus su gnas/ bya 'og gri drug pa'i rgyu ba yin/ bya 'di ni gsal ba'i bdud rtsi ste// skra dkaru gnyer ma mchi ba spong // spyod
153b2(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// bskyed pa'i rim pa lags nas shing // rigs su 'dzin po spangs pa'i phyir// phyi'i drug pa'i bdud rtsi sprin// las po la phyi nang gnyis// 'di
153b3(rgyud): yi nus pa du ma ste// skra dkar med cing rnam rtog 'joms// dkyil 'khor bzhi las rab tu gnas// lnga po gom par gyur pa yin// drug pa bzung bar gsungs pa ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas// sor bzhi nas
153b4(rgyud): ni dbus su gzhag/ lte ba'i gnas su dbus gnas pa// steng gi/ drug pa 'dzin pa yin// 'di ni nus pa du ma ste// srid pa// med cing g.yeng ba med// 'dab chags rgyal ba ji bzhin du// 
153b5(rgyud): na mkha' 'phur zhing ltung ba med// mchog dang chad pa'i da dbus gan pa// gang zag mchog la gsungs pa yin// 'di ni nus pa'ang du ma ste// dri chen bu gar 'gag pa med// rgyan gyis
153b6(rgyud): dang por zhe sdang 'joms// dur khrod chen po so so yaM// ru tra 'dul ba'i rim pa'o// bdud rtsi rnam rtog la sogs 'joms// 'phrin las bzhi ni thun mong yin// phyag rgya 'dod chags rnam par dag/ rdo rje snying pos
153b7(rgyud): gsol pa ni// drug pa zhes pa ji lta bu// gang zag mchog ni ji lta bu// 'dod chags rnam par ji ltar dag/ dpa' bos yang dag bka' bstsal pa// g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi las ni// lnga pa na mkhar 'byung
153b8(rgyud): ba yin// lnga pa rang bzhin med pa ni// drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dga' ba mchog dga' lhan cig dga'// bral ba'i dga' ba sngon 'gro bas// lnga pa bde ba chen po 'byung // bde chen rang bzhin med pa dag/ 
154a1(rgyud): 'og ga sod/ byed dru su 'dod pas kyi na brjod dumardza na nas pa snos su rdzogs pa zlog/ na ras rgya ma po las/ dgapar 'gyur ci rnas pag
154a2(rgyud): rangs nyid gser du gyur ta re// zangs las ma gtogs gser nyid dang // A pha mas gzhan drug pa ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// mo dang zla ba zla byed dang / gnyin nag dus drug de gnyis las/ r+m+ma hA
154a3(rgyud): cig re ma drug pa 'byung // rnams dang po'i spyod yul min// dper na chu'i sdodam du// 'dud pa'i thigs pa gcig mnag pas// chu rubyams su myong ba las do da dzin ma nyams su myong ba med// mul nyen nam
154a4(rgyud): bdud rtsi yang // nyams su myong bar byed pa ste// de bzhin spros byas sngal sa// rten rnams spros med me drug pa byung / rgyu gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs/ mtshan ma lnga 'am ro brgyu 'am/ 
154a5(rgyud): sa brgyad non dang mngon shes lnga// las kyi phyag rgya yongs su spangs/ ye shes phyag rgya las gnas shing // phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa// 'di ni gang zag mchog yin te// 'di'i drug pa
154a6(rgyud): 'dzin par bshad// 'dod chags zhes pa 'khor ba ste// rnam dag mya ngan 'das par gsungs// de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang // gsang ba'i dbang 'brel pa ste// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo'i don//

154b3(rgyud): 'khor lo gzhon/ bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// thams cad sgal tshigs dbug gu ste// phyi dang nang du mkhas par brtan// 'khor lo yang rnam pa gnyis// dang po 'khor lo gnyis pa rtswa

154b5(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi ru sbas pa ste// tshogs nang bla ma mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs// man ngag gzhan la sel zhing sbyar la dga'// 'dod chags spyod phyir sgras spyod pa'i don
154b6(rgyud): gza ba'i don la rgyab kyis phyogs shing skur pa 'debs// gsang ga sngags par du gcod cing gzhan la gsher/ 'di ni mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye/ sangs rgyas stong deng rdzogs tshe'i tshad/

154b8(rgyud): rgya bani grangs su sras// sum bcu rtsa gnyis las ni drung / drug cug ma su smos pa yin/ gsum bcu cu gnyis phyogs dang 'tshams da brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o// skye bcug 'tsha
155a1(rgyud): ngos sbas// gsang ba bde byor bde baR+Sha sbas// bcu drug la ni zud 'gyur ba/ brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa yin/ bcu drug pa ni g.yas g.yon

155a7(rgyud): mau d+hum mA~M sngas// 'khor lo re la 'khor lo bzhi// phyi rol 'phrog gi rnam par 'khyud// ke chu dang chu dran chubo rnams// sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed kyang // rgya mtsho chen por ro gcig 'gyur/

157a3(rgyud): ba mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// gzhang ka g.yeng ba ba spu ldang // dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa// bcu gnyis rang bzhin yin par gsungs// za pa rgyun chad bral bas dga'// de yi dmigs gzugs sku

157a8(rgyud): par spros pa'o// rgyu rnams bdun du spros pa dang // 'bras bu gsum du bsdu ba'o// rgyu rnams 'bras bu la thim ste// 'bras bu gnyis su sgom par bya// ros kun sems kyi ngo bo ste// sems ni stong pa'i ngo bo yin
157b1(rgyud): rnam po ci spong ra gcig pa'o// 'dzin thang da med dkyis// 'dod dgas rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'dod chags sgra yi phyag rgyas// phyag rgya chen po ye shes lnga/ 'dis tshig ces dang mas phyag rgyad
157b2(rgyud): ni bde ba chen po ste/ skyed dang rdzogs dang rang bzhin bral// bde chem 'khor lo rnam pa gsum// gsang ba'i sna rtse a la gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gang yin pa// rig pa la sogs de bzhin ted dag
157b3(rgyud): ba bde skyongs sa la gnas/ rang bzhin bde chen 'khor lo ste// bde ba chen po ro gang ste// til dang til mar ji bzhin te// dper na shing ni bcad pa las// 'o ma 'dzag pa ji bzhin no// bde ba chen po de nyid
157b4(rgyud): lasaHskra'i rtse mo brgya stong dang / khri dang 'bum ni rnam pa ste/ dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o// gsum pa klog gi rnam pa ste// bzhi pa mar me lta bu'o// de
157b5(rgyud): kun gyi rim pa yi// sprul pa la sogs rim pa bzhin da/ sprin gyi rnam pa skyed pa ni// a li skye ba'i mtshan ma yin// marame lta bu 'dzin pa yi// 'di'i mtshan mar gsungs pa yin// lnga
157b6(rgyud): nam mkha' lta bu ni// gnyis su med par bar dro yi// mtshan ma stong par shes par bya// gzhan yang 'dar ma la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes byar bya// shes rab ye shes 'brel pa ste// dga' ba
157b7(rgyud): bzhi'i mtshan nyid kyang // gzhang ka g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang // lus 'dar dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// gsang ba'i rdo rje rtswa ldom nas// byang chub sems su bde ba snyam// mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo ste// rdo rje 'am pad
157b8(rgyud): ma 'gas pa snyam// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo yin// bde ba rgyun chad bde ba snyam// bral ba dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// 'di rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // byang chub chen po la sogs pa// gong du gsungs par
158a1(rgyud): don ni 'chang po po// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum/ bde chen 'khor lo'i rgyu'i rgyud// gsang ba'i sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud// gsang ba bde skyong 'bras bu'i rgyudang 'bum pa rgyu'i rgyud
158a2(rgyud): gsungs// gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud yin te// shes par bya// dga' ba'i snang ba zhes bya ste// mchod dga' snang ba mchod pa yin/ rab tu dga' ba thob snang ba thob// lhan cig skyes pa 'od gsal lo//
