158a3(rgyud): ye shes bzhi'i rang bzhin ste// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i pho nya yin// rags pa'i bdud bzhi gsang ba 'joms// 'phra ba bdud bzhi rang bzhin gyi// 'khor lo bzhi ru 'joms pa yin// 'khor lo la rten
158a4(rgyud): dga' ba bzhi// de nyid ye shes bzhi ru snang // de phyir bdud zhi bzhi 'joms pa yin// 'dod chags la rten dug gsum ni// nyon mongs pa'i dug yin// 'dod chags pa bcu gnyis
158a5(rgyud): yin/ gsang ba bde skyong nyon mongs 'joms// kha dogadabyibs ni phung po'i bdud// rta mgrin 'khor lo phung po 'joms// spobs pa bzhi ni lha'i bdud// rig pa'i 'khor lor
158a6(rgyud): lha bdud 'joms// skye dang bcas pa'i 'chi ba ste// gsang ba skye med mdze bdud 'joms// kau 'phra ba'i bdud 'joms de dang 'dra// skad cig bzhi dang sde pa bzhi// bzang po bzhi dang bden pa bzhi// 'byung ba bzhi/ 
158a7(rgyud): dang yul bzhi dang // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la sogs pa// ye shes chen po 'di nyid las// khyad par gzhan ni mi 'byung ste// rnam par rtogs pa'i bye brag las// gzhan la log pa'i dbye brag dang // gzhan
158a8(rgyud): la mos pa'i bye brag dang // tshul chos du ma'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin// dbang gsum dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste// 'di yis thams cad pa bA gsung/ 
158b1(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dge slong dbang gsungs ji ltar lags// de yi bya ba ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// dge slong la sogs rnam pa gsum// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// 
158b2(rgyud): rigs 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong te// tshig dang bzhi dang bcur ldan pa// nyis brgya lnga bcu'i go rims kyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong so sor thar pa yin// gtong dang gtong ba chen po dang / 
158b3(rgyud): shin du gtong dang rnam par gtor// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yin// dkyil 'khor 'jug pa dge ba yin// de la gnas pa bsnyen gnas yin// bdun dang ldan shing
158b4(rgyud): chen po yin// bum pa'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de bsnyen pa dge bsnyen yin// de phyir bdun ldan chen po yin// gsang ba dbang gi dge ba ste// de'i tshul ldan dge tshul yin// bdun dang ldan
158b5(rgyud): pa chen po yin// dge ba shes 'bru ye shes yin// de nyid slob dge slob yin// theg pa gsum ni nges 'byung zhing // rigs 'dzin theg pa 'bras nas// 'bras bu 'dir phyir mi ldog
158b6(rgyud): pa gsum yin te// rnam par smin dang 'khor ba dang // spong ba gsum ni 'khor ba yin// theg pa gsum ni nges 'byung la/ rigs 'dzin theg pa 'bras bu nas// 'bras bu 'dir gnas rnal 'byor pa// khyim pa 'am
158b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i cha// lugs gsum du ni gnas pa dang // dbang skur rab gnas la spogs bya// theg gsum phyi'i cha lugs kyis// gsang ba'i spyod par cha lugs te// dper na rdol zas su 'gyur// zangs las
158b8(rgyud): gseram gyi rnam pa'o// zangs kyi dus na rdo med te// gser du 'gyur bas rdo mi snang // ga rigs 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// gnyis po snang ba nyid du ni/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsu
159a1(rgyud): te/ de nas gsang ba bzhi po ni// bzhi po'i dbang du 'brel pa yi// rtag tu g.yeng ba'i sems 'di nyid// gzugs la stsogs pa bgug gnas yis// sgom bya lhan cig bcas pa dang / 
159a2(rgyud): dbang du bcas te sgom par bya// bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yin// dmigs thams cad rnam gsal te// sems nyid bsam du med pas ni/ cir yang bsam par mi bya'o// sems nyid stong par bcug nas
159a3(rgyud): stong pa sems su rab bcug nas// stong dang mi stong la spogs pa'i// rtog pa bcom pas mkha' ltar 'gyur// rten yod ma yin rten pa med// dpe med gnas kyang yod ma yin// de nyid lnga pa rdzogs pa
159a4(rgyud): ste/ lhan cig skyes nyis med rig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// khrims tshul gar dang phyag rgya rnams// sgyu ma tsam du ma shes par// phyag rgya chen por ya
159a5(rgyud): dag sgom// dur khrod chen po grags pa can// snying rje med cing na khrag za// de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyi nang spras dang mthar thug gi/ dkyil 'khor du bzhugs da'ang mnos nas
159a6(rgyud): sgom dang bzlas pa la sogs med// gsang sngags bar du gcod cing gzho// rnal 'byor kun la skur pa 'debs// rdo rje spun la 'tshig cing smod pa dang / rdza ba yan lag dam tshig nyams// bla ma la smod pa'i rnam smin
159a7(rgyud): gyis ta mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo yi// rtsa ba 'khor lo'i don ma gtogs/ lcags kyi gri so bcu drug la// 'dzug pa ru ni nga yis bshad// ga pa'i gsang ba ma gtogs pa/ 
159a8(rgyud): sbas pa mi dmigs rnam gsum gyi// 'thur du sems can dmyal bar skye// shing rta yi ni 'khor lo ltar// las kyi rnam par smin pas 'khor// shes rang rig rang gsal dang // rang gi bde ba gang 'dod pa// rang gi sgyu
159b1(rgyud): mad gang 'dod pa// rang rig shes sgo nga lta bu dang // dbyibs dang ye shes la sogs pa// lha'i don ni 'chang ba po// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum// bde chen 'khor lo'i rgyu'i rgyud// gsang ba'i sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud// gsang ba
159b2(rgyud): bde skyong 'bras bu'i rgyud// bum pa rgyu'i rgyud du gsungs// gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud yin te// shes rab ye shes 'bras bu'i rgyud// skye rgyu'i rgyud du gsungs// 'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// bar ma de yi 'bras bu'i rgyud// 
159b3(rgyud): rgyud zhes pa ni rgyud yin te// rgyal pos gsang ba ston pa ste// gsang ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// bum dbang las dang po la gsang // gsang dbang bum pa'i dus su gsang // shes rab ye shes gsang ba'i dbang // rang rig/ 
159b4(rgyud): ye shes gsang ba'i dbang // rang rig shes rab ye shes gsang // gsang bdakyil 'khor bzhi pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs ri rab kyi rdul
159b5(rgyud): snyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la skor ba lan gsum byas nas mi snangabar gyur to// gsang ba spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po b+ha ya d+hA ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya/ 
159b6(rgyud): ye shes kyis sbyar cing gtan la phab pa// / tshe/ rgya gar skad du/ shri tsakra sam b+ha ra g+hu d+ha a tsan te/ bod skad du/ dpal mkhor mo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam
159b7(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms pa/ 
159b8(rgyud): bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun rdzob 'khor ba'i 'khor ba'i chos la skyob par gyur to// de nas gas ba'i bdag po dpal lag na ni rjes gsol pad kye kye bcom pa ru ka/ kun rdzob 'khor ngan
160a1(rgyud): rnams kyis// de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ skye ba'i mtha' dang mtshan mar sdang // de nyid kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos// sems nyid bas/ 
160a2(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin te// phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa// bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid kyi// dbye ba mi mthun grangs dag dang // dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dag kyang // 'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams dang // 
160a3(rgyud): gnas pa'i tshul dang rim pa yang // gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bdag chag nyon mongs ye shes kun// ri drug zla shing mkhril lcag gi/ rang bzhin gyi lam 'das pa// de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas/ 
160a4(rgyud): ngo bo ste// bde gshegs kun gyis thugs kyi gsang // 'di des yis/ bshad kyis nyon// rtag skye 'gag la sogs pa yaM// mtha'aspangs sems nyid rang rig cing // bzod nas spros pa nyid med nyid// 
160a5(rgyud): de don bsam gyis mi khyab par nges// de nyid dbye bar rab 'bring yang // rna ba gsum du shes par bya// dang po rang rig pas mi khyab// rgyud dang lam rnams bsam mi khyab/ mtha' dang nyon mongs bsam
160a6(rgyud): mi khyab// chos dang lta spyod bsam mi khya'o// mdor bstan de nyid rim par dbye// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya chos// de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab/ a ni yi ge dam pa ste/ khong nas byung ba skye ba med/ skye ba kun gyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// yi ge
160a7(rgyud): dam pa bsam mi khyab// khrag phyung khrus dang gtsang sbra dang // rgyan cha gtser bu thal gong spogs// chang dang bdud rtsi chu dang yang ka ma dang sring mo bu mo spogs// rol pa spyod pa bsam mi khyab// nga yi 'dul ba'i sems can la// mos pa'i mahA
160a8(rgyud): la thug pa med// de phyir mtha' la thug pa med pas/ de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab// rtag chag sgor skur ltos pa'i sgra// de nyid mthar gnas bsam mi khyab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spogs// 'dar dang 'phar dang drod la sogs// rtag nyid
160b1(rgyud): bsam mi sa mi khyab pa// lha sgom rlung dang rtswa la sogs// lam nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rang rig na mkha'i srin chen ste// pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa/ rgyud nyid bsam gyis mi khyab nges// rgyu 'bras tha snyad kun dang bral// rtsol ba
160b2(rgyud): rdul gyis ma gos pa// sprin med mkha' ltar ma gos pa'i// sprin dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag/ rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// a ni shad dang sprul pa la sogs kyis// bcu gnyis la sogs dbye ba yin// yi ge dbye ba rgyas pa'o// 
160b3(rgyud): gzugs ni sdug dang mi sdug spogs/ bcu dgu phra rab rdul gyis mtharasgra la sogs pa de bzhin te// sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drug ste// reg bya bcu gcig nang de bzhin/ gang zhig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbye ba sangs
160b4(rgyud): rgyas pa'o// theg pa gsum dang ji snyed 'du shes yod kyi bar/ lta ba'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// tshogs kyi lam dang mthar phyin lam// lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems rtag bdud rnams 'byung ba'i rtags// rtags
160b5(rgyud): kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// mu stegs rang rgyal nyan thos nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa spyod pa'i bar// spyod pa'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// rtag dang chad dang skur pa'o// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das te mtha' dang // thabs dang shes rab mthe'i ba ra/ 
160b6(rgyud): mtha'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// 'dod chags la sogs nyi khri dang / tshig stong rtsa ba nye ba dang / zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin te// nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang / 'dod chags zhe sdang sbyin la srogs/ rgyu'i dbye ba
160b7(rgyud): rgyas pa'o// sems dang na mkha' ye shes dang / sangs rgyas 'od gsal zung 'jug sogs/ rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o// bla dgas mtshan mar snang ba dang / sgra 'dogs pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa dang / rigs min mos po khyad par
160b8(rgyud): 'tshol// rdul tshangs khas len blo 'jog cing // sangs rgyas nyid dang sgrub byed na// gang ltar bcos kyang de thar te/ de ni sems can rang rig 'ga' zhig mtha' lhung lta ste// rang rig gzhan rig sems ma yin// kun rdzob don dam dbang
161a1(rgyud): gnyis ma yin// rang don rtog ge skam po dang // mthar lhung dbu mar khas len dang // de ni sems nyid rang rig dang / brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin te// de bral bsam gyis mi
161a2(rgyud): khyab pa'o// rang rig ye shes chen po yin// sprin srogs dkar po chos rnams dang // rang rig spyi'i rnam pa yis// thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba 'am/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa// rdul tsam tha snyad yod ma yin// 
161a3(rgyud): rang 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir// 'dod chags la srogs skyon kyang de sgrim pa ma yin te// sprin nyid la ni sprin bzhin no// rang bzhin gyis gzhan bye brag gis// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su snang // rang rig/ 
161a4(rgyud): sprin med namakha' la/ rang rig rnam rtog na mkha' mtshungs// sprin med gas rlung gis gtor byas te// sprin med na masnang ba nyid// gzhan rig rnam rtog bral ba la// sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhe
161a5(rgyud): bya ste/ rang rig kho na tsam du zad// dper na skyes bu na mkha' ltab la/ sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig la sgribs pal nyan mkha' de la ma sgribs ji bzhin no// grangs ni dang po gcig yin te/ 
161a6(rgyud): gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa las// dag pa gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa laso// dag pa gzhan gyi rnam grol min/ 'di ni ra rig kho na'o// de nyid rig pa bcing ngas pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // bzung 'dzin tha
161a7(rgyud): dang shes pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o// lus ngag sems ni rang bzhin las// rnam thar stong dang mtshan ma med// smon pa med dang sku gsung thugs/ bsam gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o// byams dang snying rje
161a8(rgyud): dga' btang snyoms// sa chu me rlung rang bzhin las// bzhi'i grangs su nges pa ste/ dga' ba la sogs nges pa'o// rigs ni lnga'i sangs rgyas lnga// phung po lnga dang chags sdang lnga// bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa'o// pha rol
161b1(rgyud): phyin drug rang bzhin las// yul drug la sogs pa rnams ni// bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid te// brgya la spogs ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig rang rig gzhan rig gnyis// thog me med nas gnas pa ste// lus dang grib
161b2(rgyud): ma'i tshul du gnas sa rang med pas ni gzhan rig dag/ so sor skye bo'i dus na 'dod/ 'di yang rmongs chen ma rungs pa// gzhan rig ma spangs rang rig 'dod/ 'khor ba spangs na mya ngan 'das// kha cig 'khor bar mya
161b3(rgyud): ngan 'dasaka/ rig pa glang 'dor gnyis su rtogs/ de la sogs pa lha'i don// rig pa 'dzin pa brgya rtsa bcu// thog chen mdo sde stong phrag bcu/ nyan thos rang rgyal stong phrag gnyis// khyab 'jug dang po la sogs pa// lta ba'i don
161b4(rgyud): la bsam mi khyab// rang rig 'dod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub/ bde ba chen po'i ro gang laka khams gsum 'khor bar kun shes nasakasangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba nyid// 'khor ba nyid ni
161b5(rgyud): mya ngan 'das// lta ba'i don dang bral ba ste// rang rig med cing gzhan rigamed/ don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka spangasasems nyid na mkha' chos nyid med// 'phrul pa med pa ma 'khrul med
161b6(rgyud): theg pa med cing rig pa med// dman dang gya nom gnyis kyang med// ye shes med cing bde ba medaka mtha' bral dbu mar yang gnas pa// bsam mi khyab tu gnas pa ste/ 'di rtog khong du chud pa dang // mi 'jigs sgra
161b7(rgyud): skur mi skyel pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'thu bo ste/ rgyal ba kun gyi nang na mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa byin rlob cing // ma 'gro kun gyi gnas ni mchod pa'i gnasaka/ rigs 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste// des kyang ma gzhag 'bad te bslabs
161b8(rgyud): rigs 'dzin sa la gnas par bya// rigs 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gnas te/ bcu lnga yi ni bdag nyid las/ sku gnyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// gzhan gyi las dang smon la
162a1(rgyud): stobs// de yi stobs kyi snang ba las ka yang dag nyid las snang rgyu med// rig pa rnam pa gnyis yin te/ dang po bla ma'i gdam ngag dang // rigs 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i bar// rang rig spyi'i rnam pa ste// chos nyid yul/ 
162a2(rgyud): dang byas pa'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa dgu ste/ rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid ni// yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i// rtog med 'khor bar snang ba yi/ khams gsum brtan dang g.yos byas pa'o// bdag gi de nyid tshul gyis ni// mnyam
162a3(rgyud): rjes thob kun spangs te/ rgyu ma'i tshul du gar gnas pa/ snang mthar phyin pa'i de'i tshad/ thun dang 'pho ba chu tshod dang // dbyug gu skad cig rim pa la// sems kyi phyir rgod la sogs skyon bral te// dben par gnas pa ste// snang med mthar phyin
162a4(rgyud): tshad yin te/ rang rig spyi'i tshad bstan to// snang ba med cing rgyu ba med// bya \u0f7f med cing bgrod pa med// rang 'byung lhun gyis grub pa ru/ Ta rtag tu mi 'gyur gang gnas pa// rang gi rig pa'i mtshan nyid la// mthar phyin pa yi tshad yin// 
162a5(rgyud): 'dod chags ro yis nyes pa dang / sems can sdom 'dzin dbang skur dang tshogs kyi 'khor bdud pa'i dus/ bsam gyis rma khyab pa rgyu ba'i dus// khyad par can du gsungs pa'o// gzhan yang rtogs pa'i
162a6(rgyud): sems dang yang / rtogs med dri ni skyes pa'o// gzugs la lta ba mi gnyis kyis// byams dang snyi rjel sogs pa'i// mdor na dkar po'i chos rnams dang / bzod dang sgyu rtsel la sngogs dang / skye rdzogs rim pa'i sgo
162a7(rgyud): bkun/ skye ba gcig gam dus sam ni/ yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang // 'khor ba'i chos la gang skyo bo// bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i dus// skyed rdzogs la srogs mi gnas shing ka/ rdzogs pa chen po gang 'dod / 
162a8(rgyud): de yang 'jug pa'i dus yin te/ bdud rnams bsam gyis mi khyab par/ bar chod pa 'jug pa'i dus// bzung ba'i mtha' ni bcwo brgyad te// na mkha' mnyam bzhi bcas pa bzhi med dang / yul drug dug gsum rten pa/ 
162b1(rgyud): dang ta lhan cig skyes gnyis sgra la rten// sra chu me rlung sgra rten no// chos rnams 'dod nas ma skyes pa'i/ rang rig sgom pa mkha' mnyam ste// bla ma sems bzung dang po bcesaka chos rnams thams cad sems yin/ 
162b2(rgyud): yin te// bzhi bcas rang rig rnal 'byor te/ sems ni gdod nas ma skyes pa'o// bzhi med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gzugs sgra di ro rog bya chos// de rten sems bzung bla ma la// skyes bu 'bad te blang bar bya/ 
162b3(rgyud): de bzhin 'dod chags sde sdang dang // gti mug rjes su mkhas pas bzung // lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung ba'i bzhi// rten te sems skye med par sgom// bye brag sems bzung bsam mi khyab// nyan thos la sogs theg
162b4(rgyud): chen la/ man ngag yod pa ma yin te/ lha dang spyod pas sems bzung dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu lam dang yang // dus dang long spyod rnal 'byor dang // bdag don gzhan don dgongs pa dang // ngal du ba mtha' spang/ 
162b5(rgyud): tshogs chung dang // tshogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa bcwo lnga yis// rigs 'dzin theg pa khyab par 'phags/ kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// rang rig bsam mi khyab mi laka/ sbyin dang byams pa
162b6(rgyud): so sogs pake sku gnyis gzhan don gang las 'byung // bsam khyab pa sems gnas nas/ de nyid ci la phyi ru ci// bcom ldan kyis bka' bstsal pa// sbyin dang byams pa la sogs pa// gzhan rig rnam rtog/ 
162b7(rgyud): dag pa dang / sku gnyis sems can den mdzad pa'i// sems can las ni don sangs rgyas/ 'byung ba'i rkyen dang nges pas na/ thasam mi khyab la gnas kyang / sbyin srogs 'bad te bslab par byas de la bsam mi khyab pa 'byung
162b8(rgyud): gzungs dang ting 'dzin la srogs sku// sbyin la sogs pa'i sbyin byas nas// bsam mi khyab las 'byung nges pa// de nyid ma gtogs 'khor ba'i chos// dbul pos nor bu byi dor bzhin// bsam mi khyab las sems gzhag nas/ 
163a1(rgyud): bskyed rdzogs rim par sems gnas na// de yang sngon sbyangs 'gro can te// sems kyi yid 'ong mchod par gces// rang sems las su rung bas na// de yi rtags ni nang du ste// des na nang phyir ru rang
163a2(rgyud): 'byung // lus la dri med srin bu med// skra dkar gnyer ma la sogs pa// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no// 'khor ba sgyu mar snang ba dang // srog med na mkha' ltar snang ba// bsam ma khyab pa'i rtags yin no// de nas
163a3(rgyud): 'khor 'das pa de dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur te/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzog s+ho// 
163a4(rgyud): g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / shakya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#/ rgya gar skad du// shi badz+ra khaM sa ma ya ra dza/ tran tra na ma/ bod skad du// dpa' bo na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
163a5(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bye ba dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo la/ 
163a6(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa dag gi nang nas// na mkha' spyod ma dang / sa spyod ma dang / sa 'og gi sa spyod ma dang / gsum lo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ gsang ba'i don 'di gsung
163a7(rgyud): dang ldan snying rje ldan pa rtse gcig sems// lus ngag gus bcas gzhan la phan sems ldan// 'jig rten rdul shugs ldan zhing zab mo yi// lam la spro bar gyis la legs par nyon// na mkha' khyed kyi mtshan nyid ni/ 
163a8(rgyud): nga yis khyed la bshad par bya// mkha' spyod steng sgo rlung yin// sa spyod bar du thig le'i sgo// sa 'og spyod pa shu skra sgo// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dang por mkha' spyod mtshan nyid kyang // rnam pa gsum du
163b1(rgyud): shes bya ste// bems po rlung dang rnam rtog rlung // kun gyi mtshan nyid ye shes rlung // mdor bstan rgyas nyid rim pa dbye// gnyis med rlung ni ma ni ste// bzung 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung // ldang 'jug thabs deng shes rab
163b2(rgyud): rlung / snying ka gzhang ka mgrin pa dang // lte ba lus ni khyab par ru// rigs lnga'i lus rlung rim par gnas// rgyu ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i rlung // dngas snyigs dbye ba brgyad du byung // de nyid rlung gi thun brgyad rted de pa kun
163b3(rgyud): re la ni 'pho ba re// chu tshod re la dbyug gu gnyis// rlung gi dbyug gu drug bcu bzhi// de bzhin chu tshod sum bcu gnyis// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya pa srogs// sems dang ma 'dra ba'i rlung // drags pa dang ni 'phra
163b4(rgyud): ba lata gsal ba sems kyi gzhon pa gzung // rnam rtog gzu 'jug sems kyi rta// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas// 'di nyid ye shes rdo rje ye shes rlung // dbye ba tha/ 
163b5(rgyud): dang shes rab gnyis// 'di rnams mkha' spyod rang bzhin te// de dag mkhas pas man ngag rtag/ yon tan rtags skyon rtags rnams kyi// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes par bya// de dag kun gyi
163b6(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyang // gzhom dang ni g.yon ma ni// 'di ni gzhung gi rnam por gnas// bems po rlung ni lam yin te// dbang po'i dngon sum lam yin pas// snang ba'i ri rab gling bzhi la nyi zla byang dbyug sde rgyug
163b7(rgyud): gis ta thabs dang shes rab skor spogs la// 'bad ma'i sems ni bzung bar bya// de dag bems por yang dag gnas// mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis// rin chen sems ni dran mi byas// de ni rnam rtog rlung yin to// 
163b8(rgyud): de nyid ni sa lam gyur to// ro ma dang ni rkyang ma ste// sprul pa'i khyil lta bu'i rnam pa ste// rnal 'byor gyis ni dmigs pa'i yul// rnam rtog gnas der rnam rtog rlung dgag go/ rang rig dgod nas ma skyes pa// 'di nyid
164a1(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje'i rlung // kun dar ma'i rtsal brten// tsan dan gis ni shing lta bu/ karang rig ye shes spyod yul te// gnas de 'bang de rang rig bzung // mkha' spyod rlung gi rang bzhin phyir// de dag rdorje
164a2(rgyud): lam yin no// de nas sa spyod bshad pa ste// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// tsan dz+wa la'i bye brag rtag/ dang po'i rang bzhin tsan d+ha li// gsu ma kha sbyor tsan d+ha li// de bzhin gcer bu tsan da li// de nyid
164a3(rgyud): la yang dbye ba ste// stug po stug pa shin tu stug/ yang dag stug po gzhan sbyar dang // bye brag kun la sbyar bar bya// gcer bu shin tu gcer bu dang // shin tu gcer bu gcer bu rtsogs// de dag kun la
164a4(rgyud): sbyar ba bya// dbye ba rnaM ba bcu gnyis ste// yan lag bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad// sa spyod rtsa'i rang bzhin de// stong phrag bdun bcurtsa gnyis sgom// gzhan skyed kyi ni 'gro mo can// 'phra ba de
164a5(rgyud): lozlog pa'o// rgyad dang nyi shu sla'i rtseg/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis skra'i rtse// lnga'i cha der tshe rtsa'i gsum// 'dus yungs ka ra tsam gis tshad// dbus dang g.yas g.yon phra sbom dang // gnyis
164a6(rgyud): 'gyur bye brag shes par bya// dngang ma dang ni snyigs ma'i rtsar// rang bzhin nyid du gnas pa la// ye shes lta bu'i rtsa bdun kyang // dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa// sa spyod ma'i rang bzhin no// gnas spogs
164a7(rgyud): pa gzhan shes// 'di nyid nor bu rin po che// 'di la rten nas thams cad 'byung // rtsi rigs rtsol gnas rtsol tshad rtsol// dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la// la stsogs// tshol ba las ni dngos grub med/ 
164a8(rgyud): de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni// sa spyod ma'i dngos grub ste// thams cad kyi ni rten yin no// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// byang chub sems ni rnams pa gsum/ dang po don dam sa
164b1(rgyud): yin te// de ni shes spyod yul las 'das// gnyis pa gzhan rig byang chub sems dpa'// dper na rkyen gi shel sgong bzhin// gsum bems po byang chub sems/ sil dang ni ge bur ste// donani
164b2(rgyud): kun rdzob gnyi su gsungs// las kyi rlung dang las kyi ses// g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub sems// ye shes rlung dang ye shes mes// g.yo ba don dam sems yin te// dang sa snyigs la ni rim pa bzhin// klu dbyibs
164b3(rgyud): dang kha dog las kyi ni// sems kyi khyad par shes par bya// las kyis rlung gi ma g.yo zhing // mas kyi lces ma 'jigs par// kha ba lta bu'i mtshan ma la mi shigs haM gis dbyibs 'dra ste// nor bu kun da'i dog lta bu
164b4(rgyud): dkar la 'tsher dang bze dang snum// bde ba chen po'i sku 'byung yana'adi ni don dam byang chub sems// dmar la dang ba'i rang bzhin la// khyad par bzhin thun mong ste// de ni shes rab byang chub seMs/ de las zlog pa dman
164b5(rgyud): pa gnyis// go bor gnas shing sred pa ste// dman pa rkyen gis g.yo' khur byed// de ltar don dam kun rdzob gas/ sems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya// rgyu 'chol ba la dngos grub med// rkyen tshol bu de bzhin te/ 
164b6(rgyud): bla ma'i nal las shes par bya/ don dam sems kyi spyod/ yul min// kun rdzob tshor ba'i bde ba'i yul// sa 'og spyod ma'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje gsum sgom byed pa// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// yi ge dang ni yAn
164b7(rgyud): lag dang // bsdus pa'i don dang spyi'i don// sras po la don dang mthar thug do// / sna tshogs de las 'byung bar 'gyur// nor bu ngagi sil snyan bzhin// rtogs med sems las sna tshogs 'byung / a li k+Sha li
164b8(rgyud): ma ning dang / drug tu sbyor bar rtag par bya// sgrub mtha'i ye shes ga bsam mi khyab// yan lag rnam gsum yin te// sgyu 'bras mda' dang bdang can/ rdzong bya dang ni rjod byed do// de lus zlog
165a1(rgyud): bsdus par bshad// theg pa gsum dang de la gzhan// mthun mong spyi ru nges pa ste// bye brag rang las shes par bya// sbas pa sngags pa dang dbang du byed// sngags dang ldan sde dbang sdug N+DI/ 
165a2(rgyud): chos ni spyi dang bye brag go// de dag rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// ma snod dang snod min bye brag kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// bla mas legs par bstan par bya// de nyid yang dri ga
165a3(rgyud): rtog 'gyur nas// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// bsam brtan la sogs 'jigs pa med// sangs rgyas sku ni yang dag 'gyur// bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs dang // chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs bskor// dman pa
165a4(rgyud): rnams la bye ba'i rgyu// de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te// rnal 'byor nang ma de lhag la/ phyi nang rnal 'byor ma rgyud de// shes rasnying por snying rtser bcas te// thabs dang shes rab srung shing la/ 
165a5(rgyud): gnyis med dang thugs kyis srub pa la// bdud rtsi'i ro ni nyi shu bzhi/ nor bu rin chen rgyud chen brjod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // ji ltar ngan 'grog gyo
165a6(rgyud): mo las// 'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba min// de bzhin lo grangs mang po las// dngos grub myur du 'byung ba med// de phyir rin chen nyi shu bzhi// bdud rtsi ro 'dra se ge'i gzugs// gnas ni nyi shu zazhi nyid kyang // 
165a7(rgyud): skra rnams kyis ni byin brlabs ste// mkha' 'gro nyi shu bzhi la btad// phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyo 'debs so// dam tu sbas zhing dam dA spel// rgya las 'das nas dam tshig nyams// sngags dang dbyibos dang chos bdag ci/ 
165a8(rgyud): sku gsum thugasu rang bzhin te// de'i ngo bor kun tu rtags// sngags gnyis te chos la gnyis// gnyis kyang gnyi su shes par bya// rai'i bye thag dbyel ba la// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par byan/ daphyi nang smras
165b1(rgyud): dang mthar thug bzhi/ rgyud kun phyag rgya bzhi yin pas// dbye ba mkhas pas btag/ de nyid rtogs na rgyud dang ldan// de las zlog pa 'das pa yi// rang bzhin ni tsan d+ha li/ gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ mkha 'gro// 
165b2(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// rtsa gsum gis ni byin brlabs// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ mkha 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// su ru rab 'dum gsang rdo rje// dza ru gsum ga mig gcod gsang // gsang ba ga cod// a ru 'do// 
165b3(rgyud): ldan pasam mi khyag/ la u ru snang chen na mkha' mnyam// go ru ba dan tho namakha' che// re ru me'u thung sku gsung thugs// de rul ka rin chen 'breng // ma ru shing grib dam tshig che/ a ru a re stobs the tsho/ oM rA
165b4(rgyud): 'jigs byed ye shes gsang te 'u ye shes rlung shugs ye 'phreng // ku ru 'chang mthung ye shes 'bar// ka tsu sha ma'i bzlal ba'i 'bre // la ru nin bzang rin chen 'bar/ ku ru Na na nyi ma 'i 'khor he ra kha ga ye nas
165b5(rgyud): rgyal/ za ru 'khor mkha 'gro sdom// gri ru khan d+ha ga sa 'bar// so ru sho d+hi ba sang bdud rtsi/ su ru 'khor l-i ru ra/ khror rgyan// na ru shing dpal rdo rje rgyal// se ru stobs chen ye shes
165b6(rgyud): bas ma// ma ru 'khor lo sbyar chags pa'i rgyal// gu ru brtson 'grus mkha'agro sdom// de dag brtad de leg snyoms// nang du tsan d+ha li dag ni// nyi shu bzhi ni brtan pa ste// dang po gas pas gnyis
165b7(rgyud): pa yang // rang bzhin yin te de nas dang // rten ni tha mar bsrungs pa ste// mkha 'gro khyed gi mtshan nyid ste// de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin// dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pas// dbang dang dam tshig ldan D+ha/ 
165b8(rgyud): rta dang glang po la sogs te// bu dang chung ma nor byo dbyig/ gnyen bskur dag gis gnyis par byas ste/ bdad ci roli ra ri las// bla ma'o zhal las dngos grub thang // yid la bzung la dran par phyi da
166a1(rgyud): de nas 'khor lo 'dus pa de dag thams cad rjesu yid rang bar gyur to// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// rdzogs spyo// 'ag+ha ya d+ha ra dang / 
166a2(rgyud): lo tsa ba shAkye ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o// // rgya gar skad du// shrI ma ha kha sa ma tsan ta ra tsa// bod skad du// dpal na mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'ding skad ba gis
166a3(rgyud): thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i ba ga la snyoms par bzhugs sod/ gzhan yang dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pa
166a4(rgyud): thabs gcig tu bzhag so// de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos// bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyog nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// phyi nang gsang ba'i chod pa'i
166a5(rgyud): mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol pa// kyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa ched btso pa gang lags ldan pa gang 'jigs pa gang lags chen po gang // bdag la khyed kyis stan tu
166a6(rgyud): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bcoM ldan bdud bzho bcom pa ste// de re la yang bzhi zhi ste// bcu drug grangasu shes par bya// ldan pa de'i gnyis po ste// dang po bum dbang bdud bzhi yang / 
166a7(rgyud): kha tog dbyibs la lo tog gis// skye ba'i bzung 'dzin du ma dag/ phung po bdud du ras grags// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa// nyon mongs pa'i btud yin no// yang dag la ma ston bla na med// sdeng ruhA skyes pa'i/ 
166a8(rgyud): dang lam ston grogs ngan dag/ de lta bu'o br-i tAd yin no// skye ba'i rim pa lags na na// de lta bu'i bred da yin no// log rtogs tu mra'i rtogs pa 'gags/ de na phung po la btud bcom mo// rten pa rton pa ro nyam pra// 
166b1(rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i bdun bcom mo// dus min mchi dang tshe zad dang // 'dig mchi bdag bdud yin te/ tshe lo stong stsogs thub pa'i// tshe li 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// gzhan yang bdud bcom bye brag ni// tshe'i bdud
166b2(rgyud): rtsirtsi bcud kyis len// grwa ni 'chi bdag btud bcom so// de bzhin phung lus kyi phung po ste// long spyod kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms// sems kyis lha'i ba dad 'joms ste// rten dang rten sgyu mar ldan// de nas gsang dbang bdud bzhi
166b3(rgyud): yang // phyag 'tsha nA khro tshul gar la sogs// phyi ma'i tu ma'i phung po'i bdud// rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa'i bdud yin no// dman pa'i lam ni gang ston pa// bla ma lta bu'i btud// phyi'i
166b4(rgyud): tshe'i bcud kyi len// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye zag kyangasgo gsum 'khrul par gang 'dod pa/ bla ma lha'i bu'i bdud// sgo gsum las ni du ba'i tshad
166b5(rgyud): de nyid ma shes phung po btud// de nyid dbang de skyabs byas kyang // 'bras/ bu mi 'byung sems nyid mongs// nyon mongs bdud yin te// rlung spogs gnas pa'o rlu tshul shes pa// lha'i bu'i btud bcom mo// 
166b6(rgyud): de nyid sgyu mar shes par bya// de nyid shes pa'i phung po'i btud// nyon mongs po'i btud bcom mo// dngos po'i mthar ltung bas yin// rgyu med la so skyes 'chi bas ste// rgyu rkyen la skyes rang bzhin gnas// rgyur 'chi
166b7(rgyud): bdag bcom mo// tshe la dbang sgyur ma lta bu// gnyen po stobs dang ldan pa'o// shes rab ye shes ba dud yong // rtsa dang shing kra la sngogs pa'adi/ dman pa'i lam ston lha'i gdud/ de nyid du ma'i
166b8(rgyud): phung po'i bdud// de sgom rang bzhin nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa'i bdud yin no// kha dog dbyi byes ni skyes pa dbyibs// de nyid 'chi bdag btud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag kyang
167a1(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po las ston pa'i// bla ma lha'i bu'i 'dud// gnyis las gsum rgyud las gsungs pa phung po bdud// rang sems nyon mongs pa'i bdud// 'khor bar ltung ba ste skyel med/ 
167a2(rgyud): skye ba las 'byung 'chi bdag bdud// rnam par rtog pa skyes so// 'dod chags kyis zin bdud// ma spangs sum bcu drug nyid dang // nges pa drug bcu drug rtsa drug gi// lam stan thams lha gtud bajam// 2na
167a3(rgyud): ma zhi datu da bcom mo// dge zhing rgyu ma rang bzhin med// bde chen 'od rgyung phung po bdud bcom// 'bras bu reg pa ye shes sbyin// rar sems nyon mongs sdug sA la bral// nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom mo// 'go man
167a4(rgyud): mas ni 'dud nacom mo// dman pa'i stobs gis zin pa'o// rgyal po dmang su dpal pa bzhin// de nyid lam gi 'dud kyi thon/ rgyal loHngas shor ba 'dra// gsu ba la rjod de ldan pa la/ na bzhi pa'i lamu spon/ 
167a5(rgyud): b+h+ra ma ni// lta bu'i 'dung yin no// bdud gsuM snga ma'i zhalas shes// snod yin gas ba sogs pa dag/ mar dang khar la sogs pa snod// mthung de ma zhu dug 'gyur te// khyud par brgyud kyi zin 'i ste/ 
167a6(rgyud): rigs pa 'a pa 'ang// dbang dang mnA dag zel rgyas pa// 'dud 'ams las rgya sa nags snga pas yin nyon no// rjel dag tu rab tu khrigs/ tham tsho cig la tha~Md 'dun
167a7(rgyud): gnyis/ thol pa de nyid dran pa ste// tha ma gcig la dbang thob nas// bla ma gcig la gzhen par bya// bla me rnam pa gsuM su gsungs// phyi'i bla ma de nyid de// nang gi bla ma bdag po'i lha// bdud dang dgra'i ldan
167a8(rgyud): kun// thams cad 'jigs shing skrag par byed// 'jigs pa bzhi la no gsungs pa ste// dgra dang bdud kyi yulas rgya'o// dmigs pa lha chags 'du dang ldan// de byer chen po zhes ni gsungs// de tshe 'khor 'dus
167b1(rgyud): pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang thams cad rgyud de la dga' zhing 'gu nas// rjesu yid rang bar gyur to// / dpal namatha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ 
167b2(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ra dang // dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shi ka la ya la ga tsi ta tan tra ra dza// bod ska
167b3(rgyud): du/ sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal khro/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus 'dod chags chen// mtshon gyur 'di la yang dag gnas// mgon po thugs rje
167b4(rgyud): ldan shi khyed gis bdag la bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' stsal pa// sku ni bum pa'i ngo bo ste// gsungs ni gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid// thugs ni shes rab ye shes so// sangs rgyas spyan dang ma ma/ 
167b5(rgyud): kyi// dam tshig sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ rdo rje la 'di 'dzin la 'di/ skad gsol// rgyud kyi don la rims goms shing // smras pa'i tshig la ma rmongs shig// gzhan gyi cod pas mo rdzi yid/ 
167b6(rgyud): dbang dang man dgra ma thob par// dbang skur rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs// sngags stsogs ngal ba don med de// shi nas sems can dmyal bar skye// de nyid tso bo dbang gsum gi// man ngag yan
167b7(rgyud): la// bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// dang po bum dbang rims pa yang // gnas ni shin tu sngags pas rtsam/ kra shis yid dag la shin tu snum// kra shis bya rnams skad snyan skegs
167b8(rgyud): dpag khasam shing rnams yod par dero// gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig gam// chu ngogs dag las spogs pa ru/ nas bdag sa'i lha mo la// gtor ma sbyin sreg mchod yon gi// sa sdang phyir ni khro
168a1(rgyud): rnams gzugs// de nas dang po snyen ma 'bum// snyen pa gsum ni rab 'bring ste// mtshan ma grangs dang dus gsum gsungs// de re re la yang gsum gsum sten mtshan ma
168a2(rgyud): gzugs dang 'od dang sla// drangs ni stong khrag khrig 'bum// dus ni bcwo lnga bcu gsum dang // bdun du snyen pa rdzogs pa dang // lha rnams gnyen pa gnyis byas nas// lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun
168a3(rgyud): lhag par gnas pa tshul bzhin byas// kra shis lo grangs ldan pa'o// bu mo ku sha'i phyogs mthun pa// ku sha Na las mtshan ma rtags// so shing rtse mo me tog d+hi/ bsrung bskung la sogs ma mtshan mnyags
168a4(rgyud): dbang gis dkyil 'khor skyed par bya// dkyil 'khor slob ma rab 'bring mtha'// ting 'dzin me tog rdu'i mtshon dri rim// gang dang ldan pa de nyid de// de nyid mchod rdzas rim pa yang // a khar
168a5(rgyud): sngags kyis kyang / de lad byabar bya// de nas kun/ mags pa// spangs pa'i tshig dang bganan yang sngon du 'gro// tham gnyis par bya
168a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lha rnams mchod par bya ba'i phyir// rta dang ma he dang // rin chen la sngogs rten rnams dang // spos dang mar me la sogs dang // brgya 'am stong ngam khri 'am 'bum// tha re rgyal mtshan
168a7(rgyud): ba dan la sogs/ byin brlabs tshogs bsags phyir ru dgongs// de nas slob ma bzhugs par bya// khrus byas yan lag dri yis byugs// kye ho khyod ni ci lta bu// 'jig rten 'khrul khas las zar
168a8(rgyud): nas// kye hu ka drag po chen po'o// dkyil 'khor chen por khyod rol 'am// dad pa dang bcas spros par gyis// rnam rtog bral dang bral sems bdag/ dga' ba chen po khyod ston pa// rdo rje 'dzin
168b1(rgyud): dgongasu gsol/ byang chub chen por lung snyan pa/ 'gon po chen po phyag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la rtsol/ pad ma las dbyung bdag la rtsol// legs so legs so rigs kyi bu// rgyal
168b2(rgyud): sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rnam rtog thams cad 'joms byed pa// gnyis med khyod ni blang bar bya// mi skyod bcom ldan dang mtshungs pa'i// zil gyis mi gnon khyod gis blangs// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod pa ni// 
168b3(rgyud): mchog gi de nyid blang bar bya// thabs dang shes rab bzung du 'jug/ nam yang khyod gis spangs mi bya// tshangs spyod de bzhin bsam btan la// 'bad pa'i sems ni btang bar bya// chang ni rtag 'thung
168b4(rgyud): khro mi bya// de bzhin sha yang shes par bya// gzhan gyi phyag rgya bsnyen/ par bya// 'di ni dam tshig brgyad yin no// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro// mthung mong sngon dang sems
168b5(rgyud): skyed sbyin// bskor ba gsum byas phyag gsum byas 'tshal// yal ba ba ra tu bcad nas ni// mig la sogs pa lnga ka ba la/ lha grangasu du me tog sbyin// kun byed chu yis gsang dag bya// me tog
168b6(rgyud): cas dang rdo rje yang // de'i snying la gzhag pa sgom// slob dpon la ni brnyed byed stsogs// ltung ba gnyis pa brjod par bya// phyi'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dbang// sngon tu sdig pa lan gsum bral// mig gi gzugs
168b7(rgyud): ni mthong ba dang / rna ba'i sgra dang rna ba'i dri// kalce'i ro dang lug kyi rig/ dngos grub 'phrin las so so ru/ na mkhas pas rtag cing shes par bya/ me tog btor te lta yang sbyin// 'khor rnams rtso bo yan
168b8(rgyud): lag yin// rtse bo'i mtshan nyid shes par byed/ ji ltar gso ba'o smin pa'o/ dbang po lnga'i gzugs su sbyin// de bzhin sems dpa' chen po'od// mi shes pa'i rab rim kun// rgyal ba kun rnams kyis yang dgas la/ 
169a1(rgyud): de la gzugs snyan dkyil 'khor bstan// dbang gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du// bzhag ste rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur// mu' khams mi skyod me long gi// rdo rje rigs kyi 'phrin las grub// dadu
169a2(rgyud): brgyan rin chen 'byung ldan te// mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin gyis// rin chen rigs kyi 'phrin las grub// 'od dpag med pa rdo rje 'bang // so sor rtog pa rang bzhin gyis// pad ma rigs gi 'dzin las
169a3(rgyud): byed// dril bu don yod grub pa ste// 'phrin las sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// rigs las dras nas mig mi dbang // rdo rje dang sbyar rdo rje sems// chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin las// de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las
169a4(rgyud): mi 'jigs seng ge l-i khri stengs ni// rigs byed slob dpon dbang sbyin byad/ bdud bzhi 'joms pa rgyal chen bzhi// chos rnams mi nub rgyal 'tshal gzugs// chos kun sku las kun khyab/ 
169a5(rgyud): bdugs kyi stengs nas dga' byed// rdo rje dril bu rdul shugs gnyis ni tedabugs 'byung ba dang lung bstan dang // rten parabyed pa rnam pa lnga/ gzhan yang rdzas kyi byi brag rnams// rin chen
169a6(rgyud): bdun las sngogs pa kun// mthun mong yin pa rA nga'i gsungs// bum pa'i dbang gis la sa rnams ste// dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang po yin// gnyis par rim par dbang yin no// brtan par byed pa gsu
169a7(rgyud): pa'o// de nas gsang ba bshad par bya// lus ni ri rab lhun po la// byang chub sems kyi gnas byas na/ bde ba'i brtan yang gnas su bstan// gsar ba'i dbang gis brnyed par 'gyur// 
169a8(rgyud): rim pa dang por btsal bar bya// dang por shes pa rtag pa dang // bdag dbang yod par blang ba dang // nyes pa dag par byang ba dang // dkyil 'khor skyed par bya ba dang // bar chod dgyegs rnams bzhi pa
169b1(rgyud): dang / srung ba de la sngogs kyis mchod// dri la thig le'u du ma dang // g.yon na gnas pa de nyid la/ srub dang skyabs thabs sbyor ba dang // srung ba de las bde ba'i rgya rgyun gyis// lus kun khyeb nas
169b2(rgyud): ga sar ba ru// ka ra la rtsad mar lta bur 'dzag/ dkyil 'khor tu 'jug gong dang 'dra// ro ma'i 'khor lo 'dab gsams la// lce gcig pad mar byin brlabs la// si lo ga pur 'dres pa yis// bya la
169b3(rgyud): gzhag ste de la thim// sor gnyis longs spyod mnyam sbyar la/ dbug su mi dmigs sgom par bya// gsang ba la ni rnam gsum ste// rdo rje rtse mos sbyin par dang // sbom po 'khro mos byin pa dang // rdo tshangs
169b4(rgyud): dri tshangs sbyin pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang la yang // dang po shes rab rtag da pa yang / lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum mkhas pa rtag cing shes par bya// de nas khyad par lta bar snyan te// 
169b5(rgyud): rigs dpal de 'tsho longs spyod dang // rgyan dang gzugs kyi khyad par lnga/ phyi'i rtag par yin par gsungs// bsam gtan pa ni rdo rje rigs// khyad par nga'i gsungs// rnam rtog/ 
169b6(rgyud): chung ba rdo rje yin/ lang 'tshe'i khyad par yin par gsungs// mi'i rtog pa'i brgyan shes pa// rdo rje brgyan gi khyad par yin// de nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur// mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan ste/ rdo rje gzugs
169b7(rgyud): kyi khyad par yin/ chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid// de'i ri la khongs spyod pas longs pas// rdo rje longs spyod khyad par rod/ kun 'dar ma de thugs kyi rigs// rigs kyi khyad par yin no zhe/ de
169b8(rgyud): nyid 'di ltar 'khor ba ni/ zugs kyi lang 'tshol khyad par ro// 6de dmar la gdang bA dang / byang chub sems ni dkar la dang // gnyi su med par gsal kha'i tshul/ dper na nor bu ke ke ru/ dar
170a1(rgyud): rgyus pa de bzhin du/ thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad par ru// lA la na dang sa ran// a ba d+ha'i gnyis med la// spyod thugs longs spyod khyad par du// dang por phyi la gnyis nang // gsu
170a2(rgyud): kha gsang ba'i rtaga'o// lus rtag pa ni sku yin te// ngag rtag gsung du 'gyur ba'o// yid rtag thugs su shes par bya// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// sgyu ma tsam du dgongs pa'i don// kun la khyad cing shes par
170a3(rgyud): bya// lus kyi drug la ngag gi bdun// sems kyi bdun la sgyum tshul// dang po smigs sgyu nyid yin te// gsum pa spogs sgyu myi snang bzhin// de bzhi ni zhal nas shes par bya// chu la bdud te mar ni gci/ 
170a4(rgyud): drin bdun te sha ni gnyis// sbong po bzhi te 'o ma gsum// 'di rnams datsal ba'i brtan 'gyur // lo gsum bzhi yin par gsungs/ khar gnyis ti bu ram cig/ chang ni gnyisu
170a5(rgyud): shes par bya// rgyan ni bye zag sna tshogs so/ rgun ka'i shwa dang ston ka'i sha/ zhal cig nang du bcu dang ldan// g.yar dang sgyid kyi sha rnams dang // drod dang ldan na bcu dang
170a6(rgyud): ldan// rang bzhin shi ba'i sha yin te// bdun pa byas na dam tshig nyams// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// gzhan yang 'bras bu la sogs smin// ma ro dang bcas pa sbyar bar bya// sha yang mar gi
170a7(rgyud): de bzhin no// chang rnams kun gi bcud skyed de/ dmar ba kun ro rtsa byed// chu skyed pa ni gzhon nu ste// ro rtsa lA ni sha lnga yin// bcud skyed sha dang dmar gnyis kyang // lnga dang lnga'i kha'i sras
170a8(rgyud): chan mnyam por gsungs pa'o// ba ro rtsa ba'i sha l-i yang lom sgo ma nyams par// lnga gsum lnga 'i khro bor bya// ra'i chang ngam 'o ma 'am/ sha dang mnyam por byin par bya// 'di ni lan lag ltos byas/ 
170b1(rgyud): de nas 'tshams cad sten pa dang / dam tshig sna tshogs bye ba dang // spros ma med pa'i yan lag yin// dbang skur sngon du bsgom pa'i don// dbang po thob phyir nga gsungs pa// rig ma 'di ni yan lag smos
170b2(rgyud): byas gtang na man gang byin// 'da' rnams bya zhing 'dod pa'i brtags// rtag pa shin tu smos pa med// phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa 'khyud// dang po sbyor thabs zhes gsungs so// dbu rgyun 'gul rgyan la sog
170b3(rgyud): pa// sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya ste/ langs pa gcig tu gang skye la dang // kha sbub 'phrang dang lnga yin te// 'di rnams kun gyi dgongs pa zab// dgongs med spyad pa spyod byed pa// 'di ni mnar med skye ba'i rgyu// / 
170b4(rgyud): tha mal paM las rgya 'gyur gis// bum pa dbang dang 'brel ba'o// bum bu dang ni gsang pa ste// gsang ba las gzhan 'brel pa ste// / de'i rnam smin brjod mi lang // dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim pa ni// kr-i me'i zhal
170b5(rgyud): nas shes par bya// yan lag bdun sgom sbyor dngos// khyad par rnam pa gsum las byung // sngags dang sman ni dad pa ste// gnyis pa sbyor thabs yin par gsungs// gsum pa ting nge
170b6(rgyud): 'dzin yin te// sngags dang sman gis kun 'odar sbyang / skye shing tshad dang gnas par tshad// 'byung ba bzhi dang rigs mthun pa'i// skye shing skyed pa tshad dong mnyam// sor gsum sor bzhi dar dang men/ 
170b7(rgyud): gnas pa'i chang ni rnam pa drug/ rnam thar gsar ba'i pho brang nas// skye mched rim po gnas pa'o// steng rta 'drin lte bar gnas// khams la gsang ba'i bde stong mas// 'dab 'khor sprul
170b8(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo gnas/ ma rni gros ka ra ya ni sgrol maM// i ni sbyin pa la ni tshul khrimaso// maMn baM zod pa yaM na bas ma l+ya ta naM// i ni phyag rgya chen po ste// bai ni dam tshig chen po'i/ na
171a1(rgyud): yang dag spong ba snying khar gnas// he ru ka ni ma shegs shing // rdo rje nga'is ma rgyal po // dri'i tshad ni sor bzhi 'byung // dngos po khrus bya sa gnyi sa gal// smad stu mad
171a2(rgyud): dri dang gsuM// sum tshwa sum gnyis stong smad do// lus la sku zhing me la 'dug/ rtse gsum d+ha ni shin tu bza'// dngos po sgru ba dang mu ba dang // ra~M ba ni nyi shing dang/ rom 'a shags dang yan
171a3(rgyud): lag bcas// rdo la sogs pa lnga sbyar dang // gzhan yang sman dang snom dang drin/ da la sogs pa'i nang du spags// sgo gnyis ni po lho 'dag/ zab pa'i sdig ces btab sgo byas la// dgongs pa mi
171a4(rgyud): shes 'dod chags phyir// dpa'o mtshan mar shes par bya// chags pa'i gzugs ldan sna tshogs 'byung // tha me la gsum 'am 'dun dranas 'byung // dgongs pa'i bye zag shes par bya// sngags dang / 
171a5(rgyud): spyan gi khyad par ro// dgongs pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir/ sla/ kha sogs btsal mi byad na'adi'i sdig pa bsam mo// khyab// dug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur nas/ gang bu'i rtsa'i kha phye na/ 
171a6(rgyud): sbyor thubs khyad par yin par gsungs/ bde chen go zlog sbyor ba dang // 'khor ba'i go zlog sbyor ba dang // sku'i go zlog sbyor ba dang / ye shes rko zlog sbyor ba dang // 'byung ba go zlog sbyor ba dang / 
171a7(rgyud): yum/ gi zlog sbyor ba dang // thig le'i go zlog sbyor ba dang // bsam pas rtan go zlog sbyor ba dang // stong pa go zlog sbyor ba dang / dbus gis go zlog sbyor ba dang // dga' ba'i go zlog sbyor ba dang // gdum mo ga
171a8(rgyud): zlog sbyor ba dang / ca'i go zlog sbyor ba dang // byang sems go zlog sbyor ba dang // g.yas g.yon go zlog sbyor ba dang // bde ba'i go zlog sbyor ba dang // brten gri go zlog sbyor ba dang // kun mkhyen pas kyang ma mkhyen pa// 
171b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum// sras rnams mthung mong ma yin skyed// ting nge 'dzin gi khyad par ro// 'di ni khyad par ma rtogs par// zab pa'i don 'di yod pa yin// 
171b2(rgyud): dbang skur ba'i sngon du yang // gdam ngag sbyin par gsungs pa yin// gdam ngag 'di ni dbang thob 'gyur// shes rab ma la rten nas su// bde ba'i ye shes skyed pa na// shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs// si la ga pur/ 
171b3(rgyud): shes rab ste// de'i bde ba ye shes yin// si lar shes rab zhes bya ste// ga pur ye shes su ni Shashad// rtsa gsum 'dus pa shes rab ste// de'i thig le ye shes yin// la la rna ni shes rab ste// ra sa / 
171b4(rgyud): ni ye shes so// ma ni shes rab zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems ni ye shes/ mkha'agro ma ni shes rab ste// dpal po ye shes su ni bshad// dga' ba gsum pa ni ye shes ste// rang bzhin dga' ba
171b5(rgyud): shes rab yin// 'og gi shes rab zhes bya ste// steng la ye shes su yang bshad/ g.yon pa shes rab zhes bya ste// g.yA pa ye shes yang bshad// chos dbyings shes rab zhes byas ste// 
171b6(rgyud): sheshes bzhin ye shes yin// phyag ming dang ni ye she rnams// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// shes rab ye shes la yang gsum// tshig la bslabs pa gnas pa yin// gzugs rnyan la ni bshad pa ste// mngon
171b7(rgyud): par rtog pa sgom par gsungs// e baM ma ta ya rnam pa gang / e na si ste khai ni chu/ ma ni me ste yang ni rlang // e ni snying rje baM ni byams pa// ma ni dga' ba ya nibatang snyoms// a na saM spyaH/ 
171b8(rgyud): baM ni ma ma kyi// ma ni gongs dkar yi ni sgrol ma/ e ni sbyin pa baM ni tshul khrims// ma ni bzod pa ya ni bsam gtan// e ni phyag rgya chen po ste// baM ni nam tshig chen po'o// / mA ni chos kyi phyag yin/ 
172a1(rgyud): ya ni ye shes phyag rgya'o// e ni sha ra te bau lho'o// ma ni nub ste ya ni byang phyogs so// oM ni sku'i thig le ste// baM ni gsung las ma ni thugs// ya ni ye shes thig le'o// e ni sngon po bai ni ljang kun
172a2(rgyud): dmar po ya ni ser podaname ni mkha'agro ba la ma// ma ni dum skyed ya ni gzugs can// e ni shes rab 'kha' 'gro ste/ ba~M mirdo rjeg pa 'gro yin// ma ni na tha mkha' gro ste// ya ni las kyi mkha' gro ro
172a3(rgyud): 'gog la ba~M ni la// ma ni sdug bsngal ba ni longs spyod// ma ni chos ma ni sprul pa// e ni mtshan ma pa ni stong pa// ma ni rnam thar ya ni dpe' spyad// e ni rnam pa sna tshogs ste// baM ni rnam par smin pa'o// 
172a4(rgyud): nyid pa ste// yA ni rnam pa'i mtshan nyid bral// e na chung la ba ni 'bring8/ ma ni lhag la ya ni cher lhag/ g.yas nI g.yon nas me d+hu ste// ba nI g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu// ma ni mgo nas rtsa
172a5(rgyud): bas/ ye ni steng nas rgyu ba chu// e ni gnas btan bi ni pha la chenam ni kur ya ni thams cad da.e ni bsnyen pa Sha~Mnalce'i sen// ma ni sgrub pa ya ni bsgrub chen// e ni shar la yini nu
172a6(rgyud): ma ni shar mtshams baM ni nub 'tshams// e ni rgyu la baM ni bsngags// e ni snang ba'i ni 'tshed/ ma ni snang thob baM ni 'dogasal// e ni bdag gis bzang po yin// bam ni dus kyi bzang po yin// ma ni ye shes
172a7(rgyud): bzang por gsungs// ya ni rlung gi bzang yin// e ni bdag gi gnas yin te// baM ni rnal 'byor gnasu bstan// ma ni gzhan gi gnas pa ste// ya ni rgyud gi gnas yin no// e ni dga' ba zla ni
172a8(rgyud): mchog dga' ba ba// ma ni lhan cig yang dag bral// e ni me long baM ni mnyam nyid/ ma ni kun rtog ya ni nan tan// e ni zhi ba kho ni dbang // ma ni rgyas pa ye bsod// yi ge 'du ba'i sngags / 
172b1(rgyud): gsum/ oM ni sku'i 'khor lo ste// a ni gsung gi 'khor lo'o// hUM gi thugs gi 'khol lo yin// oM ni sa rnam snang a ninA 'od dpag med// hUM gi mi skyod rang bzhin no// oM naM b+hag yon
172b2(rgyud): hUM ni g.yas// a ni dbus kyi snying la yan// oM ni g.yonA gi spyan yin te/ hU~M ni g.yas pa a dbus ma/ oM ni srog la hUM ni tsi la/ ma ni gnas par shes par bya// oMn nu
172b3(rgyud): la hUM ni thugs/ oM ni gsungs ni shes par bya/ au lus la a ni dag/ hU~M na yong du shes par bya/ a ni thabaswa hAM ni shes rab/ a ni dbu su med pa'o// oM ni g.yon gI la le na/ 
172b4(rgyud): hU~M ni ga yi sa gi rang sa ma// a ni ba 'od ting yin// oM ni g.yas/ gi rang sa na// hU~M ni g.yon gi la lan// a de bzhin dbus na gnas// oM ni ga khu ra hUM si la// a ni
172b5(rgyud): dkar la rtsa dmar yin// oM ni mchog dga' hUM ni 'tshed pa'i dga'/ ya ni rang bzhin dgo' ba'i don// dgal la lhan cig skyed pa ste// lhan cig skyes pa dga' bar 'argya
172b6(rgyud): rgyu la 'bras bu// sbyor bar 'gyur// 'bras bu lam ni sgyu sbyor ba// rgyu la rgyu'i sbyor ba'o// 'bras bu la yang 'bras bu sbyor// rgyu 'bras gnyis su med par sbyar// thabs la shes rab sbyor bar
172b7(rgyud): shes rab la yang thabs kyi sbyor thabs dang shes rasbyor/ sbyor ba 'di yis dgongs pa yang kun mkhyen pa yang rtogs par dga'// a ni rnam snang mi skyod pa/ na ro rin chen
172b8(rgyud): ldan te// zla tshes 'od dpag med pa ste// thig le don yod grub pa ste// oM ni bde gshegs lnga rang bzhini// zhabs kyu don yod grub pa ste// 'di ni de bzhin 'ong dpag tu med// ha ni rnam
173a1(rgyud): na n+da/ na/ nanaH/ snang mdzad de/ zla tshes rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ thig le mi skyod rang bzhin no// zhabs kyu sgrol ma rang yang bzhin// ra ni gos dkar ngo bo yin// ha ni
173a2(rgyud): rdo rje dbang phyug tsha de the tshes ma ma kyi rang bzhin no// zig le spyan du shes par bya// 'byung ba lnga dang sku lnga dang // 'khor lo lnga dang dga' ba dang / go rims bzhin du shes par bya// zhabs kyu bya ba nan
173a3(rgyud): tan yin/ la ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// ha ni shes dbyings ye shes so// zla chos so sor rtog pa'o// thig le me long ye shes so// 'di dag kun gi dgongs pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gi tshe
173a4(rgyud): nas gsang // kun zhugasang shing dpyod pa dga'// yi ge tshul gi rgyas btab zod de nas byang chub sems dang / sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang de mkha' 'gra ma'i tshogs kyi
173a5(rgyud): mchod nas// mi snang bar gyur to// mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i snga ma pa tha sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po// rdzogs spyo/ rgya gar gi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ra dang // bor
173a6(rgyud): kyi dge slong shAkya be shes kyis rgyur cing zhus nas btan la pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ bar skad // rad na ma lo tan tra dza ra/ 'od skad du// rin chen 'brang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal ba
173a7(rgyud): ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mos gsol pa rdo rje 'dzin// dpal ldan 'khor lo bsgom pa ru/ rin chen 'brang ba ron ma rtogs/ khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
173a8(rgyud): bka' bsngal pa// nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang gzigs// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa ru// ma gsungs khyod la nga yis bshad// de'i 'phreng ba rnam pa gsum// dang po snod gi rin po che// snod bcud
173b1(rgyud): gnyis dang rang bzhin bral// de na rin chen gsum yang yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa gsum cu gsungs pa la// de rnams rin chen ji ltar lags// de rnam su'i spyod yul lags/ 
173b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// dang po snod gi rin po che// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ ka ka ru ni dkar po ste// mi skyod pa'i byin brlabs ste// dbyibs ni zla ga ma lta bu ste// rab ni ngang pa'i
173b3(rgyud): sgo nga'i tshad// 'di ni rin chen 'bad pa ste// ba ka ra ra kar lug bkar mo'o// 'o ma sku zhing spang ba dang // mi skyod pa la mchod pa bya// de nas spyi bor bdags pa'o// mchod pa bye brag kun la bya// shar
173b4(rgyud): gi gnod rnams thub par bya// gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni/ gzhan sbom po tsam// 'di ni rin chen dag pa ste// rdul chu rnam par blugs la// rkan gi rtsa tshar ba dang // kha'i
173b5(rgyud): nang du bzhugs pa ste/ ro ma'i 'khor lo lde mnan la// de nas ngal nas skyong ba dang // gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse nu bde ba chen po skyes tsam na// ro ma 'i 'khor lo ri dgas mnan// dpe
173b6(rgyud): na sbrul gi nye zos pa/ mgo bo gnan pas mi ru 'byung // de bzhin gshegs las byang chub semos/ sna kyang ni gyen las zlog/ tig la dang ti la mar bzhin du gnas/ khyad par bde gyen du sgre/ bde ba ltar
173b7(rgyud): phyin rin po che// de'i 'brang ba tu mar bshad// the ma skyes pa'i khro bo tsam// e ran la sogs pa sman lnga yang // spyiru rtug tu dgas gyur nas/ pus kyi gnyer ma zang bar byed/ de nas yang dag gnyis pa yang
173b8(rgyud): bye dur rgya ni sngon po ste// rin chen 'byung ldan byin brlabs te// dbyibs kyi sog ka lta bu ste// rab gi tshad gi glang po'i mig/ de ni rin chen myug gu ste// ngang ba'i sgo nga ldong ros dang / spang sha mo dang gsum sbyar na
174a1(rgyud): de dag rna ba g.yas su nags// lho lo gdon rnams thub par gsungs// gang la yod pa de la skyod/ 'bring ni rang ba'i sgo nga tsam/ 'di ni rin chen e ran dang / dag pur rag ta rdul chu gsu
174a2(rgyud): de'i nang byugs lce rgod du/ gyen mthur gnyis ni snang dang zhugs// de'i byang chub sems bzung te// 'gal mo'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas// bye'u yi sgong nga'i tshad tsaman// a ru ra dang sbyar ru ra/ dza ru ra dang
174a3(rgyud): ldosdong ros rnams// sreg ste skus te lus la byug/ 'di ni rang na ga pur ra/ lus kyi srin bu 'byar bar byed/ de nas yang dag gsum pa yang // pad ma ru ka dmar po ste// 'od dpag med kyi byin brlabs ste/ 
174a4(rgyud): rab ni kar sha pa ni stong // gur gum ga pur lnga sbyar lan lde pa'i dbus su zhag la bcings// rad na ke ru ka dang / na nub gi gdon rnams thug par gsungs// 'bring ni ka sha pa ni ldan
174a5(rgyud): 'di ni rad na ka ra ste// mar dang sa le sres ma dang / gzor byas pa'i rtul chu lnga// de'i nang blugs legs par gnas/ 'di'i byang chub sems bzung ste// chu la chu bzhag ci bzhim
174a6(rgyud): yin no// tha ma ka sha ni tsam/ 'bras bu gsum dang ru te// mar gi snying po dang sbyar te// spyi bo'i sdug tu spang bar bya// 'di ni rad na da las/ thA ka ra med par byed pa'on de nas
174a7(rgyud): yan lag bzhi pas yang / de nas mar gad lnga ku ste/ don yod grub pa byin brlabs pa'i/ rab ni the con dbyug pa can/ 'di ni rad na kang ka ri/ rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas naskus
174a8(rgyud): rna ba g.yon du gdags/ 'dis na byang gi gdon rnams byug// 'bring ni rim sgor ba tsam/ ma he de ba um de/ gnyis kyis ga pur ra tag yis// dbyug ste lte ba'i nang du bzhag/ gtsu
174b1(rgyud): si la gnyis ka zin/ tha ma bzhan gyis/ zla ba tsam ldong ros ser po gser dang gtsu man tsa cig ni byin nas ni 'di ni e ru na ra te// srid pa mi skye bde dang ldan/ 'di ni rad na pa ra ta had
174b2(rgyud): de nas yan lag lnga la yang // kha dog dbyibs ni du mar snang // rnam par snan mdzad byin brlabs ste// don rnams so sor du mya byed// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs so so'i skye bo'i yis// 
174b3(rgyud): rin chen gnas rnams gang na tsa la/ rin chen ma tshil ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i phyi rol na/ rin po che'i gling yod do// de'i gnas nas btsal bar byad
174b4(rgyud): gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni// gser rdul la sogs rdo rnams kyi/ gnas ni kuna? la yod par gsungs/ rin chen shes pa rnam pa lda// dang po rgyud rnams thams cad las/ 
174b5(rgyud): rmongs par byed par shes par bya/ bla ma'o man ngag thos pas shes/ gnyis pa rnal 'byor thob pas shes/ gsum pu rgyud kyi man ngag la/ bzhugs pa'i tshong dpon
174b6(rgyud): bo shes/ bzhi po yon tan kun ldan pa// rgyal po chen pos de shes so// lnga pa rnal 'byor pa dang // rgyal po chen po 'brel ba'i/ gser gar mkhas pa rtag par 'gyur/ dang po lan
174b7(rgyud): dag ci ltar lags// gnyis pa rnal 'byor ci ltar lags/ gsum pa rgyud ni ci ltar lags// 'greng ba lnga ni ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal padang po mam pa
174b8(rgyud): shes par khyad/ rin chen ngo bo cig nyid yon tan du mar shes pa ste// dben ni rdzas kyi pha la mkhan/ tshu la mi dbyings 'bigs la sogs du mar shes pa man ngag yin/ rnam 'phyo
176a1(rgyud): shes pa rtse gcig te/ de'i thams cad shes pa yin/ rgyud kyi don ni shes pa yin dang natshong dpon des ni shes pa yin/ sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa'i'adi yon tan
176a2(rgyud): kun ldan rgyal pos shes/ rgyal po'i rnal 'byor dang 'bral ba'i/ sa 'og gser gyi kwing pa shes/ gsor de'i yis shes pa'o// rtag pa rnam pa gnyis yin te mngon gsum
176a3(rgyud): dang ni tshad ma ste/ rdo rje ba la ma la la srogs dang / e ran de la sogs la dang / mngon du btan pa phab pa yin// mra ha ni la sogs pa/ gnon rnams thub cing lha rnams sgyu ba dam tshig
176a4(rgyud): thams pa gsor ba dang / tshenams srid pa la sogs pa'o// da po gdon gi mtshan ma ni/ mkhas rtogs cing zhes par bya// de nas gdod kyi mtshamam med
176a5(rgyud): de nyid cho ga tshul bzhin bya// de nas chu ming bcang ma rud/ gtor ma btang la chu rtsang bla gser rdul snod du chu thugs la// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la srogs
176a6(rgyud): mtshan ma g.yas gi wa da la la// rnal 'byor pa'i bzhag par bya// go mo gsum gi ba racha la/ g.yon gi ma 'di la thog tu t+ya/ chu'i nang du me long bzhag/ phyir ru gtor ma cha cig
176a7(rgyud): sbyin// nang du yol ba dkar po bcad// de ru tshogs dang sna shigs gzhag/ rnal 'byor yan lag grub byas la/ lnga'i rnal 'byor rdzogs pa dang / khro bo drag du 'tshams bcad pa
176a8(rgyud): sngon po khro mo lho ru sgom// de yis rin chen dang po bzung // de nas sor bzhi 'chang du bzhug/ thub pa mthub la sogs// mkhas pa brtag cing shes par bya// dbyibs dang kha rnon po che
176b1(rgyud): yon tan med pa gang du srid// dper na bu cig skyes 'gyur na/ ga pa med pa ni gang du srid// de bas mkhas las rtag par bya/ lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gser rdul la sogs ji
176b2(rgyud): wA ra legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// gser ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// rang bzhin dang ni bzod byas te/ 8 bzhin gis mchi ba smrad// bzor byas las ni rnam men pa gnyis/ 
176b3(rgyud): ga ser 'gyur gser gyi brgyan yin te/ brdar ba'i gser ni srin ni la 'gyegs// lo dang zla ba zla ba che// mkhas pa rtags shes khor bya// rdul la sogs pa yang de bzhin te// mdor na snang
176b4(rgyud): zhing srid pa'i rdzas thams cad rin por che yin te/ man ngag can gris shes pa 'gyur// de nas bcud rin por chen/ lus ni ri rab lhun po la/ rin chen
176b5(rgyud): gser gi g.yel dang // thabs dang shes rab rin po che// shes rab rtsa'i/ rang bzhin ci// thaHsa ni byang chub sem yin no// dmar dang ga ba shi sa raHste// dkar tsi
176b6(rgyud): gdang bza su gsungs// a ba 'du ti rin chen la// thig le gtug mo 'phreng ba yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// a ba 'du ti ji ltar lags// bcom ldan
176b7(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// a ba 'du te rang bzhin la// steng sgra lnga yang dag gnas/ bar de 'og tu 'ang de bzhin la// bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa dang / yon tan skyon gi mtshan nyid de/ 
176b8(rgyud): bde chen thig le ha yin te// oM dang tsU dade tsaM dang bzhinabade ba chen po la 'khor lo'u// ska gsung thugs deng/ de latsho/ 'grin ru ni 'dug pa bzhi/ ka sgrol pa ru yang de bzhin te/ 
177a1(rgyud): chos kyi sku ni rin chen la// stong pa bcu drug 'phreng bar bshad// de nas shin tu gsang ba'i 'od// pad ma rdo rje gnyis pa ni/ a la 'ang tI rin po che/ a pags a dang ba dang bzhi// gsang
177a2(rgyud): ba'i thig le bzhi ru bshad/ a ni me long lta bu ste/ badz+ra ni bya ba nan tan yin// e niso sor rtog pa ste/ ba ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// rin chen chos dbyings ye shes te/ rnam par tha ra dang stong
177a3(rgyud): nyid dang / mtshan dang de bzhin dper byad rnams// a 'i 'khor lo 'byung ba bzhin// phaT kyi gnasu ye shes lde// se'i gnas su snyoms 'jug dgu/ ba~M gi gnas su lnga bcu brgyad// de kho na ru shes
177a4(rgyud): pa ra bya/ kA e e ta sa bon bzhinayon tan skyon gi mtshan nyid kyis// kun la khyad cing shes par bya/ da lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// de'i don rnams ji ltar thug
177a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dag pa ji ltar lags/ skra dkaganyer ma ci ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rnam rtog pa don yin te mtshan dang dpe' byang
177a6(rgyud): spangs pa dang // dbang po lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga// skye mched de nyid lnga ru 'gyur// khams rnams rten cing ngo bo che// 'di rnams ca 'i ngo bo ste// rnam rtog spong phyir rin po che byang sems dag pa'i
177a7(rgyud): rin por che// g.yas rkyang ba ni thabs yin te/ g.yon gi shes rab rtsa bdun dag/ sogs na mkhal dgag par bya// zlum po gsang ba'i sna rtser dgags// la la na dang sa sran/ a
177a8(rgyud): 'dra ti nang chung bas// de na ni mkha' zla bo ste// dper na stsal go lce gnyis dag/ gzhan 'dug dang bye brag gis// dgag pa'i bye brag shes par byed dgag pa'i srog dang rtsa ba ba ste na
177b1(rgyud): de zlar dus su gnas pa dang / ras nas rim du gnas pa dang / skang cigaciganas 'azung ba'i ldanaka gnyer ma'i ring bzhin dag/ gangs na pa de'i tshad/ gsum so gsal pa macom/ 
177b2(rgyud): ldan 'das/ dbus su gnas pa ci cig lags/ rim shes rim pa ci lta 'drang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' spel pa// thabs shes bya ba rtog pa'i mtha'// snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbu
177b3(rgyud): ma'o don// g.yas pa'i srog ni rtog pa'i don// g.yon pa'i rtsol kha chad pa'i mtha'/ ro ma rtag pa'i byang chub sems/ rkyang ma'i khrag zhi tshod pa'o// kun dar ma ru gang gnas pa// de yi dbus
177b4(rgyud): mar shes par bya// mchog gi dga' brtag pa'i mtha' ba'i dgal ba ched la'i mtha'// ldan cig skyes dag/ dpur mar bshad// oM dang hUM ni mtha'i gnyis te/ a yirnam
177b5(rgyud): par dbul mar gsungs// a yi ka li mtha' gnyis te// ma ni yi ge dbu ma yin// skyes pa bud mthul yin te/ nam ni gnyi su med par gsungs// 'do na 'gog pa bzung du 'jug/ shes
177b6(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin pa ru// 'brel pa bzung du 'jug par gsungs// bya ba'i rgyud dang rnal 'byor rgyu do// snang ba bzung 'du 'jug par gsungs// dpal kun gsang ba 'dus pa ru// steng sgo dbugs la zung du
177b7(rgyud): 'jug/ shes rab rnal 'byor bla ma ru/ si la ga pur 'azung du 'jug/ derim nas rim du drang pa la// gsang ba'i 'khor lo a la ni/ bde ba rdzogs pa'i tshad ston nas/ pad ma rdo rje 'gag la sum/ 
177b8(rgyud): de nas yongasu rdzogs pa 'chang de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi// bde chen 'khor lo la bar du phreng // dang po 'di ltar shes par bya// de ltar sems ni rten par 'gyur/ bde par chen po'i 'khor lon
178a1(rgyud): da gsang ba'i ste rtse bar drang / lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcud kyi rin can gang ma gnas/ de'is shes pa su yis shes/ de'i rtag pa ji ltar gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
178a2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas// a ba 'dra ti'i rtsa dag gnas// ro ma sbyang ma sbrul ltar gnas// gzhan pa rnams khug par gnas// 'di rnams kun la rang bzhin gnas/ 
178a3(rgyud): rtsa dang 'khor lo 'di rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pos gsungs// phyi'i rtsa dang nang gi rtse// gsang ba de bzhin mthar thugs nas/ man ngag yin par shes par gsungs// rtag pa rnam pa
178a4(rgyud): ga nyi sa su bstan// dang po lus kyi rtag pa pa ste// gnyis pa dag tu shes par bya// lus la spyi dang bye brag gnyis/ rgyu ni rlung ni rang bzhin te// yan lag thung na chu'i/ 
178a5(rgyud): khams/ sman zheng chen me'i khams/ na sna tshogs dum na mkha khams// spyi ru dka ra la chu'i khams dmar ba ni me'u shes par bya/ ser la de bzhin sa'i khamasad
178a6(rgyud): sngo ba rlung tu shes parabyeyang na rlung gi khams yin te// drod rnams che ba me'i khamasabartan pa'i khams su bshad yin/ chu rnams chen chu'i khams// de rnams ldan kun na mkha'i khams
178a7(rgyud): 'jug pa yid chen ma yin te// ldog pa sprul pa sa ru gsungs/ rnal 'byor rgyud kyi bye zag gis/ sems gi gnas su shes par bya// nu 'chung la sil med/ sbrul dang chos su khe sbyor yin// gzhan
178a8(rgyud): yang mkhas pas shes par bya// de nas bye brag gsum tu ni// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan mar gsungs// kun la khyad par shes par bya// dang po dbyibs kyi rtog pa yang // de 'brel pa'i dbyibs kyi rnam pa bzhi
178b1(rgyud): grub pa'i zlub po rdza ga ma dang / rur gsum du yang shes par bya/ dkar po la sogs dang 'dra/ nabs nas rkang ba'i bar kun la rtag cing shes par bya/ sa cig 'dra shing sdom pa dang / rang du
178b2(rgyud): dadun da re thung ba dang / 'dar ba la sogs bye brag rnams// mkhas pas rtag cing shes par bya/ rtags te rtag pa'i mtshan ma ya ne/ rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// 'dod chags sku la zhe sdang
178b3(rgyud): thugaso// dmun pa gsum du shes par bya// dang po 'dod chags byed pa la/ yang ngo mar ngo tshams dang gsum// mkhas pa 'dod chags skyed la brtag/ nyin par bzhi mtsho nas par bzhid
178b4(rgyud): de bzhin skad cig zang cig cig mkhas pa rtag cing shes par bya/ namig 'dzum pa stu ldong la sogs/ dbyibs kyi 'dod pa skyed pa brtag/ 'dod pa gzigs ldan chu zhing dmar// 
178b5(rgyud): sna stu sa dkar la sogs pa dang // skar 'dar kha ni skam la srogs da/ 'dod pa skyed pa'i rtag su bshad/ gzhan yang 'dod pa skyeng ba'i brtag/ kha dog dbyibs la rtag par bya/ 
178b6(rgyud): snga sa phyir 'dod kha'i rtags// chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// gsungs thugs la shes par bya/ lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags zhes byang pa ci ltar lagasan
178b7(rgyud): de'i chen po ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la srogs ji ltar lags// sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste/ 
178b8(rgyud): bo'i bsam pa ma ta rtogs par// sbas pa'i gsang ba'i la zhen na/ srid pa'i sa bon mi zad par/ dper na rgyud kyi mda' bzhin du'abras bu ma nar med dmyal bar skyed// chen po/ 
179a1(rgyud): ga ma rtog rang bzhin te/ 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes skyed// 'dod chags zhes pa spang bar bya// de'i chen po gnyis por gsungs// 'dod rgyags zhes pa me tog te// 
179a2(rgyud): de'i chen po dri dang 'dra// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// zhe sdang la sogs gong dang 'dra// thams cad rten pas ska ru brtan// brjod pa dang bral gsung du bstan/ rnam rtog bral bas thugs
179a3(rgyud): su shes// rnam rtog chu la rtong phor tshobla ma la gus snying rje che// gzhan yang bye brag kun shes pa// 'di la rten gis kun lags na// bla ma yon tan dang ldan zhing // dbang dang
179a4(rgyud): man dug 'brel shes na// gsang ba'i don la ma rmongs shig/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i/ dechos la ser sna med pa dang // gsul l+ya gson por smra ba dang / rigs
179a5(rgyud): byas kun gi kun pa dang / las kyi phyag rgya'i chang ba dang / dam tshig dang ldan bla ma la// 'di la bkur gi thams cad la/ snyen cing bkur bar bya ba min// lha mos gsol
179a6(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das// gang zhes pa ji ltar lags// sbas pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de'i 'bras bu ci ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bag pa med zhes
179a7(rgyud): bya ye shes su// sum bcu rtsa bdun sku gsung thugs// chos la longs spyodasprul sku dang // dga' bra bzhi ru mngon bsdus pa/ dmigs pa'i rgyan zhes 'di gsang ba'or
179a8(rgyud): btun dang ldan phyir chen po'o// sum de cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa// gnyer po'i stobs kyis mi bzhugs pa// sbas pa pad mang rdo rje gnyis// snyoms par zhugs nas 'dod pa snyed/ 
179b1(rgyud): 'dini gan thong ma rung da dper na ljon shing sa bya la ga me tog thams cad spyod/ gnyon mongs ma pa'i 'dad chags las// dug gsum las gas thams cad ste// smras pas
179b2(rgyud): gsung ba mkho'i ba ste/ dgab pa mya ngan 'das pa ste// 'khor bar mnar med dmyal ba sted dur khrod rgyal lo drags pa can snying rje med par sha khrag za/ shing rta'i 'khor la bzhin du gnas// 
179b3(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa sku gsung thugs// skyob pa mya ngan 'das gyur dang // 'khol 'khor ba'i tshul dang ni// tshogs kyi shugs kyi mthu' yis ni// sems can don la yang dag 'dug/ chos sku
179b4(rgyud): sgos rdul namakha' bzhin/ sku gnyis srin dang char tshul sku gnyis sems can doni mdzad pa na sems can las dang smon lam stob sa/ de'i stobs kyis snang ba las// yang
179b5(rgyud): nyid dang las snal 'gyur masku gsum de nyid bzhi za'i don/ dur khrod la sogs 'ang 'du shes na gsum bcuHgnyis chos su'i 'da'adu brgyad ni gzugs sku gnyis kyis
179b6(rgyud): gzhan yang 'di'i bye brag ni// skam khyi'ogasang ba'i rdo rje 'da' 'khros pa'i pad ma'i dza'i// rgu dang 'dra ba yon tan spyod// 'jam po la rten tho ba'i tshul / nga'i gan du tshur shog yon// 
179b7(rgyud): 'arje bo la rten 'dzub mo'i bar// khyod kyi gnas su 'ong gis yin// 'the bo 'dzu gnyis zung gsum ni/ nga ga rgyas sam 'dri ba yin// ba ga ma rgyas zlum por ston// bde ba'i gnas/ 
179b8(rgyud): 'dra bar yang / srod dang tho rangs nam gung gsum/ 'dzub tshigs dang po nam bzung nas/ tha ma'i bar du brda yin no// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs kyin lan gsum bar du/ 
180a1(rgyud): nan tan bzung // gzhan yang brda'i bye brag rnams// rgyud rnams kun tu me gsungs pa/ gnas ni thams cad 'dug pa ste/ gnyis shes rab 'dug sar gsu
180a2(rgyud): zhing ni thams kyi ma chagasanacanan gas rab nye ba ning // 'dub zab sa kyi rob ste/ ni shes rab 'ong bcad du yin// tshan do thabs kyi spyan dang ban/ shes rabar ba nan nyimanan
180a3(rgyud): dur khrod thabs ni nas rtog bral// de bzhin shes rab nye dur khrod// gzhan yang dza'i byi zag rnams// kha dog de bzhin dbyings dang yang yan lag tshul rtsa las shes par bya// de rnams lha mos
180a4(rgyud): mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang ba gyur to/ rgyud kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i yang gas pas/ rang bzhin gis gsang ba di
180a5(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin chen rdo rje dang // dge slong shAkya legs kyis sbyar ba'o// // rgya gar skad
180a6(rgyud): ma hA sa mo ya tan tra naH/ bod skad du/ dam tshig chen po'i rgyud zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyaga'i tshal lo// / 'di skad skad bdag gis tha
180a7(rgyud): pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kyi thams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rdo rje btsun mol ge l-i sums par bzhugs so// de nas bya bachun sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
180a8(rgyud): sring ba dang / rnal 'byor grangs med pa'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la zhal 'dzum la mdzas nas dam tshig rim par bka' bstsal la/ dam tshig na
180b1(rgyud): ni mi ldan na// sgrub dang sgrub par mi 'gyur ro// rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu bzhin// tshe'i dus byas dmyale bar 'gro// de phyir dam tshig shin tu srung / sangs rgyas bla ma la thob phyir/ mthung mo nga ma yin
180b2(rgyud): tha ma yin/ lnga bcu dag nyid srung bar bya// mthun mong brgyad dang bcu gnyis te// de rnams med par shes par bya/ de rnams spyil dam tshig ste// bye brag dam tshig bsrung ba dang // phung po lnga ni rig
180b3(rgyud): lnga ste// 'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga'o// skye mche de snyems dpa' sems rma yin// gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad la// brjed dang gnyes pa la sogs spangs// de la mchod dang stod stsogs bya// don
180b4(rgyud): dam pa yang rang rig ste// tshogs bsags phyir ni nga'i gsungs// tsher ba la sogs de dang 'dra// sa ni sangs rgyas spyan yin te// spyod lam gsum du ma g.yengs shig/ gong du gsu
180b5(rgyud): tshul bzhin srung // chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// rig la srogs pa de bzhin no// gzugs la sogs pa de bzhin no// dkyi'o 'khor du gzhugs rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa shin du mchod// 
180b6(rgyud): b.rus shing gshe ba la spogs spangs// sems can po dang mo kun la// dpa'o dpa' mo dam tshig bsrungs// bza' ba la stsogs dang su yang // bdud rtse sbyor bas dam tshig bzung // sha lnga
180b7(rgyud): bdud rtsa lnga rnams la// rang gi sbyor dang gzhan sbyor la// rjes su yid rang dam tshig yin// mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas// dam tshig srung phyir mchod pa'i rdzas// lus kyi nyes sgom sku yin te// 
180b8(rgyud): ngag ni nyes sdom gsung du gsungs/ yid kyi nyes sdom thugs su gsungs// oM gi 'od zer dkar po'i/ 'dod khams dag par 'gyur ba'i// sku'i dam tshig srung ba'o/ de mchod
181a1(rgyud): dang stod sngogs bya// bsdu ba yang oM du shes par bya// oM gyi kha dog dmar po'o// gzugs khams dag pa dam tshig ldan// hUM ni kha dog nag po yis// gzugs med
181a2(rgyud): dag pa dam tshig go// oM ni spyi bor yang dag gnas// a ni de bzhin 'grin par gnas hUM ni snying khar sngo dang su// sku'i mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// 'dod khams dag pa dam tshig ga
181a3(rgyud): gsung gi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// gzugs khams dag pa de tshig yin// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyi su// gzu med pI dam tshig ste// oM dang A da tsU dang sku// oM nr-i r+g+haM ba sku gnyis// a ni laM gi dku cu gi/ 
181a4(rgyud): hUM ni 'bras bu'i sgo bcu gnyis// bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs/ ye shes cig sbyor sdom pa'o// dang ldan chos kyi sku gsu dathugs// ye shes cig sbyar sdom pa'ido// lo nges spyod rdzogs pa sku gsung ku/ 
181a5(rgyud): ye shes gcig sbyor sngo ba'o// sprul/ yang ni sku gsung thuT// ba tshe/ snying po haM nyid la sku dang gsung dang thugs yang // ye shes dang ni rnam pa bzhi// AM dang A dong ts+tsha dang yaM// yA dag
181a6(rgyud): zhi ni bzhi ru gsungs// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bya la// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad shes par bya// AM dang hUM gaM nyis rang bzhin gis// sngoT kyi ngo bo shes par bya// sngaT kyi grangs ni nyi khri stong // drug brgya zlas pas shes
181a7(rgyud): par bya ba lag pa sbyang ba rang bzhin ga ra// rkang dang rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lo// de ltar gnas na dam tshig go// gzhan yang dam tshig bye brag kyang // 'jig rten tha snyad spangs pa'i phyir// ma skyod rnam snang
181a8(rgyud): la srogs dang dpa' bo mkha 'gro ma zhes pa/ gsang ba'i rdo rje ma pad ma dang / ji ltar rol pa'i spyod yul kun/ tha snyad kyang ni la la 'jug/ gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshig la rtsa ba bzhi
181b1(rgyud): dang / lag yan lag bcu/ thegs che la smod pa dang / gsang ba'i don la skur 'debs dang / rnal 'byor kun la smod pa rung / sems can rnams la 'tshe byed dang / 'di gsang ba ni dam tshig gi/ spros pa goms par rim
181b2(rgyud): yang / ma byin len blangs pa dam tshig ste// 'dod chags chen po dang ldan pa yi// 'dod spyod pa ni de dang 'dzi rang gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir// brdzun du smra ba bzhi pa yin// ro mA sha dang bcud
181b3(rgyud): kI sha ta kha ba'i chang dang dang ra ba'i chang // mar la gnyis te 'o ma gcig/ zhag ni gsum ste yan lag bcu/ 'di ldan dam tshig yin par bsrungs// ba dad rtsi nyid la dus gsu ma du// bcom ldan skra
181b4(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi ste/ dang po nyungs kar tha ma ya/ byi la'ikham gyi tshul du bza'// mtshan mo shes rab sku gsung thugs// nyi ma nub dang nyi ma shar// nyi ma gung gi tha~M gr-is kyi
181b5(rgyud): dusanam sros na ma ni langs pa dang // nam gyi dgung ni shes rab dus// dus drug mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// dam tshig 'di la ma nyams na/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams na
181b6(rgyud): bzhugs pa yi// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma mo rnams// mchod dang bsrung ba la srogs byed// gzhon yod gsang ba'i bye brag la// gsang ba'i sgom pa rnal 'byor pas// lus la me dang khrag mi 'don/ 
181b7(rgyud): srog gam zug rngu phyir mi rtogs// srog chags 'dod pa spyod pa mthong na// rang gi rnal 'byor shor mi bya// dam tshig bsrang phyir dben par 'dag/ las su rung na g.yeng bar 'khyam// 'di skad ces
181b8(rgyud): bya yan lag brgyad// bdag gi bcu ni yin par gsungs// thos pa'i dus gcig lnga bcu'i don// / bcom ldan 'das ni rna ba bzhi// de bzhin gshegs par yan lag bcu/ sku gsung thugs
182a1(rgyud): thugs ni lus ngag yin// rdo rje mi 'byid phyir dam tshig/ btsun mo dam tshig gis rgyan mdzes// ba ga la snyoms par 'jug 'joms pa'od// snyoms par dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba// bzhugs
182a2(rgyud): pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo la'o// snying rje chen pos gsol pa// bye brag yin par nga yis gsungs// e ni yan lag brgyad yin no// baM ni bcu pa'i rang bzhin te/ ma lnga bcu'i rang bzhin no// ya ni gzhan rnams
182a3(rgyud): yin par gsungs// e ni srogs bsad pa ste/ ba~M ni ma byin len pa ste// ma ni rdzun du smra ba ste// ya ni 'dod chags spyod pa ste// e ni sku yi dam tshig ste// baM ni gsung gi dam tshig go// ma ni thug/ 
182a4(rgyud): kyi dam tshig go// ya ni bza' ba'i dam tshig go// dus gsum dam tshig ma bsrungs na// 'jig rten pa dang 'bum gyur pa'i// rnam smin che bar nga yis gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa'i
182a5(rgyud): mtshan ma ni// lus kyi nyes pa sna tshogs 'byung // ngag gi nyes pa sna tshogs smra/ kha dog dbyibs ni rnams 'gyur/ ba dang / lag gi rdzas mi 'thub cing // 'bras dang shu ba la sogs 'byung
182a6(rgyud): de tshe rnal 'byor nyams pa'i mtshan ma ni// lus kyi nye ba sna tshogs 'byung // dam tshig nyams pa shin tu bsam// bla ma 'am rdo rje skyon 'gram tu/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul byas la/ 
182a7(rgyud): gser rdul la sngogs brgya 'am stong // rta dang glang po la sngags dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan brgya 'am stong / mar me la spogs de bzhin no// tshogs gi
182a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen pos bskor// tshogs bsags pas ni nyams pa bsro// gal te nyams pa gsos na// nyams pa de dang rnal 'byor gzhan// gnas gcig dang ni chu gcig dang // yul
182b1(rgyud): dang lam gyi gnas gcig gam// skad cig tsam yang 'dug mi bya// 'dug na nyes pa bsam mi khyab/ rang gnas sbyin sreg dbang skur dang // gtor ma mchod dang bzlas pa dang // ri lu mig sman la sogs dang / 
182b2(rgyud): zhi rgyas la srogs las rnams dang // 'jig rten mtshan ma brgyad dag dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i mtshan ma bzhi// sangs rgyas pa yi mtshan ma gcig/ gzhan yang dngos grub ma lus pa// dam tshis
182b3(rgyud): 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur// 'bru rnams sna tshogs bskyed 'gyur ba// rin chen sa las skyes pa yin// dam tshig sku gsung thugs yin te// de las 'das nas dam tshig 'gyur// ji lta bur ni
182b4(rgyud): med pa'i ming // shi ma thag tu stong par 'gyur// de bzhin dam tshig 'di med na/ mnar med sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ pi wang gling bu sbyor kun spogs/ rgyu dang bral na
182b5(rgyud): gdung mi rung // de bzhin dam tshig med 'gyur na// bsngags bzlas sgom pa ma rdzogs par// 'bras med par ni bklag par 'gyur// nas la nas kyi myu gu skye// dam
182b6(rgyud): tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang // tshe 'di thob par gsungs pa ste// dus ni gzhon min spyod ldan dus// bstan bya gzhan min nga yi ste// skye ba gzhan min pa dang ma// bzhi ni yin par gsungs pa'o// de ltar
182b7(rgyud): dam tshig dang ldan pa/ bud med 'dra zhing dga' bar 'gyur// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mar bstan// nor dang bran dang g.yog 'khor dang // rgyal po'i yul 'khor la srog
182b8(rgyud): 'du ta ngag ni snyan pa bde bar 'gyur// srog spyod la srogs tshigs smras kyang // sems can skrag par mi 'gyur ro// lus kyi sems can gsad byas kyang // rnam smin 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bsku ni thob par
183a1(rgyud): ngas gsungs so// ngag gi phra mo'i tshig smras kyang // nye bar mi 'gyur gsungs thob 'gyur// yid kyi mnar ma sems byas gyur kyang // nges par mi 'gyur thugs thob 'gyur// dam chis
183a2(rgyud): ldan pa'i yon tan no// e ma'o rgyud ni ngo re 'tshal ka/ dam tshig chen po'i rgyud rdzog s+ho// ka g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
183a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shi ma hA pa la tan tra na ma/ bod skad du// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal sdom pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
