230a3(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje phag mo'o// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed par byed pa ni// gshin rje'i brtan ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyed pa rjes su gnas lnga dang // srung bar byed pa ni gzhin rje'i pho tsa ma'o// 
230a4(rgyud): mi dge ba'i chos bskyed pa rnams spong bar byed pa ni gshin rje'i mchi ma pa ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos rnams mi skyed byed pa no// gshin rje 'joms ma'o// chos bdag med pa'i lam
230a5(rgyud): nas su// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhugs pa ni// shes rab pha rol phyin slor ma'o// de bzhin rnal 'byor pas gnas byas// snang ba med pa'i gnas la gnas// snang ba med
230a6(rgyud): ma yang dag rten// spyod pa med pa'i chos rnams la// chos can mod cing chos nyid med// rten 'khrel mkhan dang mnyam mgyi rgyas// dngos med mtshan ma med pa'o// 'di ni de nyid go 'phang gnas/ 
230a7(rgyud): ye shes dag ni mig gi me thong // phra rab rdul rab dang mnyam ma// 'khor lo ma nas mthong shin tu nges// skra tse'i stong phrag rgya'i ni// tshe dang cha ru yongasu rtag/ he ru ka dang rnal 'byor ma// lhan cig pa kha'i
230a8(rgyud): dbus nas mthong // 'khor lo sgyur bar rab brtson pas// Sha gdong ma ni phyi rol dgod// he ru ka ba sogs bdag po khyod// mkhan 'gro bzhi yis yongasu skor/ naphan tshun du ni bdag por byed// 
230b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems stsogs bdag po ldan// phyi rol dur khrod drag po dang / kha gdong tshogs mchog gi mchog/ shing mchog sna tshogs mdzes po dang // khyi dang phyi spang 'dzags pa dang // kha gdong 'ug pa bya/ 
230b2(rgyud): dgod dang / lce sbyang de bzhin ro sregs pa/ keng rus gsal zhing khyis phug dang / gegs ni 'chang dang byed sregs dang / thod pa skam po pus mo dang / mgo med lhag mthor pa gar// rnam pa sna tshogs
230b3(rgyud): sgral gis mdzes// drag po sbrul dang de bzhin rdza// seng ge phag dang stag dang ni/ de bzhin ra dang lug dag dang / glang po d+ha dang byed bu dang / rnga mo sna tshogs dam tshig mchog/ rnam pa sna tshogs chang dang ni
230b4(rgyud): 'bru chang btung ba'i mchog rnams kyis// dpa' bo bzang po 'dus pa dang // sna tshogs rnal 'byor me mchog rnams/ thod pa kha tri kha rag dang / dri khug cang te'u mchog rnams/ 'dzin
230b5(rgyud): sna tshogs rol mo bzang po dang / bzang ba'i longs spyod dang / sna tshogs 'od dang khyud pa dang / bcas dring ldog pa'i/ mchog rnams kyis/ rnam pa de ltar rlung khrod ni// gnod sbyin
230b6(rgyud): ro langs srin po rnams/ he ru ka'i nga rgyal gyis/ de la gtor ma byin par bya/ tsang teSh+Ta rdo rje dril bya dang / glar dang rol mo byed pa dang / phyogs kyi gos can phyag rgya can/ hUM hUM phaT kyi li ki l-i bya/ 
230b7(rgyud): ga yas rkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ 'bar bya'i phyag rgya cing bar bya// dam tshig kha ru btsud nas ni/ sngags 'di rjesu dran par bya// au au a ra li d+yo/ dzA hUM baM tso/ badro Ta kai ne sa ma ta ma TA sh+ya ho/ 
230b8(rgyud): de skad bsum dang gni lngar brjod par bya'o// g.yas skor dang g.yon skor gis kyang / thod pa'i nang gi sbyin par bya ba rnams// rdo rje thal mo kha gyen du phyed la sngags 'di rjod do// oM kha kha kha hi kha
231a1(rgyud): hi sarba ra kra ya k+ka/ ba sarba b+hud ta pre ta bi shi tse da ud ma ta/ a pa s+phu raT ki ni a Ta ya/ i maM b+ha ling / gri ha tu ma ma sahI/ dan ta ya thAM swam bu dza tha bi pa tha/ dza g+ha tha mi ta kra ma ta/ 
231a2(rgyud): ma ma sarba ka ra sad d+ha kha/ b+hi shud d+ha ye swA hA/ ya ga ban du hUM hUM phaT swA hA// de ltar cho ga dang cho gas 'tshams bzhir sbyar bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
231a3(rgyud): ye shes/ gsang ba'i yang gsang ba chen po 'dis gsungs pa// dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid chos// namakha' ltar bu ro dri ma med dod stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis// slong nyid shin tu rnam par sgom// 
231a4(rgyud): legs so zhes ni bya ba byin// rgyu rdzogs sbyor ba'i bya ba las// legaso legs ye shes tshe bshad pa'i rgyud phyi ma las// phag mo mtho ngan par 'byung ba zhes bya ba rdzogs spyod/ rgya garas gi
231a5(rgyud): mkhan po gnya' na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ga khu s+ho/ dngos grub kyis sbyar cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o/ oM thI// / rgya gar skad du// ku la lo kan
231a6(rgyud): tha pan tsha shi ka na mra tan tra ra dzA na ma/ bod skad du/ rigs kyi spyan ras gzigs kyi lja bats+tsha ba zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro mo la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas gsang dam pa 'di// 'jig rten
231a7(rgyud): rmongs par bya ba'i mchog/ rigs dang rigs 'byung zhes bya'o// gsang sngags mchog zhi bshad par bya// dam tshig spyod pa las des grolA/ bya ba dus dag rnams spangs pa// sku gsum yang
231a8(rgyud): dag ldan pa ste// 'jig rten mgon po 'gro ba'i bdag/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'dod pa'i lha// mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bya ster// de'i sngags 'di mtshungs pa med// bla ma'i zhal la rnam
231b1(rgyud): par gnas// drag shul tshe dang 'jigs gzugs can// thig le lnga dadrang yang dag ldan// gcod byed dang po dang byas pa// chen po lnga lnga po dang ldan// lce gnyis yan lag med gnyis gnas// sku
231b2(rgyud): gsum sngags gi 'dren pa'o// de nyid dran par byed pa'o// gtsang ngam ni mi gtsang rung // lha'i dbang phyug rol byed mas// 'dod lnga bzhin du yang dag lha// sngags kyi mgron po 'di la ni// bya
231b3(rgyud): mi dgos grub mi dgos// mchod pa sbyin sreg mi dgos shing // bsam brtan rnal 'byor yang dag ldan// dus dang dus mtshams nges grol zhing // ce gcig yid ni brtan pa yis// cho ga bzhin su 'byam
231b4(rgyud): bzlas zhing // yang na yi ge re re la'o// the tsom med par tshig tsam gis// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// snying 'kho lo nang nas 'thar thug/ gzhan dang bzhin mchog khyed byed// 
231b5(rgyud): de ni bye brag gnyis ldan par// shes na thams song bar 'gyur/ bsam brtan rnal 'byor yang dag ldan// blo ldan du rol bkod bya ba// 'gro na gang rtsi yang ci rung ba dzi/ sa
231b6(rgyud): sbrengs la sogs pa grub par byed// pad ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// yang na na mkha'i phyag rgya'o// lte ba nas ne mkha'i bir// nus pa gsum dang yang dag ldan// g.yo zhing dga' ba'i yul
231b7(rgyud): ci na// blo yis rnam par 'jug pa bya// srog ni rgyu'o tshed tsam dang // go 'phang gnyis kyis gos pa yi na// de ltar dgod pa byas 'gyur na// 'jig rten mgon po'i sku 'drar 'gyur// gzhan
231b8(rgyud): t+yan ni bzlas pa dang / las rnams gang gi byed par 'gyur// res mkha' 'gro khu tshur drang // 'bras 'dod so ba gdong ba bzhin// cho lags bsam brtan sbyor lo yis// gang tshe las
232a1(rgyud): rnams brtsam 'gyur na// de tshe de'i yid gnas pa'i// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rang gzugs bsam brtan dang bcas pa// 'tshan mchog gi ni 'od dang mtshungs/ se lu'i me/ 
232a2(rgyud): tog rang dang tshungs pa// lha'i lha ni phyag bzhi pa// pad ma'i gdan la yang dag gnas/ gzhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin ma mchog/ phyag gis mchod sbyin la brtson cing // mu tig nor bu dag gas rgyan// 
232a3(rgyud): phyag na pad ma spyan bzang po// sna tshogs gzugs can bzi rjid che// dpa' bo dbang phyug 'gro ba'i mgon// rnal 'byor ma'i sta~M nga kar byed// stegs kun gyi ni bzhir 'gyur lta// dngos gru 'thar
232a4(rgyud): rab sgrub byed// dngos po gang dang gshi dang // rnal 'byor bsam brtan la brtson la// de la de'i pags cad ni// yinabazhin nor bu mchog ltar 'gyur// dkar ba zhi ba rab ster lha/ 
232a5(rgyud): tham cad rtog par byed pa mchog/ dbang dang 'gugs pa'i lha ni// sku mdog dmar po rnam par las mad dedud / dam ra ba'i sku mdog mtshungs// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis skor pa
232a6(rgyud): 'di ni dkar bar byed pa ste// dgra rnams 'joms par byed pa'i mchog/ dka ra dang dung ka dmar ba 'am// rnam par snang ba nges bor sbyor// bsod pa la ni sku mnog nag/ de bzhin gnod la
232a7(rgyud): ser por gsungs// lug gi bdan la yang dag bzhugs/ rkan gyi phyugs ni dbugs par byed// sa 'og la stsogs gang gnas pa// de rnams thams cad rmugs par byed// don dam tshig
232a8(rgyud): rnams bya ba ni// mang du smra ba ci zhig dgos// 'jig rten gsum ni lam rnams ni// yon tan rgyad dang yang dag ldan// rgyud gzhan nye bar spyod pa las// bsungs dang ma gsungs
232b1(rgyud): yang rnyed// rang gzugs bsam brtan skor ba'i// byed pa 'gyur gis kre tsom med// skal ldan byed pa'i lha 'di ni// snying ka'i chu skyes dbus na gnas// snying ka'i chu skyes zha sbyor ba yis// dbang dang dga'
232b2(rgyud): ba bsod par byed// lha ni sku mdog bsum dang ldan// spros pa rnam pa gsum dang ldan// rnal 'byoraro ma'i gar gnas pa'i// las de rtag tu byed par 'gyur// pad ma kha sbyor la gnas dge/ 'byin pa rnam la
232b3(rgyud): gsum yang byed// rtag tu brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa// mar me'i lce lhar mi g.yor gnos/ sngar bshad lha'i lha dbang phyugs dmar rang dmar skra'i 'od dang mtshungs// mtshan byed dus su
232b4(rgyud): gnas byas na// rnam 'byor 'di nyid brtsams par bya// de gzugs/ 'tshang ba'i lus 'di ni// sngur giHgdong pra sa leg/ sbyangs pa// zhogs pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i lha// 'gyub bya'i
232b5(rgyud): lus suM yang dag 'gugs// thams cad gsang ba 'o kha la me gnas/ zhabs pa lcags kyu gzi brjid che// de'i sgrub bya gag/ byas nas Tu lcags kyu spyi bor bdab par bya// 'dar zhing khrag gI
232b6(rgyud): sngags pa'i lus// yang dang yang du skyug par byed// khrag ni thams cad pags 'gyur zhing // sgra dgu la ni nges par gsungs / sgri thos pa dag las nges 'grol bas// lus 'di nyid ni lta bar bya/ 
232b7(rgyud): de'i dbus las sngags slang zhing // dang po'i yi ge dbang phyug mchog/ 'bar ba'i me dang 'od mtshungs pa// rang gi shes rab nub pas mtshan// de ni pad ma'i gzugs sgom zhing // kha'i gur las te/ 
232b8(rgyud): nges par 'byung // song zhing sgrub bya'i kha la thim// sgrib pa'i snying kAr mad me'i ba ra// de mthar gang ci yang rung ba ni// snying kar gnas pa de dag kun// mer mer po rnams kun br-i nas/ 
233a1(rgyud): sgrol ma'i gzugs can yid 'phrog pa'o// de yang gsungs pas cho ga bzhin// rlung gi yi ge rtogs par bya// bdag bzhin thams cad thim par 'gyur zhing // dngos po gcig tu gyur pa
233a2(rgyud): mchog/ bdag nyid dang ni nor bdag gis// bran gi dngos po yang dag gnas// 'jig rten na ni sa bdag gnas// the tsom med par cis mi grub// gzhan dbang sogs lnga rnal 'byor pas// sngags
233a3(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug sbar mi bya// rgyal srid sgrub pa la brtson pa// gsang sngags rgyal po'i dbang phyug sbyor// bud med 'dod pa'i sred pa yis// gang zhig gzhan tu byer 'gyur na// brang dbang til mcho
233a4(rgyud): ngag gamo ci/ de ma thog tu 'chi bar 'gyur/ rigs 'byung snying po mchog sras she rtag tu srog zhing srung ba byed/ dam tshig spyod pa gaman 'gyur yang // gsang sngags kha tron po 'di
233a5(rgyud): bzlas na/ 'du 'dzi med pa gcig pu yis// mkhas pas 'am khri zlas na// de la la 'phral du rtag du byung zhing // rig 'byung go 'bar 'khor sum grub// 'jig rten thams cad snyed
233a6(rgyud): byed cing // srang dang yang du sdud par byed// na me kha'i go 'phang 'gro 'gyur zhing // bran pa tsa gi the tsom med// sems dang sems med nges sbyor bas// sems kyi sems ni nges par mthong // sems ni sems
233a7(rgyud): pa yim 'gyur ni// lus can rnams la nges par 'jug/ nang med nang bcas byed pa ste// de bzhin nad bcas nang med byed// sngags kyi mgon po'i dbang phyug ni// zhugs pa lpags kyu 'dzin pa mchogs
233a8(rgyud): gsum bdag gnas skol gnas pa// gang gis 'jig rten mgon rig pa// srin med na mkha' lta bu yi// 'jig rten mgon po'i go 'phang 'gro// gzhan tu na ni rmongs pa yis// byis pas zla ba 'dzin
233b1(rgyud): pa bzhin/ kha rang bzhin go 'phang sbyor ba yis// las grub pa la brtson 'gyur na// las rnams thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing // gcig tsam gis ni the tsom med// rigs kyi spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug
233b2(rgyud): gis lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// rdzogs s+ho// // shes rab dbang phyug dad pa'i// las kyi rdo rje las bzhugs to// tshe 'das pa'i don du ni// 'jig
233b3(rgyud): rten mgon po'i rgyud 'di la sbyar// de la bsod nams gang bsags pa// dri med 'di'i 'gro ba kun// log par lta ba lam grol zhing // 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dra bar shog/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po// 
233b4(rgyud): shri da ra'i dpal gau zhabs kyi zhal lnga nas// sgyur cing brtan la la ba ba'o// / @#/ rgya gar skad du/ shri he ru ka ad b+hu da ya nA ma// bod skad du// dpal khrag mthung
233b5(rgyud): mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bzhi yang dag bshad bya ba// mchog tu rmad byung gas ba ni// gang zhig yis ni yang dag rigs// smra ba myos dngos grub/ 
233b6(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// tshes grangs med cing skar ma 'ang med// bskyang ba med par brjod bya ste// dag pa dang ni mi gtsang med// pa sgra chu'i bya ba med// dus dang mchong las rnam par grol// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa rnam
233b7(rgyud): par spyad// de yis grong ba'i chos mi spyad// brtsod ldan dus su dngos grub 'gyur// rdzogs ldan yon tan gcig grub ste// de bzhin bsum ldan yon tan gnyis// gnyis ldan yon tan gsum gyi gsung
233b8(rgyud): rtsod ldan yon tan bzhi nyid de// dngos grub nyid tu the tsom med// dpal khrag mthung mngon par 'byung ba las// bzhugs pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste// dang po'o// // // de nas gzhan ni
234a1(rgyud): rab bshar bya// rgyu rnams kun tu sbas pa ste// dpal khrag mthung rgyud chen bya// 'dod pa'i dngos grub byed pa'o// sa'i cha mnyam yid 'ong bar// dri'i chu ni nyer byugs te// sna tshogs
234a2(rgyud): spos ni yid 'ong dang // me tog sna tshogs gtsal tu kram// brtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogasu// sngags zhes lus ni srung bar bya// phyogs ni bcing bar bya'o// de nas cho ga yang dag ldan// mkhas las
234a3(rgyud): dgod bya dgod par bya// sems no shin du dag par bya// kun nas kun tu cho gsam/ bud med phyag rgya ge sta raM bcas// dang po sreg drag rjes dbyangs dang // rig dang thung bar rab tu grags// gru gsum
234a4(rgyud): gnyis ni yang dag ldan// de bzhin ma ni zhi ba dang // bud med skyes bu rnam pa bzhi// oM gnyis dang po'i dbyangs bzhin du// thung dang ring bar shes par bya// dbyangs kyi phyi mo dgod par bya// 
234a5(rgyud): dbyangs kyi sden dang por dgod// lce rtsa'i dbyangs ni dgod pa/ bya// tsheg ga ga sa dbyangs ni gsum par ro/ ai puHpad ma bzhi pa'o// lnga par rta'i sde tshan te// drug pa rtsa'i sde tshan te// 
234a6(rgyud): an ta s+tha'i ni bdun par ro// dro ba'i yi ge brgyad pa ste// mtha' mar ru ni smras pa yon// nade ltar rigs cing rnam par shes pas// sngags kyi gtso bo nyid dag ru// bkod pa la ni sngags btum pas/ 
234a7(rgyud): myur du dngos grub 'bras bu thob// dpal khrag mthung mngon par 'gyu ba las// sngags bkod pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas sngags kyi tshi ga bshad// 
234a8(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa po// gang gi rnam par shes pa tsam gris// sgrub po dngos grub thob pa 'gyur ro// lnga pa yis ni lnga pa dang // drug pa yis ni lnga pa nyid// de nyid kyi ni bzhi pa dang / gnyis// 
234b1(rgyud): pa'i ni gsum pa dang // an ta s+tha'i bzhi pa nyid// lnga pa'i ni dang po dang // a na ra da'i bzhi pa nyid// de nyid kyi ni grenyis pa dang // dbus ma sha'i dang po rjod// An ta sA'i dang po nyid// drug pa yin lnga pa dang // 
234b2(rgyud): u ma sha'i bzhi pa nyid// gnyis pa ni dang blo drang // an ta sA'i gsum pa nyid// gsum yi ni gsum pa dang // u s+tha sha'i gsum pa nyid// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // drug pa yA ni bzhi pa dang
234b3(rgyud): an ta sA'i dang po brjod// gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa ya n-i dang po brjod// drug pa yi ni lnga pa nyid/ nyi shurtsa bdun pa ni mchog/ de bzhin sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa// nyi shu rtsa btun mchog
234b4(rgyud): nyid dang // an ta swa'i dang brjod// lbu pa yi ni gsum pa dang // u ma ma ni'i gAnyi su pra drang // bcu bdun pa ni mchogadan nyid do// an ta'i gnyis pa dang // de bzhin tu gsum pa'o// gcig
234b5(rgyud): gis ma tsamra nyi shu mchog/ drug pa yi ni bzhi pa nyid// us+sa shaganyis pa dang sum bcu rtsa gcig de nas blangadrug pa yin lnga pa dang // yang na bcoM rgyad pa nyid dang // an ta sA ni dang
234b6(rgyud): por brjod// u swa ma sha'i gsum pa dang // de nyid kyi ni bzhi pa nyid// de bzhin du yang gsum pa nyid// drug pa'i bzhi pa dang // gsum pa yi ni gsum pa nyid// drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / sa su sku sha'i gsum pa
234b7(rgyud): an ta sA'i gnyis pa dang // de nyid kyi dang po nyid// an ta s+tha'i gnyis pa nyid// u swa shwa'i dang po nyid// drug pa'i dang por brjod par bya// u ma natri dang po nyid// de bzhin rgya yig rnal 'byor ma// lnga la yin
234b8(rgyud): dang po dang // u sa sma sa ni ya dang por brjod// an ta s+tha yi gsum pa nyid// de bzhin tu ni bco brgyad pa// bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // an
236a1(rgyud): ta'i gnyis pa nyid// bzhi pa'i lnga pa dang // bya'i yi ge dpa' bo brjod// de nas nyi shu pa nyid dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi mchog/ lnga pa'i lnga pa dang // drug pa yi ni lnga pa nyid// an ta sA'i
236a2(rgyud): gnyis pa brjod// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa nyid// an ta yi ni de bzhin gnyis// de nyid ni dang po dang // drug pa yin lnga pa nyid// dron gyi sde tshan bzhi pa dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa nyid// de bzhin mkhas
236a3(rgyud): pas bcu bdun dang // an ta sA'i gnyis pa dang // de nyid kyi yang bzhi pa nyid// drug pa dang po 'ang brjod par bya// drod kyi sde tshan gnyis pa dang // an ta'i rang por brjod// ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ 
236a4(rgyud): b+han d+ha ya b+ha ma d+ha ya/ tra sa ya tra sa ya/ k+ko b+ha ya krA b+ha ya/ dahr-i hra tra pe pheM/ pra Ta pa TaHha da t+ta ra/ tsibA nAM pa!grA b+hU g+h+ra/ ba sa ru tI rA/ ana? tA/ rA lam b+hi Ni// g+hI hA na g+h+ri ha na/ 
236a5(rgyud): sa pa ta ba la bu tsang ga sa ra baM pa tar dza ya ta ra dza ya/ a ka r+d+ha/ ya ka d+ha ya// hI tIdan+to nAM kr-I kl-i tsAHhi/ hUd+h+waM/ ki li ki li/ si li si liHhi li hi li/ hUM hUM/ au gyi yig dang / 
236a6(rgyud): po ste/ hU~M phaT/ kyi yi ge mtha' mar sbyar// rtsa ba'i sngagasu rab tu grags// dpal khrag mthung mngon par 'byung ba las// yi ge btu pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste// gsum pa'o// 
236a7(rgyud): snying po 'di ni bshad par bya// 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa po// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya bas// chos don 'dod dang thar ste// drod kyi sde tshan gsum pa las// dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar
236a8(rgyud): bar bya// dang po ru ni yongasu grags// drug po yi ni lnga pa las// de bzhin nyid kyi bzhi pa sa na// 'og gi char ni rab tu brtags// lnga pa la ni lnga pa las// dbyangs yige gsum pa sa s+ya
236b1(rgyud): ba yin// drod kyi sde tshan gsum pa la// dbyangs yig lnga pa yang dge ldan// bzhi pa ru ni yongs su grags// drug pa yin lnga pa la// de nyid ni bzhi pas ni// 'og gi char ni the tsom med// drod kyi sde tshan
236b2(rgyud): gsum pa le// dbyangs yog lnga pa yang dag ldan// steng du ngas yang dag sbyar ba ni// drug paru snongasu grags/ drug pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang por brjod par bya// dang po yi ni tshig rkang ste
236b3(rgyud): dngos grub kun gyi 'bras ste// gcig ma tshad la ma nyi shul// me'i dbus nA dbye bya ste// dbyangs yi gsum par yang dag ldan// dang po ru yig yongasu grags// drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la// lnga pa
236b4(rgyud): lnga pa yang dag ldan// lan gnyis su ni yongs su grags// drod da kyi sde tshan bzhi pa'o// bcwo lnga yis ni brgyan byas te/ bzhi pa'i mthar dang yang dag ldan// lnga pa ru ni yongasu grags//

241a1(rgyud): ni shes pas 'grub pa ste// sngags rnams kun ni the tsom med// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// de med pas kyang dngos grub med// grub mtha' rigs byed mtha' dag ni// snying po gcig tu rab grags

241a5(rgyud): de nas sngags 'di thos pa yis// rang 'dod dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ rdo rje phag mo mchog te bzhag/ rab tu 'bad pas bzlas la bya// rang 'byung rdul ni dmar po yis// yul nas gnye ba
241a6(rgyud): rab tu bcings/ byi la l-i ni gdug pa nyid// dngos grub 'dod pas yongasu bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab/ spos bzangs 'di ni sngags rig go// rdo rje phag mo'i phyag rgya yis// zod pa kha sbyar
241a7(rgyud): bcing bar bya/ skra'i sbyin sreg brjod byas te// 'di ltar mi rtog mnyam bzhag ste// dam tshig rab tu sbyang bar bya// rtag tu phyag rgyas mchod bya ste// rtag tu bza' btung bya ba yin// de ltar sngags shes byas pa yin/ 
241a8(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster// chang dang ba glang sha sgos te/ lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg bya// lha rnams kun dang skar ma dang / klu sngogs sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas// sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur na/ 
241b1(rgyud): phra mo'i mi rnams spos ci dgos// lce'i dri ma so shing dang / de bzhin rang lus dral byas nas// mi dang a la ka ta dang / sbyin sreg dag ni byas pa yis// 'jig rten gsum ni dbang du gyur// rtul ni rab 'byung dmar po dang / 
241b2(rgyud): kha zas drug pa'i bza' ba dang // mi'o skye dang yang dag ldan// lan la cig gis ni gdug pa'i mchog/ rang lus mar ni skyes pa dang / rang gi sgra yis sbyin sreg bya// ni ba lo mi'i shing gi me gsal bas// lan ni gcigs/ 
241b3(rgyud): dbye ba'i mchog/ bya rog sgro'i sbyin sreg bya// s+ho byed me la mnyam gzhag pas// tshwa ba'i mar khu yang dag ldan// skad cig tsam gyis bsadra dang skad// stong phrag dgu ru gang lugs dang / sbyin sreg dag ni bya ba ste// dus ni
241b4(rgyud): ring bas rgyal po thob// gang ga saM sha ni blugs pa dang / mkhas pas dgung lus brgya phrag gis// de'i zla gsum nang na// skad cig tsam gyis dbul po zad// gang gis rtag tu zan pa yi// ske bo kun
241b5(rgyud): la stug par 'gyur// zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gis grub par 'gyur te the tsom med// 'dod pa'i lha 'dra bud med mchog/ myos shing sto ba sten bar bya// 'dod pa shin tu rgyas pa yin// 'jig rten rnams la/ 
241b6(rgyud): brtse bar bya// sa stengs rnamasu dngos grub thob/ bud med bya bas yongasu skor/ dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo dang / dpal ldan khrag mthung mnyam sbyor la// dpa' bo kun gyis phyag byas nas// 'jig rten gsum du dngos grub ste// 
241b7(rgyud): dam tshig spyod pa srung bar bya// dpal ldan khrag mthur mngon par 'byung ba las// dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi sbyin sreg gi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste zhes bya ba bcu pa'o// 
241b8(rgyud): de nas las mchog dam pa dag/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor gnyis med de// rtag tu 'khyud pas gsang mchod bya/ rnal 'byor mas mchod ster 'gyur// sgrub pa pos ni nub kun tu// de nas pho nya mchod par bya/ sha na'i
242a1(rgyud): 6/ daThi/ ba khar gtsug stenyata ci tsam 'dod pa de tsam du// rtags kyi las rung 'gyur ba ste// sa'i dbus nas ra mo dag/ til gyi mar khus btsos nas ni// rkang pa'i 'thil la byug par bya// de nas rtag su gyur pa ste// 
242a2(rgyud): pa ta dang ni ka Tu ke/ re hi ni dang rta'i dri// 'di rnams cha ni mnyam bya ste// arga'i 'o mar rtags nas ni/ ling ka la ni skus byas pa na// ci tsam tshad du 'dod pa ru// de tsam tshad du 'gyur ba yin/ myur du chu ni dron mo yaM sa// 
242a3(rgyud): skus na snga ma kho na bzhin 'gyur// pad ma dkar po ge sa ra dang // sbrang rtsi dag dang rtags nas ni// rtags ni brtan par 'gyur ba yin// pad ma dkar po ge sar dang // til ni dkar po rnams dang no// ma he'i mar ma skol dang
242a4(rgyud): dpa' bo gcig gi rtsad pa dang // sbrang rtsi lhan cig brtags nas ni// lte ba la ni byugs nas ni// de srid rtags ni bgyi la mi 'gyur/ rdul dang yung ba gnyis blangs te// ba'i der bre do ni ci srid bre gang gyur
242a5(rgyud): tsam du// de srid skol ba bya ba yin// de ltar gtung bar bya ba ni/ nyi ma bdun gyis rdzogs par 'gyur// bcud len sbyor ba yang / dag la// dpa' bo yin na gsungasaHyi// spre'u 'i 'chil ma blangs byas

242a7(rgyud): sdig 'dzub ni// la gal g.yon la skor byas te/ gang dang gang la bsams pa de/ mgo ba gos dang kaser dang ni// bza'i bzas dang btung ba dang // de nag thams cad blangs nas ni// sngags pa'i khyim ni yongs
242a8(rgyud): grah+maH/ ta khrag dang rang 'byung cig byas te// sgrub pos rig pa lan bdun bzla sra/ de ni mi la reg byas nas// reg par skyes bu khrag mdzag 'gyur// lan cig bzlas pa'i rig pa 'dis// chus ni yongs su/ 
242b1(rgyud): ba ra mar 'gyur// de ltar sems can gang gang gi// khrag dang khrag chen po dag gi// bskrad pa btag sra tre bcing bar bya// lan bdun bzlas pa dag gi ni// de gzugs 'jig par the tsom med// de dag kun tu grol
242b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// ltas las bud med gzugs bzang dang / rgyal po rnams dpas bdag dag// sgrub pos mchod dang ma mthong dang // thams cad 'gug par 'gyur ba ste// lan bdun mngon par sngags byas na// mda'i shu

242b6(rgyud): pos ji dang me tog dang // spos ni ji ltar gsungs pa dang // de bzhin yang ni zla ba'i gtung / bar me 'greng bas phul bar bya// dri zhim smos kyis gtug pa dbul/ rna la stan cig la ni gnas nas ni// lha la mdzo
242b7(rgyud): par kha bstan nas// sngags pa'i kha ni nub tu ltas/ bsgrub pa po ni phreng ka'i gzugs// zhal bzhi phyag ni bzhi pa dang // thod pa dang ni khA traM khA// mdzes bdag ni bzung bar bya// lag pas zhags pa lcags kyu bzung // 
242b8(rgyud): kha dog nag po 'bar ba che// zod pa'i phreng ba bcings pa dang // stag gi lags pa sham thabs byas// bstan la g.yas rkyang bas gnas// ral ba'i 'acod pan zla khyed brgyan// shin tu 'dzes pa'i rus pas brgyan/ 
243a1(rgyud): gas yang dag sgoms byas nas// de nas phreng ba blang bar bya// stan cig la ni gnas nas ni// dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa yi// me tri'i lus kyis rig pa bzlas// bsgrub pa po'i snying po yis// mtshan ni thog thag
243a2(rgyud): bzlas pa bya// dang po'i mun la ha ha dgod// sbyar ku ya~M ni sgra sgrogs pa// bsgrub po g.yog dang bcas pa yis// de mthong 'jigs par ma bya'o// gnyis pa yi ni thun dag la// na mkha'i steng du 'bab par mthong // mi
243a3(rgyud): g.yo bas ni bzlas pa bya// 'gro ba thams cad za 'dra ba// 'gyur ba'i na zhal dag tu// thun gsum pa la mthong ba yin// lhar bcas lha min mir bcas dang // thun bzhi pa la 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phag mos mchog
243a4(rgyud): ster lag// dpa' bo chen po legaso legs// de yis mchog ni sbyin zhes smra// mchog tu sa 'og 'gro ba dang // ral gri mig sman 'khor lo sbyar// rag gis thamams cad bsgrub pa dang // phyag rgyas
243a5(rgyud): chen po rjes la grub// phyag rgya gang gis sgrub pa kho// dngos grub/ thams cad yun sun tshogs// de ba ldan khrag mabur de mchod bya// phyag rgya yid dang lus dag la// phyag rgya mchod pas mchog ni yod/

243a8(rgyud): dpa'o che// thams cad zhal ni lus gnas mchog/ kun tu lag brkyang ba'i mchog/ kun tu mig dang spyi bo dang // kun tu kha dang sna dang rna ba yin// 'jig rten rnams la skor te gnas// de phyir myur du sgra
243b1(rgyud): par bya// gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni// rang gi lus las nges 'byung ba// 'og gi char ni the tsom med// de ru bsgrub bya la ni gzhag/ rtsa'i dz+wa la~M nas rnal 'byor ma// phyug gi sa bon blangs nas ni// bdag gis lus la

243b3(rgyud): kyisata ta rgyal zhing dra na med rmongs pa dang // rdo rje phag mo shin tu mongs// de'i rtag tu dbang du 'gyur// 'ong zhing rje su 'ong bar 'gyur// de lta nyid du dkod nas ni// bsam ba tan dang na yang dag ldan// bdag nyid chen pos brgya byin dang //

243b5(rgyud): 'byor sngags ni gsungs pa'o// rdul shugs dang ni bzlas pa thalasnang ba bcung zad mi dgod ste// bsam brten 'di yis grub par 'gyur// 'gro ba lta zhing rab tu sbyar// dpal ldan khrag mthung

244a1(rgyud): ni mnyam yid 'ong bar ga zug du thams cadan rnam spangs te// mtshan ldan ni ldan la yis// sa 'khor mchog ni rdzi ba mi na/ dngos grub 'dod pa'i mnyam gzhag pa/ lo nya dag ni mchod par/

247b3(rgyud): les rnyed dka' ba// ma lus l+yaso ba med par grub// kun gyi rgyal por grags pa ste// rtag tu phyag rgya bcing bar bya// 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'bras don du// spun dang slob dpon mchod par bya// de ni gnyis sred
247b4(rgyud): rnam gnas nas// spyan dang bu dang lhan cig tu bde dang sdug snga la kunatu 'byung // de la ye shes gsal mi byed/ sngags rnam su ni 'dzin pa 'am// cang zhing bso ba zab ste/ rtag tu dam tshig yang
247b5(rgyud): dag gsang // sngags ni u la'ang mi sbyin te// man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya// gang gi don du man ngag rnams// dam tshig bsrung la sbyin par bya// rtag tu 'jig rten g.yon pas spyod// rkang pa g.yon pu snon
247b6(rgyud): tu btang // yan lag g.yon pas sgyur bar brtson// g.yon pas 'dzub thor byas la btung // lus kyi g.yonas pa drag nyid mchod// de ru g.yon pas 'khyur pa dang // g.yon pas gus pas mchod par bya// g.yon pa kun
247b7(rgyud): lta ba nyid// de bzhin g.yon pas 'gro byas na// dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster// ci ltar bdag nyid ga yon pas byed// g.yon pas thar pa mtshan nyid ste// cung zad gsung dang ma gsungs pa// dpal khrag mthu
247b8(rgyud): ma yon pas spyod// smra ba sde sa la gnas nas ni// bzlas dang rtul shugs bral bas kyang // g.yon pas dngos grub pa yin// dpal ldan khrag mthur mngon par byung ba las g.yon pa'i mchod pa dang / 
248a1(rgyud): sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor ma yino// lta ba la rengs pa'i cho ga bshad// snying rlung na rtse byin gyis rlog/ de ltar rlung gi g.yo med par// snying gi
248a2(rgyud): rlung gis skrag bcings te// gzugs bzad ma ni myur ba 'od // de nas yi dgas mo sgrub pa// skye gnas la ni gI wang bzhug/ sngags las pad ma'i bdan gnas te// bsam btan gang zhig kun tu brtsam// skyo zhing
248a3(rgyud): kun tu ru 'gyur na// thig le byas na gnas pa dang // rgod cing dges pa nyid dag go// de ltar g+hi wa da dngos grub ni// gsang ba'i rgyud las nges par 'gyur// ldod ros dang ni man 'ashel la// bu mo la ni bzhug par byed// 
248a4(rgyud): sor bzhi zlu ma kha'i mi gnas ni// 'chi ma ra bcas shing rtag tu du// 'di rnams sngags kyis bzlas par gnas// de bzhin snying po nye snying po// rang gi srog bzhin bcas par 'dzin// de ltar dpa' bo dngos
248a5(rgyud): bya chen/ rgyud 'di ni the tsom med// brtsod pa chen po 'byung ba la// m-i minakha dog sngon po'o// rlong gshugs kyis skor/ bar bya// ma jug pa chen po gzhan gyi phye/ rnathams cad rengs ning drag par bya/ 
248a6(rgyud): tshe ga treg yi ge mtshon cha dang // nyon mongs med par sbyar byas te// de ma thag tu thams cad rlag/ de ni mi'i sde kun gyis// gang zhig cung zad mtshon mchog dang // bza' dang dug dang med 'gro// ser ba rlang dang mtshan cha'i
248a7(rgyud): char// dpal khrag mthung mngon par 'byung ba las// gzugs khazang ma lta ba dang // g+hi wang dang // gzhan gyis sde rab tu rigs pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ste// brgya bdun pa'o// 
248a8(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ro langs kyi ni sgrub thams ni// cho ga yongs rdzogs rnal 'byor pa dag/ 'grub par 'gyur te the tsom med/ sha sngags pas ci ltar rnyed pa yi// ro ni nad med rgas pa med// de ni zangs te 'grub
248b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor kun la dngos grub ster/ ba ni dag mo'i 'o ma dang / sran ze 'bras dang bcas ldan pa 'i thug pa rol khu 'di// 'jigs pa med par blugs par byed/ ci sring ron langs kyi bar/ bdag gis ci bgyis zhes ni sgra
248b2(rgyud): ril mig sman dngos grub dang // shing lham rgyal po ral gri dang // sbyor dang dgra bo rlag par byang // rkang dbyug dang ni bcud kyi len// don mchog cig ni byin nas ni// 'gro ba gzhan tu ma yin no// de ltar cho ga'i rim pa dang // mtshan nyid kun
248b3(rgyud): dang bral gyur na// sdig pa dang ni ma dag ldan// dngos grub 'bras bu rlag par 'gyur// tshad mas 'di rnams rtag byas te// snying po ru ni rab tu grags// khyab 'jug drug po dab pa po dang // tshangs pa la sogs pa dag dang // byang chub
248b4(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams dang ni// drang gros sna tshogs pa dag dang/ klu dang rtsi de rnams te// ro sangs nag tu ldi la sogs pa/ rag sha lce 'am mi lab ci// sha za ba ni srin po sog nyi sa nA bawA
248b5(rgyud): bangs// 'jig rte spyong ba lagegs kyi rgya me dam mo dkyil 'khor ma 'byor pa da mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs dang mas dang ni dung skyes ma// gzugs can ma ni slar log ma/ za ba sangs rgyas
248b6(rgyud): dbang dang ni// grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang // gnod ga sbyin po dang gnod sbyin mo// phyogs chen dgar mo u ma la// ci ltar bde ba rtse zhing che/ de nas grub pa'i dpa' bo chen// sngags rnams kyi 'o dag gis// de ltar grub pa'i sngags chen po// rim
248b7(rgyud): g.yis ni rnal 'byor che// dpal ldan khrag mthung bar 'byung ba las// ro langs chen po sgrub pa'i mab seM// lha thams cad la brtse zhing bde ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya/ 
248b8(rgyud): snying po ni sngags sogs bzlas pa la// phreng ba'i rigs dang grangs casha dang // tsho gas rnal 'byor bzlas par bya// shel dang nya phyis su tig dang // du rag sha ni mdzes pa yin// rdo rje'i mig gis dngos grub ster/ tse ti tses ni thaMd brjod/ 
249a1(rgyud): tre pa bar te lung dang dur// tshe ring nad med 'phel pa yin// dbang du byed na zhi don dang // nor 'phel bar ni byed pa yin// byu ru yi ni phreng bas so// rin chen bred pas mdzes pa yin// gser gyi phreng ba dgra dang ni// smrab pos
249a2(rgyud): rin chen phreng bas smras// rgyal po'o don du sngags las bzlas// dpal na chen po nyid tu thob// dngos grub thams cad yod pa dang // sa'i dbang por the tsom med// 'byung po bdag nyid dbang du byed// nor rnams 'gugs par 'gyur ba'o// / 
249a3(rgyud): bya rog sgo yis bskyon pa nyid// bong bu yis ni sdang ba ste// khyi dang rta'i phreng bas so// sgrub pos me tog gis mchod// ro'i sgra'i skud pa dang // bong bu'i sku dang yang dag ldan// skur la 'di yis sdang ba dang // khyi'i sku dang sregs pas ni// 
249a4(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad byed pa yin// gser gyi skud pas bzhi par 'gyur/ yang na ras kyi skud pa ni// gzhon nu ma yis bkal ba yi// gzugs mdzes yong su rdzogs ma dang // gsal zhing dran ldan 'jam par smad
249a5(rgyud): de'i skud pa'i phreng ba yis// grol ba'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// dang ldan/ khrag mthung mchod par bya// spyi bor ri khong can gyi mtshan/ zhi zhing zhal ni bzhi pa ste// 'dod pa kun gyi gzugs bzang ba// dpa' ba
249a6(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba can// sangs rgyas nor bu rtsug pur byas// lag pa khA traM khA ni bzung // mdung dang ral gri'i spyod pan byas// brgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// brgya phyed phreng bas mtshon pa ste// lha chen chung mar bcas pa yid/ steng
249a7(rgyud): nas gdugs ni dkar pos g.yogs/ lha'i dri yis byug pa dang // lha'i me tog lu sa la mchod// phyag ni 'brum phrag dang ldan pa// rnal 'byor chen po lad ma 'khyud// g.yas pa'i phyag na mtshon cha dang // chang gis bkang ba'i thod pa
249a8(rgyud): bzang po g.yas pa phyag na snrums// zla ba phyed pa'i khri 'i 'od// lha'i na za' dag dang ldan// lha'i ga pur gri yis ni// lus la gdug cing byug pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs las// rnga yab kyis ni g.yog/ 
249b1(rgyud): pa yin// rnal/ byor mas ni mnyam par skor// ma la dang ni tum skyes ma// rdo rje lag mo g.yon na gnas/ dpal gyi skyed tshal 'dam na// rtag tu me tog 'bras bu sha ra// 'dod pa'i shing la tsugs mes brgyan// lha dang lha min cho
249b2(rgyud): kyis gnas// 'dod pa 'di yis myos pa ste// skyed mol na dpal mchog ste// sprin gyi phreng ba byed kyis bkab// 'dod pa'i ro'i char pa 'bag/ 'dod pa'i gnas ni mchog yin te// chags dang byams pa kun tu gang // phra
249b3(rgyud): kun dang mnyas par sbyar// dpa' bo dadi yang dag ldan// nags kyi dbus na lAM ba ste// dpal ldan rdo rje dbang phyug phyug/ klu dang gling bu gar la sogs// bzangs tung sgra ni mnyam par rigs// rnga rings kyi n-i sgra la sogs// sa
249b4(rgyud): sgra ni chen po dang // rdza rnga byas pa'i sgra dag dang // pa ta ha nau brdungs pa'i sgra// rol mo kun gyi sgra chen pos// dpal chen btsas par brtse bya ste// kun tu yongasu khengs pa yin// de'i sbyor bas dngos grub 'gyur// ci srid
249b5(rgyud): snying po skyes par du// dpal khrag mthu mngon par 'byung ba las/ zlas pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ mchod pa dang bde ba'i chang mo chele'u zhes bya ba ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas dngos
249b6(rgyud): grub rnal 'byor ched / sbyin sreg la ni rab sgrub pa// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// sbyin sre gnyis med gang lugs kyi// mnye ma med skal ba zangs de'i ni// dang grub kun gyi skye ba ste// sme shi rga dang mya ngan dbul dmyur ba
249b7(rgyud): cad du rlag par 'gyur// rgyal po'i don du sgrub pa pos// stong phrag bcu lo sngags ni bzlas// po nya'i steng du gnas nas ni// sbyin sreg stong phrag lngar bya/ sha chen dang ni ro mar smos// sbyin sreg dgang lugs rim pa yis/ 
249b8(rgyud): dpag tshad 'bum phrag rgya'i bar// g.yog 'khor phun sum 'tshogs par 'gyur// dngos grub chen po rgyal dbang dpal// ma nyams kun tu khyab cing 'gro// sngags pa dus bzhin du ni gson// de la sus kyang gnon mi nus// 
250a1(rgyud): gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor gyis// stong phrag suM bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas/ ba glang sha dang sha chen dang // sde gnang na'i dgang lugs ni// chang dang 'o ma mnyam khar stsol// sbyin theg 'bum phrag
250a2(rgyud): gcig tu bya// gling bdun gyi ni rgyal dbang por// 'di yis dpal chen long spyod 'gyur// ji srid snying po rgyas par du// de nas dngos grub yu chog chen po// brgyad lhag pa'i brgya ni bzlas// rdzas dang cho ga rdzogs pa yis// dag
250a3(rgyud): lugs stong phrag lhag par bya// dpa' bo rtsa ba'i sngags kyi ni// 'di nyid du ni dgang lugs rgya// zla ba rab tu sbyin bya ste// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzhin snyun/ de lta re sbyin sreg cho ga rjod// de nas rab 'phel sngags shes pas/ 
250a4(rgyud): sa stengs kyi ni bdag sgrub 'gyur// skal pa chen po stong phrag gam// de bzhin skal pa stong phrag tu/ ma nyams sngags ba kun tu spyod// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// sgrub po nyi ma re re ru/ 
250a5(rgyud): rtag tu dgang lugs lnga yis mchod// rgyal po yul 'khor rab du 'gyur// bcu'i mi dbang sa bdag dang / ka de ni stobs dang bcas pa kun// de rnams myur du dbang du 'gyur// sna tshogs
250a6(rgyud): bdag nyid nor dang ni// bcus sa ni thams cad dang // gling bdun rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur// rgya 'tsho la dun gyi mthar thug par// longs spyod pa ni gser dang ni bzhin// sum bcu rtsa lnga'i spyan sreg go mo// sa 'og ba
250a7(rgyud): gyi lha ma yin// sgrub pos chung mar bcas pa ni// myur bar dbang du byed par dgyur// de ltar dngos chu bra rnas 'byor che// dpa' kho'i rabang phyug bdag gis gsung // de nas sha'i dgang lugs 'bul// yang na sha che
250a8(rgyud): dag gi'o// chang dang bcas nas snams nas ni// pad ma re re'i sbyin srog bya// sngags pas yu tra ni rnyed phrer 'gyur// sum rgya'i ni tshad kyis no// 'bum phrag gsum gyi sbyin sreg gis// 'dzam bu'i gling ni kun tu thob
250b1(rgyud): 'bum phrag lnga'i dgang lugs kyis// gling btun de'i ldeng spyod 'gyur// rtse zhing dngos grub rgyal dab dzin ci srid snying po rgyas kyi bar// rtag par gsungs pa'i cho gar gnas// skal dman gyis kyang sgrub pos 'gyur// 
250b2(rgyud): de ltar gsungs pa'i spyan sreg ni// sngags dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid che// dra phal khrag mthu po mngon khror 'byung ba las// gling btun gyi ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgya lo po'o// sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ste// nyi shu pa'o// 
250b3(rgyud): de nas sngon spyod kyi las 'dod pas dpa' bro rnams ni ste// tur khrag tsha ba'i mor khu dang // mi'o rus las sbyin sreg bye// tshe ra ma'i me ni rab tu sbyar// de bzhin 'bras bu bul sgra ldan
250b4(rgyud): khro bo rgyas ni skra ni grol// lce ru bu kha ni lho ru bltas/ sngagasas pas gos ni ba nag po byas// nyi ma phyed na me la ni// drag po'u las kyi sbyi na sreg bya dar/ num mo'i mi la sems gcig gi r+pa ci ltar nub mo
250b5(rgyud): bya ba yin// sngags kyi mthar ni ming de sbyar// nus pa bral zhing myur bar 'gugs// stobs chen sde dang bcas pa ni// mngon spyod kyis su ni bsad par bya do/ po nya 'di nyid rnal 'byor bdag/ 'grub par
250b6(rgyud): 'gyur te the tsom med// de nyid bsad pa'i las yin te// phyi nas lha la bzod par gsol// 'o ma byil basbrad rtsi mar// til dang ldan pas dag pa lugs bya// de ltar dpa' blos rab tu bzhi yang dang yang du sngags 'di bzla/ 
250b7(rgyud): re nus skrag pa rab tu bshad// nyi ma bshan la las brtsam ste// bya rog sgro yis sbyin sreg bya// dri chen ro na rgya chen dang // sha bzo'i shing gyi me sbyar te// rlung phyogs kha ni ltasa? te skad// bdag nyid du ni gnas nas ni/ 
250b8(rgyud): zhag btun gyis na the tso med// rnam par snang bar bshad par bya// sngags pas pad ma'i 'dab ma dang // sbrul gyi lpags rjes sel dag ldan// bya rog 'ug pa'i tshad dag dang / sgo byed me ni rab sbyar te/ brgyad lhag tu
252a1(rgyud): bu ste/ rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshad pa// byang ba chub sems dpa' du ma dag/ ci ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni// bdag po nyid du bya ba yin// ci ltar las kyi rjes mthun par// nges brgyud
252a2(rgyud): kyi rnam par dag/ rdo sgrub pa po yis la// nges rjod rgyud kyi las rnams bya// yid kyi dgos pa kun spangs te// gnyis su med pa'i sgom pa nyid// theg pa chen po dam ma mchog/ dngos grub tshe dang / 
252a3(rgyud): ldan par 'gro// de nas phyag mtshan mchog bshad bya// gzugs rang mdog gi cho ga'i rim// yi ge he las nges byung bye// bdag nyid he ru ka som bya// sku lus dkar la drag shul che// 
252a4(rgyud): mche ba rnams rtsigs 'jigs pa ste// spun gsum pa la zha lalnga pa// phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste// thod pa phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// ral pa zla phyed dbul mchi na na sna
252a5(rgyud): tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya drug gi sku lus brgyan// stag gi bags pa gos su sngams// mgo bo donal gyis brgyan po// dkarA dang ser dang de bzhini dmar// ljang
252a6(rgyud): steng zhal sngo ba'o// bshang dang dpa' rang sgeg pa dang // rngam dang ni dang drag ma s+ho// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje rig pas mnyam med gnas// rgyal ba'i lpags pa ma
252a7(rgyud): kyang 'dzin// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu rtsol// thod pa dang ni kha tr-i 'dzin// rdo rje chung phyag mchog ste// g.yas rkyang ba'i gnas pa yis// bdud bzhi po ni zha bas 'gre gtse// 
252a8(rgyud): reg pa'i rdo ldang ba dang // r+ya kar ba'i ma ngas kyi gzugs can la// ldeng dang sor dang dmar ba dang // dkar ba g.yon pa'i zhal gdong ste// steng gi zhal gdong sngo la
252b1(rgyud): skrasgra grol ba ni rnam par nyos/ seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya can// byin pa yi gnyis kyis rab tu 'khril// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can kun gsum shing du dmar ba ste// rdo rje thod dru bar mnyam
252b2(rgyud): bar ldan// dril bu cang te'u gyis rgyan pamadung dang kha traM phyag na sngams// chugase pa chen po me'i 'od// phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams// gtul dka' thams ca drug tu
252b3(rgyud): mdzad cing // sna tshogs sems can gdul bar mdzad/ thugs rdo su nyams ni songasu rdzogs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus snang // sna tshogs pad ma'i dkyil nA bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni
252b4(rgyud): du sa mtshan dag/ ba nabs kyis gnon phyir rnam par skom/ 'khor kun yang ni zhal gsum pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// drag cing zhi bye nyid yin te// rigs gsum
252b5(rgyud): gyis ni che ba'i gzugs// rigs gsum gis ni phyag mtshan 'dzin/ lha mos dbye ba'i gzugs can ni/ dam tshig gnyi su med par sbyor// thams ca dra yi dab gdan
252b6(rgyud): la bzhugs/ g.yas rkyang kha'i zhabras kyis gnon// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// shes rab thabs ni rnam par sgom// 'tshams rnamasu ni bum pa rags
252b7(rgyud): thod pa zla bas yong gang ba// zur rnamasu ni sgo srungs te ci ltar mdog ni chanam su// g.yas khwa'i gnas pa yis/ 'jig rten skyong ba zhabs kyis gnon// thod pa'i phreng ba'i nga
252b8(rgyud): brgyan can// thugs rje khro bas rnam par gnon// dkar mo la sngogs mdog sbyar ba// ci ltar g.yas pa'i zhal rim bzhin// phyag rgya rom pa'ang de bzhin no// lugs 'byung lugs las/ 
253a1(rgyud): zlog par ni// 'khor sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya// rdo rje pad ma'i dbusu yang // rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil ni// rang gi byin brlabs mtshang ba'i mchog
253a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas mu stegs can la swa// 'di ni rab tu gas ba ste// bla ma'i ngag la gnas pa yin// rnal 'byor ma'i dran yin no// gnas la sregs pa'i rim pa ni// sum bcu rtsa btsu na rje pA dgod
253a3(rgyud): shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba yin// sra bcu po'i mchog kyang 'gugs// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don// 'di ni dri med sgom mchog/ nges par
253a4(rgyud): brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las// bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge las skyed pa'i rang bzhin// byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste// // drug bsurtsa bdun pa'o// 
253a5(rgyud): de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba// bdag nyid cho ga'i sgom pa'i rim// ma ma ki dang spun dang ni// lha mo/ sgrol ma gos dkar mo// 'od zer can dang 'jam pa la// lha mo
253a6(rgyud): skul byed pa 'dzin ma// rang gi sa bon las byung ba// phyag bcu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum pa la g.yas rkyang zhugs// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyis zhug
253a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil mo krung gis gnas// rig byed bzhi'i zhal gdong ste/ phyogs kyi gos can riji ga dan// skra grol gyi la 'jigs pa skye/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can
253a8(rgyud): bas ltas shing thugs rje'i nyams// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// de nyid ye shesau mchog las byung // so so yang dge sbyor ba'i bdag/ de nyid ye shes gdon mi za// khro bo wA
253b1(rgyud): gzugs can ni// dpa lo ngang nyid las byung ba// khro mchog mkha' 'gro 'byung ba yang // gos pa med par ldan mnyam pa'i ro/ bdag po nyid du sbyar bar bya// bdag nyid sgom pa nyid srin no// gan// 
253b2(rgyud): par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// sgom zhing rnam par sgom par bya// khra ba'i khro bo rdo rje can// snying bka'i pad ma'i dbus bu ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs rje can// 'di ni nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing nan
253b3(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems// 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas// 'di nyid kyis ni mchod pa nyid// mchod 'os thams car mchod pa yin/ gang zhig 'di la rtag lha ga
253b4(rgyud): de ni rgyal ba'i mchod pa gzhing // nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis// de rnal 'byor rdo rje can tu 'dod// de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis// yod 'dod rnams kyi lus la kho don mchod
253b5(rgyud): pa lnga yis sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob paragang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod// dngos med bzhi la dgod pa yis// 
253b6(rgyud): lha'i gzugasu sgoms pa yis// mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po che ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub po'o// gsang sngags de nyid snyan pa yis// bstan pa tsam du legs byung badzin/ 
253b7(rgyud): rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam yang dag skyes pa na// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// nyi shu rtsa bzhir che ba yi// gAs sngogs 'di nyid la gnas te// de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid// 
253b8(rgyud): skyo bya de nyid can gyis ma ni// gal te de nyid me du gyur na// de yi 'khrul pa ci zhi bya// 'on te de nyid ldan gyur na// de la 'khrul pa ci zhing yod// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas mchog rnams/ 
254a1(rgyud): rten pas dri ma med par 'gyur// yang na mi nub bdag med pa'i// mi yi gnas ni skrag par bya// nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni/ sems can bsam pa'i dbang bgyis te// bsam btan
254a2(rgyud): las gzhan bde med phyir// de bas bsam btan mchog la gzhol// rnal 'byor la ni phyir rol 'khor// ngo yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur// de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni// rnal 'byor
254a3(rgyud): rol pas gnas pa la// dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can// rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni/ thugs rje thugs rdungs ring po nas// rdo rje rnal 'byor can dag gzigs// de rnams dgos pas/ 
254a4(rgyud): dngos grub mchog/ ci 'dod pas ni rtsol bar 'gyur// de ni rje btsun ye shes kyang // rab tu 'bad de sgrub pabya// sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan// spyod dang brtul zhugs
254a5(rgyud): dpyad pa yi// dpyod dang brtol zhugs 'dir spongs la// de nyid rtul zhugs lar dga' kyang // gong yang ru ba'i zas gnas pa// rnam pa de byes rtul zhugs can// bsam
254a6(rgyud): gtan zas mchog gnol 'gyur bas// smon pa'i dpyod pas gnas bar gis// gcer bu 'am yang na gcer bu yin// gang yang ci lta de lta bu// rang gis lhag pa'i ltar dmigs pa
254a7(rgyud): cod gcig bu rnam par bsam/ lkugs pa'i dngos por khas gyur pas gazla drug tsam gyis nges par ni// rnal 'byor can gyis te bstan nas// rnal 'byor chen po 'di gas pa 'gyur
254a8(rgyud): zhes sgron ma mchog mthong na// rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te/ na pad ma 'i 'byung gnas rab dga' ra// ngang pa'i tshogs 'dus ci bzhin no// mig la zul 'khan ltar 'jig cen/ 
254b1(rgyud): 'gro kun don ni byed pa kho// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni// mngon gyur 'di la the tsom med/ spyod pa 'di la nges par ni// ci skad bshad la der 'gyur bas// sems ni dag par gyis cig ces// / 
254b2(rgyud): sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs// gang gis rmad byung snying rjer ldan// gang gis gsungs pa de nyid 'gyur// rdo rje bdag lo'i sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni snying khar brjod// 
254b3(rgyud): snying khar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor// thugs kyi rdo rje nang sbyar te// gzhan yang rdo rje dgod par bya// chos kyi dbyingasu rnam par la rtog/ rang gi na mkhar sbyar nas su// gzi brjod gzugs ni 'dzin par snyam
254b4(rgyud): gang gi chos kyi yid dgod pa// rang dang rang bzhin dri ma med// rang ni sgom pa'i sbyor ba yi// rang gi chos kyi yi ge sgom// gzi brjod gzugs ni 'bade bas bde ba gtogs par gyis/ 
254b5(rgyud): gzhan gyi gzugs kyis sgom pa la// yid kyi gti mug grubapa yin// dbang po gzhan ma sgom par bya// bde babade la rnam par thar// gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya// 
254b6(rgyud): nges par brjod pa'i rgyu nga bla ma las// bdag tu 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste// / drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
254b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis/ gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba 'di// gsungaso// / rang dbang rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni// namamakha' lta bur dri ma med/ stong nyid ye shes rje
254b8(rgyud): yis// stong nyid ye shes brtag tu sgom// legs so bya ba rnams byin nas// brgyur sked pa'i sbyor ba las // le gso le gso ye shes che// nges par brjod pa mchog ga mchog
255a1(rgyud): legs so rdo tshul drag go// sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin rab// leg so gnyis med sbyor ba ni// mchog dang mchog ni grub pa la// log so zhes par nges par sbyor// 'do
255a2(rgyud): ba med pa'i sgom pa ni// ligaso thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon// theg pa chen po ston pa 'di// gnyis meng ye shes mchog dang ni/ man ngag thod pa'i dang byo ste// legs so rdo rje bla ma kun// 
255a3(rgyud): de brten pa'i rnal 'byor ma// leg so 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor lo// dngos grub bla na med par phyin// rdzogs te bcang mi gsung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ 
255a4(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyis// khro bos rdo rje nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla na med pa// mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa// bcom ldan 'das
255a5(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stong do// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sadz+nyA na ka ra dang // rmats+tshal dge slong rig pa'i gzhon nus sgyur tsong zhus te gratan la
255a6(rgyud): pa'o// // slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra bA ka ra dang // dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis btsos nas gtan la phab pa'o// yon mchod 'khor bcas dpal bde mchog song ba 'dzin par gyur cig/ seMs can

255a8(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ 'gyu h+ya ta na tra ra tsa// bod skad du// dpal gsang ba gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// 
255b1(rgyud): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang // thugs btsun mo'i ba ga la snyoms
255b2(rgyud): par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pas/ g.yon phyogs nas sbyor ba lan gsum byas te// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas// 'di skad ces gsol tod/ kyi
255b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba zhes ni ji ltar lags// de yi dpyod pa na ji ltar legs// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lhags/ de'i rgyal po ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ gsang ba
255b4(rgyud): zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// dang po bum dpung dang 'khrel pa yi// skye pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te// rten dang rten pa'i sgom pa sa ni/ snod bcud bzung 'dzin rnam rtog pa// spang phyir nga yis gsungs pa
255b5(rgyud): yin/ de'i khyad par dgongs pa'i don// dang po stong pa nyid la srohA/ rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsung // rten dang rten pa bye brag las// dang po rten gyi dgongs pa yang rkyethugs ka'i yi ge hUM las
255b6(rgyud): ni/ mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// kha dog nag po e 'bros las// gru gsum rgya chen bting rings thos man/ gru gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dus gsum 'joms pa dgongs pa'i don// logs ni
255b7(rgyud): rnam pa gsum yin te/ lus ngag yid gsum las byung ba'i// mi dge bcu 'joms dgongs pa'i don// chos kyi sku ni dri med kyis// rang bzhin gyis ni kun la khyab// de phyir rgya chen dgongs pa'i don// 'phags pa/ 
255b8(rgyud): nyan thos rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // chos kun rtogs pa ma yin pas// gting rings pa ru dgongs par bshad// de nas thugs ka'i hU~M las kyang // hUM spros pa lus rdo rjer 'gyur// rdo rje
256a1(rgyud): gur du gyur pa yang // dang po'i tshe'i bar chod dang / gnyis pa thar pa'i bar chod te/ bgegs ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// phyi'i bgegs dang nang gi bgegs// phyi yis tshe yi bar chod byed// 
256a2(rgyud): nang gis thar pa'i bar chod byed// bar chod rnam pa gnyis bsrungs pa// rdo rje gur gyi dgongs pa'i don// yang las byung ba'i gong dang 'dra// dbyings ni zla gam lta bu ste// rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang
256a3(rgyud): mi rtag pa ni skye ba dang // dbang du byed pa dbang gi don// ba dan bzhi'i dgongs pa yang // chos rnams dus gsum gnas pa yi// dgongs pa yin pa nga yis gsungs// ram las me'i dkyil 'khor ni// 
256a4(rgyud): zur gsum drag po dgongs pa yin// rdo rje rtse gsum sku gsudon// ba~M las chu'i dkyil 'khor te// zlum po spros pa bzhin du gsungs// bum pas chos sku'i yan lag bzhin// lam
256a5(rgyud): las gser gyi sa gzhi ste/ gru bzhi rgyas pa'i rang bzhin kyis// rdo rje rtse lnga ye shes lnga// de steng ri rab rtse mo brgyad// rnam thar brgyad kyi dgongs pa yin// snod bcud rnam
256a6(rgyud): rtog mi mang ba'i rtag dur khyod brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yon// go rims bzhin du dgongs par byed// de re'i bye brag rtog kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// gnyen po'i stobs ni yongs su rgyas// 
256a7(rgyud): shing ni rim bzhin rtag tu dgod// rtag rtog mi dge bcu'i don// 'joms pa'i rtags su chos skyong dgod// 'dod pa gas zhe sdang ma rig pa// bdug pa 'joms shing klu brgyad dgod// thugs rje
256a8(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa'i// gzugs brnyan gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis// lus ngag yid kyi sems can gyis// don mdzad phyir na char sprin dgod// nang dang gsang ba de bzhin no// de bzhin mthar thug zhi ba la/ 
256b1(rgyud): snyan nas rgyud pa shes par bya// de nas nang du gzhal yas khang // bruM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad te// rtsibs brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyis dngos// yongs su gyur pa rnam snang sku// phyi nas lta bas nang du gsal
256b2(rgyud): de bzhin nas phyi ge sa la ba// thams cad gcig tu snang ba'i don// rin chen sna lnga sku'i don// kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga'i don// khru bzhi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir gsungs// logs bzhi bsdu bu'i dngos po ste/ 
256b3(rgyud): sgo bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// ga ba brgyad ni rnam thar brgyad// bdud bzhi ye shes bzhi'i don// ta ra na la sogs pa kun// stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs// de nas snam bu bdag rnams
256b4(rgyud): ninya pad ma'i sa bon dbyangs las skyes// 'dod chags la stsogs nyon mongs kyis// ma gos rtags su pad ma'i gdan/ do steng nyi ma zla ba ste// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi bda'/ 
256b5(rgyud): dang po'i ro ni nga bdag gam// rnam rtog min phyir gsungs pa yin// yan lag bzhi ldan gtso bo'i don// 'khor lo re re gdan du sbyin// gtso bo'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir// dgos pa'i don dang / 
256b6(rgyud): bcas pa yi// rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa yi// de nas lha rnams smyos pa ni// skye bo bzhi'i tshul yin te// skad cig las 'byung bsdus pa'i tshul// dper na chu rlung las ni nya// rkyen las skyes pa dod bsher
256b7(rgyud): tshul tedaper na nyi ma pad ma bzhin// skye sgro bzhir bsdug sgong skyes tshul// dper na rdo la zangs bzhin no// sbyor ba las skyes mngal skyes tshul// ya ra la sreg cing mar la bso// dper na spra tshil las ni gzugs
256b8(rgyud): pho brang rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs// rjes su skyes pa he ru ka/ dbang skur bcom ldan mi skyod pa// bstod pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan yin// bdud rtsi myang ba'i 'od dpag med// mchod pa don yod grub pa yin// 
257a1(rgyud): yan lag las byung ba yi// dngos grub don ni khyad par 'phags// de nas bzlas pa sgom pa dang // dbang po rab 'bring tha ma ste// rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa ste// bzlas pa yis ni bya bar gsungs/ 
257a2(rgyud): 'bring gis spyod pa yab yin// tha ma dbu ma'i spyan la 'jug/ dbus ma'i spyan la rtag gyur na// sum bcu rtsa bdun rdzogs par sgo// 'bring gis kyang ni de bzhin te// gnas pa rtswa dang g.yo ba rlung // dkod pa sems
257a3(rgyud): dang dman pa dbyings// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug chos dang yan lag bdun// 'di ni bstan pa shin du zab// gong du bstan pa thams cad kyang // rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya// re re la yang bzhi bzhi
257a4(rgyud): ste/ du ba'i tshul ni shin du zab// phyi dang nang gi sngags kyi don// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyi'i don// phyir las ltos na nang yin te// de nyid gsang ba gsang ba'i don// las su rung ba mthA
257a5(rgyud): phyin don// nang du dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ni// phung po khamasadang skye mched ning // de yi lha ru byin brlabs pa// lA dang drug la sum bcu bdun// g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo srogs
257a6(rgyud): pabla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// sum bcu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba// yongs su ma rdzogs ji ltar lags// skyed pa zhes ni ji ltar lags// de yi rim pa ji ltar lags// gzhan

258a1(rgyud): phung srogs rnam snang la srogs pa'i// brnyas pa rnyog ge skam po yin// lta spyod zung du 'jug pa yang // glang chen bzhengs nas mnyam par bzhengs// glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam pa bzhugs

259a1(rgyud): 'og ga sod/ byed dru su 'dod pas kyi na brjod dumardza na nas pa snos su rdzogs pa zlog/ na ras rgya ma po las/ dgapar 'gyur ci rnas pag

259a4(rgyud): bdud rtsi yang // nyams su myong bar byed pa ste// de bzhin spros byas sngal sa// rten rnams spros med me drug pa byung / rgyu gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs/ mtshan ma lnga 'am ro brgyu 'am/ 
259a5(rgyud): sa brgyad non dang mngon shes lnga// las kyi phyag rgya yongs su spangs/ ye shes phyag rgya las gnas shing // phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa// 'di ni gang zag mchog yin te// 'di'i drug pa
259a6(rgyud): 'dzin par bshad// 'dod chags zhes pa 'khor ba ste// rnam dag mya ngan 'das par gsungs// de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang // gsang ba'i dbang 'brel pa ste// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo'i don//
