259a8(rgyud): mdo rab tu sor mo'i tshad// bcu tshad bzhi dang brgyad yin pa// sor go sum la ni 'khor lo re/ sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo bzhin// dbang gis lha mo gnas kyi 'khor lo la// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par
259b1(rgyud): tshangs mdo mo la gzhal rlung // gsor gsum sor bzhi mkhas pas rtag/ gnas gsum gsang ba'i gnas yin te// de bzhin gnas gsum rim pa sted/ sor ba ni rta mgrin gnas yin te/ gsor
259b2(rgyud): brgyad gsang ba bde skyong gnas/ rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor ma// lus kyi rten gyi bye brag las// sor mo bzhi bcu brgyad nyid las// brgyad ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gnas/ na bzhi las ni
259b3(rgyud): 'khor lo gzhon/ bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// thams cad sgal tshigs dbug gu ste// phyi dang nang du mkhas par brtan// 'khor lo yang rnam pa gnyis// dang po 'khor lo gnyis pa rtswa
259b4(rgyud): rkyen dang gsang ba rang bzhin dang // dbang dang rnam pa bzhin du gsungs// rkyen la gnyis te gsang ba bzhi/ rang bzhin drug bcu gsang ba gnyis/ tsan d+ha li ni nyi shu bzhi
259b5(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi ru sbas pa ste// tshogs nang bla ma mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs// man ngag gzhan la sel zhing sbyar la dga'// 'dod chags spyod phyir sgras spyod pa'i don
259b6(rgyud): gza ba'i don la rgyab kyis phyogs shing skur pa 'debs// gsang ga sngags par du gcod cing gzhan la gsher/ 'di ni mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye/ sangs rgyas stong deng rdzogs tshe'i tshad/ 
259b7(rgyud): 'di la rnam pa thams ca ga/ ngamis smras par ma gsungs so// de phyir rgyud gzhan du ni sras/ rgyad 'dir nga yis rgyas par bshad // sum+ba bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas g.yoran gnas// drug
259b8(rgyud): rgya bani grangs su sras// sum bcu rtsa gnyis las ni drung / drug cug ma su smos pa yin/ gsum bcu cu gnyis phyogs dang 'tshams da brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o// skye bcug 'tsha
260a1(rgyud): ngos sbas// gsang ba bde byor bde baR+Sha sbas// bcu drug la ni zud 'gyur ba/ brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa yin/ bcu drug pa ni g.yas g.yon
260a2(rgyud): lasum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// bcu drug las ni bzhi bzhir 'gyur/ nga ge drug bcu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas// mgrin pa long spyod 'khor lor ru/ kA ro drug las
260a3(rgyud): long spyod pasaro mahAlong spyod 'khor lor sbas// rta mgrin 'khor lo mgrin par sbasate9kra brgyad pa ga yas g.yon cha gnyis la// bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin// brgyad
260a4(rgyud): la g.yas g.yon steng 'og pazhi// sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su smras// brgyad las phyogs 'tshams brgyad kyi cha// drug bcu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas// tshangs
260a5(rgyud): mdo de ni me la sbas/ snying ka chos kyi 'khor lo ru chos kun rig pas rig pa sbas/ 'drug bcu las ni zung // sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas
260a6(rgyud): drug bcu rtsa bzhi las ni sa zhi// drug bcu grangs su sbas pa yin// drug bcu rtsa lnga las ni brgyad// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas go yi// gzhang ka rlung ni rlung la spras// gsang ba cum
260a7(rgyud): mau d+hum mA~M sngas// 'khor lo re la 'khor lo bzhi// phyi rol 'phrog gi rnam par 'khyud// ke chu dang chu dran chubo rnams// sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed kyang // rgya mtsho chen por ro gcig 'gyur/ 
260a8(rgyud): lte ba 'khor lo bde chen sku// de bzhin mtshan dang dpe' byed ldan// snying ka chos kyi sku yin te// rnam thar la sogs de bzhin te// mgrin pa longs spyod de dang 'dra// bde ba sprul pa de
260b1(rgyud): bzhin te/ mtshan rnams steng la stong pa 'og dang po bde chen kha sbyor yin// stong po khe sbyor 'og yin te// bde chen kha spyod gnyis pa yin// gzhan ni zhal nas shes par bya// stobs bcu
260b2(rgyud): rnam dag kha sbyor bcu/ garlung ni sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid// rtsa drug dbus kyi rang bzhin gang // me ni gos kar rang bzhin te// zung rtsa gsum ni dod kyis kang // rang bzhin gyis ni gnas pa la// brgyad dang lnga'i mtshan
260b3(rgyud): nyid la/ brgyad la dbyangs kyi rgyal po brgyad// lnga la ka li dang po lnga// rig pa'i yi ni pho brang mtha'// rta mgrin dbyangs ni g.yas dngas// s+ya g+hanyis mtha' gzhag 'dab gu yin// ma ning bzhi dang
260b4(rgyud): ya gnyis dbus// byang chub sum bcu rtsa bdun yin// de nas rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid kyang / phyi'i stong phrag bdun bcu gnyi sha la gnas nas tshig skyed byed/ nang gi brgyad
260b5(rgyud): nyi shu ni// tshig la gnas nas rkang par byed// gsang ba sum bcu rtsa bdun yin/ rus par gnas nas dga' bar bskyed// de kho na yi rtsa gsum ni// gsang bar
260b6(rgyud): gnas shing bde bar skyod// khang pa stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis// khang pa re l+ya khang po 'bum// khang pa der gnas srid pu rigagastong phrag bdun bcu rtswa gnyis ste// grangs ni 'bum du shes par
260b7(rgyud): bya nyi nang dang gsang ba'i rtsa lnga yang // srid bu'i grangs rigs ni grangs su gsungs// de kho na ya~M rtsa gsum la// 'dod chags skyed pa'i srid bu drag/ nyin mo nub mo 'tshams dang gsum// 
260b8(rgyud): dgu ru mkhris pas shes par byA// rtswa der gnas pa'i ga bur dgu/ bdud rtsi sbyor ba las byung ba// bdud rtsi la sogs gang du gsungs// ya ma las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // ram las me yi
261a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsam// de steng a las ka pa la/ pang las pad ma 'dab ma brgyad bsam// mang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de ru sha la sogs pa dgod// rtswa ba'i steng du sor bzhi
261a2(rgyud): maH mtho gang tsam du bsam pa ni// yi ge gong zlog sgom par bya// sngon po dmar mo dkar po dang // hUM las gyur pa rdo rje bsam// de steng yi ge maM bsam la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de ru bsam// 'di ni
261a3(rgyud): bdud rtsi kha sbyor ro// sha lnga la ni gnan du 'gyur// lcags kyu bdud rtsi lnga ru 'gyur// las kyi me yis bus pa ste// zla ba gtso bo la sogs zhu// tha mal ba'i bdud rtsi yin// yi ge gsum dang nyi ma zhud
261a4(rgyud): lha yi bdud rtsi zhes ni bya// 'od zer gis ni ba gug ye shes kyi// bdud rtsi yin par nga yis gsungs// las gsum skor ba sku gsung thugs// 'di ni byin brlabs rnal 'byor ro// 
261a5(rgyud): de nas bdud rtsi me ngan dang mchog mchod pa'i rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs// de nas rol pa'i rnal 'byor te/ g.yas g.yon dgongs pa shes par bya// de nas zhu ba'i rnal 'byor/ 
261a6(rgyud): ba sa ma// nyams pa'i rlung dang rdum mo'i mes// ye shes lnga zho'i ngo bor 'gyur// kha cig mi skyod rnam snang te// sha'i mkha' 'gro mnyam nyid yin// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod// cha gcig rlung khros pa ste/ 
261a7(rgyud): 'khris pa bad kan la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rtsi ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin// so sor kun du rtog pas mchod// cha gcig rang bzhin med pa ste// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro
261a8(rgyud): mchod par bya// rlung ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// rtswa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin// ga pur sha za'i mkha' 'gro yin// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro yin// gzhan yang rtsa la sogs pa yi// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi
261b1(rgyud): bye brag kun// go rims bzhin du shes par bya// sku ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// gsung ni sha za mkha' 'gro'o// thugs ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro yin// gzhan yang 'khor
261b2(rgyud): dbus gnas ni// mkha' 'gro bye brag shes par bya/ dga' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// mchog dga' sha ba'i mkha' 'gro'o// rang bzhin dga' ba ye shes te// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro na// dpa' bo zlas
261b3(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ mkha' 'gro las ni nyi ma'o// tsan d+han li ni nyi shu bzhi// smras pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi ru bsdu// bde chen longs spyod 'khor lor bsdu// long spyod gong du bsdu ba'i rim pa yang // 
261b4(rgyud): thig sa las ni mams cad 'dus dper dkyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byed/ nyi ma 'odra bar phyogs su cu du mar spong // du ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gcig tu bsdu/ da por na 'khor mos sbyar ba'i rnam
261b5(rgyud): gdugs// shing gi 'phrul 'khor sbyor ba ji bzhin no// gnyis ka chos kyi 'khor lor bsdus kyang // nyi ma zla dkyil tsan ka'i tshad// de yi dus nya yung kar tshad// sngags kyi phreng
261b6(rgyud): ba spu'i nyag ma tsam gyis ni// g.yas skor g.yon skor oM li ka li sbrul lhur 'khyil// de dge thig le'i rnal 'byorate// 'di la sems can bad+h+wan gyur na// de nas 'phra mo'i rnam
261b7(rgyud): 'byor sgom// zla ba a li ka li la// a li nyi ma la thim nas// nyi ma la zhabs skyed nyi mau la thim bsam// zhabs skyed la sogs par thim/ yan lag lnga ni ye shes lnga/ de ni 'phra mo'i rnal
261b8(rgyud): 'byor te// de nas te 'phra mo la sems ni rim par sgom pa'o// de nas rang gi ye shes te/ chos kun stong par ro gcig pa'o// gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor dang // sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnyis// 'bar dang ni 'dzag
262a1(rgyud): pa'i tshul// bla ma'i zhal la shes par bya'o// phyi'i rnal 'byor la sogs te// nang ni rnam rtog srog gi rlung // srog la gnyis 'gags dbu ma ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas// sor bzhi
262a2(rgyud): nas ni rtse gsum gcig/ dbus 'gags pa'i gnas pa yi// dang po de ru bzung bar bya// de nas sprul pa'i gnas su bzung // yang na 'grang bar shes par bya// shes rab ye shes dang bral ba'i// dga'
262a3(rgyud): ba mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// gzhang ka g.yeng ba ba spu ldang // dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa// bcu gnyis rang bzhin yin par gsungs// za pa rgyun chad bral bas dga'// de yi dmigs gzugs sku
262a4(rgyud): gnyis// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba rnams// byang chub sems rgyud mi rtog snyam// mchog dga' mi dmigs nyi shu ldan/ gsang ba'i nor bu yongs su gang // lhan cig skyes dga' mi dmigs
262a5(rgyud): pachos kyi sku ni yin par gsungs// bde ba rgyun chadabral bas dga'// de yi dmigs pa gzugs sku gnyis// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba rnams// yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba'i
262a6(rgyud): dngos// dgongs dang gnas pa'i rim pa'o// skar ma'i tshogs dang de ltar du mar 'phros mod kyang // nyi ma zla ba lta bu bzung du 'jug/ nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung zhugs kyang // sgra gcan lta bu gnyis su med pa'o// 
262a7(rgyud): rdorje snying po yang zhus pa// skar ma'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// byang chub sum bcu rtsa bdun ni// dgu'i khyad par spros pa'o// sku gsung dang ni ye shes lnga// 'bras bu'i khyud
262a8(rgyud): par spros pa'o// rgyu rnams bdun du spros pa dang // 'bras bu gsum du bsdu ba'o// rgyu rnams 'bras bu la thim ste// 'bras bu gnyis su sgom par bya// ros kun sems kyi ngo bo ste// sems ni stong pa'i ngo bo yin
262b1(rgyud): rnam po ci spong ra gcig pa'o// 'dzin thang da med dkyis// 'dod dgas rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'dod chags sgra yi phyag rgyas// phyag rgya chen po ye shes lnga/ 'dis tshig ces dang mas phyag rgyad
262b2(rgyud): ni bde ba chen po ste/ skyed dang rdzogs dang rang bzhin bral// bde chem 'khor lo rnam pa gsum// gsang ba'i sna rtse a la gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gang yin pa// rig pa la sogs de bzhin ted dag
262b3(rgyud): ba bde skyongs sa la gnas/ rang bzhin bde chen 'khor lo ste// bde ba chen po ro gang ste// til dang til mar ji bzhin te// dper na shing ni bcad pa las// 'o ma 'dzag pa ji bzhin no// bde ba chen po de nyid
262b4(rgyud): lasaHskra'i rtse mo brgya stong dang / khri dang 'bum ni rnam pa ste/ dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o// gsum pa klog gi rnam pa ste// bzhi pa mar me lta bu'o// de
262b5(rgyud): kun gyi rim pa yi// sprul pa la sogs rim pa bzhin da/ sprin gyi rnam pa skyed pa ni// a li skye ba'i mtshan ma yin// marame lta bu 'dzin pa yi// 'di'i mtshan mar gsungs pa yin// lnga
262b6(rgyud): nam mkha' lta bu ni// gnyis su med par bar dro yi// mtshan ma stong par shes par bya// gzhan yang 'dar ma la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes byar bya// shes rab ye shes 'brel pa ste// dga' ba
262b7(rgyud): bzhi'i mtshan nyid kyang // gzhang ka g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang // lus 'dar dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// gsang ba'i rdo rje rtswa ldom nas// byang chub sems su bde ba snyam// mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo ste// rdo rje 'am pad
262b8(rgyud): ma 'gas pa snyam// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo yin// bde ba rgyun chad bde ba snyam// bral ba dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// 'di rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // byang chub chen po la sogs pa// gong du gsungs par
263a1(rgyud): don ni 'chang po po// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum/ bde chen 'khor lo'i rgyu'i rgyud// gsang ba'i sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud// gsang ba bde skyong 'bras bu'i rgyudang 'bum pa rgyu'i rgyud
263a2(rgyud): gsungs// gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud yin te// shes par bya// dga' ba'i snang ba zhes bya ste// mchod dga' snang ba mchod pa yin/ rab tu dga' ba thob snang ba thob// lhan cig skyes pa 'od gsal lo// 
263a3(rgyud): ye shes bzhi'i rang bzhin ste// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i pho nya yin// rags pa'i bdud bzhi gsang ba 'joms// 'phra ba bdud bzhi rang bzhin gyi// 'khor lo bzhi ru 'joms pa yin// 'khor lo la rten
263a4(rgyud): dga' ba bzhi// de nyid ye shes bzhi ru snang // de phyir bdud zhi bzhi 'joms pa yin// 'dod chags la rten dug gsum ni// nyon mongs pa'i dug yin// 'dod chags pa bcu gnyis
263a5(rgyud): yin/ gsang ba bde skyong nyon mongs 'joms// kha dogadabyibs ni phung po'i bdud// rta mgrin 'khor lo phung po 'joms// spobs pa bzhi ni lha'i bdud// rig pa'i 'khor lor
263a6(rgyud): lha bdud 'joms// skye dang bcas pa'i 'chi ba ste// gsang ba skye med mdze bdud 'joms// kau 'phra ba'i bdud 'joms de dang 'dra// skad cig bzhi dang sde pa bzhi// bzang po bzhi dang bden pa bzhi// 'byung ba bzhi/ 
263a7(rgyud): dang yul bzhi dang // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la sogs pa// ye shes chen po 'di nyid las// khyad par gzhan ni mi 'byung ste// rnam par rtogs pa'i bye brag las// gzhan la log pa'i dbye brag dang // gzhan
263a8(rgyud): la mos pa'i bye brag dang // tshul chos du ma'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin// dbang gsum dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste// 'di yis thams cad pa bA gsung/ 
263b1(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dge slong dbang gsungs ji ltar lags// de yi bya ba ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// dge slong la sogs rnam pa gsum// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// 
263b2(rgyud): rigs 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong te// tshig dang bzhi dang bcur ldan pa// nyis brgya lnga bcu'i go rims kyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong so sor thar pa yin// gtong dang gtong ba chen po dang / 
263b3(rgyud): shin du gtong dang rnam par gtor// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yin// dkyil 'khor 'jug pa dge ba yin// de la gnas pa bsnyen gnas yin// bdun dang ldan shing
263b4(rgyud): chen po yin// bum pa'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de bsnyen pa dge bsnyen yin// de phyir bdun ldan chen po yin// gsang ba dbang gi dge ba ste// de'i tshul ldan dge tshul yin// bdun dang ldan
263b5(rgyud): pa chen po yin// dge ba shes 'bru ye shes yin// de nyid slob dge slob yin// theg pa gsum ni nges 'byung zhing // rigs 'dzin theg pa 'bras nas// 'bras bu 'dir phyir mi ldog
263b6(rgyud): pa gsum yin te// rnam par smin dang 'khor ba dang // spong ba gsum ni 'khor ba yin// theg pa gsum ni nges 'byung la/ rigs 'dzin theg pa 'bras bu nas// 'bras bu 'dir gnas rnal 'byor pa// khyim pa 'am
263b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i cha// lugs gsum du ni gnas pa dang // dbang skur rab gnas la spogs bya// theg gsum phyi'i cha lugs kyis// gsang ba'i spyod par cha lugs te// dper na rdol zas su 'gyur// zangs las
263b8(rgyud): gseram gyi rnam pa'o// zangs kyi dus na rdo med te// gser du 'gyur bas rdo mi snang // ga rigs 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// gnyis po snang ba nyid du ni/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsu
264a1(rgyud): te/ de nas gsang ba bzhi po ni// bzhi po'i dbang du 'brel pa yi// rtag tu g.yeng ba'i sems 'di nyid// gzugs la stsogs pa bgug gnas yis// sgom bya lhan cig bcas pa dang / 
264a2(rgyud): dbang du bcas te sgom par bya// bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yin// dmigs thams cad rnam gsal te// sems nyid bsam du med pas ni/ cir yang bsam par mi bya'o// sems nyid stong par bcug nas
264a3(rgyud): stong pa sems su rab bcug nas// stong dang mi stong la spogs pa'i// rtog pa bcom pas mkha' ltar 'gyur// rten yod ma yin rten pa med// dpe med gnas kyang yod ma yin// de nyid lnga pa rdzogs pa
264a4(rgyud): ste/ lhan cig skyes nyis med rig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// khrims tshul gar dang phyag rgya rnams// sgyu ma tsam du ma shes par// phyag rgya chen por ya
264a5(rgyud): dag sgom// dur khrod chen po grags pa can// snying rje med cing na khrag za// de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyi nang spras dang mthar thug gi/ dkyil 'khor du bzhugs da'ang mnos nas
264a6(rgyud): sgom dang bzlas pa la sogs med// gsang sngags bar du gcod cing gzho// rnal 'byor kun la skur pa 'debs// rdo rje spun la 'tshig cing smod pa dang / rdza ba yan lag dam tshig nyams// bla ma la smod pa'i rnam smin
264a7(rgyud): gyis ta mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo yi// rtsa ba 'khor lo'i don ma gtogs/ lcags kyi gri so bcu drug la// 'dzug pa ru ni nga yis bshad// ga pa'i gsang ba ma gtogs pa/ 
264a8(rgyud): sbas pa mi dmigs rnam gsum gyi// 'thur du sems can dmyal bar skye// shing rta yi ni 'khor lo ltar// las kyi rnam par smin pas 'khor// shes rang rig rang gsal dang // rang gi bde ba gang 'dod pa// rang gi sgyu
264b1(rgyud): mad gang 'dod pa// rang rig shes sgo nga lta bu dang // dbyibs dang ye shes la sogs pa// lha'i don ni 'chang ba po// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum// bde chen 'khor lo'i rgyu'i rgyud// gsang ba'i sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud// gsang ba
264b2(rgyud): bde skyong 'bras bu'i rgyud// bum pa rgyu'i rgyud du gsungs// gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud yin te// shes rab ye shes 'bras bu'i rgyud// skye rgyu'i rgyud du gsungs// 'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// bar ma de yi 'bras bu'i rgyud// 
264b3(rgyud): rgyud zhes pa ni rgyud yin te// rgyal pos gsang ba ston pa ste// gsang ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// bum dbang las dang po la gsang // gsang dbang bum pa'i dus su gsang // shes rab ye shes gsang ba'i dbang // rang rig/ 
264b4(rgyud): ye shes gsang ba'i dbang // rang rig shes rab ye shes gsang // gsang bdakyil 'khor bzhi pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs ri rab kyi rdul
264b5(rgyud): snyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la skor ba lan gsum byas nas mi snangabar gyur to// gsang ba spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po b+ha ya d+hA ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya/ 
264b6(rgyud): ye shes kyis sbyar cing gtan la phab pa// / tshe/ rgya gar skad du/ shri tsakra sam b+ha ra g+hu d+ha a tsan te/ bod skad du/ dpal mkhor mo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam
264b7(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms pa/ 
264b8(rgyud): bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun rdzob 'khor ba'i 'khor ba'i chos la skyob par gyur to// de nas gas ba'i bdag po dpal lag na ni rjes gsol pad kye kye bcom pa ru ka/ kun rdzob 'khor ngan
265a1(rgyud): rnams kyis// de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ skye ba'i mtha' dang mtshan mar sdang // de nyid kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos// sems nyid bas/ 
265a2(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin te// phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa// bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid kyi// dbye ba mi mthun grangs dag dang // dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dag kyang // 'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams dang // 
265a3(rgyud): gnas pa'i tshul dang rim pa yang // gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bdag chag nyon mongs ye shes kun// ri drug zla shing mkhril lcag gi/ rang bzhin gyi lam 'das pa// de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas/ 
265a4(rgyud): ngo bo ste// bde gshegs kun gyis thugs kyi gsang // 'di des yis/ bshad kyis nyon// rtag skye 'gag la sogs pa yaM// mtha'aspangs sems nyid rang rig cing // bzod nas spros pa nyid med nyid// 
265a5(rgyud): de don bsam gyis mi khyab par nges// de nyid dbye bar rab 'bring yang // rna ba gsum du shes par bya// dang po rang rig pas mi khyab// rgyud dang lam rnams bsam mi khyab/ mtha' dang nyon mongs bsam
265a6(rgyud): mi khyab// chos dang lta spyod bsam mi khya'o// mdor bstan de nyid rim par dbye// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya chos// de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab/ a ni yi ge dam pa ste/ khong nas byung ba skye ba med/ skye ba kun gyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o// yi ge
265a7(rgyud): dam pa bsam mi khyab// khrag phyung khrus dang gtsang sbra dang // rgyan cha gtser bu thal gong spogs// chang dang bdud rtsi chu dang yang ka ma dang sring mo bu mo spogs// rol pa spyod pa bsam mi khyab// nga yi 'dul ba'i sems can la// mos pa'i mahA
265a8(rgyud): la thug pa med// de phyir mtha' la thug pa med pas/ de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab// rtag chag sgor skur ltos pa'i sgra// de nyid mthar gnas bsam mi khyab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spogs// 'dar dang 'phar dang drod la sogs// rtag nyid
265b1(rgyud): bsam mi sa mi khyab pa// lha sgom rlung dang rtswa la sogs// lam nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rang rig na mkha'i srin chen ste// pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa/ rgyud nyid bsam gyis mi khyab nges// rgyu 'bras tha snyad kun dang bral// rtsol ba
265b2(rgyud): rdul gyis ma gos pa// sprin med mkha' ltar ma gos pa'i// sprin dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag/ rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// a ni shad dang sprul pa la sogs kyis// bcu gnyis la sogs dbye ba yin// yi ge dbye ba rgyas pa'o// 
265b3(rgyud): gzugs ni sdug dang mi sdug spogs/ bcu dgu phra rab rdul gyis mtharasgra la sogs pa de bzhin te// sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drug ste// reg bya bcu gcig nang de bzhin/ gang zhig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbye ba sangs
265b4(rgyud): rgyas pa'o// theg pa gsum dang ji snyed 'du shes yod kyi bar/ lta ba'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// tshogs kyi lam dang mthar phyin lam// lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems rtag bdud rnams 'byung ba'i rtags// rtags
265b5(rgyud): kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// mu stegs rang rgyal nyan thos nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa spyod pa'i bar// spyod pa'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// rtag dang chad dang skur pa'o// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das te mtha' dang // thabs dang shes rab mthe'i ba ra/ 
265b6(rgyud): mtha'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// 'dod chags la sogs nyi khri dang / tshig stong rtsa ba nye ba dang / zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin te// nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang / 'dod chags zhe sdang sbyin la srogs/ rgyu'i dbye ba
265b7(rgyud): rgyas pa'o// sems dang na mkha' ye shes dang / sangs rgyas 'od gsal zung 'jug sogs/ rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o// bla dgas mtshan mar snang ba dang / sgra 'dogs pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa dang / rigs min mos po khyad par
265b8(rgyud): 'tshol// rdul tshangs khas len blo 'jog cing // sangs rgyas nyid dang sgrub byed na// gang ltar bcos kyang de thar te/ de ni sems can rang rig 'ga' zhig mtha' lhung lta ste// rang rig gzhan rig sems ma yin// kun rdzob don dam dbang
266a1(rgyud): gnyis ma yin// rang don rtog ge skam po dang // mthar lhung dbu mar khas len dang // de ni sems nyid rang rig dang / brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin te// de bral bsam gyis mi
266a2(rgyud): khyab pa'o// rang rig ye shes chen po yin// sprin srogs dkar po chos rnams dang // rang rig spyi'i rnam pa yis// thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba 'am/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa// rdul tsam tha snyad yod ma yin// 
266a3(rgyud): rang 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir// 'dod chags la srogs skyon kyang de sgrim pa ma yin te// sprin nyid la ni sprin bzhin no// rang bzhin gyis gzhan bye brag gis// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su snang // rang rig/ 
266a4(rgyud): sprin med namakha' la/ rang rig rnam rtog na mkha' mtshungs// sprin med gas rlung gis gtor byas te// sprin med na masnang ba nyid// gzhan rig rnam rtog bral ba la// sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhe
266a5(rgyud): bya ste/ rang rig kho na tsam du zad// dper na skyes bu na mkha' ltab la/ sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig la sgribs pal nyan mkha' de la ma sgribs ji bzhin no// grangs ni dang po gcig yin te/ 
266a6(rgyud): gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa las// dag pa gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa laso// dag pa gzhan gyi rnam grol min/ 'di ni ra rig kho na'o// de nyid rig pa bcing ngas pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // bzung 'dzin tha
266a7(rgyud): dang shes pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o// lus ngag sems ni rang bzhin las// rnam thar stong dang mtshan ma med// smon pa med dang sku gsung thugs/ bsam gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o// byams dang snying rje
266a8(rgyud): dga' btang snyoms// sa chu me rlung rang bzhin las// bzhi'i grangs su nges pa ste/ dga' ba la sogs nges pa'o// rigs ni lnga'i sangs rgyas lnga// phung po lnga dang chags sdang lnga// bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa'o// pha rol
266b1(rgyud): phyin drug rang bzhin las// yul drug la sogs pa rnams ni// bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid te// brgya la spogs ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig rang rig gzhan rig gnyis// thog me med nas gnas pa ste// lus dang grib
266b2(rgyud): ma'i tshul du gnas sa rang med pas ni gzhan rig dag/ so sor skye bo'i dus na 'dod/ 'di yang rmongs chen ma rungs pa// gzhan rig ma spangs rang rig 'dod/ 'khor ba spangs na mya ngan 'das// kha cig 'khor bar mya
266b3(rgyud): ngan 'dasaka/ rig pa glang 'dor gnyis su rtogs/ de la sogs pa lha'i don// rig pa 'dzin pa brgya rtsa bcu// thog chen mdo sde stong phrag bcu/ nyan thos rang rgyal stong phrag gnyis// khyab 'jug dang po la sogs pa// lta ba'i don
266b4(rgyud): la bsam mi khyab// rang rig 'dod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub/ bde ba chen po'i ro gang laka khams gsum 'khor bar kun shes nasakasangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba nyid// 'khor ba nyid ni
266b5(rgyud): mya ngan 'das// lta ba'i don dang bral ba ste// rang rig med cing gzhan rigamed/ don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka spangasasems nyid na mkha' chos nyid med// 'phrul pa med pa ma 'khrul med
266b6(rgyud): theg pa med cing rig pa med// dman dang gya nom gnyis kyang med// ye shes med cing bde ba medaka mtha' bral dbu mar yang gnas pa// bsam mi khyab tu gnas pa ste/ 'di rtog khong du chud pa dang // mi 'jigs sgra
266b7(rgyud): skur mi skyel pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'thu bo ste/ rgyal ba kun gyi nang na mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa byin rlob cing // ma 'gro kun gyi gnas ni mchod pa'i gnasaka/ rigs 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste// des kyang ma gzhag 'bad te bslabs
266b8(rgyud): rigs 'dzin sa la gnas par bya// rigs 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gnas te/ bcu lnga yi ni bdag nyid las/ sku gnyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// gzhan gyi las dang smon la
267a1(rgyud): stobs// de yi stobs kyi snang ba las ka yang dag nyid las snang rgyu med// rig pa rnam pa gnyis yin te/ dang po bla ma'i gdam ngag dang // rigs 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i bar// rang rig spyi'i rnam pa ste// chos nyid yul/ 
267a2(rgyud): dang byas pa'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa dgu ste/ rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid ni// yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i// rtog med 'khor bar snang ba yi/ khams gsum brtan dang g.yos byas pa'o// bdag gi de nyid tshul gyis ni// mnyam
267a3(rgyud): rjes thob kun spangs te/ rgyu ma'i tshul du gar gnas pa/ snang mthar phyin pa'i de'i tshad/ thun dang 'pho ba chu tshod dang // dbyug gu skad cig rim pa la// sems kyi phyir rgod la sogs skyon bral te// dben par gnas pa ste// snang med mthar phyin
267a4(rgyud): tshad yin te/ rang rig spyi'i tshad bstan to// snang ba med cing rgyu ba med// bya \u0f7f med cing bgrod pa med// rang 'byung lhun gyis grub pa ru/ Ta rtag tu mi 'gyur gang gnas pa// rang gi rig pa'i mtshan nyid la// mthar phyin pa yi tshad yin// 
267a5(rgyud): 'dod chags ro yis nyes pa dang / sems can sdom 'dzin dbang skur dang tshogs kyi 'khor bdud pa'i dus/ bsam gyis rma khyab pa rgyu ba'i dus// khyad par can du gsungs pa'o// gzhan yang rtogs pa'i
267a6(rgyud): sems dang yang / rtogs med dri ni skyes pa'o// gzugs la lta ba mi gnyis kyis// byams dang snyi rjel sogs pa'i// mdor na dkar po'i chos rnams dang / bzod dang sgyu rtsel la sngogs dang / skye rdzogs rim pa'i sgo
267a7(rgyud): bkun/ skye ba gcig gam dus sam ni/ yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang // 'khor ba'i chos la gang skyo bo// bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i dus// skyed rdzogs la srogs mi gnas shing ka/ rdzogs pa chen po gang 'dod / 
267a8(rgyud): de yang 'jug pa'i dus yin te/ bdud rnams bsam gyis mi khyab par/ bar chod pa 'jug pa'i dus// bzung ba'i mtha' ni bcwo brgyad te// na mkha' mnyam bzhi bcas pa bzhi med dang / yul drug dug gsum rten pa/ 
267b1(rgyud): dang ta lhan cig skyes gnyis sgra la rten// sra chu me rlung sgra rten no// chos rnams 'dod nas ma skyes pa'i/ rang rig sgom pa mkha' mnyam ste// bla ma sems bzung dang po bcesaka chos rnams thams cad sems yin/ 
267b2(rgyud): yin te// bzhi bcas rang rig rnal 'byor te/ sems ni gdod nas ma skyes pa'o// bzhi med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gzugs sgra di ro rog bya chos// de rten sems bzung bla ma la// skyes bu 'bad te blang bar bya/ 
267b3(rgyud): de bzhin 'dod chags sde sdang dang // gti mug rjes su mkhas pas bzung // lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung ba'i bzhi// rten te sems skye med par sgom// bye brag sems bzung bsam mi khyab// nyan thos la sogs theg
267b4(rgyud): chen la/ man ngag yod pa ma yin te/ lha dang spyod pas sems bzung dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu lam dang yang // dus dang long spyod rnal 'byor dang // bdag don gzhan don dgongs pa dang // ngal du ba mtha' spang/ 
267b5(rgyud): tshogs chung dang // tshogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa bcwo lnga yis// rigs 'dzin theg pa khyab par 'phags/ kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// rang rig bsam mi khyab mi laka/ sbyin dang byams pa
267b6(rgyud): so sogs pake sku gnyis gzhan don gang las 'byung // bsam khyab pa sems gnas nas/ de nyid ci la phyi ru ci// bcom ldan kyis bka' bstsal pa// sbyin dang byams pa la sogs pa// gzhan rig rnam rtog/ 
267b7(rgyud): dag pa dang / sku gnyis sems can den mdzad pa'i// sems can las ni don sangs rgyas/ 'byung ba'i rkyen dang nges pas na/ thasam mi khyab la gnas kyang / sbyin srogs 'bad te bslab par byas de la bsam mi khyab pa 'byung
267b8(rgyud): gzungs dang ting 'dzin la srogs sku// sbyin la sogs pa'i sbyin byas nas// bsam mi khyab las 'byung nges pa// de nyid ma gtogs 'khor ba'i chos// dbul pos nor bu byi dor bzhin// bsam mi khyab las sems gzhag nas/ 
268a1(rgyud): bskyed rdzogs rim par sems gnas na// de yang sngon sbyangs 'gro can te// sems kyi yid 'ong mchod par gces// rang sems las su rung bas na// de yi rtags ni nang du ste// des na nang phyir ru rang
268a2(rgyud): 'byung // lus la dri med srin bu med// skra dkar gnyer ma la sogs pa// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no// 'khor ba sgyu mar snang ba dang // srog med na mkha' ltar snang ba// bsam ma khyab pa'i rtags yin no// de nas
268a3(rgyud): 'khor 'das pa de dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur te/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzog s+ho// 
268a4(rgyud): g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / shakya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#/ rgya gar skad du// shi badz+ra khaM sa ma ya ra dza/ tran tra na ma/ bod skad du// dpa' bo na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
268a5(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bye ba dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo la/ 
268a6(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa dag gi nang nas// na mkha' spyod ma dang / sa spyod ma dang / sa 'og gi sa spyod ma dang / gsum lo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ gsang ba'i don 'di gsung
268a7(rgyud): dang ldan snying rje ldan pa rtse gcig sems// lus ngag gus bcas gzhan la phan sems ldan// 'jig rten rdul shugs ldan zhing zab mo yi// lam la spro bar gyis la legs par nyon// na mkha' khyed kyi mtshan nyid ni/ 
268a8(rgyud): nga yis khyed la bshad par bya// mkha' spyod steng sgo rlung yin// sa spyod bar du thig le'i sgo// sa 'og spyod pa shu skra sgo// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dang por mkha' spyod mtshan nyid kyang // rnam pa gsum du
268b1(rgyud): shes bya ste// bems po rlung dang rnam rtog rlung // kun gyi mtshan nyid ye shes rlung // mdor bstan rgyas nyid rim pa dbye// gnyis med rlung ni ma ni ste// bzung 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung // ldang 'jug thabs deng shes rab
268b2(rgyud): rlung / snying ka gzhang ka mgrin pa dang // lte ba lus ni khyab par ru// rigs lnga'i lus rlung rim par gnas// rgyu ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i rlung // dngas snyigs dbye ba brgyad du byung // de nyid rlung gi thun brgyad rted de pa kun
268b3(rgyud): re la ni 'pho ba re// chu tshod re la dbyug gu gnyis// rlung gi dbyug gu drug bcu bzhi// de bzhin chu tshod sum bcu gnyis// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya pa srogs// sems dang ma 'dra ba'i rlung // drags pa dang ni 'phra
268b4(rgyud): ba lata gsal ba sems kyi gzhon pa gzung // rnam rtog gzu 'jug sems kyi rta// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas// 'di nyid ye shes rdo rje ye shes rlung // dbye ba tha/ 
268b5(rgyud): dang shes rab gnyis// 'di rnams mkha' spyod rang bzhin te// de dag mkhas pas man ngag rtag/ yon tan rtags skyon rtags rnams kyi// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes par bya// de dag kun gyi
268b6(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyang // gzhom dang ni g.yon ma ni// 'di ni gzhung gi rnam por gnas// bems po rlung ni lam yin te// dbang po'i dngon sum lam yin pas// snang ba'i ri rab gling bzhi la nyi zla byang dbyug sde rgyug
268b7(rgyud): gis ta thabs dang shes rab skor spogs la// 'bad ma'i sems ni bzung bar bya// de dag bems por yang dag gnas// mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis// rin chen sems ni dran mi byas// de ni rnam rtog rlung yin to// 
268b8(rgyud): de nyid ni sa lam gyur to// ro ma dang ni rkyang ma ste// sprul pa'i khyil lta bu'i rnam pa ste// rnal 'byor gyis ni dmigs pa'i yul// rnam rtog gnas der rnam rtog rlung dgag go/ rang rig dgod nas ma skyes pa// 'di nyid
269a1(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje'i rlung // kun dar ma'i rtsal brten// tsan dan gis ni shing lta bu/ karang rig ye shes spyod yul te// gnas de 'bang de rang rig bzung // mkha' spyod rlung gi rang bzhin phyir// de dag rdorje
269a2(rgyud): lam yin no// de nas sa spyod bshad pa ste// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// tsan dz+wa la'i bye brag rtag/ dang po'i rang bzhin tsan d+ha li// gsu ma kha sbyor tsan d+ha li// de bzhin gcer bu tsan da li// de nyid
269a3(rgyud): la yang dbye ba ste// stug po stug pa shin tu stug/ yang dag stug po gzhan sbyar dang // bye brag kun la sbyar bar bya// gcer bu shin tu gcer bu dang // shin tu gcer bu gcer bu rtsogs// de dag kun la
269a4(rgyud): sbyar ba bya// dbye ba rnaM ba bcu gnyis ste// yan lag bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad// sa spyod rtsa'i rang bzhin de// stong phrag bdun bcurtsa gnyis sgom// gzhan skyed kyi ni 'gro mo can// 'phra ba de
269a5(rgyud): lozlog pa'o// rgyad dang nyi shu sla'i rtseg/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis skra'i rtse// lnga'i cha der tshe rtsa'i gsum// 'dus yungs ka ra tsam gis tshad// dbus dang g.yas g.yon phra sbom dang // gnyis
269a6(rgyud): 'gyur bye brag shes par bya// dngang ma dang ni snyigs ma'i rtsar// rang bzhin nyid du gnas pa la// ye shes lta bu'i rtsa bdun kyang // dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa// sa spyod ma'i rang bzhin no// gnas spogs
269a7(rgyud): pa gzhan shes// 'di nyid nor bu rin po che// 'di la rten nas thams cad 'byung // rtsi rigs rtsol gnas rtsol tshad rtsol// dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la// la stsogs// tshol ba las ni dngos grub med/ 
269a8(rgyud): de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni// sa spyod ma'i dngos grub ste// thams cad kyi ni rten yin no// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// byang chub sems ni rnams pa gsum/ dang po don dam sa
269b1(rgyud): yin te// de ni shes spyod yul las 'das// gnyis pa gzhan rig byang chub sems dpa'// dper na rkyen gi shel sgong bzhin// gsum bems po byang chub sems/ sil dang ni ge bur ste// donani
269b2(rgyud): kun rdzob gnyi su gsungs// las kyi rlung dang las kyi ses// g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub sems// ye shes rlung dang ye shes mes// g.yo ba don dam sems yin te// dang sa snyigs la ni rim pa bzhin// klu dbyibs
269b3(rgyud): dang kha dog las kyi ni// sems kyi khyad par shes par bya// las kyis rlung gi ma g.yo zhing // mas kyi lces ma 'jigs par// kha ba lta bu'i mtshan ma la mi shigs haM gis dbyibs 'dra ste// nor bu kun da'i dog lta bu
269b4(rgyud): dkar la 'tsher dang bze dang snum// bde ba chen po'i sku 'byung yana'adi ni don dam byang chub sems// dmar la dang ba'i rang bzhin la// khyad par bzhin thun mong ste// de ni shes rab byang chub seMs/ de las zlog pa dman
269b5(rgyud): pa gnyis// go bor gnas shing sred pa ste// dman pa rkyen gis g.yo' khur byed// de ltar don dam kun rdzob gas/ sems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya// rgyu 'chol ba la dngos grub med// rkyen tshol bu de bzhin te/ 
269b6(rgyud): bla ma'i nal las shes par bya/ don dam sems kyi spyod/ yul min// kun rdzob tshor ba'i bde ba'i yul// sa 'og spyod ma'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje gsum sgom byed pa// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// yi ge dang ni yAn
269b7(rgyud): lag dang // bsdus pa'i don dang spyi'i don// sras po la don dang mthar thug do// / sna tshogs de las 'byung bar 'gyur// nor bu ngagi sil snyan bzhin// rtogs med sems las sna tshogs 'byung / a li k+Sha li
269b8(rgyud): ma ning dang / drug tu sbyor bar rtag par bya// sgrub mtha'i ye shes ga bsam mi khyab// yan lag rnam gsum yin te// sgyu 'bras mda' dang bdang can/ rdzong bya dang ni rjod byed do// de lus zlog
270a1(rgyud): bsdus par bshad// theg pa gsum dang de la gzhan// mthun mong spyi ru nges pa ste// bye brag rang las shes par bya// sbas pa sngags pa dang dbang du byed// sngags dang ldan sde dbang sdug N+DI/ 
270a2(rgyud): chos ni spyi dang bye brag go// de dag rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// ma snod dang snod min bye brag kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// bla mas legs par bstan par bya// de nyid yang dri ga
270a3(rgyud): rtog 'gyur nas// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// bsam brtan la sogs 'jigs pa med// sangs rgyas sku ni yang dag 'gyur// bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs dang // chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs bskor// dman pa
270a4(rgyud): rnams la bye ba'i rgyu// de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te// rnal 'byor nang ma de lhag la/ phyi nang rnal 'byor ma rgyud de// shes rasnying por snying rtser bcas te// thabs dang shes rab srung shing la/ 
270a5(rgyud): gnyis med dang thugs kyis srub pa la// bdud rtsi'i ro ni nyi shu bzhi/ nor bu rin chen rgyud chen brjod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // ji ltar ngan 'grog gyo
270a6(rgyud): mo las// 'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba min// de bzhin lo grangs mang po las// dngos grub myur du 'byung ba med// de phyir rin chen nyi shu bzhi// bdud rtsi ro 'dra se ge'i gzugs// gnas ni nyi shu zazhi nyid kyang // 
270a7(rgyud): skra rnams kyis ni byin brlabs ste// mkha' 'gro nyi shu bzhi la btad// phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyo 'debs so// dam tu sbas zhing dam dA spel// rgya las 'das nas dam tshig nyams// sngags dang dbyibos dang chos bdag ci/ 
270a8(rgyud): sku gsum thugasu rang bzhin te// de'i ngo bor kun tu rtags// sngags gnyis te chos la gnyis// gnyis kyang gnyi su shes par bya// rai'i bye thag dbyel ba la// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par byan/ daphyi nang smras
270b1(rgyud): dang mthar thug bzhi/ rgyud kun phyag rgya bzhi yin pas// dbye ba mkhas pas btag/ de nyid rtogs na rgyud dang ldan// de las zlog pa 'das pa yi// rang bzhin ni tsan d+ha li/ gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ mkha 'gro// 
270b2(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// rtsa gsum gis ni byin brlabs// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ mkha 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// su ru rab 'dum gsang rdo rje// dza ru gsum ga mig gcod gsang // gsang ba ga cod// a ru 'do// 
270b3(rgyud): ldan pasam mi khyag/ la u ru snang chen na mkha' mnyam// go ru ba dan tho namakha' che// re ru me'u thung sku gsung thugs// de rul ka rin chen 'breng // ma ru shing grib dam tshig che/ a ru a re stobs the tsho/ oM rA
270b4(rgyud): 'jigs byed ye shes gsang te 'u ye shes rlung shugs ye 'phreng // ku ru 'chang mthung ye shes 'bar// ka tsu sha ma'i bzlal ba'i 'bre // la ru nin bzang rin chen 'bar/ ku ru Na na nyi ma 'i 'khor he ra kha ga ye nas
270b5(rgyud): rgyal/ za ru 'khor mkha 'gro sdom// gri ru khan d+ha ga sa 'bar// so ru sho d+hi ba sang bdud rtsi/ su ru 'khor l-i ru ra/ khror rgyan// na ru shing dpal rdo rje rgyal// se ru stobs chen ye shes
270b6(rgyud): bas ma// ma ru 'khor lo sbyar chags pa'i rgyal// gu ru brtson 'grus mkha'agro sdom// de dag brtad de leg snyoms// nang du tsan d+ha li dag ni// nyi shu bzhi ni brtan pa ste// dang po gas pas gnyis
270b7(rgyud): pa yang // rang bzhin yin te de nas dang // rten ni tha mar bsrungs pa ste// mkha 'gro khyed gi mtshan nyid ste// de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin// dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pas// dbang dang dam tshig ldan D+ha/ 
270b8(rgyud): rta dang glang po la sogs te// bu dang chung ma nor byo dbyig/ gnyen bskur dag gis gnyis par byas ste/ bdad ci roli ra ri las// bla ma'o zhal las dngos grub thang // yid la bzung la dran par phyi da
271a1(rgyud): de nas 'khor lo 'dus pa de dag thams cad rjesu yid rang bar gyur to// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// rdzogs spyo// 'ag+ha ya d+ha ra dang / 
271a2(rgyud): lo tsa ba shAkye ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o// // rgya gar skad du// shrI ma ha kha sa ma tsan ta ra tsa// bod skad du// dpal na mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'ding skad ba gis
271a3(rgyud): thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i ba ga la snyoms par bzhugs sod/ gzhan yang dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pa
271a4(rgyud): thabs gcig tu bzhag so// de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos// bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyog nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// phyi nang gsang ba'i chod pa'i
271a5(rgyud): mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol pa// kyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa ched btso pa gang lags ldan pa gang 'jigs pa gang lags chen po gang // bdag la khyed kyis stan tu
271a6(rgyud): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bcoM ldan bdud bzho bcom pa ste// de re la yang bzhi zhi ste// bcu drug grangasu shes par bya// ldan pa de'i gnyis po ste// dang po bum dbang bdud bzhi yang / 
271a7(rgyud): kha tog dbyibs la lo tog gis// skye ba'i bzung 'dzin du ma dag/ phung po bdud du ras grags// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa// nyon mongs pa'i btud yin no// yang dag la ma ston bla na med// sdeng ruhA skyes pa'i/ 
271a8(rgyud): dang lam ston grogs ngan dag/ de lta bu'o br-i tAd yin no// skye ba'i rim pa lags na na// de lta bu'i bred da yin no// log rtogs tu mra'i rtogs pa 'gags/ de na phung po la btud bcom mo// rten pa rton pa ro nyam pra// 
271b1(rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i bdun bcom mo// dus min mchi dang tshe zad dang // 'dig mchi bdag bdud yin te/ tshe lo stong stsogs thub pa'i// tshe li 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// gzhan yang bdud bcom bye brag ni// tshe'i bdud
271b2(rgyud): rtsirtsi bcud kyis len// grwa ni 'chi bdag btud bcom so// de bzhin phung lus kyi phung po ste// long spyod kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms// sems kyis lha'i ba dad 'joms ste// rten dang rten sgyu mar ldan// de nas gsang dbang bdud bzhi
271b3(rgyud): yang // phyag 'tsha nA khro tshul gar la sogs// phyi ma'i tu ma'i phung po'i bdud// rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa'i bdud yin no// dman pa'i lam ni gang ston pa// bla ma lta bu'i btud// phyi'i
271b4(rgyud): tshe'i bcud kyi len// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye zag kyangasgo gsum 'khrul par gang 'dod pa/ bla ma lha'i bu'i bdud// sgo gsum las ni du ba'i tshad
271b5(rgyud): de nyid ma shes phung po btud// de nyid dbang de skyabs byas kyang // 'bras/ bu mi 'byung sems nyid mongs// nyon mongs bdud yin te// rlung spogs gnas pa'o rlu tshul shes pa// lha'i bu'i btud bcom mo// 
271b6(rgyud): de nyid sgyu mar shes par bya// de nyid shes pa'i phung po'i btud// nyon mongs po'i btud bcom mo// dngos po'i mthar ltung bas yin// rgyu med la so skyes 'chi bas ste// rgyu rkyen la skyes rang bzhin gnas// rgyur 'chi
271b7(rgyud): bdag bcom mo// tshe la dbang sgyur ma lta bu// gnyen po stobs dang ldan pa'o// shes rab ye shes ba dud yong // rtsa dang shing kra la sngogs pa'adi/ dman pa'i lam ston lha'i gdud/ de nyid du ma'i
271b8(rgyud): phung po'i bdud// de sgom rang bzhin nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa'i bdud yin no// kha dog dbyi byes ni skyes pa dbyibs// de nyid 'chi bdag btud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag kyang
272a1(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po las ston pa'i// bla ma lha'i bu'i 'dud// gnyis las gsum rgyud las gsungs pa phung po bdud// rang sems nyon mongs pa'i bdud// 'khor bar ltung ba ste skyel med/ 
272a2(rgyud): skye ba las 'byung 'chi bdag bdud// rnam par rtog pa skyes so// 'dod chags kyis zin bdud// ma spangs sum bcu drug nyid dang // nges pa drug bcu drug rtsa drug gi// lam stan thams lha gtud bajam// 2na
272a3(rgyud): ma zhi datu da bcom mo// dge zhing rgyu ma rang bzhin med// bde chen 'od rgyung phung po bdud bcom// 'bras bu reg pa ye shes sbyin// rar sems nyon mongs sdug sA la bral// nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom mo// 'go man
272a4(rgyud): mas ni 'dud nacom mo// dman pa'i stobs gis zin pa'o// rgyal po dmang su dpal pa bzhin// de nyid lam gi 'dud kyi thon/ rgyal loHngas shor ba 'dra// gsu ba la rjod de ldan pa la/ na bzhi pa'i lamu spon/ 
272a5(rgyud): b+h+ra ma ni// lta bu'i 'dung yin no// bdud gsuM snga ma'i zhalas shes// snod yin gas ba sogs pa dag/ mar dang khar la sogs pa snod// mthung de ma zhu dug 'gyur te// khyud par brgyud kyi zin 'i ste/ 
272a6(rgyud): rigs pa 'a pa 'ang// dbang dang mnA dag zel rgyas pa// 'dud 'ams las rgya sa nags snga pas yin nyon no// rjel dag tu rab tu khrigs/ tham tsho cig la tha~Md 'dun
272a7(rgyud): gnyis/ thol pa de nyid dran pa ste// tha ma gcig la dbang thob nas// bla ma gcig la gzhen par bya// bla me rnam pa gsuM su gsungs// phyi'i bla ma de nyid de// nang gi bla ma bdag po'i lha// bdud dang dgra'i ldan
272a8(rgyud): kun// thams cad 'jigs shing skrag par byed// 'jigs pa bzhi la no gsungs pa ste// dgra dang bdud kyi yulas rgya'o// dmigs pa lha chags 'du dang ldan// de byer chen po zhes ni gsungs// de tshe 'khor 'dus
272b1(rgyud): pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang thams cad rgyud de la dga' zhing 'gu nas// rjesu yid rang bar gyur to// / dpal namatha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ 
272b2(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ra dang // dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shi ka la ya la ga tsi ta tan tra ra dza// bod ska
272b3(rgyud): du/ sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal khro/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus 'dod chags chen// mtshon gyur 'di la yang dag gnas// mgon po thugs rje
272b4(rgyud): ldan shi khyed gis bdag la bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' stsal pa// sku ni bum pa'i ngo bo ste// gsungs ni gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid// thugs ni shes rab ye shes so// sangs rgyas spyan dang ma ma/ 
272b5(rgyud): kyi// dam tshig sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ rdo rje la 'di 'dzin la 'di/ skad gsol// rgyud kyi don la rims goms shing // smras pa'i tshig la ma rmongs shig// gzhan gyi cod pas mo rdzi yid/ 
272b6(rgyud): dbang dang man dgra ma thob par// dbang skur rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs// sngags stsogs ngal ba don med de// shi nas sems can dmyal bar skye// de nyid tso bo dbang gsum gi// man ngag yan
272b7(rgyud): la// bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// dang po bum dbang rims pa yang // gnas ni shin tu sngags pas rtsam/ kra shis yid dag la shin tu snum// kra shis bya rnams skad snyan skegs
272b8(rgyud): dpag khasam shing rnams yod par dero// gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig gam// chu ngogs dag las spogs pa ru/ nas bdag sa'i lha mo la// gtor ma sbyin sreg mchod yon gi// sa sdang phyir ni khro
273a1(rgyud): rnams gzugs// de nas dang po snyen ma 'bum// snyen pa gsum ni rab 'bring ste// mtshan ma grangs dang dus gsum gsungs// de re re la yang gsum gsum sten mtshan ma
273a2(rgyud): gzugs dang 'od dang sla// drangs ni stong khrag khrig 'bum// dus ni bcwo lnga bcu gsum dang // bdun du snyen pa rdzogs pa dang // lha rnams gnyen pa gnyis byas nas// lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun
273a3(rgyud): lhag par gnas pa tshul bzhin byas// kra shis lo grangs ldan pa'o// bu mo ku sha'i phyogs mthun pa// ku sha Na las mtshan ma rtags// so shing rtse mo me tog d+hi/ bsrung bskung la sogs ma mtshan mnyags
273a4(rgyud): dbang gis dkyil 'khor skyed par bya// dkyil 'khor slob ma rab 'bring mtha'// ting 'dzin me tog rdu'i mtshon dri rim// gang dang ldan pa de nyid de// de nyid mchod rdzas rim pa yang // a khar
273a5(rgyud): sngags kyis kyang / de lad byabar bya// de nas kun/ mags pa// spangs pa'i tshig dang bganan yang sngon du 'gro// tham gnyis par bya
273a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lha rnams mchod par bya ba'i phyir// rta dang ma he dang // rin chen la sngogs rten rnams dang // spos dang mar me la sogs dang // brgya 'am stong ngam khri 'am 'bum// tha re rgyal mtshan
273a7(rgyud): ba dan la sogs/ byin brlabs tshogs bsags phyir ru dgongs// de nas slob ma bzhugs par bya// khrus byas yan lag dri yis byugs// kye ho khyod ni ci lta bu// 'jig rten 'khrul khas las zar
273a8(rgyud): nas// kye hu ka drag po chen po'o// dkyil 'khor chen por khyod rol 'am// dad pa dang bcas spros par gyis// rnam rtog bral dang bral sems bdag/ dga' ba chen po khyod ston pa// rdo rje 'dzin
273b1(rgyud): dgongasu gsol/ byang chub chen por lung snyan pa/ 'gon po chen po phyag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la rtsol/ pad ma las dbyung bdag la rtsol// legs so legs so rigs kyi bu// rgyal
273b2(rgyud): sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rnam rtog thams cad 'joms byed pa// gnyis med khyod ni blang bar bya// mi skyod bcom ldan dang mtshungs pa'i// zil gyis mi gnon khyod gis blangs// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod pa ni// 
273b3(rgyud): mchog gi de nyid blang bar bya// thabs dang shes rab bzung du 'jug/ nam yang khyod gis spangs mi bya// tshangs spyod de bzhin bsam btan la// 'bad pa'i sems ni btang bar bya// chang ni rtag 'thung
273b4(rgyud): khro mi bya// de bzhin sha yang shes par bya// gzhan gyi phyag rgya bsnyen/ par bya// 'di ni dam tshig brgyad yin no// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro// mthung mong sngon dang sems
273b5(rgyud): skyed sbyin// bskor ba gsum byas phyag gsum byas 'tshal// yal ba ba ra tu bcad nas ni// mig la sogs pa lnga ka ba la/ lha grangasu du me tog sbyin// kun byed chu yis gsang dag bya// me tog
273b6(rgyud): cas dang rdo rje yang // de'i snying la gzhag pa sgom// slob dpon la ni brnyed byed stsogs// ltung ba gnyis pa brjod par bya// phyi'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dbang// sngon tu sdig pa lan gsum bral// mig gi gzugs
273b7(rgyud): ni mthong ba dang / rna ba'i sgra dang rna ba'i dri// kalce'i ro dang lug kyi rig/ dngos grub 'phrin las so so ru/ na mkhas pas rtag cing shes par bya/ me tog btor te lta yang sbyin// 'khor rnams rtso bo yan
273b8(rgyud): lag yin// rtse bo'i mtshan nyid shes par byed/ ji ltar gso ba'o smin pa'o/ dbang po lnga'i gzugs su sbyin// de bzhin sems dpa' chen po'od// mi shes pa'i rab rim kun// rgyal ba kun rnams kyis yang dgas la/ 
274a1(rgyud): de la gzugs snyan dkyil 'khor bstan// dbang gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du// bzhag ste rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur// mu' khams mi skyod me long gi// rdo rje rigs kyi 'phrin las grub// dadu
274a2(rgyud): brgyan rin chen 'byung ldan te// mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin gyis// rin chen rigs kyi 'phrin las grub// 'od dpag med pa rdo rje 'bang // so sor rtog pa rang bzhin gyis// pad ma rigs gi 'dzin las
274a3(rgyud): byed// dril bu don yod grub pa ste// 'phrin las sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// rigs las dras nas mig mi dbang // rdo rje dang sbyar rdo rje sems// chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin las// de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las
274a4(rgyud): mi 'jigs seng ge l-i khri stengs ni// rigs byed slob dpon dbang sbyin byad/ bdud bzhi 'joms pa rgyal chen bzhi// chos rnams mi nub rgyal 'tshal gzugs// chos kun sku las kun khyab/

274a6(rgyud): bdun las sngogs pa kun// mthun mong yin pa rA nga'i gsungs// bum pa'i dbang gis la sa rnams ste// dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang po yin// gnyis par rim par dbang yin no// brtan par byed pa gsu
274a7(rgyud): pa'o// de nas gsang ba bshad par bya// lus ni ri rab lhun po la// byang chub sems kyi gnas byas na/ bde ba'i brtan yang gnas su bstan// gsar ba'i dbang gis brnyed par 'gyur// 
274a8(rgyud): rim pa dang por btsal bar bya// dang por shes pa rtag pa dang // bdag dbang yod par blang ba dang // nyes pa dag par byang ba dang // dkyil 'khor skyed par bya ba dang // bar chod dgyegs rnams bzhi pa
274b1(rgyud): dang / srung ba de la sngogs kyis mchod// dri la thig le'u du ma dang // g.yon na gnas pa de nyid la/ srub dang skyabs thabs sbyor ba dang // srung ba de las bde ba'i rgya rgyun gyis// lus kun khyeb nas
274b2(rgyud): ga sar ba ru// ka ra la rtsad mar lta bur 'dzag/ dkyil 'khor tu 'jug gong dang 'dra// ro ma'i 'khor lo 'dab gsams la// lce gcig pad mar byin brlabs la// si lo ga pur 'dres pa yis// bya la
274b3(rgyud): gzhag ste de la thim// sor gnyis longs spyod mnyam sbyar la/ dbug su mi dmigs sgom par bya// gsang ba la ni rnam gsum ste// rdo rje rtse mos sbyin par dang // sbom po 'khro mos byin pa dang // rdo tshangs
274b4(rgyud): dri tshangs sbyin pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang la yang // dang po shes rab rtag da pa yang / lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum mkhas pa rtag cing shes par bya// de nas khyad par lta bar snyan te// 
274b5(rgyud): rigs dpal de 'tsho longs spyod dang // rgyan dang gzugs kyi khyad par lnga/ phyi'i rtag par yin par gsungs// bsam gtan pa ni rdo rje rigs// khyad par nga'i gsungs// rnam rtog/ 
274b6(rgyud): chung ba rdo rje yin/ lang 'tshe'i khyad par yin par gsungs// mi'i rtog pa'i brgyan shes pa// rdo rje brgyan gi khyad par yin// de nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur// mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan ste/ rdo rje gzugs

274b8(rgyud): nyid 'di ltar 'khor ba ni/ zugs kyi lang 'tshol khyad par ro// 6de dmar la gdang bA dang / byang chub sems ni dkar la dang // gnyi su med par gsal kha'i tshul/ dper na nor bu ke ke ru/ dar
275a1(rgyud): rgyus pa de bzhin du/ thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad par ru// lA la na dang sa ran// a ba d+ha'i gnyis med la// spyod thugs longs spyod khyad par du// dang por phyi la gnyis nang // gsu
275a2(rgyud): kha gsang ba'i rtaga'o// lus rtag pa ni sku yin te// ngag rtag gsung du 'gyur ba'o// yid rtag thugs su shes par bya// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// sgyu ma tsam du dgongs pa'i don// kun la khyad cing shes par
275a3(rgyud): bya// lus kyi drug la ngag gi bdun// sems kyi bdun la sgyum tshul// dang po smigs sgyu nyid yin te// gsum pa spogs sgyu myi snang bzhin// de bzhi ni zhal nas shes par bya// chu la bdud te mar ni gci/ 
275a4(rgyud): drin bdun te sha ni gnyis// sbong po bzhi te 'o ma gsum// 'di rnams datsal ba'i brtan 'gyur // lo gsum bzhi yin par gsungs/ khar gnyis ti bu ram cig/ chang ni gnyisu
275a5(rgyud): shes par bya// rgyan ni bye zag sna tshogs so/ rgun ka'i shwa dang ston ka'i sha/ zhal cig nang du bcu dang ldan// g.yar dang sgyid kyi sha rnams dang // drod dang ldan na bcu dang
275a6(rgyud): ldan// rang bzhin shi ba'i sha yin te// bdun pa byas na dam tshig nyams// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// gzhan yang 'bras bu la sogs smin// ma ro dang bcas pa sbyar bar bya// sha yang mar gi
275a7(rgyud): de bzhin no// chang rnams kun gi bcud skyed de/ dmar ba kun ro rtsa byed// chu skyed pa ni gzhon nu ste// ro rtsa lA ni sha lnga yin// bcud skyed sha dang dmar gnyis kyang // lnga dang lnga'i kha'i sras
275a8(rgyud): chan mnyam por gsungs pa'o// ba ro rtsa ba'i sha l-i yang lom sgo ma nyams par// lnga gsum lnga 'i khro bor bya// ra'i chang ngam 'o ma 'am/ sha dang mnyam por byin par bya// 'di ni lan lag ltos byas/ 
275b1(rgyud): de nas 'tshams cad sten pa dang / dam tshig sna tshogs bye ba dang // spros ma med pa'i yan lag yin// dbang skur sngon du bsgom pa'i don// dbang po thob phyir nga gsungs pa// rig ma 'di ni yan lag smos
275b2(rgyud): byas gtang na man gang byin// 'da' rnams bya zhing 'dod pa'i brtags// rtag pa shin tu smos pa med// phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa 'khyud// dang po sbyor thabs zhes gsungs so// dbu rgyun 'gul rgyan la sog
275b3(rgyud): pa// sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya ste/ langs pa gcig tu gang skye la dang // kha sbub 'phrang dang lnga yin te// 'di rnams kun gyi dgongs pa zab// dgongs med spyad pa spyod byed pa// 'di ni mnar med skye ba'i rgyu// / 
275b4(rgyud): tha mal paM las rgya 'gyur gis// bum pa dbang dang 'brel ba'o// bum bu dang ni gsang pa ste// gsang ba las gzhan 'brel pa ste// / de'i rnam smin brjod mi lang // dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim pa ni// kr-i me'i zhal
275b5(rgyud): nas shes par bya// yan lag bdun sgom sbyor dngos// khyad par rnam pa gsum las byung // sngags dang sman ni dad pa ste// gnyis pa sbyor thabs yin par gsungs// gsum pa ting nge
275b6(rgyud): 'dzin yin te// sngags dang sman gis kun 'odar sbyang / skye shing tshad dang gnas par tshad// 'byung ba bzhi dang rigs mthun pa'i// skye shing skyed pa tshad dong mnyam// sor gsum sor bzhi dar dang men/ 
275b7(rgyud): gnas pa'i chang ni rnam pa drug/ rnam thar gsar ba'i pho brang nas// skye mched rim po gnas pa'o// steng rta 'drin lte bar gnas// khams la gsang ba'i bde stong mas// 'dab 'khor sprul
275b8(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo gnas/ ma rni gros ka ra ya ni sgrol maM// i ni sbyin pa la ni tshul khrimaso// maMn baM zod pa yaM na bas ma l+ya ta naM// i ni phyag rgya chen po ste// bai ni dam tshig chen po'i/ na
276a1(rgyud): yang dag spong ba snying khar gnas// he ru ka ni ma shegs shing // rdo rje nga'is ma rgyal po // dri'i tshad ni sor bzhi 'byung // dngos po khrus bya sa gnyi sa gal// smad stu mad
276a2(rgyud): dri dang gsuM// sum tshwa sum gnyis stong smad do// lus la sku zhing me la 'dug/ rtse gsum d+ha ni shin tu bza'// dngos po sgru ba dang mu ba dang // ra~M ba ni nyi shing dang/ rom 'a shags dang yan
276a3(rgyud): lag bcas// rdo la sogs pa lnga sbyar dang // gzhan yang sman dang snom dang drin/ da la sogs pa'i nang du spags// sgo gnyis ni po lho 'dag/ zab pa'i sdig ces btab sgo byas la// dgongs pa mi
276a4(rgyud): shes 'dod chags phyir// dpa'o mtshan mar shes par bya// chags pa'i gzugs ldan sna tshogs 'byung // tha me la gsum 'am 'dun dranas 'byung // dgongs pa'i bye zag shes par bya// sngags dang / 
276a5(rgyud): spyan gi khyad par ro// dgongs pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir/ sla/ kha sogs btsal mi byad na'adi'i sdig pa bsam mo// khyab// dug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur nas/ gang bu'i rtsa'i kha phye na/ 
276a6(rgyud): sbyor thubs khyad par yin par gsungs/ bde chen go zlog sbyor ba dang // 'khor ba'i go zlog sbyor ba dang // sku'i go zlog sbyor ba dang / ye shes rko zlog sbyor ba dang // 'byung ba go zlog sbyor ba dang / 
276a7(rgyud): yum/ gi zlog sbyor ba dang // thig le'i go zlog sbyor ba dang // bsam pas rtan go zlog sbyor ba dang // stong pa go zlog sbyor ba dang / dbus gis go zlog sbyor ba dang // dga' ba'i go zlog sbyor ba dang // gdum mo ga
276a8(rgyud): zlog sbyor ba dang / ca'i go zlog sbyor ba dang // byang sems go zlog sbyor ba dang // g.yas g.yon go zlog sbyor ba dang // bde ba'i go zlog sbyor ba dang // brten gri go zlog sbyor ba dang // kun mkhyen pas kyang ma mkhyen pa// 
276b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum// sras rnams mthung mong ma yin skyed// ting nge 'dzin gi khyad par ro// 'di ni khyad par ma rtogs par// zab pa'i don 'di yod pa yin// 
276b2(rgyud): dbang skur ba'i sngon du yang // gdam ngag sbyin par gsungs pa yin// gdam ngag 'di ni dbang thob 'gyur// shes rab ma la rten nas su// bde ba'i ye shes skyed pa na// shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs// si la ga pur/ 
276b3(rgyud): shes rab ste// de'i bde ba ye shes yin// si lar shes rab zhes bya ste// ga pur ye shes su ni Shashad// rtsa gsum 'dus pa shes rab ste// de'i thig le ye shes yin// la la rna ni shes rab ste// ra sa / 
276b4(rgyud): ni ye shes so// ma ni shes rab zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems ni ye shes/ mkha'agro ma ni shes rab ste// dpal po ye shes su ni bshad// dga' ba gsum pa ni ye shes ste// rang bzhin dga' ba
276b5(rgyud): shes rab yin// 'og gi shes rab zhes bya ste// steng la ye shes su yang bshad/ g.yon pa shes rab zhes bya ste// g.yA pa ye shes yang bshad// chos dbyings shes rab zhes byas ste// 
276b6(rgyud): sheshes bzhin ye shes yin// phyag ming dang ni ye she rnams// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// shes rab ye shes la yang gsum// tshig la bslabs pa gnas pa yin// gzugs rnyan la ni bshad pa ste// mngon
276b7(rgyud): par rtog pa sgom par gsungs// e baM ma ta ya rnam pa gang / e na si ste khai ni chu/ ma ni me ste yang ni rlang // e ni snying rje baM ni byams pa// ma ni dga' ba ya nibatang snyoms// a na saM spyaH/ 
276b8(rgyud): baM ni ma ma kyi// ma ni gongs dkar yi ni sgrol ma/ e ni sbyin pa baM ni tshul khrims// ma ni bzod pa ya ni bsam gtan// e ni phyag rgya chen po ste// baM ni nam tshig chen po'o// / mA ni chos kyi phyag yin/ 
277a1(rgyud): ya ni ye shes phyag rgya'o// e ni sha ra te bau lho'o// ma ni nub ste ya ni byang phyogs so// oM ni sku'i thig le ste// baM ni gsung las ma ni thugs// ya ni ye shes thig le'o// e ni sngon po bai ni ljang kun
277a2(rgyud): dmar po ya ni ser podaname ni mkha'agro ba la ma// ma ni dum skyed ya ni gzugs can// e ni shes rab 'kha' 'gro ste/ ba~M mirdo rjeg pa 'gro yin// ma ni na tha mkha' gro ste// ya ni las kyi mkha' gro ro
277a3(rgyud): 'gog la ba~M ni la// ma ni sdug bsngal ba ni longs spyod// ma ni chos ma ni sprul pa// e ni mtshan ma pa ni stong pa// ma ni rnam thar ya ni dpe' spyad// e ni rnam pa sna tshogs ste// baM ni rnam par smin pa'o// 
277a4(rgyud): nyid pa ste// yA ni rnam pa'i mtshan nyid bral// e na chung la ba ni 'bring8/ ma ni lhag la ya ni cher lhag/ g.yas nI g.yon nas me d+hu ste// ba nI g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu// ma ni mgo nas rtsa
277a5(rgyud): bas/ ye ni steng nas rgyu ba chu// e ni gnas btan bi ni pha la chenam ni kur ya ni thams cad da.e ni bsnyen pa Sha~Mnalce'i sen// ma ni sgrub pa ya ni bsgrub chen// e ni shar la yini nu
277a6(rgyud): ma ni shar mtshams baM ni nub 'tshams// e ni rgyu la baM ni bsngags// e ni snang ba'i ni 'tshed/ ma ni snang thob baM ni 'dogasal// e ni bdag gis bzang po yin// bam ni dus kyi bzang po yin// ma ni ye shes
277a7(rgyud): bzang por gsungs// ya ni rlung gi bzang yin// e ni bdag gi gnas yin te// baM ni rnal 'byor gnasu bstan// ma ni gzhan gi gnas pa ste// ya ni rgyud gi gnas yin no// e ni dga' ba zla ni
277a8(rgyud): mchog dga' ba ba// ma ni lhan cig yang dag bral// e ni me long baM ni mnyam nyid/ ma ni kun rtog ya ni nan tan// e ni zhi ba kho ni dbang // ma ni rgyas pa ye bsod// yi ge 'du ba'i sngags / 
277b1(rgyud): gsum/ oM ni sku'i 'khor lo ste// a ni gsung gi 'khor lo'o// hUM gi thugs gi 'khol lo yin// oM ni sa rnam snang a ninA 'od dpag med// hUM gi mi skyod rang bzhin no// oM naM b+hag yon
277b2(rgyud): hUM ni g.yas// a ni dbus kyi snying la yan// oM ni g.yonA gi spyan yin te/ hU~M ni g.yas pa a dbus ma/ oM ni srog la hUM ni tsi la/ ma ni gnas par shes par bya// oMn nu
277b3(rgyud): la hUM ni thugs/ oM ni gsungs ni shes par bya/ au lus la a ni dag/ hU~M na yong du shes par bya/ a ni thabaswa hAM ni shes rab/ a ni dbu su med pa'o// oM ni g.yon gI la le na/ 
277b4(rgyud): hU~M ni ga yi sa gi rang sa ma// a ni ba 'od ting yin// oM ni g.yas/ gi rang sa na// hU~M ni g.yon gi la lan// a de bzhin dbus na gnas// oM ni ga khu ra hUM si la// a ni
277b5(rgyud): dkar la rtsa dmar yin// oM ni mchog dga' hUM ni 'tshed pa'i dga'/ ya ni rang bzhin dgo' ba'i don// dgal la lhan cig skyed pa ste// lhan cig skyes pa dga' bar 'argya
277b6(rgyud): rgyu la 'bras bu// sbyor bar 'gyur// 'bras bu lam ni sgyu sbyor ba// rgyu la rgyu'i sbyor ba'o// 'bras bu la yang 'bras bu sbyor// rgyu 'bras gnyis su med par sbyar// thabs la shes rab sbyor bar
277b7(rgyud): shes rab la yang thabs kyi sbyor thabs dang shes rasbyor/ sbyor ba 'di yis dgongs pa yang kun mkhyen pa yang rtogs par dga'// a ni rnam snang mi skyod pa/ na ro rin chen
277b8(rgyud): ldan te// zla tshes 'od dpag med pa ste// thig le don yod grub pa ste// oM ni bde gshegs lnga rang bzhini// zhabs kyu don yod grub pa ste// 'di ni de bzhin 'ong dpag tu med// ha ni rnam
278a1(rgyud): na n+da/ na/ nanaH/ snang mdzad de/ zla tshes rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ thig le mi skyod rang bzhin no// zhabs kyu sgrol ma rang yang bzhin// ra ni gos dkar ngo bo yin// ha ni
278a2(rgyud): rdo rje dbang phyug tsha de the tshes ma ma kyi rang bzhin no// zig le spyan du shes par bya// 'byung ba lnga dang sku lnga dang // 'khor lo lnga dang dga' ba dang / go rims bzhin du shes par bya// zhabs kyu bya ba nan
278a3(rgyud): tan yin/ la ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// ha ni shes dbyings ye shes so// zla chos so sor rtog pa'o// thig le me long ye shes so// 'di dag kun gi dgongs pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gi tshe
278a4(rgyud): nas gsang // kun zhugasang shing dpyod pa dga'// yi ge tshul gi rgyas btab zod de nas byang chub sems dang / sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang de mkha' 'gra ma'i tshogs kyi
278a5(rgyud): mchod nas// mi snang bar gyur to// mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i snga ma pa tha sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po// rdzogs spyo/ rgya gar gi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ra dang // bor
278a6(rgyud): kyi dge slong shAkya be shes kyis rgyur cing zhus nas btan la pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ bar skad // rad na ma lo tan tra dza ra/ 'od skad du// rin chen 'brang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal ba
278a7(rgyud): ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mos gsol pa rdo rje 'dzin// dpal ldan 'khor lo bsgom pa ru/ rin chen 'brang ba ron ma rtogs/ khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
278a8(rgyud): bka' bsngal pa// nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang gzigs// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa ru// ma gsungs khyod la nga yis bshad// de'i 'phreng ba rnam pa gsum// dang po snod gi rin po che// snod bcud
278b1(rgyud): gnyis dang rang bzhin bral// de na rin chen gsum yang yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa gsum cu gsungs pa la// de rnams rin chen ji ltar lags// de rnam su'i spyod yul lags/ 
278b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// dang po snod gi rin po che// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ ka ka ru ni dkar po ste// mi skyod pa'i byin brlabs ste// dbyibs ni zla ga ma lta bu ste// rab ni ngang pa'i
278b3(rgyud): sgo nga'i tshad// 'di ni rin chen 'bad pa ste// ba ka ra ra kar lug bkar mo'o// 'o ma sku zhing spang ba dang // mi skyod pa la mchod pa bya// de nas spyi bor bdags pa'o// mchod pa bye brag kun la bya// shar
278b4(rgyud): gi gnod rnams thub par bya// gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni/ gzhan sbom po tsam// 'di ni rin chen dag pa ste// rdul chu rnam par blugs la// rkan gi rtsa tshar ba dang // kha'i
278b5(rgyud): nang du bzhugs pa ste/ ro ma'i 'khor lo lde mnan la// de nas ngal nas skyong ba dang // gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse nu bde ba chen po skyes tsam na// ro ma 'i 'khor lo ri dgas mnan// dpe
278b6(rgyud): na sbrul gi nye zos pa/ mgo bo gnan pas mi ru 'byung // de bzhin gshegs las byang chub semos/ sna kyang ni gyen las zlog/ tig la dang ti la mar bzhin du gnas/ khyad par bde gyen du sgre/ bde ba ltar
278b7(rgyud): phyin rin po che// de'i 'brang ba tu mar bshad// the ma skyes pa'i khro bo tsam// e ran la sogs pa sman lnga yang // spyiru rtug tu dgas gyur nas/ pus kyi gnyer ma zang bar byed/ de nas yang dag gnyis pa yang
278b8(rgyud): bye dur rgya ni sngon po ste// rin chen 'byung ldan byin brlabs te// dbyibs kyi sog ka lta bu ste// rab gi tshad gi glang po'i mig/ de ni rin chen myug gu ste// ngang ba'i sgo nga ldong ros dang / spang sha mo dang gsum sbyar na
279a1(rgyud): de dag rna ba g.yas su nags// lho lo gdon rnams thub par gsungs// gang la yod pa de la skyod/ 'bring ni rang ba'i sgo nga tsam/ 'di ni rin chen e ran dang / dag pur rag ta rdul chu gsu
279a2(rgyud): de'i nang byugs lce rgod du/ gyen mthur gnyis ni snang dang zhugs// de'i byang chub sems bzung te// 'gal mo'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas// bye'u yi sgong nga'i tshad tsaman// a ru ra dang sbyar ru ra/ dza ru ra dang
279a3(rgyud): ldosdong ros rnams// sreg ste skus te lus la byug/ 'di ni rang na ga pur ra/ lus kyi srin bu 'byar bar byed/ de nas yang dag gsum pa yang // pad ma ru ka dmar po ste// 'od dpag med kyi byin brlabs ste/ 
279a4(rgyud): rab ni kar sha pa ni stong // gur gum ga pur lnga sbyar lan lde pa'i dbus su zhag la bcings// rad na ke ru ka dang / na nub gi gdon rnams thug par gsungs// 'bring ni ka sha pa ni ldan
279a5(rgyud): 'di ni rad na ka ra ste// mar dang sa le sres ma dang / gzor byas pa'i rtul chu lnga// de'i nang blugs legs par gnas/ 'di'i byang chub sems bzung ste// chu la chu bzhag ci bzhim
279a6(rgyud): yin no// tha ma ka sha ni tsam/ 'bras bu gsum dang ru te// mar gi snying po dang sbyar te// spyi bo'i sdug tu spang bar bya// 'di ni rad na da las/ thA ka ra med par byed pa'on de nas
279a7(rgyud): yan lag bzhi pas yang / de nas mar gad lnga ku ste/ don yod grub pa byin brlabs pa'i/ rab ni the con dbyug pa can/ 'di ni rad na kang ka ri/ rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas naskus
279a8(rgyud): rna ba g.yon du gdags/ 'dis na byang gi gdon rnams byug// 'bring ni rim sgor ba tsam/ ma he de ba um de/ gnyis kyis ga pur ra tag yis// dbyug ste lte ba'i nang du bzhag/ gtsu
279b1(rgyud): si la gnyis ka zin/ tha ma bzhan gyis/ zla ba tsam ldong ros ser po gser dang gtsu man tsa cig ni byin nas ni 'di ni e ru na ra te// srid pa mi skye bde dang ldan/ 'di ni rad na pa ra ta had
279b2(rgyud): de nas yan lag lnga la yang // kha dog dbyibs ni du mar snang // rnam par snan mdzad byin brlabs ste// don rnams so sor du mya byed// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs so so'i skye bo'i yis// 
279b3(rgyud): rin chen gnas rnams gang na tsa la/ rin chen ma tshil ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i phyi rol na/ rin po che'i gling yod do// de'i gnas nas btsal bar byad
279b4(rgyud): gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni// gser rdul la sogs rdo rnams kyi/ gnas ni kuna? la yod par gsungs/ rin chen shes pa rnam pa lda// dang po rgyud rnams thams cad las/ 
279b5(rgyud): rmongs par byed par shes par bya/ bla ma'o man ngag thos pas shes/ gnyis pa rnal 'byor thob pas shes/ gsum pu rgyud kyi man ngag la/ bzhugs pa'i tshong dpon
279b6(rgyud): bo shes/ bzhi po yon tan kun ldan pa// rgyal po chen pos de shes so// lnga pa rnal 'byor pa dang // rgyal po chen po 'brel ba'i/ gser gar mkhas pa rtag par 'gyur/ dang po lan
279b7(rgyud): dag ci ltar lags// gnyis pa rnal 'byor ci ltar lags/ gsum pa rgyud ni ci ltar lags// 'greng ba lnga ni ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal padang po mam pa
279b8(rgyud): shes par khyad/ rin chen ngo bo cig nyid yon tan du mar shes pa ste// dben ni rdzas kyi pha la mkhan/ tshu la mi dbyings 'bigs la sogs du mar shes pa man ngag yin/ rnam 'phyo
280a1(rgyud): shes pa rtse gcig te/ de'i thams cad shes pa yin/ rgyud kyi don ni shes pa yin dang natshong dpon des ni shes pa yin/ sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa'i'adi yon tan
280a2(rgyud): kun ldan rgyal pos shes/ rgyal po'i rnal 'byor dang 'bral ba'i/ sa 'og gser gyi kwing pa shes/ gsor de'i yis shes pa'o// rtag pa rnam pa gnyis yin te mngon gsum
280a3(rgyud): dang ni tshad ma ste/ rdo rje ba la ma la la srogs dang / e ran de la sogs la dang / mngon du btan pa phab pa yin// mra ha ni la sogs pa/ gnon rnams thub cing lha rnams sgyu ba dam tshig
280a4(rgyud): thams pa gsor ba dang / tshenams srid pa la sogs pa'o// da po gdon gi mtshan ma ni/ mkhas rtogs cing zhes par bya// de nas gdod kyi mtshamam med
280a5(rgyud): de nyid cho ga tshul bzhin bya// de nas chu ming bcang ma rud/ gtor ma btang la chu rtsang bla gser rdul snod du chu thugs la// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la srogs
280a6(rgyud): mtshan ma g.yas gi wa da la la// rnal 'byor pa'i bzhag par bya// go mo gsum gi ba racha la/ g.yon gi ma 'di la thog tu t+ya/ chu'i nang du me long bzhag/ phyir ru gtor ma cha cig
280a7(rgyud): sbyin// nang du yol ba dkar po bcad// de ru tshogs dang sna shigs gzhag/ rnal 'byor yan lag grub byas la/ lnga'i rnal 'byor rdzogs pa dang / khro bo drag du 'tshams bcad pa
280a8(rgyud): sngon po khro mo lho ru sgom// de yis rin chen dang po bzung // de nas sor bzhi 'chang du bzhug/ thub pa mthub la sogs// mkhas pa brtag cing shes par bya// dbyibs dang kha rnon po che
280b1(rgyud): yon tan med pa gang du srid// dper na bu cig skyes 'gyur na/ ga pa med pa ni gang du srid// de bas mkhas las rtag par bya/ lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gser rdul la sogs ji
280b2(rgyud): wA ra legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// gser ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// rang bzhin dang ni bzod byas te/ 8 bzhin gis mchi ba smrad// bzor byas las ni rnam men pa gnyis/ 
280b3(rgyud): ga ser 'gyur gser gyi brgyan yin te/ brdar ba'i gser ni srin ni la 'gyegs// lo dang zla ba zla ba che// mkhas pa rtags shes khor bya// rdul la sogs pa yang de bzhin te// mdor na snang
280b4(rgyud): zhing srid pa'i rdzas thams cad rin por che yin te/ man ngag can gris shes pa 'gyur// de nas bcud rin por chen/ lus ni ri rab lhun po la/ rin chen
280b5(rgyud): gser gi g.yel dang // thabs dang shes rab rin po che// shes rab rtsa'i/ rang bzhin ci// thaHsa ni byang chub sem yin no// dmar dang ga ba shi sa raHste// dkar tsi
280b6(rgyud): gdang bza su gsungs// a ba 'du ti rin chen la// thig le gtug mo 'phreng ba yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// a ba 'du ti ji ltar lags// bcom ldan
280b7(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// a ba 'du te rang bzhin la// steng sgra lnga yang dag gnas/ bar de 'og tu 'ang de bzhin la// bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa dang / yon tan skyon gi mtshan nyid de/ 
280b8(rgyud): bde chen thig le ha yin te// oM dang tsU dade tsaM dang bzhinabade ba chen po la 'khor lo'u// ska gsung thugs deng/ de latsho/ 'grin ru ni 'dug pa bzhi/ ka sgrol pa ru yang de bzhin te/ 
281a1(rgyud): chos kyi sku ni rin chen la// stong pa bcu drug 'phreng bar bshad// de nas shin tu gsang ba'i 'od// pad ma rdo rje gnyis pa ni/ a la 'ang tI rin po che/ a pags a dang ba dang bzhi// gsang
281a2(rgyud): ba'i thig le bzhi ru bshad/ a ni me long lta bu ste/ badz+ra ni bya ba nan tan yin// e niso sor rtog pa ste/ ba ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// rin chen chos dbyings ye shes te/ rnam par tha ra dang stong
281a3(rgyud): nyid dang / mtshan dang de bzhin dper byad rnams// a 'i 'khor lo 'byung ba bzhin// phaT kyi gnasu ye shes lde// se'i gnas su snyoms 'jug dgu/ ba~M gi gnas su lnga bcu brgyad// de kho na ru shes
281a4(rgyud): pa ra bya/ kA e e ta sa bon bzhinayon tan skyon gi mtshan nyid kyis// kun la khyad cing shes par bya/ da lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// de'i don rnams ji ltar thug
281a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dag pa ji ltar lags/ skra dkaganyer ma ci ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rnam rtog pa don yin te mtshan dang dpe' byang
281a6(rgyud): spangs pa dang // dbang po lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga// skye mched de nyid lnga ru 'gyur// khams rnams rten cing ngo bo che// 'di rnams ca 'i ngo bo ste// rnam rtog spong phyir rin po che byang sems dag pa'i
281a7(rgyud): rin por che// g.yas rkyang ba ni thabs yin te/ g.yon gi shes rab rtsa bdun dag/ sogs na mkhal dgag par bya// zlum po gsang ba'i sna rtser dgags// la la na dang sa sran/ a
281a8(rgyud): 'dra ti nang chung bas// de na ni mkha' zla bo ste// dper na stsal go lce gnyis dag/ gzhan 'dug dang bye brag gis// dgag pa'i bye brag shes par byed dgag pa'i srog dang rtsa ba ba ste na
281b1(rgyud): de zlar dus su gnas pa dang / ras nas rim du gnas pa dang / skang cigaciganas 'azung ba'i ldanaka gnyer ma'i ring bzhin dag/ gangs na pa de'i tshad/ gsum so gsal pa macom/ 
281b2(rgyud): ldan 'das/ dbus su gnas pa ci cig lags/ rim shes rim pa ci lta 'drang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' spel pa// thabs shes bya ba rtog pa'i mtha'// snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbu
281b3(rgyud): ma'o don// g.yas pa'i srog ni rtog pa'i don// g.yon pa'i rtsol kha chad pa'i mtha'/ ro ma rtag pa'i byang chub sems/ rkyang ma'i khrag zhi tshod pa'o// kun dar ma ru gang gnas pa// de yi dbus
281b4(rgyud): mar shes par bya// mchog gi dga' brtag pa'i mtha' ba'i dgal ba ched la'i mtha'// ldan cig skyes dag/ dpur mar bshad// oM dang hUM ni mtha'i gnyis te/ a yirnam
281b5(rgyud): par dbul mar gsungs// a yi ka li mtha' gnyis te// ma ni yi ge dbu ma yin// skyes pa bud mthul yin te/ nam ni gnyi su med par gsungs// 'do na 'gog pa bzung du 'jug/ shes
281b6(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin pa ru// 'brel pa bzung du 'jug par gsungs// bya ba'i rgyud dang rnal 'byor rgyu do// snang ba bzung 'du 'jug par gsungs// dpal kun gsang ba 'dus pa ru// steng sgo dbugs la zung du
281b7(rgyud): 'jug/ shes rab rnal 'byor bla ma ru/ si la ga pur 'azung du 'jug/ derim nas rim du drang pa la// gsang ba'i 'khor lo a la ni/ bde ba rdzogs pa'i tshad ston nas/ pad ma rdo rje 'gag la sum/ 
281b8(rgyud): de nas yongasu rdzogs pa 'chang de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi// bde chen 'khor lo la bar du phreng // dang po 'di ltar shes par bya// de ltar sems ni rten par 'gyur/ bde par chen po'i 'khor lon
282a1(rgyud): da gsang ba'i ste rtse bar drang / lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcud kyi rin can gang ma gnas/ de'is shes pa su yis shes/ de'i rtag pa ji ltar gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
282a2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas// a ba 'dra ti'i rtsa dag gnas// ro ma sbyang ma sbrul ltar gnas// gzhan pa rnams khug par gnas// 'di rnams kun la rang bzhin gnas/ 
282a3(rgyud): rtsa dang 'khor lo 'di rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pos gsungs// phyi'i rtsa dang nang gi rtse// gsang ba de bzhin mthar thugs nas/ man ngag yin par shes par gsungs// rtag pa rnam pa
282a4(rgyud): ga nyi sa su bstan// dang po lus kyi rtag pa pa ste// gnyis pa dag tu shes par bya// lus la spyi dang bye brag gnyis/ rgyu ni rlung ni rang bzhin te// yan lag thung na chu'i/ 
282a5(rgyud): khams/ sman zheng chen me'i khams/ na sna tshogs dum na mkha khams// spyi ru dka ra la chu'i khams dmar ba ni me'u shes par bya/ ser la de bzhin sa'i khamasad
282a6(rgyud): sngo ba rlung tu shes parabyeyang na rlung gi khams yin te// drod rnams che ba me'i khamasabartan pa'i khams su bshad yin/ chu rnams chen chu'i khams// de rnams ldan kun na mkha'i khams
282a7(rgyud): 'jug pa yid chen ma yin te// ldog pa sprul pa sa ru gsungs/ rnal 'byor rgyud kyi bye zag gis/ sems gi gnas su shes par bya// nu 'chung la sil med/ sbrul dang chos su khe sbyor yin// gzhan
282a8(rgyud): yang mkhas pas shes par bya// de nas bye brag gsum tu ni// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan mar gsungs// kun la khyad par shes par bya// dang po dbyibs kyi rtog pa yang // de 'brel pa'i dbyibs kyi rnam pa bzhi
282b1(rgyud): grub pa'i zlub po rdza ga ma dang / rur gsum du yang shes par bya/ dkar po la sogs dang 'dra/ nabs nas rkang ba'i bar kun la rtag cing shes par bya/ sa cig 'dra shing sdom pa dang / rang du
282b2(rgyud): dadun da re thung ba dang / 'dar ba la sogs bye brag rnams// mkhas pas rtag cing shes par bya/ rtags te rtag pa'i mtshan ma ya ne/ rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// 'dod chags sku la zhe sdang
282b3(rgyud): thugaso// dmun pa gsum du shes par bya// dang po 'dod chags byed pa la/ yang ngo mar ngo tshams dang gsum// mkhas pa 'dod chags skyed la brtag/ nyin par bzhi mtsho nas par bzhid
282b4(rgyud): de bzhin skad cig zang cig cig mkhas pa rtag cing shes par bya/ namig 'dzum pa stu ldong la sogs/ dbyibs kyi 'dod pa skyed pa brtag/ 'dod pa gzigs ldan chu zhing dmar// 
282b5(rgyud): sna stu sa dkar la sogs pa dang // skar 'dar kha ni skam la srogs da/ 'dod pa skyed pa'i rtag su bshad/ gzhan yang 'dod pa skyeng ba'i brtag/ kha dog dbyibs la rtag par bya/ 
282b6(rgyud): snga sa phyir 'dod kha'i rtags// chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// gsungs thugs la shes par bya/ lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags zhes byang pa ci ltar lagasan
282b7(rgyud): de'i chen po ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la srogs ji ltar lags// sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste/ 
282b8(rgyud): bo'i bsam pa ma ta rtogs par// sbas pa'i gsang ba'i la zhen na/ srid pa'i sa bon mi zad par/ dper na rgyud kyi mda' bzhin du'abras bu ma nar med dmyal bar skyed// chen po/ 
283a1(rgyud): ga ma rtog rang bzhin te/ 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes skyed// 'dod chags zhes pa spang bar bya// de'i chen po gnyis por gsungs// 'dod rgyags zhes pa me tog te// 
283a2(rgyud): de'i chen po dri dang 'dra// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// zhe sdang la sogs gong dang 'dra// thams cad rten pas ska ru brtan// brjod pa dang bral gsung du bstan/ rnam rtog bral bas thugs
283a3(rgyud): su shes// rnam rtog chu la rtong phor tshobla ma la gus snying rje che// gzhan yang bye brag kun shes pa// 'di la rten gis kun lags na// bla ma yon tan dang ldan zhing // dbang dang
283a4(rgyud): man dug 'brel shes na// gsang ba'i don la ma rmongs shig/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i/ dechos la ser sna med pa dang // gsul l+ya gson por smra ba dang / rigs
283a5(rgyud): byas kun gi kun pa dang / las kyi phyag rgya'i chang ba dang / dam tshig dang ldan bla ma la// 'di la bkur gi thams cad la/ snyen cing bkur bar bya ba min// lha mos gsol
283a6(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das// gang zhes pa ji ltar lags// sbas pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de'i 'bras bu ci ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bag pa med zhes
283a7(rgyud): bya ye shes su// sum bcu rtsa bdun sku gsung thugs// chos la longs spyodasprul sku dang // dga' bra bzhi ru mngon bsdus pa/ dmigs pa'i rgyan zhes 'di gsang ba'or
283a8(rgyud): btun dang ldan phyir chen po'o// sum de cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa// gnyer po'i stobs kyis mi bzhugs pa// sbas pa pad mang rdo rje gnyis// snyoms par zhugs nas 'dod pa snyed/
