283b1(rgyud): 'dini gan thong ma rung da dper na ljon shing sa bya la ga me tog thams cad spyod/ gnyon mongs ma pa'i 'dad chags las// dug gsum las gas thams cad ste// smras pas
283b2(rgyud): gsung ba mkho'i ba ste/ dgab pa mya ngan 'das pa ste// 'khor bar mnar med dmyal ba sted dur khrod rgyal lo drags pa can snying rje med par sha khrag za/ shing rta'i 'khor la bzhin du gnas// 
283b3(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa sku gsung thugs// skyob pa mya ngan 'das gyur dang // 'khol 'khor ba'i tshul dang ni// tshogs kyi shugs kyi mthu' yis ni// sems can don la yang dag 'dug/ chos sku
283b4(rgyud): sgos rdul namakha' bzhin/ sku gnyis srin dang char tshul sku gnyis sems can doni mdzad pa na sems can las dang smon lam stob sa/ de'i stobs kyis snang ba las// yang
283b5(rgyud): nyid dang las snal 'gyur masku gsum de nyid bzhi za'i don/ dur khrod la sogs 'ang 'du shes na gsum bcuHgnyis chos su'i 'da'adu brgyad ni gzugs sku gnyis kyis
283b6(rgyud): gzhan yang 'di'i bye brag ni// skam khyi'ogasang ba'i rdo rje 'da' 'khros pa'i pad ma'i dza'i// rgu dang 'dra ba yon tan spyod// 'jam po la rten tho ba'i tshul / nga'i gan du tshur shog yon// 
283b7(rgyud): 'arje bo la rten 'dzub mo'i bar// khyod kyi gnas su 'ong gis yin// 'the bo 'dzu gnyis zung gsum ni/ nga ga rgyas sam 'dri ba yin// ba ga ma rgyas zlum por ston// bde ba'i gnas/ 
283b8(rgyud): 'dra bar yang / srod dang tho rangs nam gung gsum/ 'dzub tshigs dang po nam bzung nas/ tha ma'i bar du brda yin no// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs kyin lan gsum bar du/ 
284a1(rgyud): nan tan bzung // gzhan yang brda'i bye brag rnams// rgyud rnams kun tu me gsungs pa/ gnas ni thams cad 'dug pa ste/ gnyis shes rab 'dug sar gsu
284a2(rgyud): zhing ni thams kyi ma chagasanacanan gas rab nye ba ning // 'dub zab sa kyi rob ste/ ni shes rab 'ong bcad du yin// tshan do thabs kyi spyan dang ban/ shes rabar ba nan nyimanan
284a3(rgyud): dur khrod thabs ni nas rtog bral// de bzhin shes rab nye dur khrod// gzhan yang dza'i byi zag rnams// kha dog de bzhin dbyings dang yang yan lag tshul rtsa las shes par bya// de rnams lha mos
284a4(rgyud): mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang ba gyur to/ rgyud kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i yang gas pas/ rang bzhin gis gsang ba di
284a5(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin chen rdo rje dang // dge slong shAkya legs kyis sbyar ba'o// // rgya gar skad
284a6(rgyud): ma hA sa mo ya tan tra naH/ bod skad du/ dam tshig chen po'i rgyud zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyaga'i tshal lo// / 'di skad skad bdag gis tha
284a7(rgyud): pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kyi thams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rdo rje btsun mol ge l-i sums par bzhugs so// de nas bya bachun sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
284a8(rgyud): sring ba dang / rnal 'byor grangs med pa'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la zhal 'dzum la mdzas nas dam tshig rim par bka' bstsal la/ dam tshig na
284b1(rgyud): ni mi ldan na// sgrub dang sgrub par mi 'gyur ro// rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu bzhin// tshe'i dus byas dmyale bar 'gro// de phyir dam tshig shin tu srung / sangs rgyas bla ma la thob phyir/ mthung mo nga ma yin
284b2(rgyud): tha ma yin/ lnga bcu dag nyid srung bar bya// mthun mong brgyad dang bcu gnyis te// de rnams med par shes par bya/ de rnams spyil dam tshig ste// bye brag dam tshig bsrung ba dang // phung po lnga ni rig
284b3(rgyud): lnga ste// 'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga'o// skye mche de snyems dpa' sems rma yin// gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad la// brjed dang gnyes pa la sogs spangs// de la mchod dang stod stsogs bya// don
284b4(rgyud): dam pa yang rang rig ste// tshogs bsags phyir ni nga'i gsungs// tsher ba la sogs de dang 'dra// sa ni sangs rgyas spyan yin te// spyod lam gsum du ma g.yengs shig/ gong du gsu
284b5(rgyud): tshul bzhin srung // chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// rig la srogs pa de bzhin no// gzugs la sogs pa de bzhin no// dkyi'o 'khor du gzhugs rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa shin du mchod// 
284b6(rgyud): b.rus shing gshe ba la spogs spangs// sems can po dang mo kun la// dpa'o dpa' mo dam tshig bsrungs// bza' ba la stsogs dang su yang // bdud rtse sbyor bas dam tshig bzung // sha lnga
284b7(rgyud): bdud rtsa lnga rnams la// rang gi sbyor dang gzhan sbyor la// rjes su yid rang dam tshig yin// mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas// dam tshig srung phyir mchod pa'i rdzas// lus kyi nyes sgom sku yin te// 
284b8(rgyud): ngag ni nyes sdom gsung du gsungs/ yid kyi nyes sdom thugs su gsungs// oM gi 'od zer dkar po'i/ 'dod khams dag par 'gyur ba'i// sku'i dam tshig srung ba'o/ de mchod
285a1(rgyud): dang stod sngogs bya// bsdu ba yang oM du shes par bya// oM gyi kha dog dmar po'o// gzugs khams dag pa dam tshig ldan// hUM ni kha dog nag po yis// gzugs med
285a2(rgyud): dag pa dam tshig go// oM ni spyi bor yang dag gnas// a ni de bzhin 'grin par gnas hUM ni snying khar sngo dang su// sku'i mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// 'dod khams dag pa dam tshig ga
285a3(rgyud): gsung gi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// gzugs khams dag pa de tshig yin// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyi su// gzu med pI dam tshig ste// oM dang A da tsU dang sku// oM nr-i r+g+haM ba sku gnyis// a ni laM gi dku cu gi/ 
285a4(rgyud): hUM ni 'bras bu'i sgo bcu gnyis// bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs/ ye shes cig sbyor sdom pa'o// dang ldan chos kyi sku gsu dathugs// ye shes cig sbyar sdom pa'ido// lo nges spyod rdzogs pa sku gsung ku/ 
285a5(rgyud): ye shes gcig sbyor sngo ba'o// sprul/ yang ni sku gsung thuT// ba tshe/ snying po haM nyid la sku dang gsung dang thugs yang // ye shes dang ni rnam pa bzhi// AM dang A dong ts+tsha dang yaM// yA dag
285a6(rgyud): zhi ni bzhi ru gsungs// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bya la// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad shes par bya// AM dang hUM gaM nyis rang bzhin gis// sngoT kyi ngo bo shes par bya// sngaT kyi grangs ni nyi khri stong // drug brgya zlas pas shes
285a7(rgyud): par bya ba lag pa sbyang ba rang bzhin ga ra// rkang dang rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lo// de ltar gnas na dam tshig go// gzhan yang dam tshig bye brag kyang // 'jig rten tha snyad spangs pa'i phyir// ma skyod rnam snang
285a8(rgyud): la srogs dang dpa' bo mkha 'gro ma zhes pa/ gsang ba'i rdo rje ma pad ma dang / ji ltar rol pa'i spyod yul kun/ tha snyad kyang ni la la 'jug/ gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshig la rtsa ba bzhi
285b1(rgyud): dang / lag yan lag bcu/ thegs che la smod pa dang / gsang ba'i don la skur 'debs dang / rnal 'byor kun la smod pa rung / sems can rnams la 'tshe byed dang / 'di gsang ba ni dam tshig gi/ spros pa goms par rim
285b2(rgyud): yang / ma byin len blangs pa dam tshig ste// 'dod chags chen po dang ldan pa yi// 'dod spyod pa ni de dang 'dzi rang gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir// brdzun du smra ba bzhi pa yin// ro mA sha dang bcud
285b3(rgyud): kI sha ta kha ba'i chang dang dang ra ba'i chang // mar la gnyis te 'o ma gcig/ zhag ni gsum ste yan lag bcu/ 'di ldan dam tshig yin par bsrungs// ba dad rtsi nyid la dus gsu ma du// bcom ldan skra
285b4(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi ste/ dang po nyungs kar tha ma ya/ byi la'ikham gyi tshul du bza'// mtshan mo shes rab sku gsung thugs// nyi ma nub dang nyi ma shar// nyi ma gung gi tha~M gr-is kyi
285b5(rgyud): dusanam sros na ma ni langs pa dang // nam gyi dgung ni shes rab dus// dus drug mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// dam tshig 'di la ma nyams na/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams na
285b6(rgyud): bzhugs pa yi// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma mo rnams// mchod dang bsrung ba la srogs byed// gzhon yod gsang ba'i bye brag la// gsang ba'i sgom pa rnal 'byor pas// lus la me dang khrag mi 'don/ 
285b7(rgyud): srog gam zug rngu phyir mi rtogs// srog chags 'dod pa spyod pa mthong na// rang gi rnal 'byor shor mi bya// dam tshig bsrang phyir dben par 'dag/ las su rung na g.yeng bar 'khyam// 'di skad ces
285b8(rgyud): bya yan lag brgyad// bdag gi bcu ni yin par gsungs// thos pa'i dus gcig lnga bcu'i don// / bcom ldan 'das ni rna ba bzhi// de bzhin gshegs par yan lag bcu/ sku gsung thugs
286a1(rgyud): thugs ni lus ngag yin// rdo rje mi 'byid phyir dam tshig/ btsun mo dam tshig gis rgyan mdzes// ba ga la snyoms par 'jug 'joms pa'od// snyoms par dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba// bzhugs
286a2(rgyud): pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo la'o// snying rje chen pos gsol pa// bye brag yin par nga yis gsungs// e ni yan lag brgyad yin no// baM ni bcu pa'i rang bzhin te/ ma lnga bcu'i rang bzhin no// ya ni gzhan rnams
286a3(rgyud): yin par gsungs// e ni srogs bsad pa ste/ ba~M ni ma byin len pa ste// ma ni rdzun du smra ba ste// ya ni 'dod chags spyod pa ste// e ni sku yi dam tshig ste// baM ni gsung gi dam tshig go// ma ni thug/ 
286a4(rgyud): kyi dam tshig go// ya ni bza' ba'i dam tshig go// dus gsum dam tshig ma bsrungs na// 'jig rten pa dang 'bum gyur pa'i// rnam smin che bar nga yis gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa'i
286a5(rgyud): mtshan ma ni// lus kyi nyes pa sna tshogs 'byung // ngag gi nyes pa sna tshogs smra/ kha dog dbyibs ni rnams 'gyur/ ba dang / lag gi rdzas mi 'thub cing // 'bras dang shu ba la sogs 'byung
286a6(rgyud): de tshe rnal 'byor nyams pa'i mtshan ma ni// lus kyi nye ba sna tshogs 'byung // dam tshig nyams pa shin tu bsam// bla ma 'am rdo rje skyon 'gram tu/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul byas la/ 
286a7(rgyud): gser rdul la sngogs brgya 'am stong // rta dang glang po la sngags dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan brgya 'am stong / mar me la spogs de bzhin no// tshogs gi
286a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen pos bskor// tshogs bsags pas ni nyams pa bsro// gal te nyams pa gsos na// nyams pa de dang rnal 'byor gzhan// gnas gcig dang ni chu gcig dang // yul
286b1(rgyud): dang lam gyi gnas gcig gam// skad cig tsam yang 'dug mi bya// 'dug na nyes pa bsam mi khyab/ rang gnas sbyin sreg dbang skur dang // gtor ma mchod dang bzlas pa dang // ri lu mig sman la sogs dang / 
286b2(rgyud): zhi rgyas la srogs las rnams dang // 'jig rten mtshan ma brgyad dag dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i mtshan ma bzhi// sangs rgyas pa yi mtshan ma gcig/ gzhan yang dngos grub ma lus pa// dam tshis
286b3(rgyud): 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur// 'bru rnams sna tshogs bskyed 'gyur ba// rin chen sa las skyes pa yin// dam tshig sku gsung thugs yin te// de las 'das nas dam tshig 'gyur// ji lta bur ni
286b4(rgyud): med pa'i ming // shi ma thag tu stong par 'gyur// de bzhin dam tshig 'di med na/ mnar med sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ pi wang gling bu sbyor kun spogs/ rgyu dang bral na
286b5(rgyud): gdung mi rung // de bzhin dam tshig med 'gyur na// bsngags bzlas sgom pa ma rdzogs par// 'bras med par ni bklag par 'gyur// nas la nas kyi myu gu skye// dam
286b6(rgyud): tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang // tshe 'di thob par gsungs pa ste// dus ni gzhon min spyod ldan dus// bstan bya gzhan min nga yi ste// skye ba gzhan min pa dang ma// bzhi ni yin par gsungs pa'o// de ltar
286b7(rgyud): dam tshig dang ldan pa/ bud med 'dra zhing dga' bar 'gyur// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mar bstan// nor dang bran dang g.yog 'khor dang // rgyal po'i yul 'khor la srog
286b8(rgyud): 'du ta ngag ni snyan pa bde bar 'gyur// srog spyod la srogs tshigs smras kyang // sems can skrag par mi 'gyur ro// lus kyi sems can gsad byas kyang // rnam smin 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bsku ni thob par
287a1(rgyud): ngas gsungs so// ngag gi phra mo'i tshig smras kyang // nye bar mi 'gyur gsungs thob 'gyur// yid kyi mnar ma sems byas gyur kyang // nges par mi 'gyur thugs thob 'gyur// dam chis
287a2(rgyud): ldan pa'i yon tan no// e ma'o rgyud ni ngo re 'tshal ka/ dam tshig chen po'i rgyud rdzog s+ho// ka g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
287a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shi ma hA pa la tan tra na ma/ bod skad du// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal sdom pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
287a4(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang / dpa' bo tshogs dang / la ma la spogs mkha'
287a5(rgyud): 'gro ma dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so// 'jig rten na ni cher grags pa// dgra ni chen po drug yin te/ 
287a6(rgyud): de ltar nyi ma nub pa'i tshe// grong khyer gyi ni mi rnams kun// rta dang glang po la sogs dang // rdzas rnams rab tu 'phrog par byed// thams cad dman pa dbul por skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin yul drug tu ni drags
287a7(rgyud): shes rab nyings nub pa'i tshe// ma rig pa'i mun pa la// so sor skye bo thams cad kyi// ye shes lnga la sogs pa yi// rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed// bde ba med pa gnas su skye// dgra ni yongs
287a8(rgyud): su gzhom pa'i phyir// mchod pa med cing bzlas pa med// gtor ma sbyin sreg man 'dal med// klog dang skar ma bsam gtan med// g.yeng ba'i tshes dang skar ma'i tshogs// thams cad bde ba spangs te bde ba yaM/ 
287b1(rgyud): stan la bdag nyid lags 'dug ste/ shes rab ye shes grub par byed// shing rta'i 'khor lo ltar// yul la yang dag rgyug pa'i sems// de dag la ni bzlog nas su// las kyi rlung ni chen po g.yos
287b2(rgyud): ye shes me ni chen po 'bar// rnam rtog srogs te bdud rtsi'i ro// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// skye ba med pa'i gnas su bzung // de nas sems ni rten gyur na// mtshan mar snang ba 'gags par
287b3(rgyud): 'gyur// de la las ni bzlogs gnas su// rang sems stong pa sgom par bya// chos la bdag med rtogs pa na// de tshe sems ni rtogs par 'gyur// thams cad stong par ros gang ste// 
287b4(rgyud): bde ba chen po sku zhes brjod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste/ 'di la gsal ba ci yang med// snang bar bya ba ci yang med// de nyid mthong ba rnam par grol// rigs
287b5(rgyud): gcig dang ni rigs gsum dang // rigs lnga rigs ni brgyal stsogs de nyid 'dis ga dang med// ji ltar glang po'i rnas ni rnyed 'gyur na// glang po'i rjes ni mi tsal ltar// sems
287b6(rgyud): kyi de nyid rnyed 'gyur na// rnam rtog gang yang mi tsal lo// ji ltar 'dag cing 'dod pa la/ sman nyid dag tu sbyar la sbyin// sman la dug tu sbyor ba yang // sman pa mkhas pas sbar bas shes
287b7(rgyud): gzhazhon yang mar dang kha ra dang // mar gyi snying po la sogs pa// mthungs te zhu na sman du 'gyur// de bzhin ngas ni gsungs pa yang // drang po'i don dang nyes pa'i don// sgra ni ji bzhin nyin ji bzhin/ 
287b8(rgyud): dgongs pa dang ni dgongs pa min// srog gcad 'dar ba'i gser bzhin du// yongs su bdags nas nga yi bka'// blang bar bya ba'i mos pa 'am// gzhan gyi mkhas pa 'jug mi bya// de ltar skyes bu
288a1(rgyud): bluglan po ste// dag ru gyur pa'i skyes bu yis// sman yin byas te dug byin la// sman du dmigs te dug zos pa// zos pa'i rjes la 'chi bar 'gyur// thabs rnams thams cad
288a2(rgyud): sgyu ma ste// shes rab brjod du med par gsungs// 'di ltar rig pa mkhas pa yis// dug ni dug gis byin par bya// ji ltar me yis tshig pa la// de bzhin mo yis gdung bar bya// ji ltar
288a3(rgyud): 'dod chags che ba la// 'dod chags nyid kyis spang bar bya// ji ltar zhe sdang che ba dang // zhe sdang nyid kyis sdang bar bya// de bzhin gti mug che ba la// gti mug nyid kyis spang bar bya// dper na rlung gi/ 
288a4(rgyud): mar me 'jig pa de nyid nags sregs me'i grogs su 'gyur// 'dod chags la rten bde ba'i yul// drug gis dgra rnams bcom nas gnyis med thob// ri lu mig sman la srogs 'di las
288a5(rgyud): byung / ji ltar pha rol thabs ldan pas// gzings la brten nas pha rol 'gro/ pha rol phyin nas dor bar byed// de bzhin rang rig tshol las kyang // bud med sgyu ma la brten te// rang
288a6(rgyud): rig ye shes thob par byed// rang rig ye shes thob pa dang // bud med sgyu mang dor bar byed// bzang mo'i dgongs pa ma gtogs pa// zab mo spyad pa spyod par byed// sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung // ji ltar ri yi rtse no// 
288a7(rgyud): nas ha skyes bu 'ga' zhig ltung 'gyur na// de ni lhung ba chen por 'gyur// gzhan yang dar gyi srin bu yis// rang la rang gi 'ching bar 'gyur// mtshan mo me ye srin bu yang // rang gis rang ni srog par byed// sgyu
288a8(rgyud): ma tsam gyis tshul gnas shing // mtha' bzhi las ni rnam par grol// spros pa thams cad nye bar ni// mtsho bya mtsho byed ma yin te// lta ba dbus nas gnas pa yi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i
288b1(rgyud): rgyud las// mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / gang zhig rtag par bya ba yang // gnas ni shin du bsngags pa ru// khru do ba'i man 'dal la// dang po pa'i rnam lnga yang // sor gcig tsam
288b2(rgyud): du dbyug par bya// de nas dri chen dri chu yis// dbyugs te me tog sngon po bkram// rgyan la sngogs pas mdzes par bya// bum pa lnga ni phyogs dang dbus// de nas bzlas pa khri dang 'bum// bdud rtsi chu ru byin brlabs ted
288b3(rgyud): gang zhig rtag pa'i me de la// dang po 'tshams bcad khrus te// skrag pa nag po phyir zlog gyon// skra ni gyen bcings sha bcings dang // ber ga thogs te shar sgor bzhag/ tshil chen me 'bar shar du ltam/ nub tu me long
288b4(rgyud): dngul la srogs// dag pa de la sman lnga dang // dri sngas byugs ste bkram par bya// de nas me long nang du yang // gdon gyi mtshan ma rtag par bya// gtso bo'i sngags kyi mtha' ru ni// gdon gyi ming
288b5(rgyud): dang sngags btags nas// lha mo gdon la sogs pa kun// mtshan mar 'byung bar the tsom med// mi de rgyan ni tha dad rte/ lha la srogs mthong bye brag gis// dus ni 'byung po'i nyi ma spogs/ 
288b6(rgyud): mtshan ma la sogs 'byung ba'i tshe// de tshe gdon ni dbang du bsdu// tshe dang bsod nams long spyod dang // mdza' shes zug rngu la sogs pa// gdon la byung ba gsal ba'i phyir// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro ma srogs la// 
288b7(rgyud): brtag pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag kyang // mchod dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo srogs// bskor ba mtshan ma rtag par bya// dbang skur dus gsum ye shes kyang // dbab pa de bzhin sdig la sogs// mtshan ma me long dag
288b8(rgyud): la ni ha brtags te gzhan yang pa ci 'dod pa yi// mtshan ma brtags pa bla ma yi// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// nad kyi zug rngu 'byung ba'i phyir// gso ba'i rigs par ma gsungs pa'o// rlung dang
289a1(rgyud): bad kan 'khrigs pa dang // 'dus pa dang ni yan lag bcas// gnas bzhi'i 'khor lo gnas pa ste// lus kun 'khrus byas gnas bzhi na// gsang sngags lag pa gnyen byas te/ 
289a2(rgyud): me long dkyil du btags byas na/ brlung la sogs pa shes par nges// rdo rje 'khor lo de nyid la// gso ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya// dug ni brtag pa'i rig pa yang // nang rol yan lag thams cad la// 
289a3(rgyud): du dug zhugs mtshan brtags// de nas gso ba'i sbyor ba yang // sman dang sngags dang cud byas te// mkhas pas brtags nas gso bar bya// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ mtshan ma thams cad
289a4(rgyud): brtag pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// / gang zhig bsrung ba'i rten de yang // gang dang ldan pa'i rim pa yis// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam par bya// gso ba bzlas pa
289a5(rgyud): khri 'am 'bum// bsnyen pa byas te de nas yang // gser ram/ dngul la bzo byas te// nang du dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa 'am// rdo rje ra ba la spogs bya// yung kar la srogs 'bru
289a6(rgyud): lnga dang // rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // de nas gzhag te rab gnas kyang // yongs su rdzogs nas bcings par bya// gzhan yang gro ga 'am shing shan nam// dur khrod dag gis ro sangs la// gsang
289a7(rgyud): dang dges srad tshul bzhin bya// bzlas pa gong dang 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs gyur na// sngags dang yongs su rdzogs pa bri/ sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis// lus ngag yid las
289a8(rgyud): bsrung ba bya// yongs su ma rdzogs zur drug la// dpa' bo drug gi bsngags bris la// bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan mar sgom// rtsibs mtshan drug la g.yung drung gi/ yi ge drug ni bris pa ste// bsrung
289b1(rgyud): bya'i lus mtshan mar skom/ dbus su yi geg bris te/ bar chad thams cad 'gags par bsam/ cho ga yongs su rdzogs byas te/ bzo byas snod ni kha dog 'gyur// leg par sbas te spyi bo 'am/ mgrin
289b2(rgyud): pa de bzhin dpung pa yi// tshangs pa'i bu gar long spyod mnyam// sor bzhi dag tu bcings par bya// gzhan yang nad pa 'am rnal 'byor pa// bdag la bsrung na dang por yang // gdon gsol ba ste gnas gsu
289b3(rgyud): duHthig le gsum byas sngags gsum dgod// gzhan yang gnas ni sum bcu bdun// thig le byas te sngags rnams dgod// de nas go cha mchod pa yang // tshul dang 'thun par shes par bya// de nas
289b4(rgyud): stan nam mal cha la// oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ sgo dang gzhan la bri bar bya// gzhan yang lag pa g.yas pa yi/ 'thil du gur gum dag sbyar te// g.yon gyi sbom po 'khro mo/ 
289b5(rgyud): yis ta spyi bo bral ba rna ba mig/ snga dang kha dang mgrin pa rudapung pa snying kha lte ba dang // 'og gi sgo gnyis yan lag la// sngags dang bcas na legs par 'tshol// gzhan
289b6(rgyud): yang skud pa sna lnga la// sngags dang bcas nas bsrung bar 'gyur// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i rim pa ste/ gsum pa'o// / mgon po thugs rje
289b7(rgyud): che ldan pa// de nyid la ni phyag 'tshal nas// rdo rje snying po yang zhus pa// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo de ltar na// ye shes bye brag ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ ye shes kyi ni de nyid kyi/ rtag
289b8(rgyud): pa rab tu bshad par bya// de la ye shes kyi ni gnas// rnam pa lnga ru zhes par bya// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rab tu gsang dang gsang ba che// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// de phyir phyi'i ye shes ni
290a1(rgyud): su phyag macan dang blal/ de nar rtogs pa phyi'i ye shes/ nang gi phung sa sa sogs sa bu brtag pa de 'i dang nyid ma shes so// de nas gsang ba mi mi shes ni/ rtswa dang drung dang brig par rlos
290a2(rgyud): rdeg pa de dang bral ba no// gsang ba'i ye shes yin par bshad// dga' dang mchog dga' brul ba'i dga'// lhan cig skyes dga' gang mid pa/ de brtog pa gang yin pa/ gan nyid spangs pa ye shes so// 
290a3(rgyud): ye shes ye shes chen po ni// dngos po ro mnyam mtha' spangs pa'i// sems kyi de nyid stong pa yi// rnam rtog spangs te ji bzhin 'jog/ de ni rang rig chen po ste// de nyid ye shes chen po yi// brtag
290a4(rgyud): da nyid bshad par bya// dang ba re mnyam gyur pa yaM// de ltar shes na du rtor 'dzin gyis// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal chen po'i rgyud las// ye shes brtag pa'i le'u ste/ 
290a5(rgyud): bzhi pa'o// // de nas ye shes chen po yi// brtag pa de nyid bshad par bya// dang po ro mnyam gyur pa yi// stong pa nyid kyi ro tshon la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs dang / 
290a6(rgyud): phung po khams dang skye mchen srogs// rtswa dang rlung dang thig le dang // dga' dang mchog dang dga' bral dang // de la sogs pa thams cad kun// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// de ni gzhan rig zhes byar ste/ 
290a7(rgyud): rang rig sems kyi de nyid la// gnyis su med par sgom par bya// de nyid ye shes chen po ste// mthar phyin partag pa rdzogs pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las// ye shes chen po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// 
290a8(rgyud): de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rjes su yi rang nas// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pas mchod nas/ 
290b1(rgyud): g.yon phyogs nas lan gsum skor ba byas te/ mi snang bar gyur to// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud zhes bya ba rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar mkhan po rad na badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes sgyur cing brtan
290b2(rgyud): la phab// / @#/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra d+ha ki ni g+ha ha tan tra na tsa/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// kye hoH
290b3(rgyud): dngos rdzogs rgyal po kye/ dbang rnams dam pa yod dam ci// gtso 'khor khyad par med dam ci// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag tha dad med dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rnam rtog
290b4(rgyud): bzung 'dzin dgag pa dang // rang rig ye shes thugs pa'i phyir// dab rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bomadabang ni nges pa kho na'o// sus ngag kun las bzang ba dang / de phyir
290b5(rgyud): sems kyi dri ma ni/ 'khrung dang 'dor dang sreg pa dang // mkhyen pa'i rten dang gi 'byed pas/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung namakha' snga bur gsungs pa 'o// dedza ba gnyis pa gsum pa dang / 
290b6(rgyud): rim gyis ma drod dbang ma thog/ skyes pa'i rim pa legs nas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams dang // thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ skabs kyi rim pa lta shur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las
290b7(rgyud): dang po// mngon par brtags pa'i rim pa dang // mngon par rtogs pa yan lag ste// 'di yis ngan 'gro'i srid las grol// dbang dang man ngag 'brel pa'o// de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro me
290b8(rgyud): 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// slobs dpon sems kyi rgyal po ste// 'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang // 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag spogs bya// rdo shing 'dra ba'i 'dra bag la spogs pa'i// 
291a1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa dang // ras dang mtshon la sogs pa yi// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la// byin pa ye shes byas nas su// lha yin zer mchod la sogs te/ 
291a2(rgyud): bcos ma'i lha tshogs de ltar na// dpung tshogs ye shes sangs rgyas sa// ci'i phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan pa bden pa dag/ 'khrul pa yi ni 'khrul bzhi dag/ bcos ma med par bcos ma dag
291a3(rgyud): 'dra dang 'dra ba lta bu'o// dbang bzhi grol bar mi 'gyur te// log pa log pa srid pa 'ching // 'khrul pas 'khor lo skor bskor// de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // lha'i bu'i bdud spangs te// bla ma dam/ 
291a4(rgyud): rtag tu bsten// yid ches rigs dang nges pa skye// lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang // 'og ma spong bzhi gong ma 'thob// man ngag tshad ma yin par blang // mos pa'i rjes su 'breng byed
291a5(rgyud): cing / che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing // 'jig rten lta spyod// 'de ba yi// snod bcud blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas kyi khyad par bye brag ste// rgyan
291a6(rgyud): gyi khyad par bral ba ste// rigs kyi khyad par drug pa rigaso// phyag dang zha bas sogs khyad par rigs// gtso 'khor la sogs khyad par rig/ dper na pha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin
291a7(rgyud): med na// pha rol phyin pa nga mi thob// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gnas pa'i// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor ste// gang zhig dbus su mi gnas no// 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du mi gnas// dper na
291a8(rgyud): rgyal po med pa'i grong // grong dang grong khyer ji bzhin no// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// sku
291b1(rgyud): / gsod pa sa gyu / rdzun byu bye pa dang / 'dod nugs ga dngang du ga sa pa'i dam sa byasas 'gyur na// chud pa'i dam tshas dadang 'dru chu
291b2(rgyud): chos mi zhes som tsam gdam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dpe chen mkhodza ma gyur ba'i rgyam po bral ba'i rin chen bdun po de dag gis/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i ming ni mi thob bzhin// bla ma'i zhas nas
291b3(rgyud): thams cad shes par bya/ de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang / nus cam byed par med mod kyi/ rang 'i sa rten dag nas kyang / rang sems las rung ba dang // ma rung ba dang mas kyi mnga'
291b4(rgyud): log pa pa ni ma lon pa// don byed nus dang mi nus dang / yongs su rdzogs pa sa rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med snang // pa dad par nis bstan to// num
291b5(rgyud): sarapa rnamapa' bzhin/ rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod yang sems rang gis rtogs pas na// sems 'dod nas sangs rgyas so// rdo rje lag mas yang nus pa// srog sbyong
291b6(rgyud): kha sogs dam tshig la// g.yeng ba khyed kyi bdag la bsrungs// rang gi lus ngag sems yod kyi// gsang ba'i 'du shes ma skyes nas// srog spyod nyams pa chung bar nges// gzhan gyi gnod pa ro ni tshor ba
291b7(rgyud): dag nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// de la zlog pa chen por nges// gang zhig ma byin chung blangs kyang // gzhan la nyon mongs cher skyes na// de ni nyams su 'bring du nges// cher blangs nyon mongs chung
291b8(rgyud): dang 'bring // chen po las ni nyon mongs cher// de ni chen po kho nar nges// tshul chos srung brtan pa ste// brjed pa la phyogs 'bring du gsungs// gzhan du dam tshig nyams pa yi// che 'bring chung ngu dam chig/ 
292a1(rgyud): dag rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga ya~M/ rgya rkyen dag mas zhes byas te// srung batsho yis zin pa dang / phyi na dzin slob dpon gyis// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po banas
292a2(rgyud): dang 'thun par gshegs par bya// dam tshig gong 'og bye brag kIs// tha ma'i dkyis 'khor shes por bya// gnan yang gshegs pa'i bye brag sas/ sbyin sreg gis ni sdig sreg phyir/ nang gi rgya
292a3(rgyud): srog chen po'o// bab pa'i me ni rgyan bzhag med/ thangs kyi rkyen banag ma yin no// po bdun danas gcig pa// phyi'i sbyin pa nag rtson po sa// zla ba gsum dang 'dun dag dang // 'bring
292a4(rgyud): gsungs te zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag me ni chung ngu gsungs// rgyas pa ma sogs de bzhin te// rang bzhin 'dod nas gsungs pa yi// brtum mo'i ye shes rang bzhin// 'di
292a5(rgyud): ni rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// thog ma med par gnas paH/ me// thog ma med par gnas pa'i phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i 'bud shing spogs// ye shes me yi bud shing yin/ 
292a6(rgyud): man ngag can gyis sreg byas na// nyams pa'i shing sngogs 'jogs par nges// dgang gzar la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sngogs de dang 'dra// rgyu 'di brtan gyi legs par bzung // thams cad
292a7(rgyud): dga' zhing 'gu bar 'gyur// dpal mkha' 'gro gsang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya d+hA ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
292a8(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shi gnyen na ma le tan tra ra tsa// bod skad du/ dpal ye shes 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// kye legs
292b1(rgyud): gsang bdag rdo rje mtshan// gsang ba bla na med pa yi// lta ba zhes bya gang zhig lags// spyod pa gang dang gang lags pa// gtso bo bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
292b2(rgyud): lta ba shes rab pha rol phyin// don la spos bral lhun gyis grub// rang rig ye shes dbyings nas gas ma// rang rig mun pa'i sgrib pa med// shes rab snying po rtser byung bas// lta ba kun gyi
292b3(rgyud): yang rtse yin// don dam par rang rig ye shes la// blang ba med cing dor ba med// dman dang gya nom gnyi ga med// sgom pa po med sgom byed med// dmigs med gnas su snying rje dang // dmigs
292b4(rgyud): med gnas su shes rab dang // blo dang lhan cig gcig sgyur ba/ na mkha' na mkha' ji bzhin no// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog sgom pa min// dman pa rnams
292b5(rgyud): la sbyar mi 'debs// de nyid la yang sgom mi bdag/ dngos bor skal par sgom pa bas// rang gi sems skad zos pa yis// brgya stong la srogs char mi phod// dpe dang 'greng bar
292b6(rgyud): mi nus te// dper na mtsho dang glang chen bzhin// dngos por bsgom pas sgom mi bya// dngos med pa'ang sgom pa min// dngos med dngos po ro mnyam na// ma sgoms na yang dra sgom pa nyid// sgom dang
292b7(rgyud): mi sgom gnyi ga med// 'od gsal de la sems zin na// bzung 'dzin dge'i dpung rnams 'joms// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i gnas// rab kyi mnyam
292b8(rgyud): bzhag rjes thob spangs// 'bring gi rjes thob stong par lta// tha mas rjes thob sgyu mar wA// seng ge stang bu'i sa spyod ni// bzhi pa yin par rtogs// de phyir spyod pa'i rgyal po bstan// gnas pa'i rgyan dang g.yeng
293a1(rgyud): ba'i rgyan// de phyir zung 'jug rgyal po bstan/ rkyen dang dbang po rab 'bring gis// mnyam bzhag rjes thob rgyal po ston// 'khrul pa dazung 'dzin gnyis su rtags// de phyir sems kyi de nyid bstan/ 
293a2(rgyud): lta spyod 'di la nan tan gyis// de nas thams cad dga' zhing 'gu nas yid rangs te/ phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod nas/ mi snang bar gyur to// dpal ye shes 'brang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba lta spyod/ 
293a3(rgyud): sman du byung ba rdzog s+ho// / rnal 'byor pa tsa dra ma le dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shi badz+ra la gnya' na
293a4(rgyud): tan tra ra tsa// bod skad du// dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma sangs rgyas/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
293a5(rgyud): rgyud gang lags/ rgyal po gang / ye shes gang / 'bar ba gang / dpal ni gang lags/ bdag la gsungs 'jigs byed chen pos bka' bstsal pa/ dpal ni ye shes chen po ste/ 
293a6(rgyud): gnyis med bde chen ro langs byung // bzung 'dzin mtha' spangs rang rig gis// sna tshogs 'dud las ye shes dbang // rang byin dbyer byin brlabs pa lta ba ste// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsang ba ri rud
293a7(rgyud): sprin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu ltar// thung du gnas shing ring du 'byung // de nyid bral dang kha dbye dang / rgyas par bya ba gsum yod te// drang po drang ba'i rnam pa yang // dros pa'i tshad ni gsum yod te// sku gsum
293a8(rgyud): yon tan kun ldan na// gso bzhi phyi ru 'byung bar nges// 'bring las sor gnyis tha ma yang // sor dang nas kyi tshad kyis 'byung / ne sbom 'phra gzhan skyes phra mo tsam// dang po bya don nyid na gnas// rnam thar sor gnyis
293b1(rgyud): skye mched bzhi// bstod pa drug ste khams sor brgyad// nyi shu lte ba nyi shu lnga// snying ga ru ni gnas pa'o// spyan la sogs pa'i kun ldan pas// dra ba'i sbyor btsam par bya// rnam kun reg snang sku regs bcings pa dang / 
293b2(rgyud): rgyab yo la dbul dang mchod pa dbu la// gdan khri dbul dang skra khrus gsol// sman mchod dbul dang me mchod dbul// de nas reg bya'i mchod pa dbul// kan rdzob lce'i rtse mo tsam// 'khro mo'i 'dzab mo'i rtse mo la// 
293b3(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i ri lu legs byas te// mkhas pa'i reg bya'i mchod pa dbul// mngon du shes pa gdon mi za// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// khams gsum mchod par gdon mi za// dar dmar men ni sor bzhi tshad// 
293b4(rgyud): rkyed pa sku regs dbul bar bya// sprul pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su// ras la spogs pa rgyab yol dbul// shing bu rigs dang 'thun pa yi// sbom 'phra rigs kyi bdag po tsam// dri med sman
293b5(rgyud): dang snum ldan pa'i// gzug rngu ste med mchod rdzas kyi// b+he ro tsa narA lam du mchod// dri zhim chu'i khrus byas rtekhrus kyis lus la mchod par dbul// sman dang snum gyi phye ma yis/ bsgom
293b6(rgyud): gnyis dag tu mchod pa dbul// shin du dro ba'i me dag gis// brtum mo'i me la me mchod dbul// byed pa'i tshad mnyam ka ti dag/ ba dan ni stab pa'i mchod pa dbul// de yi drang bar gdon mi za// de nas rgyas par
293b7(rgyud): bya bar yang // gzhan gyi gong dang 'dra ba ste// phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma kun// rgyas par byed pa'i las yin te// rgyas pa'i sbyor ba gsum byas nas// dper na me tog pad ma bzhin// de nas dpe ba'i rim pa
293b8(rgyud): yang / gang du gsungs pa thun mong ste// dus gsum lce yi ro myos kyang // skyod na nges par kha dpe ste// de nyid gsum ni me rang bzhin// me sbar ba'i rkyen gyur pa// rlung nyid yin par gsungs pa ste// rkyen
294a1(rgyud): ni me 'bar bar bshad// gzhan yang rkyen gyi bye brag kyang // srog rtsol rlung gi dbu mar dgag/ bum pa gzhal me rlung phul nas// sgo dgu phyi ru drag tu 'bud// las kyis ngal dung
294a2(rgyud): cha snyoms te// sbyor ba rdzogs nas bde ba'i rkyen// bde ba'i las ni rdo rje 'chang // bde ba yis ni bde ba bsgrubs// rgyu bde ba lnga 'bras bu 'do// rgyu ni nang nas 'di mchog las// 'bras bya'i nang 'di
294a3(rgyud): mchog go// de nas bde ba'i rten 'gyur dang // srid pa dgag dang rlung dag dang // gnas nas gonas su brten bzung ste// g.yas rkyang bas ni ro ma dgag/ dpa' bo g.yas nas mkha' 'gro g.yon
294a4(rgyud): g.yon rkyang ba yis rkyang ma ste// sa khams kun 'dar ma ru gsungaHde bzhin zlum pos dbu mar bzung // de dag kun gyis bye brag kyang // dpa' bo g.yas/ gzhan gyi g.yon// de bzhin kun
294a5(rgyud): la sbyar ba bya// gzhan yang bzung ba'i bye brag kyang // dri chenabug gu dgu lam gyi// rlung du gu phyir ru bus byas te// rkang lag drag bsgribs byas nas// zin par 'di la the
294a6(rgyud): tsam med// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma gnyis kyis// thun mong du ni dpe gsum bstan// b+hai ro tsa na las kyi rlung // gzhan yang lam brgyad rlung rnams dag/ dang po nyid du sdoms byas la// zin par 'di sa
294a7(rgyud): the tsom med// byed pa sdams pa'i man ngag go/ byed par spel bar gyur na// mi zin pa la the tsom med// gnas gsum ngag tu k+Sha bsgoms te// dbus gsum pa yis yar grangs te// lta ba'i gyen grangs
294a8(rgyud): kyang zin// 'di ni gang zag mchog gis yin// mdzes pa'i spyi bor de nyid la// gyen du kan dang 'thur du kan// drang po'i g.yas g.yon btsan thabs la/ ka ta'i gzer ni ka btsan thabs cig/ sbom po
294b1(rgyud): 'phra mos gnan pa ste// bla ma'i zhal nas ma blangs nas// lus kyi nad bzhi kun nas skye// chu 'gegs chu so sgong nga la sngogs// lus smad nad sna nyi shu 'byung // gzhan yang tsan thabs thabs gnyis ni// bla ma'i
294b2(rgyud): zhal nas shes bya'i phyir// lus srog long spyod thams cad kyis// dus gsum man t+pal bcas te mchod// lus srog rtag pa 'phangs pa bas// man ngag dam pa de 'phangs pa// de bas tsan thabs legs
294b3(rgyud): par sbas// man ngag chu bo'i rgyun 'dra bas// de nyid rgyun du shes par bya// zab mo'i 'od ston rgyal bas gsungs// rdo rje phag mo la srogs gsungs// gsang ba'i yang gsang rmad 'byung 'di// khyod la gtad
294b4(rgyud): do dam du spos// kun la spel na dam tshig nyams// kye ma rgyud kyi da 'di yi don 'di las// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma mo'i tshogs// thams
294b5(rgyud): cad ngo mtshar cher skyes te// dga' zhing 'gu la yid rangs so// dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba las cher gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdzog s+ho// 
294b6(rgyud): sing ga ling gi rnal 'byor ma tsad ma li dang / bla ma dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis sgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shri tsan tra ma le tsan tra ra tsa
294b7(rgyud): bod skad duka dpal 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma ho mgon po rdo rje can// sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// blangs pa gang lags tshad gdang
294b8(rgyud): lags// rang bzhin grub pa ji ltar lags// mgon po bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// rang bzhin grub pa grub 'dod pas// bla ma'i bka' din
295a1(rgyud): legs son pas// dur khrod la sogs phyogs su// bar chod gsum med yon tan ldan// brtag par las dang po'i gnas// gang zag mchog la brtag pa med// yon tan
295a2(rgyud): ldan pa'i sar 'dag ste// bla mas sems bzung rnal 'byor pas// sgo dal ba'i tshad brtag ste// bcings pa gsum ni nges sgoms lnga tshogs las// skye ba gcig gam grub par nges// dbugs bcings
295a3(rgyud): kun rdzob sna rtser yang // yid bcings sor bzhi na mkha'i sems// sems bcings rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu rkyen las ni sna tshogs las// sems can mos pa sna tshogs 'byung // de dag bcings pa
295a4(rgyud): gsum dag pa'i// sems can las las nges grol bA// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// 'du shes gsum gyis chags pas grol// thig le cha gsum 'phra mo ni// yan lag lnga ldan 'byung ba'i
295a5(rgyud): rimaHdgra dang rang rig 'od ror snang // stong nyid thabs dang shes tshul// sa dang lam la sogs rim pa kun// rang bzhin gyis gnas mkhas pas sbyar// de nas sgron ma'i tshad bstan te// 
295a6(rgyud): tshad ni spyi dang bye brag ni// brgyad khrag gnyis dang bcu gnyis ni// yi ge gsum las nges 'byung la// gsang ba spyod pa rgyud kyi tshad// brgya phrag gcig dang sum bcu lnga// ye shes bcu las nges 'byung ba/ 
295a7(rgyud): rin chen 'phreng ba nges tshad do// brgya phrag gcig dang sum bcu bzhi// mi 'gyur sum bcu las 'byung ba// sku gsung thugs kyi sgron ma'o// brgya bcu rtsa lnga'i yi ge bzhir// ma tshang ba las gang 'gyur pa/ 
295a8(rgyud): gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis yi ge gcig/ rin chen 'bar ba'i ldang tshad do// bdun bcu rtsa gnyis yi ge ni// nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'byung ba yi// na mkha' mnyam pa'i tshad yin no/ 
295b1(rgyud): drug bcu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi tshad// drug bcu rtsa drug yi ge nyi shu gcig/ gsang ba rdo rje rab tu grags// drug bcu rtsa gnyis mi 'gyur ba// drug bcu stobs po che'i tshad// bzhi bcu
295b2(rgyud): rtswa gcig yi ge lnga// nam mkha' chen po'i tshad yin no// sum bcu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ ye shes 'phreng ba'i tshad yin no// sum bcu rtsa gnyis nyi shu dgu/ mkha' 'gro gsang ba tshad yin no// sum bcu rtsa bzhi
295b3(rgyud): ye shes 'bar ba'i lha tshad do// sum bcu rtsa drug yi ge dgu/ ye shes 'phreng ba'i tshad yin no// sum bcu rtsa bzhi nyi shu bzhi// mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i tshad yin no// sum bcu rtsa bzhi bzhi bcu dag/ me yi 'phreng
295b4(rgyud): ba'i tshad yin no// nyi shu rtsa gnyis bcwo brgyad dag/ de nas nges parabashad bya ba// gsang ba'i 'khor lo gang ston pa/ gsang ba'i rdo rje dam tshig dag/ ston pa dam tshig chen por nges// dgra
295b5(rgyud): drug ston pa stobs po che// dbang bzhi dgag grub gsang ba spyod/ rang rig de don bsam mi khyab// ye shes gsum don rin chen 'bar// sgo gsum lam ston na mkha' mnya
295b6(rgyud): bcom ldan la srogs the tsom med// ston pa na mkha' chen po ste// dbang bzhi de nyid gang ston pa// ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud du nges// lta spyod rmad du byung bar ston// ston pa ye shes 'phreng
295b7(rgyud): bar nges// gleng bslang rnam pa lnga'i don// ston pa mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud// he ru ka dpal gang ston pa// me yi 'phreng ba'i rgyud du nges// dbang gsum don ni gang
295b8(rgyud): ston pa// sku gsung thugs ril li nges// snod bcud rin chen ston byed pa// rin chen 'phreng ba'i ril li nges// thams cad don la rjes su yid rang ro// dpal zla ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud
296a1(rgyud): gi rgyal po// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad / shI rad na dzal ta na ra tratsan ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rin po che 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// dpal
296a2(rgyud): kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// he ho rdo rje snying po dang / 'kha' spyod sa spyod la sogs pa rnams// sgom gsum lags par bsdus nas ni// ra ril chen po dbyi ba nyon// la las las byung thabs kyi rgyud/ 
296a3(rgyud): ta las byung ba shes rab rgyud// i phyis a las gnyis med rgyud// thabs ni sku ste shes rab gsung // gnyis med thugasu shes par bya// sku gsung thugs su rang bzhin las// nyi shu rtsa bzhir byung ba'o// a la la
296a4(rgyud): ho e ma ho// thabs ni la las byi ltar byung // rang la shes rab ji ltar 'byung // a la las gnyis med ci ltar byung // sku gsung thug su ji ltar 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa bzhor ci ltar gyur/ 
296a5(rgyud): e ma ho 'gon po bshad du gsol// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ a las a ba 'du ti swe/ 'di nyid las ni gnyis mi du rgyud// 'byung ba'i gnas ni rgyu ru rtags// lo las las
296a6(rgyud): na ba'i rtsa// de las thabs kyi rgyud 'byung ba'i// rgyud gnas dang ngo bor rtag/ ta pa las ra sa na rtsa// de nyid las ni shes rab kyi// ral 'byung ba'i rgyu dang gnas// shes rab ye shes bcu drug brda// la ni nub kyi thabs
296a7(rgyud): yin to// thabs kyi yi ge bcu bzhi brda// thog 'ad 'tha' med nas ma skyes pa'o// e ni gnyis med rang bzhin te/ gnyis med blo'i spyod yul min// blo dang sgra ni kun rdzob phyir// g.yas ni thabs yin la la yin
296a8(rgyud): g.yon pa shes rab ra sa na/ a ba 'u ti gnyi su med/ thabs shes rab gnyi su med// ra li ngo bor shes par bya// 'dod chags mun pa lus ni thabs// la la ni ni sku yin te// gti mug mun
296b1(rgyud): dog dang yang // shes rab na ni bzung // zhe sdarje snying po stobs yin te// sku ste gsung du 'gyur ro// bsku la brgyad de gsung la brgyad// thugs la brgyad de nyi shu bzhi// ra li sha nyi shu rtsa bzhir nges// gnas ni
296b2(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / tsan d+ha li deng phyag dag dang // 'khor ni 'byung ba nyi shu bzhis// de nyid rnga ru shes pa ste/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbas bso// gnas dang dang 'kha' 'gro ra la dpe// sgom gsum du ni rang bzhin
296b3(rgyud): bsdu/ dang po rgyud kyi dpe ba dang // rgyud kyi nges pa gnas nges pa// brtod par nyes dang go rims dang // grogs nges rigs nges bcwo lnga ngas// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa yi// dman pa'i rims pas dang por gsungs// 
296b4(rgyud): dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// rdo rje rnal 'byor nyid yin te/ skyes pa 'dul phyir rnal 'byor rgyud// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni/ ri bud med yong su bzung phyir ro// dang po rtsa ba brgyad gsungs te/ 
296b5(rgyud): de ni bshad pa'i rgyud yin te// de rjes phyi ba phyi pa ste// rim pa bcu ni bskor ba te// snod ngan dman pa'i rim pas so// me tog snying po bcud bzhin to// phyi'i phyi nas bdud rtsi ba'o// ra li snying po snying po'i rgyud/ 
296b6(rgyud): dang bor la la thabs kyi rgyud// dpal ldan 'khan 'gro mas zhugs nas// sku'i mkhan 'gro brgyad la brtad// de rje sa ra la gsung gi rgyud// gsung gi mkhan 'gro rgyad la btang // phyi nas a las thugs
296b7(rgyud): kyi rgyud// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad la btang // gnyis med ye shes bdud rtsi ro// lus las gsal ba'i mig gi lus// gsal ba'i phyir sgo nas ste// seng ge'i gzugs 'dra bdud rtsi'i ro
296b8(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od 'dra zla ba'i 'od zer// 'brug gi sgra 'dra rgya mtsho'i rting // cha bo'i rgyun 'dra ri rab lhan/ u dum 'bar zhing ge zar tshul// 'di las 'dod 'dod tshol ba dang // rtog ge ba'i spyod du ma da
297a1(rgyud): gal te rang 'dod dbyang gyur na// dpa'o mkhan 'gro khros 'gyur te// 'go lus tshal ba brgyad du 'gas// de bas rang gi chungs dang / dbu dang 'khor g.yog lus dag gis// bla ma dam pa gnyen
297a2(rgyud): bar bya// chu rgyun 'dra ba'i man ngag drang // kye ma 'gon po snying rje can// ra li'i dbye ba de ltar na/ de'i chen po de ltar lags// nang du nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// nges par phyi yang bdag la bsrungs// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ 
297a3(rgyud): ma spangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// re la 'di ni chen por 'gyur// de re la yang chen po bdun// gang zhig 'bras bu 'dod pa la// rgyu nyid rtse bor gyur pa ste// sa lu la ni myu gu bzhin// de phyir dang po'i rgyud mi spangs// 
297a4(rgyud): lhan cig skyes gnyis rgyud yin te// rang bzhin ldan kyi cig skyes pa dang // lhan cig lhan cig skyes pa'o// 'thun mong dang ni 'thun song min// bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya ba'i phyir/ dang 'om khan/ 
297a5(rgyud): 'gro'i la zhol yin te// de nyid ston pa'i bka' bas las 'das// de la 'khrul pa snying re rje// phung srogs rtsa dang shu pra ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu yin te// lo tog 'khrul rgyud 'dod dang // ngo bo ma grub
297a6(rgyud): rgyur 'dod dang / kun rdzob byung sems rgyur 'dod dang // 'di ni mongs pa ma rungs dang / phung po 'byung ba la dbang po dang // phyi'i skye mched dman pa'i rgyu// rtogs bu rgyur 'dod snying re rje// na mkha'i
297a7(rgyud): me tog dri gang dang // rang bzhin gnas pa'i rtsa rlung sngags// khyad par la gos rgyud yin te// rang bzhin gnas pa ma shes par// log par rtog pa snying re nyams// dom padam byang chub sems kyis ni// 
297a8(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rgyu/ bla ma ma snyan pa las 'khrul// kun rdzob dag kra rgyur 'dod pa// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'o// rkyen med rgyu yis 'bras mi byin// phyir rkyen ni spangs ni mi bya// ye shes
297b1(rgyud): rlung dang ye shes me// lhan cig skyes gnyis ni rkyen yin te// de nyid spangs par mi bya zhing // lus kyi drung dang me nyid spyad// gzhan du de bzhin sbyar bar bya// srid la len dang bde ba len// las mi
297b2(rgyud): steng zhing dbye ba yang / mi spang ba ni bzhi pa'o// lus dang lus kyi snying po rtse/ gnas dang gnas kyi chen ni spang ba/ gzhan du de bzhin lnga dang drug pa yin par 'dod// de nyid phywa dang nang du shes/ 
297b3(rgyud): byi nang dbye bo'am spang ba'o// sdang ba dang ni mun pa che// gang ba dang ni stong pa'i cha// 'phra ba ma spang brgyad pa'o// rgyu'i gnas dang 'bras bu'i gnas// de nyid mi spang shes par bya/ rin po che'i pho brang du// 
297b4(rgyud): brtan ni mi spang shes par bya// gal te de ru ma yin na// shor bar mi spang ro mar bstim// gnyen po mi spang gzugs sku gnyis// ma spang ba na bcu gnyis pa'o// nor bu sten las skyes pa'o// 
297b5(rgyud): bde ba la rten gnas pa'i// gong 'og khyad par shes byas nas// rgyu mas gnyen po ma spangs pa'o// de nyid rim pa 'pho byed pa'o// dga' ba mchog dga' shes bya ste/ 
297b6(rgyud): sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'i// 'khor po g.yul las byas bzlog byas te/ gnas dang gas su ldog byed pa/ gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid rim pa 'pho byed po// bla ma'i
297b7(rgyud): bla ma lu rgyud shes// 'khor bar 'jug ldog bye brag gis// 'pho ba ma spangs rnam po gnyis// ye shes me ni tshe 'bar bas// phung po 'byung ba dbang po sogs// thams cad bdud rtsi'i 'gyur ba ni// rkyen gyi khyad par ma
297b8(rgyud): spangs gnyis// rten gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// lus kyi ba spu bu ga dang // rten dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kan// bde ba'i ngo bor gang snang ba// ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa'i// de nyid rgyu ma rang bzhin
298a1(rgyud): med// gnyon po'i khyad par ma spang ba'o// 'dog mdzes mig yod phyag rgya ni// ldan pa mu tram spangs pa'o// ma tshig chos kyi phyag rgya dang // de nas ye shes phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// 
298a2(rgyud): chags pa'i phyag rgya las min te// dam tshig chos ni ngag mi ste// mu tra gnyi su med par shes// ye shes phyag rgya chen po gnyis// 'gro ba'i mu tra yin par 'dod// phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// 
298a3(rgyud): dang po gsang ba'i 'khor lo ste// phyi nas gru / dus bzhin 'khor lo yin// 'khor lo dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang po gsang ba gtum mo ste// gnyis pa rang bzhin brtum mo ni// prad+ham mo'i dbye ba ma
298a4(rgyud): spangs pa'o// las kyi rlung dang ma gnyis ni// kun rdzob 'khor ba'i rkyen yin te// ye shes rlung dang me gnyis ni// don dam med rgyan yin te// rkyen ni dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// srid pa skyed
298a5(rgyud): zing 'dag pa da// kun rdzo shu tra'i lus yin no// srid pA maM len 'ang rig skyed/ gdon dam byangasams las yin na// las kyi dpyos ma spangs thog/ sbyo sabs kyi rgyas pa'o/ kha dbye mo'i las
298a6(rgyud): yin te// sbyor thabs bzhi ma la rmongs// 'di nyid ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// sbyin 'thun las las grub pa yi// smin drug la sogs grangs kyis snyan// rang gi ye shes las 'dod pa// bla ma'i dus mtha'
298a7(rgyud): legs snyan to// ma spangs pa nges pa'i man ngag blang // 'di ni rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud// de las 'byung ba khyad par 'bras// dang por cha thig le dang // tshul dang tshul mchog gzhan mchog/ 'di nyid de nyid drug yin te// 
298a8(rgyud): de nyid drug gi tsan dA li// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// tsanadA li nyi shu rtsa bzhi// ra l-i nyi shu rtsa ba ni nges// phyi ru gnas ni nyi shu bzhi// spyan dang phyag rgya nyi shu bzhi// tsan dA li dang ra li yi// phyi dang nang du grangasu nges/ 
298b1(rgyud): he he da pa'i rdo rje 'chang // ra li'i 'byung ba'i sgo gang lags// sku dang phyag 'tshan rags pa kun// ra li'i ngo bo dman pa'i lam// mkhas spyod sa spyod so spyod// sgo sum la gnas bzab pa'i// ra l-i'i ngo bor gsungs
298b2(rgyud): pa yi/ dga' ba bcu drug rten dang bcas/ khyad par ra li'i ngo bor snyan/ ga rang rig ston pa thams cad bcas// 'thar thug re li'i shes por bya// oM ni thog mthar ma skyes pa// la ni nub dang skyong bar byed/ 
298b3(rgyud): ra ni chags pa rin po che// ra las 'dod chags khrag yin te// las las zhe sdang khu bste// a las gti mug sems yin te// sems can ra lo'i rang bzhin te// ye shes sA rangs bcu srogs// kun la
298b4(rgyud): ldan par ra ri lajig nas// sku'i ra li spyi bor gnas/ gtsug gtor dag na 'byung ba'o// gsungs gi ljags kyi dbang po gnas/ thugs na ra li'i thugs ka na// 'byung ba'i gnas kyi nges pa'o// 
298b5(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// spyan rnams lus ni nges par 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rtsol// spyi bo la sogs dge na gnas// phyag gi 'thil nas rim par 'byung / 
298b6(rgyud): bla ma'i zhal nas blang bar bya// bye brag 'byung ba'i sgo yin no// he he sems can sangs rgyas kyis// rang bzhin sa dang ldan pa ste// sa bcu la spogs sa sogs na// rngus skyes la sogs ji ltar lags// 'o ni ha sangs rgyas
298b7(rgyud): min nas ci// sems can thams cad bzod ma ma nas// sangs rgyas yin par gsungs pa ste// rdzus skyes sgong skyes dred skyes sogs// sems kyi gnas bcus bac+doMs+ho// rnam shes rgyu ni byang chub la// la khan po sas
298b8(rgyud): rgyal po ste// rang bzhin dag pa chos gos yin// rang bzhin gnas pa kha spu brags// a dang ka gnyis sdigs kyi don// thams cad sems la gnas pa na// sems med sangs rgyas yin pa ste// dam brog la sogs
299a1(rgyud): bems pa'o// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin ni// rgyu dang 'bras bu tshul dang yang // bag la nyal dang mngon du rgyu/ nub pa'i tshul dang mngon pa'i tshul// 
299a2(rgyud): gzugs can gzugs med mkhas pa'i rtag/ sangs rgyas sems de de bzhin no// de ltar sems can sangs rgyas dang // ra li sems can rang bzhin phyir// lus la sku'i phyag rgya 'dab// ngag la gsung gi phyag rgya btab
299a3(rgyud): soms la thugs kyi phyag rgya btab// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du// dngos por ro mnyam gyur ba la// sems can sangs rgyas ga la yod// dman dang gya non ge la yod// 'khor bar yongasu shes pa lo// mya ngan
299a4(rgyud): 'das shes de la brjod// khams thad rdzogs nas rnam rnyog stong // 'di la thams cad ngo mtshar gyis// legs par da kyis legs par stongs// de'i thathams cad nga 'tshir du 'gyur te// mi snang bar gyur te// rid ma
299a5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / rnam 'byor pa zla ba'i phreng ma dang // bla ma shAkye ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa// rgya gar skad du/ shri ma ha su ra tsan tra tsanam/ bod skad du// 
299a6(rgyud): dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshalo// a la la spyod pa'i kye/ 9/ ngo mtshar ma dang byung ba'i// skyed dang rdzogs pa chen po yi// ma spangs pa dang nges pa dag
299a7(rgyud): 'gon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// dang po mi spangs bshad par bya ste/ daphung po khams dang skye mched dag/ skyed pa'i rim bshad par spangs pa yi// phyag 'tshan nyi zla yig 'bru dang // bla ma'i man ngag rkyen
299a8(rgyud): ma spangs// lus ngag yid gsum dam tshig las// skra gnyis 'byung ba'i 'bras ma 'aspangs// zhe sdang ru tre skye ba'i laso// zhe sdang rang rig skyed pa dang // lus kyi dri ma krus pa'i las// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs// 
299b1(rgyud): sral li gnyis dang sral nas na sogs// nang tu phyir spyi rtsug spogs// gnas kyi dpe ba ma spangs ma// shar sogs bdud kyi snying ga ra// zhabs gnas chen po ma spangs pa'o// gnas de phyi nang tu shes gan+da/ 
299b2(rgyud): kyi dbye ba spangs pa'o// gser 'gyur rtsi'i rnam bzhin// phung sogs lha ru 'pho byed pa// 'di ni 'pho ba spangs pa'o// 'bras bu'i gnas ni phun 'tshogs te// ma spangs pa'i gan su shes// 
299b3(rgyud): phung sngags sgyur mar 'dzin byed pa// 'di ni rten gyi ma spangs pa'o// gral te nang tu ma zin na// phyi ru de nyid ngo bor sgo// de nyid shor ba ma spangs pa'o// gnyen po mi sgom sgyu mar sgom// phung sogs
299b4(rgyud): la rten lha rnams la// sgro bstu ngo bo ma spangs pa'o// tha mal ba dang skyed rims gnyis// gong 'og khyad par shes bya// sgyu ma gnyen po nang dang spangs// bdun po rnam dag la sogs pa// sngon du
299b5(rgyud): 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// phung spogs rtogs pa las log nas// 'phra ma'i gnas su gnas mi byed min// gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// gnas lha'i rnam pa 'jug pa dang // sngon du
299b6(rgyud): 'gro bar ma spangs pa'o// phung srogs gong du sgyu mar log pa gnyis// 'pho ba'i khyad par ma spangs nyid// ye shes me ni tshe 'bar nyid// phung spogs sgyu mgar 'dzin pa// rton gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// rna gzhag
299b7(rgyud): rjes thob kun 'gags te// thams cad rten dang rten du snang // de'i'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa// shes rab phag mo ma spangs pa'o// phyag rgyas
299b8(rgyud): spangs la ru 'dod// ma spangs gcig ni gzhan dang 'dra// gong ma 'og las khyad par 'di// zhe sdang thugs la 'dod chags snya// gti mug gsung gi rang bzhin te/ su phag rgya'i dbu ba ma spangs pa'o// 
300a1(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thags 'khor lo// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dag/ 'khor lo g.yeng ba ma spangs pa// dang po sgyu ma'i ye shes me// gnyis ma sgyu ma ltar snang me// gtum mo'i dbye ba spangs pa yi// 
300a2(rgyud): phun tshogs sgyu ma las g.yo zhing // kun rdzob rig phung rtsogs sgyu mar yang dag bshad// kun rdzob rig pa'i rkyen yin te// sgyu ma ltar snang la g.yo zhing // sgyu ma de nyid ltar sreg pa// don dom gnyis med rkyen yin te// 
300a3(rgyud): rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa// 'di dag 'khor ba sel zhing rnam rtog skyed// kun rdzob bdun pa sems kyi las// 'khor bar mi 'khor rang rig ste// don dam sems kyi las yin te/ las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa// 
300a4(rgyud): 'di dag mi spangs nyi shu brgyad// bum pa'i chos rnams 'brel po'o// gsang dbang bla ma'i zhal nas shes// bzhi pa ma spangs ni brgyad// rang rig lhan cig skyes pa yi// chos nyid ma dag zhi ba'i rgyud// zhal gyi
300a5(rgyud): man ngag rgyan ma spangs// 'gro ba'i chos rnams rang rig medo// sreg pa'i las rnams ma spangs yin// gong 'og rims pas de bya ba rnams// a pa 'phyi 'og min gnas// gnas dang gnas chen ma
300a6(rgyud): spangs pa// de nyid phyi dang nang du shes// phyi nang dbye ba spangs pa'o// stong pa dang ni gzugs 'dzin 'chang // 'pho ba ma spangs a 'dar ha// rten ma spangs pa te rtog spangs// sems dang 'bros te de nyid
300a7(rgyud): rang rig skam// shor ba ma spangs rang rig la// dbang po'i sgo bsku ngo bo ma spangs/ rtog pa bcos gnyen po spangs/ rang rig spyi la sems dpa' sems dpa' la// sngon 'gro ba ma spangs pa brgyad// 
300a8(rgyud): bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// spyi dang rang gis mtshan nyid la// 'pho ba ma spangs rang gis sgom// phyag rgya ma spangs rang rig las// 'phrin las nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'byung // las ma spangs te gzhan nas ni// / 
300b1(rgyud): bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// dad med bla ma'i rten na// bla ma dam pa'i mi rnyed dang // ma spangs ngo bor ma shes par// rang rig 'bras bu gang 'dod pa// de dag mi shes dri ma bsgribs// dper na sbrul gis
300b2(rgyud): 'o ma bzhin// de nas nges pa bcoM lnga yang // rgyu dang rgyu dang gnas dang sar// btad pa'i go rims grangs dang rim// nges pa bdun na gzhan du gsungs// bsngags kyi spros pa spros pa nges// rkyen ni ye she/ 
300b3(rgyud): me rlung nges// rgyu 'dras nas ni a ho nges// dbang gnyis gong 'og khyad par nges/ sun 'byin gnyen po spangs pa dang // ngo bo nyes nges dbye ba nges// las nges pa dang bco lnga ste// de las 'byung ba'i
300b4(rgyud): nges pa dag/ bcu bdun bla ma'i zhal nas shes// ma spangs pa dang nges pa yi// mtshan nyid yongasu shes 'gyur na// 'khrul pa dang ni 'okhrul pa'i bzhi// thams cad 'di yis spangs par byed// 
300b5(rgyud): 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung / gong du chud dang gan su gzugasu gnas// de bzhin gzugs las 'das pa dang // gnas pa rnam pa bzhi ru yang // rgyud 'di nges/ 
300b6(rgyud): par go kho na'o// rgyud kyi dbang gi dbang ngo bo gnas// de phyir dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // 'bad pas bla ma mnyes byas ste// rgyud kyi ngo bo dbang rnams dang // de'i man ngag shes par bya// bla ma gnyis par ma byas she/ 
300b7(rgyud): dbang rnams thob par ma byas na// nyan pa la sogs byed pa ni// 'bras bu med cing blag par 'gyur// de bas 'badod nan tan bya/ dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo rgyud kyi rgyal ba rdzogs s+ho// 
300b8(rgyud): rgya gar gi 'khan po gA yau dA dang / dge slong she kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du// / shi ga nyen na ra tsa/ 
301a1(rgyud): bod skad du/ dpal ye shes rgyal ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa lags// gang phyir sems can
301a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi ka mya ngan 'das pa thob bya ba'i phyir// dad dang brtson 'grus rdzogs bya ste// bla ma'i rje su 'jug par bya// rang rig gnyis su med pa la// gzhan rig gnyi su 'dzin par khrul// bzod nas ma skyes ma
301a3(rgyud): grul la// skye dang grub par 'dzin par 'khrul// dngos po ro mnyam 'gyur ba las// dman dang gya nom 'dzin pos 'khrul// 'khor ba yongasu shes pa nyid// mya ngan 'das par las// sangs rgyas sems can rtogs pa
301a4(rgyud): 'khrul// rang rig lhun gyis grub pa la// 'da' tha snyad bral ba la// 'di'i spyod yul byed pa la 'phrul// 'tha' bral dbu mar gnas pa la// rtags chad par 'dzin pa 'phrul// shes brjod yul las 'das pa la// 
301a5(rgyud): bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin par 'phrul// dngos po mtshan ma la sogs pa'i// rnam rtag kun gyi stong pa la// dngos po rje su 'dzinas 'phrul// rang rig gnyi su med pa la// bden pa gnyi su 'dzin pas 'phrul// 
301a6(rgyud): 'dul bya sna tshogs 'dul 'ab yi// theg pa dum gong 'og la// sgo dang bskur ba 'debs pas 'phrul// sems can 'khrul pa sna tshogs kyis// las kyi rnas smin sna tshogs la// lta ba'i skur pa
301a7(rgyud): 'debs pa 'phrul// rang rig don nas 'od gsal ba// sku dmigs phyag 'tshan la sogs la// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dod par 'khrul// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i bzhi'i// 'dod chags 'dod chags chen po ste/ 
301a8(rgyud): 'khrul bzhi 'khrul pa las na// 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang zhe sdang chen po dang / de bzhin zhe sdang bcom ldan 'das// gti mug gti mug chen po ste// de bzhin gti mug
301b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di yis nges par grol gyur cig/ 'di spangs gzhan gyis grol ba yin// bdag po lha ma snun// bdag po lhan cig rnal 'byor ma tsam// theg pa spyi bsdus de las gzhan// skye bo bems po chang ngan
301b2(rgyud): rgyad ga dbying ba tshig brtse bar bsrungs/ daphyir dam tshig 'bras bu khyad par rang rig 'byung / kye ma 'gon pa khyeng sangs rgyas// 'dod chags dbye ba de ltar na/ debang po ji ltar lags// zhe sdang dang la sogs de dang / 
301b3(rgyud): 'dra// rdo rje snyings stong rje sa// legs par nyon la yid la b.rung // las dang las kyi nam sbyin gyi/ rgyu 'bras mi shes gti mug ste// lus sems kun la'i khrub pa dag/ ne sdang yin te sna gsum gyis/ 
301b4(rgyud): kun nas gnas te nor bu'i mthar// sa don 'byung ba 'dod chags so// dbang tshogs nga bo gang ma shes// 'dod chags la sogs chen por nges// rangs ngo bar gang gnas dang / 'o ma spong ba
301b5(rgyud): gnyen po dang / ngong rgyu mar gang shes dang // dbang po slo bsdu thabs min te/ gong ma skye ba'i rgyu gyur pa// phyi yang chen por 'gyur ba ste/ gzhan gyi don du 'gyur ba dang // de las gzhan/ 
301b6(rgyud): dag mos par 'gyur// ming po mi mos spangs pa dang // nyon mongs su spyi bil byis non/ khyo zag 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs// zil gyis mo gnon 'og ma yi/ nam rtog gang yang me skyed na/ 
301b7(rgyud): mangs sngan sbyi r+ya brag srong// gnyen pa yin pa rings pa dang / nano mongs rtswa rtsem ma hU~M/ gnyis ni gang dang 'drab skye// bcu gnyis 'dang chags chen po dag/ sas ldan 'ad
301b8(rgyud): bzung ba ste// zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin no// zab pa'i lha spong ma rtogs pa/ bsngags brjod bzlas pa la byed na// gsang brjod bzlas pa la// de la ngal ba don med yin// de dag blam dpa'/ 
302a1(rgyud): las// man ngag dam pa bcal byas te/ shA 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul bzhi las// gsad pa byed pa'i go cha mchog/ de na rgyud kyi don las na// rjesu yid rang bar 'gyur ro// dpal
302a2(rgyud): ye shes rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du// shr-i ki li sa ma pa ra tran tra ra tsan nam// bod skad du// dpal 'kha' 'gro bsdoms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal
302a3(rgyud): po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba chen po'i ros gang bas// thams thad stong par 'gyur nas kyang // he hi 'gon po rdo rje 'dzin// 'kha' 'gro ma ni ji ltar lags// de'i
302a4(rgyud): sdom pa ci ltar lags// dam tshig bsdud pa ji ltar lags// phag mo dag la bshad du gsol// nyon cig rdo rje phag mo nyon// dang po dam tshig mtshan nyid kyang // rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas// rang gi
302a5(rgyud): lus ngag yid gsum dag/ kun nas 'khrugs te gzhan gyi yang // sgo gsupa kun 'khrugs chen po ste// rang bzhin sgo gsum 'khrugs pa 'bring // 'anyams pas 'bring bu gsung ba yin/ 
302a6(rgyud): gzhan 'khrugs pa ni tha ma yin// zhams pas tshung ngu yin par 'dod// der la yang gsum gsum ste// nyams pa che ba'i thang dgu mu dge/ rang la gnar sems me skyes kyang // gzhan la gnas/ 
302a7(rgyud): sems skyes pa'o// bdag gi gi yang bas skyen byas pa// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad// rang la gan dri sems cher skyes kyangagazhan la nyes bcung ba la// 'di yang rnams pa zhing
302a8(rgyud): tu bshad// g.yeng ba'i rkyen gyis nyams pa yod// 'di ni ltung bar gsungs/ rang gi dam tshig bsrung ba ni/ lha skyed gang la gzhan ma mos/ zab mo'i
302b1(rgyud): don la bskur 'debs pa// ltung ba cha 'bring yang bar bshad// rang gi mnyam gzhag ma 'khrugs/ 'di ni nyams chung ngur gsungs// de re'i dbye ba gzhan tu shes// de nas snod kyi dam tshig kyang // phye yis rang gis
302b2(rgyud): sgo gsum dag/ 'khrugs pa che chang rim pas dbye// rang sems 'khrugs nas phyi rol la// spyan sngogs nyams pa chen por gsungs// dbye ba nyams pa 'bring chung ngu// 'dor na rang bzhin dam tshig dang // bcas
302b3(rgyud): te bye brag dam tshig laso// gi nyam su med par mkhas pas gsungs// dam tshig la ni rdo rje 'chang // de nas 'kha' 'gro'i dam tshig kyang // 'kha' 'gro drug cu bzhi ru nges// ka sngogs zung rtsa 'kha' 'gror
302b4(rgyud): phyi nas rtsa re 'kha' 'gro re/ 'gro 'kha' 'gro nas bskor 'tshams kyi bar// sum bcu rtsa bdun 'kha' 'gro ma// a spogs brgyud ni 'kha' 'gro brgyad// de bzhin bzung rtsa 'kha' 'gro bzhi// 
302b5(rgyud): snying ka ru ni yang dag gnas// bzung rtsa sum ni 'kha' 'gro re/ gzhan rnams rtsa re 'gro re// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi 'grin par gnas// rdo rje phag mo lte ba'i dbus/ 
302b6(rgyud): gzhan ni spyi bor lag dag gnas// de nas sdom pa brgyad bshad de/ sangs rgyas dkun gyi bde chen po// bde ba sdom pa yang dag bshad// gang zhig bde ba khyad par can// nges par sgom
302b7(rgyud): par yin par 'dod// rdo rje phag mo mi 'da' bar// sdom pa pad ma dam tshig rab tu bshad// mi byed pa ni phyag rgyar gsungs// gdod gsal khrus byas rus pa btu
302b8(rgyud): ma nyams tum bu gcig pa la// dril spogs pas sgos nas nang du ste// ma 'dal yongs su rdzogs br-i ya// steng du seng ge khri dag la// seng ge rgyal 'tshan 'og gi rgyan
303a1(rgyud): steng na bdugs dang rgyal mtshan te// gnas der rus pa gzhag byas la// me mchod byas nas zhal wA ru// rnyed pa byas te drug pa la// gdung bu stong gon bdun pa la// cha cha
303a2(rgyud): rab tu gnas par bya// dang po'o sreg dus su yang // shi ba dang po bzung byas te// gzhag lA ro'i bsnyen pa ste// drug pa ro'i sta gon ste// dang bdun pa dra dur khrod rab tu gnas// dang po snang ba gnyis pa ru// 
303a3(rgyud): gsum pa rus pa'i mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// gzhan la med cing rang la med// dman pa mod cing de rjes med// thabs su ma gsungs shes rab kyi// rtsa rgyud bshad
303a4(rgyud): rgyud phye ma dang / 'go bye'i phyi mar gsungs pa yi// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// bdad rtsi sgron mar 'bar ba yi// rgyud do khyed la nga'i bshad// de nas tsha tsha'i rim pa dang // 
303a5(rgyud): snang bya rgyal po la sogs pa// 'thun pa'i gtam gyos la sogs// mi snang bdag la sogs la// gtor ma ma yis sa sogs bslangs// de nas bskur pa rnam lnga yang
303a6(rgyud): phan po rdo rje can dang yang / bzi brjid gar dang rdo rje rgyal// srid bus sa bzung sbyor sngogs// cho ga gzhan dang 'thun par bya// du dadrong gan su rtse ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po bzhid
303a7(rgyud): par bya// lha grangs du yod gtor ma dang // sbyin sreg dag gi bzhi byas nas// de nas shes pa dbug pa dang // bge gso bskrad sdig zhom la sngogs// las kyi rim pa byas nas ni// gcig ga
303a8(rgyud): lnga 'am drug gam bdun nam ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad// ci nus par ni gdab par bya// tus ni 'tshan mo shes rab ste// dang po la ni dkyil 'khor gyi// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa ste/ 
303b1(rgyud): gsum pa gnyis pa gnyis pa dag/ chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan 'da'// bum dbang sa la 'da' ba ste// gsang dbang sa dang tshul 'da'// gsum pa me rlungs la 'da'// bzhi pa namakha' gsungs pa'o// 
303b2(rgyud): dang po 'pho ba ma lhung bzhi// gnyis pa ro sreg ma ltung la// gsum pa tsha tsham lhung na// 'tshe ba bslang ba'i dam pa ste// srid pa'i 'tsho ba las grol nges// dman pa'i 'pho ba la sogs pas// ltung zhing 'chi
303b3(rgyud): pa kho nar nges// de bas srid pa grol 'dod pas// bla ma dam pa gnyis byas te// rgyud 'di brtad kyis lags par bzung // de'i tshe 'jig rten gi khams sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur te// mchod
303b4(rgyud): pa sna tshogs pa'i char yang phub po// na mkha' las sgra chen po yang 'byung ngo // dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dang // dur khrod na gnas pa'i tshe dang // ro langs la sogs pa// thams cad rjes su yid rang bar
303b5(rgyud): gyur to// dpal gas par 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal go// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o// 
303b6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shri a mr-i ta 'ag+ha h+ya ta na tra ra dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba brtsi bdud brtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad
303b7(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa'i dus gtsog na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i tsun mo'i ba ga la snyoms par zhugaso// de'i tshe byang chub seMs dpa'
303b8(rgyud): rdo rje snying po la sogs pa/ dkyil 'khor dgye ba ji lta bu/ sngags dang ga to ra ma ji lta bu// sbyin sregs mchod pa ji lta bu/ khyid gi bdag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// 
304a1(rgyud): rdo rje phag mo su yang zhus pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyud gang lags// rkyen gang lags dus gang lags// tshig ni gang lags srung dus gang // lus ngag dam tshig ci ltar depe// dang po nyams pa'i rgyud nyid kyang
304a2(rgyud): mi shes pa dang bag med pa// nyon mongs pa dang mags dang // rjed ngas dran pa mi gsal gto// 'di drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu// bla ma ma snyen grogs ngag 'grogs// 'dor na sgo gsum ge yang ba'i yul/ 
304a3(rgyud): de dag nyams pa'i yul tu gsungs// gdon gyi khar chod chang gi mos// log lta skye sa dang khyad grags 'dod// nyon mongs zil gnon bla mas s+ho// 'dod chags chen po skyes pa dag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i dus yin te// 
304a4(rgyud): spyi ni rtsod ldan dus su gsungs// gdon srogs gzhan gyi byin brlabs che// slong ba'i 'du shes sngon bsan no// chen po rdzogs kyang chung ngur gsungs// 'khor ba skyon 'du shes sngon du ma son na// bag med nyams pa
304a5(rgyud): san na gnas// gdon sngogs rang gis ma mthong na// de bas nyams pa chung ngur gsungs// 'khor ba skyon dang rnam smin dran// bla ma dran dang 'gyod pa skye// bar chod dang bral gshegs tus// sbyor ba dngos bzhi
304a6(rgyud): 'jug dang gsum// gang zhig rdzogs tshad 'thar phyin te// tshe 'bring g.yeng bshes par bya// sbyor ba ltung bu chung ngu ste// dngos bzhi lhung ba 'bring du 'byung // 'jugs rdzogs lhung ba chen po nges// rgyan dang phyag
304a7(rgyud): rgya phyag 'tshan dag/ 'chang dang rten dang rten pa'i dam tshig yin// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni// zab par bya ba'i dam tshig yin// sems can 'kha' 'grom// ling spyod mnyam par gang byed pa// lta bar bya ba'i nga/ 
304a8(rgyud): tshig go// rang bzhin sgyu mar gang shes pa// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig go// sgo gsum sku gsung thug su gsal// srung bar bya ba'i dam tshig yin// zhon mongs dus drug bzung 'dzin kun// rang rig skye
304b1(rgyud): med par bsgral// bsgral ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// dam tshig don du dam tshig dag/ dus drug tus gnyis lo'o bar// rtul zhugs can gyis dam tshig bsrungs// dngos grub don du rtag tu bsrungs// 
304b2(rgyud): skad cig tsam yang gnang ba med// rang gi lus kyi nges pa las// gzhan gyi lus kyi nges pa 'byung // 'di ni sgra'i nyes pa bshad// rang gi ngag gi nyes pa las// gzhan gyi ngag gi nyes pa 'byung // bdag gi
304b3(rgyud): sku'i nyes pa ste// gzhan yang gsung gi nyams par 'gyur// gzhan mkhas pas shes par bya// rang la brtsal ba'i nyes pa las// gzhan yan lag nges 'byung dang // legs par las ni ngas byang sogs// 
304b4(rgyud): bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// 'bad de dam tshig bsrung bar bya// dam tshig de'i don rnams dang // 'khor rnams 'jigs shing skrag gyur te// rdo rje phag mo yang zhus pa// dam tshig de'i don rnams ni/ 
304b5(rgyud): rab cing rgya che rtogs pa dga'// 'gon po khyod nyid bzhengs par zhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi khar zos slar la dor ba med// ngan skyugs phyir rdor slar la zos pa med/ 
304b6(rgyud): rang rig bcu dra rtsi'i ro tshor na// lo tog 'khrul pa'i rgyu 'bras ga la tshor// de bas dam tshig brtso bor gyis// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyang rgyud kyi don lo rjesu yid rangs par 'gyur te// dpal
304b7(rgyud): 'kha'u 'gro ma sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ rdzogs s+ho// dus / rgya gar gi 'khan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis sbyar
304b8(rgyud): ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shr-i dz+wa la a ga ni dag h+ye tAn tra ra dza// bod skad du// dpal gsang ba'i me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ 
305a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / thugs btsun mo'i bag la smos pa rucugaso
305a2(rgyud): de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas// rdo rje phag mos gsol pa// rnal 'byor gang lags 'pho ba gang // 'chi ba gang lags shi ba gang // ro ni gang lags ro chen gang // de bzhin shi ba chen po gang // thal ba gang lags
305a3(rgyud): thal chen gang // tsha tsha gang lags tsha tsha yi// chen po gang lags gnas ni gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs dang shes rab snyom 'jug phyir// rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs pa yi// 
305a4(rgyud): tus min lha ni bsod pa ste// dang po 'pho ba'i rtags dang yang // dus tshe denges par shes par bya/ bar cha de med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'khrul 'khor bcas te khyab par gyis// 'bras bu 'byung ba
305a5(rgyud): 'pho bar nges// khams dang 'byung ba so sor thob// srog dang rtsol ba la thim skye// rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i// skad cig dang por 'chi ba ste// rdo rje can sogs rigs bzhi dang // rnam snang tha dad bral
305a6(rgyud): ba yi// skad cig dang po shi ba ste// de nas gzhag bungan bar du gnas// lus kyi 'kha' 'gro mya ngan 'das// 'di ni shi ba chen po grags// lus ni tal 'go chad 'dra// de nyid do zhes gsus bi ste// ya rbe/ 
305a7(rgyud): dpa' dang ye shes tan// mkhas spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod// spyi bo snying ka 'grin pa ru// dri'i thig lo gsum byas te// sku gsung thugasu byin gyis rlabs// tho ma dri zhim sna tshogs kyis// khrus byas nas ni bcu gnyi su// 
305a8(rgyud): dri'i thig le bcu gnyis bya// do po'o 'khon 'gro byin gyis bo rlobs// gzhan yang rgyan la sogs// kun// dngas kun gsung na rab tu nges// ri mo bris pa 'bring yin// dri'i thig le tha ma rings/ 
305b1(rgyud): g.yas s+ye nga la sogs 'dug stangs kyis// he ru kar grag por bzhengs// rang gi bdag po gang yin pa'i// he ru ka ru nges pa dang // de la tus drug mchod pas mchod// de dag ni chen po ste// 'chi ba zhes ni/ 
305b2(rgyud): rnam pa ste// mkhas spyod gan su khrid pa ste// rang bzhin sreg pa tha ba ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la rten nas// sku'i gzugs brnyan rim bzhin spogs// lang na bum pa lta ba yi// g.ya ga zhal yas khang
305b3(rgyud): rtsegs brtsig/ mi 'tsho snying por bcung byed dang // tsan dan gur gum la sogs pa'i// dri'i phyug cing sgom par bya// tsan tan dmar po la sogs pa// dri zhim ldan pa shing bu 'o// yang na 'bras bu'i bung shing tshang ma dang
305b4(rgyud): ldan pa yi// thab khung chen po rdzogs par bya// bla ma dam pa mnyes par bya// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// zur zhi rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs bzhir mi 'jigs seng ge bzhi// dka' ba bzhi dang btung
305b5(rgyud): bzhi brgyad// cho ga yongasu rdzogs pa dang // rig pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa dang // sar dbang gang thob rdzogs par skur// de nas rgyud chags me bslar te// me lha la sogs gzhan dang 'dra// de nas rig pa de nyid
305b6(rgyud): kyang // me'i khang brtses par ru// rang bzhin spyan dran bzhagasu gsol// me mchog sdig pa sregs pa yi// sngags dang rdzogs sngags gzhan dang 'dra// me dang du ba rlung tshogs kyis// mtshan ma mkhas kyi rtag
305b7(rgyud): byas te// bkra shis rtag ni byang na lags// med na sdig pa sreg par bya// tung la sogs pa byung na lags// ma byung na yang cho ga rnams// rdzogs pa las byung rus pa dag/ 'di ni thal ba chen po ste/ de las
305b8(rgyud): gzhan bkral bar gsungs// de nas rus pa zhag gsum na// gur gam la sogs dris gtor ba// rus pa mtshan ma rtag byas te// kha dog dbyabs dang dri ro dang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// dang po dkyil
306a1(rgyud): 'khor bya ba yang // phyi la gzugs rin gyi dkyil 'khor te// nang du lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro// gsang par ba ga'i dkyil 'khor ro// bzhi pa rang rig byang chub sems// de rnams lha'i 'chen
306a2(rgyud): nyid kyang / sku mdog phyag 'tshan rags pa'i lam// lo tshul drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang // 'bar ba'i gar gur phyag rgya drug/ mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu la// tha mal pa'i rnam rtog srang // lus kyi dri khrud zhe sdang dang / 
306a3(rgyud): long spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag phyi'i dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang 'gyur ba// de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su gang 'gyur ba// de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ste rdo rje can dang pa de can/ 
306a4(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid dang // pad ma gar gi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin rta btun rdo rje sems// snying po yongs bzangs dkyil 'khor ro// 'di dag phyi'i dkyil 'khor te// de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor te// 
306a5(rgyud): nam grol snyad du 'dab khris rlung // rang gi bdag po'i lha yin no// dbang por de nyid shes bya ste// rags pa dang ni 'phra ba dang // zug rngu sgo gsum nyi khri dang // cig stong drug rgya rgyu ma tsam// lus ni/ 
306a6(rgyud): ral pa'i las 'joms pa'o// ngag ni dri khrus gti mug dag/ sprul pa'i sku'i rgyur 'gyur// mkhas spyad rlung du shes par bya// gang zhig stong pa skam pa dang // de bzhin mun pa sgom par// nyin dang mu tshan du
306a7(rgyud): mo 'a grogs// gnod rjes lta stengs dman pa ste// bcud de de las zlog pa'o// dang po yid bcings sdong rtse sems// de bzhin sems bcings bzhi po yang // 'kha' 'gro sor bzhi de na gnas// de nas rang
306a8(rgyud): rgya thig le yang // yan lag bcas dang yan lag med// shin tu yan lag med pa ste// yan lag bcas pa bcu gsum ste// thabs la thabs kyi sbyor spogs/ bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// 
306b1(rgyud): ma ni 'dus pa'i sgo ru gsungs// de nas 'og sgor ra tsa na li kha sbyor dang ni stug po'i srogs// rkyen dang bcas dang rang bzhin dang // bdag srung ba dang gzhan sbyang dang // gtum mo'i rang bzhin spar ba dang // gtum mo go
306b2(rgyud): s+pha rA mA dang // gtum mo rkyen gyis sbar ba dang // bye brag gtum mo sbar ba dang // spyi'i gtum mo sbar ba dang // grol ba'i rang bzhin gtum mo dang // chags pa gsal ba'i gtum s+ye// gsang brta lha'i
306b3(rgyud): ri'i rgyu// de nas gsang dkyil 'khor kyang // dbang po nyis sbyor kun du ru// de'i phyi ni pa ga yin// dga' ba la sogs sgyu ma yis// 'phrang ba'i lam spangs las yin te// sems kyi dri 'khrud 'dod
306b4(rgyud): chags dag/ rang rig sems kyis rgyal po'i rgyud// de nas bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni// chos sku skye med na mkha' bzhin// rang rig slong ba 'od bsal ba// sgom pas rnyed pa ma yin te// ma skos pas
306b5(rgyud): kyang rnyed pa ma yin// sgoms pa nyid kyang brtogs pa ste// ma sgom pa yang rtogs pa nyid// sgom pa nyid tsam med pa la// yongs bu skad cig med pa 'di// lnga'i rgyal po yin par 'dod
306b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog 'gyur ba// rang gi ye shes me'o che// thams cad 'di la gnas pas// dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dag/ yul dang grong khyer dag tu mi 'gro yang
306b7(rgyud): yul na yod pa thams cad bsdus pa ste// mchod dang gtor mchi/ la sogs pa'i// las dang bya ba bsna tshogs kun/ sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na// thams cad 'di la bsrud par ros
306b8(rgyud): las ni za ba las spongs te// sgo gsum rnam dag/ ngas gsum 'khor// gzugs sku gnyis ni 'byung ba'i rgyu// sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi yin te// phyi'i 'thun mong yin par gsung
307a1(rgyud): snying ka lI ba spyi bo 'grin// rigs ni nges pa'i thub kun te// skra ni spyi bo gsung 'grin pa// snying kor thugs sra yon tan dang // 'phrin las gtum mo gnyi su nges// rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang / 
307a2(rgyud): rang bzhin gnas pa'i ye shes ma// me lha dag pa bdag po'i lha// sku mdog phyag 'tshon rtog dag/ sreg rdzas sreg ste me mchod bya// nye bar zhi ba sbyin pa dang // rnam rtog sme gi phye spyi bsregs te// rang lus
307a3(rgyud): ye shes me yis ni// rtogs pa'i bud shing sred bya yi// 'di'i sbyin srog tshad ma ste// til la sogs pa nges pa'am// las kyi me nyid ye shes sas// sreg pa nye bar tshig 'gyur tshig/ sregs rdzas
307a4(rgyud): nam rtog sreg byed me// dbang gi spyod yul ma yin te// da wA ra las kyi me nyid la// til sogs sreg pa'i las byas kyang // de'i sdig pa tshig mi 'gyur// mchod pa la sogs de bzhin no// 
307a5(rgyud): sman pa tsan du nges pa ni// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam las kyi me rtogs na snyan pa med// gang bruru krugs gzar la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nA sa sbyin sreg kyang // 
307a6(rgyud): thab khung lta ba 'am sAng rtsa ste// chags grol nas ni nges pa dang / rang bzhin dang ni gsang ba yi// gtum mo'i ye shes me sbar te// g.yas g.yon dgang zur blugs zar kyang // shu tra
307a7(rgyud): rtsa dang rlung la sogs kyis// 'phra ba rtogs pa'i sregs rdzas sreg/ bde ba me mchod chen po bya// zhi rgyas las kyi rim pa dang // zhi ba zhal nas shes par bya// de nas sngags kyi bye brag kyang / 
307a8(rgyud): phyi'i sngags ni AM a hUM// nadu du mtshan rtsa gsum mtshan nyid de// gsang bar mchod nas dbus nas gnas// mtha' ni 'thab bral rang rig go/ spos la sogs phyi'i mchod pa ste// bu dang rtsi
307b1(rgyud): la sogs nad de s+tha/ gsang bar bde ba'i ro yis mchod// mthar thug stong pa'i ro yaM sa mchod// 'bras sogs phyi'i gtor ma ste// dman pa'i bgegs spogs zhi bar byed// a ba 'dru ti kar la ra sha
307b2(rgyud): la sogs bdud rtsi'i ni rang bzhin gnas// rnam rtog bgyegs chen zhi bar byed// bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i ros// 'phra ba'i don chen zhi byas la// 'di ni gsang ba'i gtor ma ste// rang rig spong ba
