362a2(rgyud): 'jig rten skyed par shes/ dpal khrag mabyung mngon par 'byung ba las// 'dug pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan gyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste// / sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// 
362a3(rgyud): de nas char pa 'bab par bshad// dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor pas// gang gis myuram du char 'bebs la/ klu brgyad po ni the tshom med// mtha' yas dang ni rgyas dang // de bzhin 'joms po stobs kyi
362a4(rgyud): rgyu// pad ma dang ni pad chen dang // tu nga skyong dang ni rigs ldan brjod/ sor so ru ni re re'i// sngags dang rang ming brjod par byed/ sA tshan drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas dbye bar bya// @6
362a5(rgyud): drug pa ni mnyam pas rten// thog ma tha mar mnyam ldan brtag/ sngags 'di dag ni mnyam par sbyor// thog ma tha ma la sogs/ brgyad// rgya mtsho 'bab pa'i chu bo chede/ 'jigs pa'i gzugasu
362a6(rgyud): byas pa yin// phyogs kyi mdog tu bdengs ka bdun// sngags kyis skul bas yang dag ldan// de yi snying kar bzhugs par byed/ pad ma 'dabargyad dgod byas la// gzhag ste nyin dang ne mchod par byan na mtha'
362a7(rgyud): dag chu yis brgyas par 'gyur// myur du char ni mi phabs na/ las gzhan dag ni sbyar bar bya// dur khrod kyi na ras dag la// dug dang skye tshe dag dang ni// nim pa'i 'dab ma'i khu pa mas// sngags ni 'di ni ya
362a8(rgyud): dag thi/ sbu gu la sogs par ni bzhugs// 'bras bub me la 'dug par bya// char ni 'bab par 'gyur ba'o// ya ra na klu nar brgyas kyi gzugs snyan mgo dgu pa byas te// de'i snying khar bcug ste// 'dud par bya'o// 
362b1(rgyud): char ba'i rgyu chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu brgyas par 'gyur ro// dam ma he ru ka'i bkal mnyan par byed pa dang / klu la klus zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas dpal chen sbyin sreg gis// bza' chen po ni bzhi
362b2(rgyud): yin// tha mar 'jug rings la sogs pa// sngags kyi cho ga bzhin du sbyor// nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin// dmig dmar dang ni bza' lag dang // de bzhin phung bu pa wa sangs// de bzhin du ni spen pa mchog/ sgra gcan 'jug rings
362b3(rgyud): mnyam par bshad// rang ming brjod pa yi ni sngags// dang pos oM kyai yi ge dang // tha mar swA hA sbyar ba yin// dbang po me dang gshen rje dang // de bzhin bde bral chu bdag dang // nor sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin dang // dbang po ldan
362b4(rgyud): du rab tu grags// de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad// sbyor ba'i lam la rab tu gnas// rang mtshan gzhon pa kha dog dang // 'jig rten skyor ba bdag nyid che// khro gro gnyis dang yang dag ldan// sgrub bya la ni sgra/ 
362b5(rgyud): ba yin// nyin bzhag bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis/ sgrub po ci rab 'gyur ba yin// zhal bzhi pa'i sngags kyis ni// phyogs da phyogs dpral gsungs sa pa ste// 'bru rnams thams cad rme
362b6(rgyud): nas ni na nyi khri ru ni sngags nas kyang // drangs ni brgyad dag dgu pa sU ga 'di rnams 'jig rten pa yin te// rnal 'byor pas ni sgrub pa 'o/ de sa'o steng du rnam par spyod// dpal khrag mthung rten tu 'gyur// thams ca
362b7(rgyud): mkhyen ldan khrag mabyung mchod par bya// sems can rang bzhin sangs rgyas kun// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba'i mchog na sngags dang phyug brgyas mnyam par bya// dang lngar khrag mthung mchod par bye/ mtho ris kyin
362b8(rgyud): don byed du// bzhi pa'i dngos grub 'ong ba ste// rtag tu drug bcu rtsa bzhi mchod// dpa' bo gnyis kyis rab sbyor bas// rang 'byung ye shes kyis ni bzhi/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/ dang ldan khrag mabyu
363a1(rgyud): mngon par 'byung ba las// tshar dbeb pa dang / bza' dgu dang / 'jig rten skyong gya brgyad kyi sgrub pa thams cad kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ so 'dun pa'o// 
363a2(rgyud): de nas rang bzhin med pa'i kun gyi dbang phyug mtshon na zhal bzhi pa ni hUM mi ge dang // ci lhur 'dod po ralas kyis dbyen lha dang mi la bde ba ni// gcig tu smras nas ltas pa khas// khrag mthung gnyis med bde 'a las/ 
363a3(rgyud): bcu drug char yang mi phod do// gos chen dang ni sha chen dang // dbang chen dang ni sbrang rtsi chen thams cad dur khrod nas ni byung // bya ge brgya'i dbang phyug mchog/ bya ba kun las dngos grub ster// ci srid rdul tu dgra bo sgom// 
363a4(rgyud): zhags pa nag po 'grin pa bcings// 'dod pa 'dabyugs pas brdung bar bya// cho ga bzhin du sngags pas bsam// lho phyogs su ni bskyal bar bya// 'dar ba'i yid dang lhung ba dang // yang dang yang du/ 
363a5(rgyud): phrag pa dang // de la nyung ni 'aklag pa nyid / dayod da sa tu rgyas par ma dang / nyis byed das nas byed de// gzugs rten byi ni sbyin theg bya// nyis gsum na tuni// 'chi bar gyu/ 
363a6(rgyud): zhi mgo bo lhung // sngags kyi cho gas 'ching ba ni// sa stengs 'chi zas btab pa ste// rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyis ni// rnal 'byor ma la dngos grub ster// snying po mi la sdus nas su// phyi yang ni ltung
363a7(rgyud): ba yin// phyag rgya chen po 'i snying po ru/ yon po zhes bya rab tu grags// sgru po 'jig rten gsum po yang // 'di yis thams cad sdud pa yin// de nas skrag pa bshad bya 'o// dag po rnams kyi stoH
363a8(rgyud): kyis dregs// sngags pas sdom gsum cho ga bzhin/ 'arnam pa'i 'dabu mar bri ba dang // bya rog sgo yis bye brag gis// sgrub po rab tu 'bad khras mchod/ blo ldan rang gi gnas la spyod// de ni stangs
363b1(rgyud): dang ni ba nga dag ni/ mi ma 'i latsugs pa zod dz+rag hU~M rang byag kyigasang gas pa/ sgyu pa skyengs ca pad/ da nas 'gyur 'don das // rnab 'byor kun gyis da pa yin/ 
363b2(rgyud): 'byor kun gyis sa chod pa yin// nas 'byor 'di ni / sum te tshu kyang mchod yin/ ga 'di dang 'dra ba gzhan na med// cung zad mngal ba gsang ba brgyas// 'jig rten gsum la yular rgya'o// gas
363b3(rgyud): mi dang mkhal 'gro ma// gang zhig byung ba de las rab skyed/ mi 'jog rten na ni yo / de kun g+ho ru kha ltas na'o// dpal khrag mthang mngon par 'byung ba las// skad pa dang gas ba'i sngags kyi cho
363b4(rgyud): me'u shes byab to// ma brgyad pa de ma bdag can na gan 'o sgyur 'drug gi zhes pas sngags mi ga // 'dod pa'i dngos kyu 'o nga
363b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ sems ni shin tu nam dag kyang // de nas rdza cwa bcing bar bye// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis// dbyangs kyi ye gros 'god pa rdzo/ re'u mig dgur ni brtsi byar byaste// mnyam par yi ge bo ni 'du kun
363b6(rgyud): gnas der lho ldan gis gi btu// dang po rdo rje sems dpal sogs// rdza lnga'i rnam pa dpa' tsho che/ dpa' bo chen po zhal ni 'gyur/ ci ltar rigs pa de ltar bya// mtha' dag rab tu zhi ba yin// sde tshad dbye ba shes bya/ 
363b7(rgyud): nas// mkhas pas phyi mo las ni btu// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa ni blang // lnga pa'i dbyangs ni yang dgu ldan// dang po'i yi ger 'gyur ba'o// de nas bzhi ra cu rtsa gcig blang // bzhi bcu pa'i sbyar ba yin// gnyis par
364a1(rgyud): yongasu grags pa'o// de nas sum bcu so drug blang // dbyangs kyi gsum pa sbyar ba yin// gsum pa'i yi ger gyur pa'o// drod kyi yi ge gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi sngags pas yang dag dang ldan
364a2(rgyud): bzhi pa'i yi ge gyur pa'o// drug pa yis ni lnga pa la// de nyid kyi ni bzhi pa lnga/ lnga pa'i yi ger gyur pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid tshe// de bzhin bzhi bcu zhe dgu zung // dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar ba ste// 
364a3(rgyud): steng du na nges sbyar ba yin// yi ge drug pa ru ni brjod// oM gyi yi ge dang po ste// baT kyi mi na thA mA ru// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa sbyar ba ma ni/ na maung gi sde tshun brgyad pa/ 
364a4(rgyud): mel bus ni sbyar ba yin// dazungs kyi bzhi pas sbyar ba sbed/ gnyis pa'i mi mchog yin no/ steng du na das sbyar 'jodami gro tsho na yin nyi nu la// skye bas dkyi la yang dag nas// dbyang
364a5(rgyud): kyi gsuM pas sbyar ba yin// yi ge sum par 'gyur ba'o/ gcigs mnanapa'i lnga bcu zad sum bcu so drug yang dag ldasi ge bzhi par brjod pa 'o/ len gnyis ni brjod par bya// de bzhin
364a6(rgyud): bzhi 'acu zhe brgyad pa// gzugs kyis rab tu dbye ba yin// bco lnga pa ni yang dag ldan// yi ge bdun pa ru ni brjod// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o// oM kyi yi ge dreng po ste/ phaT kyai yi ge mtha ru sbya ra// rnam snang
364a7(rgyud): mdzad tu 'gyur ba'o// 'dis ni dngos grub thams cad ster// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dag dang // Ad+ha tha'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsu me'u sbyar// gnyis pa'i mi kror gyur ba'o// bcu bzhi rtsa
364a8(rgyud): bzhi yang dag blang / dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbyar ba ste// yi ge sum par 'gyur ba'o// oM yi ge dang po swA hA mtha'// padam gar gyi dbang phyug go// 'di rnams rang gi sngags bshad pa'o// de bzhin cig
364b1(rgyud): ni lnga bcu blang// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa las sbyor// dang po yi ger brjod pa'o// drod kyi yi ge bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa yis sbyar// gnyis pa'i yi ger brjod pa'o// an d+ha swa'i yi gnyis/ 
364b2(rgyud): pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar ba yin// bcu bdun pa ni yang dag blang // lnga pa yis ni mnyam par ldan// bcom ldan ma yis ni mchod par bya/ sa kyi yi ge dang po ste/ Nu hUM phaT ni tha ma yin// 'dod/ 
364b3(rgyud): pa'i don du sgrub pa po// dang ldan khrag mthung dpa' bo che// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi dbang // de nas bco brgyad pas ni blang // drod kyi yi ge dang po la// dbyangs yige baiN+ya gsum pas na sbar// gnyis pa
364b4(rgyud): ni rab tu grogs// an d+ha tha'i gsungs pa la// bcu bdun pas sbyar da yan// dbyangs yiganyis nyid dag dag/ mkhas pas gsum pA r-I zhe brjod// bzhi la NA rdza ga nyi so yang dag ldan// 
364b5(rgyud): gcigs ma ca lnga bcu la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar ba yin// steng du na ngas sbyor bar bya/ oM gyi yi ge dang po ste/ par+ra kyi ya ge tha mar yin// de ltar nyid du the tsom med// 'di ni rdo rje/ 
364b6(rgyud): pho nyar 'gyur// dngos grub ster zhing thar pa ste// yi ge bzhi bcu pa nyid dang // de nyid la na dbyangs yig ni bcu gsum pa'i sbyor yin/ do nyid gnyis ldan bshad pa'o// de las rig pa ldi cu drazad med/ 
364b7(rgyud): gtsigs ma tshar nyi shu dang / an d+ha s+pha'i bzhi pa dang // dbyar+yas yi gnyis pa yang dag ldan// de bzhin bco lA pra ya saM sbyor// bzhi pa'i yi ger brjod pa'o// dbyang ngas yigi ni ga nyi sa bzhi// de bzhin sum
364b8(rgyud): drug pa gnyis// dpa' bo nyi shu drug pa btu// yi ge drug par brjod pa'o// oM gyi yi ge dang po ste/ hU~M phaT tha mar sbyar ba yin/ dpa' po chen po rno 'grin ste/ dngos grub kun gyi gtso bo ste// dpal khrag
365a1(rgyud): mthung mngon par byur ba las// 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gis gsang ba'i sngags btub pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste ra/ so dgu pa'o// / de nas yang dganas pa'i sngags/ 
365a2(rgyud): dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma// snying ka spyi bo spyi ge tsug dang // go cha mig ni la sogs pa ru// rdo sems dpal la sogs sbyar// go bya byas shing rab tu srung // rdo rje sems dpa' snying la sbyar// dngos gru
365a3(rgyud): thams cad rab tu ster// rnam par snang mdzad spyi bor dog de// de ltar yon tan khyad par can// spyi gtsug pad ma gar dbang phyug/ 'phrag par khrag mthung dgod par bya// mi gnyis rdo nyi ma yin// yan lag ku na la
365a4(rgyud): rta 'grin ste// de ltar cho cha dgod pa yin// lan bdun dag ni klu ba yon// lag par dgod par byas nasu/ lag pa'i brda' ni bstan par bya'o// rdo sems dpa' the lo gnas// de bzhin rnam snang
365a5(rgyud): 'dzub mo ste// gong mo pad ma gar dbang phyug/ ming med dpal ldan khrag mthung ster// mthe chung rdo nyi ma'o// sen mo'i ngos la rta mchog yin// lag pa'i 'thil du dpa' bo che// 
365a6(rgyud): gnyis med rdo rnal 'byor ma/ rgyal tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kun// 'di rnams lag pa la ni dgod// kun gyis sdug pa mnyam par 'gyur// de ltar cho ga bzhin du ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mchod bya// 
365a7(rgyud): gshin rje'i phyogs nas btsams nas ni// ci srid bde ba de bral gyi ni bar// dus drug gnyis 'gyur dus ni byas// mkha' 'gro 'dra ba'i sdom pa mchog/ dus bzhi gsum 'gyur shes par bya// tshes dang
365a8(rgyud): dus tshod slar shes bya// dkyil 'khor dbus ni he ru ka/ spyan drangs nas ni mchod par 'phel// rtag tu rnal 'byor dbadra phyug la// 'buM laM mchod pa 'bul mi 'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro ma dang la ma dang / 
365b1(rgyud): dung skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// 'di rnams dpa' bo yi sring po yin// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa yin// dpal khrag mthung mngon par 'byung ba las// dpa' bo chu gis go cha dang / da lha'i grangs dang // lag
365b2(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga li le'u zhes bya ba ste// / bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad byag/ dus bzhi mtha'i rnal 'byor ma// gsang ba'i mchod pa gsang ba ni/ dadapas
365b3(rgyud): gaganyis med bsten par bya// rdzogaso ldan 'di ru ma yin te// sum ldan na ni sring mo brjod// gnyis ldan la ni bu mor shes// btsod ldan chung ma'i pho nya ra gnas// de ltar cho gshes byas na// dngos
365b4(rgyud): grub 'bras dbu bskal ldan 'gyur// dpa' bo kun gyis rjes sgom na/ 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'ong ba yin// phyag rgya chen po theg pa che// rnal 'byor ma rnams dngos grub ster// phyag rgya chen po
365b5(rgyud): gzhan na med// rnal 'byor kun la sgrub pa po// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// gzhan yang rigs byed smra bdang / spyod pa pa dang grags can dang // gzhan yang bye drag smra ba ltar// 
365b6(rgyud): tshangs pa khyab 'byug lha chen gyis// kun tu dngos grub mchod ba ste// dngos yang dag ye shes 'di// thams cad pas ni mchog yin no// sa la rin chen bzhi yin te// de bzhin mchog gi mchog
365b7(rgyud): nyid do// mkha 'gro ma dang rig pa che// dang ldan ma khrag mabyung rgyal po dang // sdom pa'i bdag nyid chen po dang // rnal 'byor 'di rnams shes pa mchog/ rigs byed bzhi lnga mi byams// nga las gus
365b8(rgyud): pa la byams so// de la'ang ster te rjes bzung// ji ltar bdag nyid kun tu mchod// thams cad gnyi su med pa ste// kun nas kun tu ral 'byor sgrub// dang ldan khrag mthung dpa'i ma mchog/ de
366a1(rgyud): skye bo dam pa thams cad 'tshogs// zla ba'i btung bas dngos grub 'gyur// zhi ba yi ni 'phang mchog/ mkha' 'gro ma'i dra sdom las// na mkha' dang mnyam btus pa yin// kun mkhyen ye
366a2(rgyud): shes de rang bzhin// khrag mthung mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba// thar pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster// dang ldan khrag mthang ci bzhin thob// yon tan gzhan ni bzhin btang ba// spyan ma the bo la ni gnas
366a3(rgyud): 'dzub mo la ni bdag mar brjod// gung mo'i rtsa bar sgrol ma yin/ ming med ma la 'od byed ma// mthe chung pha rol byin ma dgod// legs pa'i mthil tu mnyam par 'gro// rgyag tu gshegastsol ba ste/ 
366a4(rgyud): de ltar nyid du the tsom med// dpa ldan khrag mthung mngon par 'byuHba khas// dus bzhi mtha' rnal 'byor ma dang // lag pa'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// 
366a5(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// skye babadun pa'i sgrub par 'gyur// sngags dang rnal 'byor/ rab 'bad pas// 'bras dkar btags pa'i rang bzhin
366a6(rgyud): mas// sngags la byorgyal song gzugs pa ni/ krol la sogs yang dag zang // sgrub po gang lta ci ga par/ de yi gzugs la gzhag bya ba// ming ni sngags kyi nang chung ba// sus ni tsan da/ 
366a7(rgyud): dmar pos byug/ shin du mnyam par gzhan pa sgoms// gang gis nub mo 'i rigs ni// dbyug lus mchod pa'i bye brag dngade ni zos pa tsam byi ni// mi rnams dam tshig can tu 'gyur// 
366a8(rgyud): gcad mar dang sha yis ni// phyi nang bdag nyid mchod par bya// lde ga cad sbyin theg bya sa// de la dngos grub thams cad gnas// sde gcad sbyin sreg bya ba yin// de nas gtor ma sbyi/ 
366b1(rgyud): par bya/ mkha' 'gro ma kun dges par bsam// ci srid yongasu rgyas pa ru// de yi sngags kyis grub par 'gyur// yang dag rtag pa'i tshogs kyis gang // rnal 'byor bzhi sogs phyag rgya dang // rang gi mdog dang
366b2(rgyud): phyag dang dbyibs// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ theg le dang ni na da s+pha ra// rnal 'byor che la rnam par gnas// las kyi dbyings kyi hAM yig na// 'bad pas thar pasgom par bya// lte snying rkan dang sna tser
366b3(rgyud): ni// hUM gi yig rnam pa bzhi// 'bar ba dang ni ring thung dang // rnams chad las kyis dbye ba ste// pu lu tas ni thar par 'gyur// ring por rgyas pas rab tu brjod// thung bas mi mthong bar ru 'gyur// rnam par chad pas
366b4(rgyud): gsod par byed// lte ba dril bu'i sgra dang mA nyaM// snying du 'brug gi sgra 'dra ste/ 'grin pa la lang gi ni sgra// sna tser yungs kar 'phangs pa 'dra// hUM yig bzhi po rgyal po che// 'jig rten gsum
366b5(rgyud): sgrub pa po// pu tsa au A go nA de mA// ka au tri ko ka la a ka tI/ pri gri so su na si ma ku// phyi nang bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas/ pu yig la sogaso rnam par gnas/ rnam shes ye shes gzung
366b6(rgyud): bar bya// rab tu 'bad pas bla mas ston// phyi'i lam rnams min pa ste// bstan chos rnams kyang ring ba yin// thabs kyis rnal 'byor ma ni rnams// 'bad pas bla ma'i snying kun bya// bstan chos mtshan nyid mdor
366b7(rgyud): sdus pa'o// de nyid ston pa dpa' bo yin// skad cigs nI rnal 'byor bdag/ skad cigis ni phyag rgya can// ku nas kun tu skad cig ste// skad cig sngags dang rnal 'byor rigs// dang ldan khrag mthung mngon
366b8(rgyud): par 'byung ba las// 'gro ba bdun gyi sgrub byaH// hU~MhUM yig bzhi rnams par dag pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi rargya gnyis pa'o// / de nas dang ldan rgyal chen la// da
367a1(rgyud): po phan par 'dod pas yin// pus ma sa la btsugs nas ni// yid kun gyis ni phyag 'tshal te// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ gsang ba chen po dag nyid zhus// kun byas
367a2(rgyud): rnam par brgyan pa ru// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// gang gi gnasu gnas pa yi// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rnams la rtse// nyon cig man ngag ci bzhin bshad// rtag par saM bsam gyis mi khyab// 
367a3(rgyud): nga // gang gis de ltar sngon du bzung // thams cad bdag nyad rtag tu gnas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes su brjod// sgo dag ru na gyur pa ste// rmalde ba'i dbus su bad ma ste// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes
367a4(rgyud): grags// de'i gnas na dpa' bo bzhugs// cha med cha ni rnam par de spangs// lus rnams kun gyis rnam por brtse// lus bral dri ma med pa ste// la lar gzugs kyi gnas na bzhugs
367a5(rgyud): la lar sna'i gnas na bzhugs// la khar mig gi sgron bzhugs la la ra sgra'i sgo na bzhugs// la lar bshad lI'i skon bzhugs// la lar sems dang rnam shes bcas// la la
367a6(rgyud): kre sa dang ltogs dang skom// la la ru khro dang la lar zhi// la lar ldogs dang btsas pa'i mdo// la lar bud med mchog lu sa// la lir bsor cing rdeg pa dang // la la ra smra ba bzhin tu/ 
367a7(rgyud): me tog 'bras la gnas// la la re mtsho zhing+ra lor spyod gnas// la la ra dril rnam par+ya gnas// la lar 'byung ba chen po lta// saM dang chu dang me dag go// l-i r+ya rig su kyi dgye yis
367a8(rgyud): mo dang ni sbom mo dang / rtal lar ma dang sring mo yin// la lar chung ma bu mo dang // la la ra tshangs ba dbang phyug dang // nyi ma dang na 'phrog mo dang // la lar zla ba skar mi dra kI li lcer nyin me nA ba
367b1(rgyud): mkhar khams gsum la yin te/ thams cad byed po zad ming rgyal/ rnal la ra ro dang bag chags nug/ cha med stong pa kun tu gas la// la khar byang chub gzigs mo
367b2(rgyud): la rgyal ba yin// la lar chos kyi 'khor lo chen/ de bzhin la lar 'chi 'pho ste// la lar dkar ba skyed pa yin// la kar dge slong tshul tu gnas/ la lar byis pa yi ni gzuzhes la la nas
367b3(rgyud): shing 'khogs pa dang // la la ra na ba sos pa dang // la lar snod dang bcud dag dang // la lar sngo zhing dmar ba dang // la lar dkar zhing ser ba dang // lu l-i ra sangs rgyas sa rnam snang mdzad/ kha mra
367b4(rgyud): sgrol ma gos dkar mo// la lar spyan ma ma ma kyi// la lar kun tu zhi bar 'gyur// la lar bya'i mngal du 'gro// na mkha' ru ni 'gro chepa nyid// la lar glang chen nga rgyal ste rna la wAr smad mchog
367b5(rgyud): mar ni 'gyur// la la rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur// la khar gnyis na ldog par gnas// la lar rlung dang 'khregs pa dang // 'am khrag dang lpags pa de// ma lnga ra du zhing mya ngan byed/ 
367b6(rgyud): la lar mi rnams za ba dang // la lar rgas pa skus pa dang // 'di ltar kun du rnam par byed// lha'i ci srid gsungs pa dang // gang de thams cad bdag nyid gnas/ na dpal ba 'di rnams
367b7(rgyud): gsang chen po te phyi nang nang du yang dag nas// kun la khyab cing rtag tu stong // srid pa bzung zhing dri ma med// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di ltar sgom// gnyis med ye shes nyid dang yang // de dang 'dra ba
367b8(rgyud): stong stong par 'gyur// bdag nyid ma ni gnas par sgom// de la brtul shugs bshad pa med// 'phreng ba dang ni sngags kyang med// gzugs dang sbyin sreg las med de/ smos dang cho ga'i bya ba lang med/ lag pa
368a1(rgyud): phyag rgya stsa ba dang / nigayon brkyang rkang bstan la sogs medadadapa' bo chen pos dngos po bzung // rang 'byung mchog ni byed pa po// dgag b.ru ni mi bya ste/ bdag nyid nges par mchod par byad
368a2(rgyud): dbus kyi gnas su thig le skom// brgya'i phyed kyis rnam par brgyan// de dbus stong par bsam pa ste// gzhol byed thig ler bcas pa ste// de yi lus ni bral 'gyur to/ de sgom du med cing bsam du med// dang
368a3(rgyud): khrag mthung mngon par 'byung la las// kun gyi rnam pa'i rgyu mar bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de ltar sgyu ma'i cho ga dang // gang gi cha ni rnam par spangs
368a4(rgyud): rtag tu snying gi dbus na gnas/ 'od ldan gsal ba chen po'o// lte ba'i rtsa bar pad ma gnas// ge sar bcas shing 'od dang ldan// rang bzhin kun ni sha ra ltar dag/ bcu drug la srogs kyis ni skor/ 
368a5(rgyud): yi ge mnyam par sbyor ba ste// kha sbyar byed pa'i bdag nyid do// de'i dbus su stong pa che// sgro dang bsdu ba'i byed pa yin// gang gis ming ni kun rang bzhin// gang gi sa yongasu grags pa'o// nyis
368a6(rgyud): zla ba rnam dag s+ho// 'phyar dang nub par ldan pa yin// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// bsod nams thams cad rnam par 'phel// pad ma'i sna rtse yungs kar tsam// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rang bzhin kun// yid
368a7(rgyud): bzlas pa yang dag ldan// dbyi'i da'angs ni rnam par spangs/ gzhan gyi sangs rgyas mi 'gyuraro// nag tu sems dpal dba' shes// lus med dri ma med pa ste// bden pa'i chos ni rang bzhin shes// mongs spyod rdzogs pa'i/ 
368a8(rgyud): sku rang bzhin/ de kun la mar me'i rnam padu ga mthong ba mtshan ma dang po'o// srin mu me khyer rnam pa 'o/ mtshan ma gnyis par mtshon pa'o// rdul kran dgar po rnam paru// phyogs bcu yi ni 'jig rted mthong brjod
368b1(rgyud): nyon mongs 'phel ba'i las rnams ni// rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid dang // 'dod pa'i lha'i longs spyod kyang // bzhi pa mthong ba'i bstan pa'o// gzugs la sogs mtho ris lha rnams ni// ga la mthong ba sems
368b2(rgyud): dpal 'o// drug pa 'jigs med long spyod// bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid do// brgyad pa nyid 'dod sangs rgyas nyid// rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'bras bu thob// skra yi rtse mo brgyar gshegs cha// rdul drad gzugs ni
368b3(rgyud): bsam par bya// stong pa la sogs dmigs mi khya// gzugs la sogs par mi lta ste// brtul med sa bon med pa yin// gzugs med mtshan nyid med pa ste// rnam shes ye shes bzung ba ste// rnam shes de yi
368b4(rgyud): bzhin ste// mngon shes brgyad po yang dag thob// kun mkhyen kun byed gtso bo ste// ye shes sku ni dri ma med// skye ba 'di las thob par 'gyur// gzi brjid stobs ldan dam pa yin// sdug cing bskal pa bzang
368b5(rgyud): po ra ston// dpag bsam shin tu yang dag 'byung // rtag tu sgom zhing/ bzlos pas ni// ci srid lus kyi bskul skyod dang // ngag gi smra ba bla ni// de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya ste// dang ldan khrag mthung go 2
368b6(rgyud): gnas ta pad ma bzhi dang 'khar lo che// de bzhin ngos gru ba kun gyi chen// dbe ba bye ba rnams dang ni// sangs rgyas bye bas legs par gsungs / dpal ldan khrag zung mngon par byung ba las/ thams cad
368b7(rgyud): so sor gas kha ba yi// mngon par shes pa brgyad nges par bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzugs rnyan gyis zhi
368b8(rgyud): 'di ru yid ldan don du gsungs// gang gis myur du de 'grub par// nad pa bzhi bar byed pa ni// pho mo rgyal po byas pa rnams// sdus pas cho ga shes par bya// srang leb khri sogs bstan rnams ni/ sngags rI/ 
369a1(rgyud): mdun du blang bya ste// 'bras dang slan chung yang dag sres// shin du bcos nas smos bcas te// nywa dang sha dang khrag gis ni// gzugs rnam dag ni byas pa sted/ bu mos bzhal ba'i skur
369a2(rgyud): yis// lus kyi tshad du khyab yin// bsags kyi yi ges skal bar bya/ drug pa bcu druganyis yi gso// bla re dag ni dri ba dang // sna tshogs gos kyi rgyal mtshan mchog/ dri dang spos dang me tog sogasad
369a3(rgyud): bsngags kyi 'dug pa skad par bya// srung ba chen po'i gos kyis ni// ba smad g.yog dang ni stod g.yog bya// gang gi cung zad nad pa yis// spyod yul ci ltar yin par sbyin// ro ru song na skyal bar bya// rol mo sna
369a4(rgyud): tshogs klu dbyangs dang / de bzhin ga zhag par byan ne// gzugs rnanam ni sbyin par bya// dbyung rgyan lag tshus 'phrul brgyanagos la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan// rkyed pa la ni mtsham
369a5(rgyud): bcig dalag par ral gri 'dzin pa ste/ dzan spyi bo khacings shing ko ma daglai/ snying rje la sogs ben pa'i sems/ dadapal ldan khragamathung rnal 'byor che// go ma gsum gyi rnam par brgyan
369a6(rgyud): tur khrod du ni 'gro ba ste// rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo skor// 'du byed rnams ni bshad nas byang // dkyil 'khor mdzes par bri ba dang / ma mo brgyad dang rnal 'byor// sgom zhing phyogs dang phyogs bral dgod// 
369a7(rgyud): de ru lha rnams yang dag gzhag/ thugs rA na lus ni lho ru zhag ste// sngags pas 'gro po bstan par bya// ci ltar mdzes pas sgrub bya sgom// nad rnams kun las rnam par grol// g.yas rkyang gis ni yang dag nas/ 
369a8(rgyud): brtsa ba'i sngag sogs kyis ni bsrung // sngags pas kha ni shar du ltas// log par shes ra kha traM kha/ gril ma 'go ma khar byas nin// lte ba'i phyogasu bdegs par bya// ci ltar stug sngal ba zhi la tu bad/ lha sbyin/ 
369b1(rgyud): nad ni zhi bar 'gyur// dpa' bo sogs pa shar phyogs gzhag/ sngags kyis bskul bar bya ba ste// ci ltar chung zad gzhag par byan thos dpon gyis ni mdzes par brtogs// khye'u mi khye'u yis grol bar yin
369b2(rgyud): pus mo bu mo grol ba yin// thams cad khrus 'ang gtsang sbra bya// mdzes zhing zhi bar bye ba yi// phyi nas slob dpon dges par bya ba ste/ gos dang brgyan la sogs pa yin// gzhan kun la yang mchod par bya// bza'
369b3(rgyud): ba btung ba la sogs gos gi so// gsang ba chen po zhi bar bya/ dpal khrag mthung mngon par byung ba'i las mchog/ 'bum khra gsum las btub pa// bstan chos thams cad kyi rgyal po// dpal khrag
369b4(rgyud): mthung dpa' bos chen po glags pas grub pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lha/ rgyal ba dang por grub par brgyud kyi phyi ma// dpal khragamathung mngon par 'byung ba las// rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgya
369b5(rgyud): po zhes bya ba// // rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar ki mkhan zakham tri ta chen po ta sa da ya badz+re dang / bod kyi lho wa bcings yon tan 'bar gyis sgyur zhing zhus te gtan
369b6(rgyud): phab pa'o// / @##// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya man dzu shri na ma sa g+hi ti/ bod skad du// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa
369b7(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // 'dul ka 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog// dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum lnga rgyal// rdo rje dbang phyug gsang
369b8(rgyud): ba'i rgyal// pad ma dkar po rgyas 'dra'i spyan// rang ga lag gi rdo rje mchog/ yang dang yong tu gser byed pa// khro gnyer rim pa ldan la spogs// lag na rdo rje mtha' yas khe/ 
370a1(rgyud): // dpa' bo 'dul ka 'dul ba bo// 'jig su rung dang dpa' byung can// rdo rje rtse mo rab khro ba// rang gi lag gi gsor byed pa// snying rje che dang shes rab dang

370a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas// thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang //

370a5(rgyud): bying ba yis/ sems can kun la sman po dang / bla med 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po// dam tshig chen po de nya
370a6(rgyud): mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis// bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyi sku// gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag/ ye shes sku ste rang 'byung ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i
370a7(rgyud): ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ don zab don ni rgya che zhing // don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba// thog mtha' bar dang mthar dge ba// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// ma 'ongs rnams kyang
370a8(rgyud): gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas// yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang // rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// rdo rje 'char chen ga sang sngags 'char// dpag med rnams kyi
370b1(rgyud): bka' bzhin du// glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol// mgon po rdzog sangs rgyas kun gyi// gsang 'dzin ci nas bdag 'gyur phyir// nges par 'byung gi bar du 'di// bdag gi bsam/

370b3(rgyud): skad rku// gsol nas thal mo sbyang byas te// lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'jug// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdzogs spangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang
370b4(rgyud): rings zhing yangs pa garkyang mdzad de// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // bdud bzhi'o dgra rnams 'dul bA byed/ sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum// spyod bar byed cing

371a4(rgyud): yi ge dam pa yin// khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med// tshig du brjod spang pa ste// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu'i mchog/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can
371a5(rgyud): thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang chen nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ga/ mchod pa chen po gti mug che/ gti mug zlos te gti mug sel// mchod pa chen po khro ba tshe/

371b8(rgyud): par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// gnyisu med dang gnyis med pa ston// yang dag mthal lo rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge ni sgra dang ldan// bu stegs 'i dgas den 'dzin
372a1(rgyud): byedad/ kun tu 'gro ba'i don yod stobs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar 'gyogs// rgyal ba dag rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i stobs che che// tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mcho

373a1(rgyud): sgregs pa// hi hi zhes sgrog 'jigs par byed// gang mo chen po gad kyangs can// rdo rje gad ma che sgrogs pa// rdo rje kun gyi sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rgyal po bde ba che// rdorje drag po dga'

373a3(rgyud): ste/ rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs la che// mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig/ lus ni rdo rje'i bsku can/ rje su ni gcig pu lus// sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse/ rdo rje snying po lpags pa 'khregs// rdo rje 'phreng thogs dpal
373a4(rgyud): ldan// rdo rje brgyan gis brgyan pa ste// gad kyang sa ha ha nges par sgrogs/ yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra// 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba// stobs po che la thabs che la// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste// byams chen rang
373a5(rgyud): bzhin dpag tu med// snying rje chen po blo'i mchog/ shes rab chen po blo chen ldan// mkhas pa chen po thams che ba// rdzu/ 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan// shugs chen 'gyog pa chen po ste/ rdza
373a6(rgyud): 'phrul chen po pha rol gnon// 'jig rten gsum na sgra cig pa// na mkha'i mtha' la sgra sgrogs pa// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog// yang dag bdag med de bzhin te// yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med// stong nyid
373a7(rgyud): smra ba'i khyu mchog ste// zab cing rgya che sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyis dung ste sgra chen ldan// chos kyi 'gan de sgra bo che// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med gzugs bzang
373a8(rgyud): dam pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs can yid la skyes// gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// gzugs snyan ma lus 'tshang ba po// tshugs pa med cing che bar grags// mkham gsum dbang phyug chen po
373b1(rgyud): smeste/ kA 'phags la ma shin tu mtho la gnas// dar pa chen po chos kyi tog/ 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig/ gnas tan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// sdug gu
373b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon ste// 'jig rten slob dpo ni 'jigs pa med// mgon skyobs 'jig rten yid gtsug pa// skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med// nam mkha'i mtha' las long
373b3(rgyud): spyod pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtshon/ ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i rtsa ba 'joms pa thod/ nyon mongs ma lus zho byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin// ye shes dbang skur bcod can
373b4(rgyud): can// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs// sdug sngal gsum gi sug sngal zhi// gsum sel mtha' yas grol bsum thob/ sgrib pa kun la nges par grol// mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas// 
373b5(rgyud): nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po// sems can kun gyi klu chen po// yon tan zong can rnams kyis thod// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba// na mkha'i mtha' la
373b6(rgyud): rab gnas pa// yin bzhin nor bu chen po 'chad// khyab bdag rin chen kun gi mchog/ dpag bsam shing chen brgyas pa ste// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ byed pa sems can kun don khyod// phan thogs sems can
373b7(rgyud): gnyis gshin pa// bzang ngan shes shir 'du shes la// khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan// dus shes sems can dbang don shes// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po// yon tan ldan shing yon tan shes// chos shes bkra
373b8(rgyud): shis bkra shis 'byang // bkra shis kun gyis bkra shis pa// grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dag/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' chen rol mo chen po ste// bkur sti rim 'gro phun gsum tshogs// mchog tu dga' ba'i
374a1(rgyud): grags bdag dpal// mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo s+ho// skyabs gi dam pa skyabasu 'os// 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog/ 'jigs pa ma las sel ba po// gtsug phud phud lhung lo
374a2(rgyud): can// ral pa man tsa cod can thogs// gdong lnga zur rgyug pud lnga dang ldan// zur pud lnga pa me tog thod// mgo zlu ma rdul shugs chen po pa// tshangs pa spyod pa rtul shags mchog/ bka' thub mthar phyir bka'
374a3(rgyud): thub che// rtsang nas dam pa ku'u tam// bram ze tshangs pa shes// mya ngan 'das pas tshangs pa thob// grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi bzhi pa nyid// mya ngan 'das zhi mya ngan 'das// legs par mya ngan
374a4(rgyud): 'das dang nye// bde sdug sel ba'i mthar gyur pa// chags bralalus las 'das pa po// thub pa med pa dpe med pa/ mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min// mi 'gyur kun tu khyab pa po// 
374a5(rgyud): zhing zag med sa bon bral// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// nyes paM spangs pa skyon med pa// shin du sang sad pa'i bdag/ kun shes kun rig dam pa ste// rnam par shes pa'i chos
374a6(rgyud): nyid 'das// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog mod lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// ye shes
374a7(rgyud): mig cig dri ma med// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che// smra ba'i skyes mchog sla ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// smra ba'i seng ge 'tshungs med// 
374a8(rgyud): kun tu lta ba mchog tu dga'// gzo brjid phreng ba lta na sdug/ 'od bzang 'bar gyi dpal gi be'u// lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po// sman pa che mchog gtsobo ste// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnams
374b1(rgyud): ma lus ljon pa'i shing // nad do cog gi sgra che ba// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gi mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can// phyogs bcu na mkha'i mthar thug pa// chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'jug
374b2(rgyud): 'gro na gdugs cig yangs pa ste// byams dang snying rje 'di dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad ma gar gyi bdag/ khyab bdag chen po rin chen gtug/ sangs rgyas kun kyi bzo brjid che// sangs rgyas kun gyi
374b3(rgyud): sku 'chang ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa cig/ rdo rje rin pa chen dbang skur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jigs rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo
374b4(rgyud): 'tsheng pa kun gyi rje// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku ngo che ga/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsum yang yin// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/ 
374b5(rgyud): rdo rje bzla ba dra med 'od// chag bral la sogs chags pa che// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar 'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa// dpa ldan
374b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas pad ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa// rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'tshang // che ba sangs rgyas rigs sngags rgyal// rdo rdorje rnon po ral gri che// ye shes mchog ste rnam par dag/ 
374b7(rgyud): theg pa chen po sdug sngal gcod// mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos// rdo rje zab mo 'dzin 'dzag/ rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan// rnam par dag pa
374b8(rgyud): bdag med chos// yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang // rtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ rdo rje bad na ni mau lul lnga ni// ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang/ kun tu bzang po blo gro bzang // 
375a1(rgyud): sa'i snying po 'gro ba 'dzin/ sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos de
375a2(rgyud): sna tshogs don// chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba// shes rab chen po skad cig la// chos kun khong du chud po 'chang // chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog 'byung ba'i mtha'// mig yi rab tu dang
375a3(rgyud): ba'i bdag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang // sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon gsum pa// ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam spyod pa// mgon po sems can
375a4(rgyud): kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed// nyon mo g.yul du gcig dpa' ba// mi shes dgra'i dregs pa 'joms// blo ldan skyeg 'chang dpal dang ldan// rtan po mi sku gzugs
375a5(rgyud): 'chang ga/ lag pa brgya po kun skyod cing // gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa rgyas gang ba// nam mkha' khyad par gar byed pa// sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i khyon// 
375a6(rgyud): rkang pa ya cig 'thil gyis gnon// rkang 'theb sen mo'i khyon kyis kyang // tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon// don cig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// rnam rig sna tshog
375a7(rgyud): gzugs don can// sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan// dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'// stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo// srid pa'i 'dod chags rdzogs spangs pa// srid gsum dga' ba chen
375a8(rgyud): po pa// sprin kar dag pa bzhin tu dgar// 'od bzad ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od// nyi ma shar ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes// sen mo 'od ni shar chen dmar// cod pan bzang po mthon ka' rtse// skra mchog mthon ka/ 
375b1(rgyud): chen po can// nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rkyen dang ldan// 'jig rten khams rgyad kun skyob pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang // dran pa zhi
375b2(rgyud): po'i ting nge 'dzin rgyal// byang chub yan lag me tog spos// lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam reg pa// sems can kun la shas cher tshags// nam mkha' lta bur chags pa
375b3(rgyud): med// sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug/ sems can kun gyi yid ltar 'gyogs// sems can kun gyi dbang don shes// sems can kun gyi yid 'breg pa// phung po lnga don de nyid shes// rnam dag phung po
375b4(rgyud): lnga 'chang ba// nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas// nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas// nges par 'byung ba kun bston pa// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa ton// dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan
375b5(rgyud): bden bzhi tshul gyis rnam pa can// shes pa brgyad pa rtogs pa 'chad/ bde don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rnam pa nyi shu'i byang chub pa// rnam pa sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ 
375b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku// byed pa dpag med 'gyed pa po// skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po// 
375b7(rgyud): theg pa gsum gyis ngos 'byung ba// theg pa gcigs 'bras bur gnas// nyon mongs khams rnams ngag pi bdag/ las kyi khams khwa rnams bzang byed pa// chu bo'i rgya mtsho kun las dag la// sbyar ba'i rgon pa las
375b8(rgyud): 'byung ba// nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas brtan spangs pa// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod byed 'gro ba'i don byed pa// 'du shes kun gyis don spangs pa// sems can
376a1(rgyud): rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed// sems can kun yid yul dang ldan// sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug/ sems can kun gyi yid la gnas// de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug/ sems can kun
376a2(rgyud): yid tshim par byed// sems can kun gyis yi dga' ba/ 'grub pa mthar phyin 'phrul pa med// nor ba thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum the tsom med pa'i blo// kun don yon tan gsum gi dag/ phung po lnga don
376a3(rgyud): dus gsum du// skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed// skad cig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang // lus med lus ste lus kyi mchog/ lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po// @
376a4(rgyud): rnams sna tshogs kun tu bston// nor bu chen po rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kun rnams rtogs bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla sa na med// gsung sngags las byung yi ge med// gsang sngags chen po/ 
376a5(rgyud): rigs gsum pa// gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po// thig/ le chen po yi ge med// stong pa chen po yi ga lnga// thig/ le stong pa yi ge rgya// rnam kha ston ldan rnam pa med// bcu drug phyed
376a6(rgyud): phyed thig le can// yan lag med pa'i brtsesau las 'das// bsam btan bzhi'i rtse mo can// bsam btan yan lag kun shes shing // ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa// ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ 
376a7(rgyud): longs daspyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal// sprul pa'i sku ste sku'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i brgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa// lha dang lha dbang lha'i lha// lA
376a8(rgyud): bdag po lha min bdag// mchi med dbang po lha'i lha// 'joms byed dbang phyug go/ srid pa'i dgon pa las dgal ba// ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla// 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa/ chos kyi
376b1(rgyud): sbyin bdag chen po// byas par go cha chas pa ste// snying rje ya na ya yang bgos// shes rab ral gri mnga' bzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel// dpa' bo 'dud gra bdud 'dul ba// 
376b2(rgyud): bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed// 'dud kyi dpung rnams 'pham byed pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren// mchod 'os stod 'os phyag gi nas// rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os// skur 'os mdzad par bya
376b3(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab// 'jig rten gsum po gom cig bgrod// mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par mnon// gsum rig rtsang ma dag pa ste// mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ byang chub sems
376b4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob// bdag ri gzhan rig thams cad la// kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog/ dper
376b5(rgyud): byad kun las 'das pa ste/ shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste// phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa// 'gro ba'i snyen bkur gnas kyi mchog/ nges 'byung gsu
376b6(rgyud): po drod rnams kyis// don gyi dom pa rnam dag dpal// 'jig rten rnaMm ni bskal ba'ang tsho/ dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa dajam dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod
376b7(rgyud): 'dud// stong nyid las khyod la 'dud// stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dod// sangs rgyas chags khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas
376b8(rgyud): bgyis pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas bzhad pa la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'atud// sangs rgyas
377a1(rgyud): thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// med pa las 'byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod lo 'dad// sgyu
377a2(rgyud): 'phrul phra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi skur/ 
377a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes kyi sku// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i yongasu dag pa thun mong ma yin pa'i/ ming yang dag par brjod pa yin te// khyod kyi dga' ba dang / dang po dang / 
377a4(rgyud): mgu ba chen po bla na med pa bskyed pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gsar ba yongs su dag par bya ba dang / yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang / yongasu ma dag pa'i sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
377a5(rgyud): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sa tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs shing yong su dag par bya bar dang / bla na med pa'i don ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang // ci tsam
377a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad// kyi dam pa ye shes kyi tshogs rnams yongasu// chos kyi tshul yang dag par bzung ba'i phyir// ngas bshad cing bstan te// bkrol zhing rnam par byed la rnam par gsal ba byaso// / 
377a7(rgyud): byin gis rlab par byed do// lag na rdo rje 'chang 'di ni// ngas khyod kyi rgyud la yang gsang sngags thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi byin gis rlabs kyis byin gis brlab so// lag na rdo rje 'chang gzhan yang
377a8(rgyud): ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin du dag cing yongs su byang ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang // sku dang gsung dang / 'thugs kyi gsangar ba shin du yongs su/ 
377b1(rgyud): dag cing yongasu byang ba go// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rnams kyi mngon pa'i rtogs pa do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'o// 
377b2(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa rnams gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos dbyings bla na med pa thug su chud pa'o// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams cad 'pham par byed pa'o// stobs bcu dang ldan pa thang
377b3(rgyud): kyi stobs bcu'i stobs nyid do// thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi lung ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par sgrub pa'i// byang chub
377b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs pa dri ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa lag nas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing ngo // lha dang mi/ 
377b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi phun sum 'tshogs pa'o// theg pa chen po'i bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyi 'byung ga na so// / 'phags pa'i lam thams cad mtha'o// rnam par grol
377b6(rgyud): rnams kyi rtag pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam skyed pa'i gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud mi mchad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rigs dang / 
377b7(rgyud): rgyud 'phel/ ba'o// pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i/ mu steg can thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'o// bdud bzhi stobs kyi dpung dang sde 'pham par byed pa'o// sems
377b8(rgyud): can thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'o// nges par 'byung ba bgrod pa thams cad kyis 'phags pa'i lam yongasu smin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge
378a1(rgyud): sems rtse cig pa rnams kyis bsam btan no// sus dang ngag dang yid 'dul ba la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor ro// kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs
378a2(rgyud): pa thams cad spongs pa'o// sgrib pa thams cad nye bar na pa'o// 'ching ba thams cad las rnam par grol bya'o// rdzas thams cad las thar pa'o// sems kyi bayeng ba thams cad zhi ba'o/ 
378a3(rgyud): 'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnaso// dgod pa thamasacang sel ba'o// ngan song gi sgo thams cad bcod pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam bzang ba'o// 'khor ba'i
378a4(rgyud): 'khor lo la mi 'jug pa'i/ chos gi 'khor lo skor ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan/ dang / ba dan sgreng ba'i/ dam pa'i chos ston pa'i gnas so// 
378a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sgom pa mngon por brtson pa rnams kyi rtogs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
378a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o// gnyis su med par so sor rtogs pa mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi rdzogs pa'o// 
378a7(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshogs thams cad yong su dag pa'o// sa thams cad yong su rdzogs pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po// rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o// chos thams
378a8(rgyud): cad kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag par rnams sems rtse gcig gis rtogs pa'o// mang yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi bar yang yong su rdzogs par byed
378b1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje 'chang / gzhan yang ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus ngang ngag dang yid la kun tu spyod pa'i sdig ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ sems/ 
378b2(rgyud): can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyor ba'o// ngan 'gro thams cad zlog pa'o// las gis sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o// mi khrim pa brgyad po thams cad kyi
378b3(rgyud): skye ba'i rgyu mi skye bar byed pa'o// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par 'jigs par byed pa'o// ltas ngan pa thams cad spong bar byed pa
378b4(rgyud): 'da' ngas dang bgeg pa thams cad nye bar bzhi par byed pa dang // bdud kyi dra'i lam thams cad ring du spong bar byed pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'o/ 
378b5(rgyud): zhe na ma yin pa yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / ngas 'dzin pa thams cad ma lus par 'joms par byed 'o// 
378b6(rgyud): sngal pa dang / yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skyo bar byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar 'gyur ba'o/ 
378b7(rgyud): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gosang chen du 'gyur ba'o// chos thams cad brjod du med par smra ba rnams cad kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags/ dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par skye ba'o// 
378b8(rgyud): bla na med pa'i shes rab spyod pa'o// sod bzhungs pa'i bying ba'o phyag rgya dang gsang sngags thams cad du gyur pad kyim chos thams cad brjod du med par smra la rnams kyi dran sa dang
379a1(rgyud): shes bzhin yang dag par skye ba'o// bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid bzhungs par byed pa'o// nad med pa dang / stobs dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o// dpal
379a2(rgyud): dang / zhi ba dang / legs par rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshig su bcad pa dang // stod pa grags par byed pa'o// nang dang 'jigs pa chen po thams
379a3(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// shin tu dag pa rnams kyi yang shin du dag pa'o// shin tu dag byed rnams kyi yang shin tu dag byed do// shin du 'byor ldan rnams kyi yang shin tu 'byor ldan no// 
379a4(rgyud): shin tu bkra shes pa rnams kyi yang bkra shis pa'o// skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi yang skyabs so// gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so// skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o// 
379a5(rgyud): gapung gnyen 'dod pa rnams kyi gapung gu nyen no// klung 'dod pa rnams kyi gling ngo // 'khras sa 'dod pa rnams kyi 'khras sa bla na med pa'o// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro/ 
379a6(rgyud): kha rnams klu'o// nad thams cad sel ba'o sman pa'i rgyal po chen po'o// blang ba dang dor ba'i dngos po bye brag byed pa tsha shes rab nyid do// lte ba ngan pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad sel
379a7(rgyud): ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i yid bzhin gi nor bu lta bu'o// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku thob par bya ba'i
379a8(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// spyan lnga thob par bya ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongasu dag pa'i// zang zing dang / mi 'jigs pa dang // chos kyi sbyin pa gting ba'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin
379b1(rgyud): pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin yong su rdzogs pa'i phyi re sa bcu thob pa'o// tshogs gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir/ gnyis med
379b2(rgyud): pa'i chos nyid do sgro btag pa med pa'i phyir// de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir yang
379b3(rgyud): dag pa'i mtha' rang bzhin nyid do// lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing brgya stong ma lus pa'i sel ba'i phyir ro// rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med par stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do// maung yang
379b4(rgyud): dag par brjod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin nyid do// gnyi su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don yang dag par 'dzin pa stong pa'i phyir chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i bzhin nyid/ 
379b5(rgyud): lag na rdo rje rdo 'chang/ gzhan yang te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'amo gsang sngags kyi skude'i spyad pa spyod pa gang la la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
379b6(rgyud): ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa/ ming gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams cad
379b7(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa dang / ma nyams shing lhag chad med par tshigasu bcad po'i tshig dang / yi ge ge'i 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum cu/ 'chang ba dang / klag
379b8(rgyud): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dam tshig bzhin du/ ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / ming gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang / 
380a1(rgyud): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku la dmigs te// kun nas sgo yis gnas pas/ gnas pa dang / chos thams cad rtogs pa'i mchog/ rtog pa med pa'i dad pa dang lda/ 
380a2(rgyud): bzhin pa dang // mos pa dang / de kho na nyid yid la byed pas// sems rtse gcig tu ston pa de la ni/ dus gsum gyi dus med pa dang / ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
380a3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad 'dus te/ gshegs nas/ chos thams cad ston par mdzad te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs pa
380a4(rgyud): mdzad de// sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad kyis de'i rgyud la yang dag par byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
380a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis phan btags pas// phan 'dogs par mdzad do// chos thams cad ma 'jigs pa'i spobs pa yang sgrub par mdzad do// dge bcom
380a6(rgyud): pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos la sdug par 'dzin pa'i dngos po bsam pa yang nye bar skyon por byed do// ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i
380a7(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang / rdo rje mgyon 'chang chen po la sogs pa// 'gro ba yongs su skyeb pa rnams kyang sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus sna tshogs kyi mdangs dang / stob dong / 
380a8(rgyud): bzi brjod zil gyis mi gnon par/ gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed do// gsang sngags dang / rigs
380b1(rgyud): bsngags kyi rgyal mo ma lus pa dang / dgyegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud kyi dgra dang / phyir ldog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen mo thams cad kyang / nyon mtshan phyed par skad cig re re/ 
380b2(rgyud): ma/ spyod lam thams cad du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sred par byed do// tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang po dang / drag po dang / chen po che dang / kun po gyad gzhon nu dang / 
380b3(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / sprin drug gi bu dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dpa chu lga dang / ku ber dang / 'phrog ma dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong bas
380b4(rgyud): yin pa de dag kyang / rtag tu rgyun ma'i chad par nyin mtshan spyad par 'gro yang rung / 'greng yang rungs 'dug kyang rung / nyal yang rung / gnyid log kyang rung / ma log kyang ru
380b5(rgyud): ba na/ srung ba dang / slob pa dang / skyed pa// byed do// mnyam par gzhan kyang rung / mnyam par/ ma gzhag kyang rung / gcig pur 'dug kyang rung / skye bo mang po'i nang na
380b6(rgyud): 'dug kyang rung / grong dang / zong rgyarang / grong rdam dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dan po zang dang / rgyal po'i pho zang na 'dug kyang rung / sgo ka dang / 
380b7(rgyud): khang dang khri lam dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / grong pal dang / tshong khra na 'dug kyang rus khang stong dang / ri dang / tshu krung dang / tshal dang / nags rtsa
380b8(rgyud): tshang tshing na 'dug kyang rung / gtsang sbra ma byas pa dang / ra ro ba dang / bag med par 'dug kyang rung ste/ rtag tu rnam pa thams cad du ci'i sgo nas kyang srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed
381a1(rgyud): par byed do// nyin mtshan du yang mchog tu bde leg su gyur par bye dzi gang snang ltung ba klu dang / gnad sbyin dadu min da sgyu ma yin pa / na mkhan
381a2(rgyud): lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi mi yin pa gzhan dag kyang/ bza rgyu skar dang / ma mo rnams dang / tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang / ma mo 'ad+ma/ 
381a3(rgyud): gang yin pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo dang / sham mo gang yin pa de dag thamasad kyang 'du zhing gcig tu 'thun par dbyung dpa bcas/ 'khor dang @
381a4(rgyud): byas gasrung ba dang / skyob pa dang med 'amasaca byed par 'gyur ro// dngas pastobs dang / gzi brjid mchog kyang de'i lus la 'jug par byed/ 
381a5(rgyud): many+dzam pa yi ngam du lan gsus du khasngon 'dzin ma/ thigs zlum d+ha d+has pa rjen nga mabacom ldan 'das 'angam dpag me zhes sems pa 'i ga zugs yo
381a6(rgyud): dmigs shing / gzugs dang mthun par sems te/ de'i gzugs dang / mthun pa bas ma btan bye pas ni// 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ ring po mi thogs par
381a7(rgyud): de nyid kyi/ sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ namakha'i dkyil
381b1(rgyud): nabazhugs pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sems can chen po rnams kyang ji ltar 'gyur kyang / ngan 'gro ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs ngan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// yul mtha
381b2(rgyud): khob tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dbang po ma tshang bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro// log par blta ba dang / lta ba ngan pa dag tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas ma bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar/ 
381b3(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bzhugs pa na yang / des ston pa'i chos spang ba dang // sgrol bar mi 'gyur ro// lha tshe rings po'i rlung du yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// mu ge dang / 
381b4(rgyud): nad dang / mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal ba'i nad du yang mi 'gyur ro// snyigs ma lnga'i nang du sna yang da skye bar mi 'gyu ro// rgyal po dang / dgra dang / chomarkun
381b5(rgyud): gyi 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur rocis kyang dman pa dang / dbul ba'i 'jigs pa/ yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// drings dang / skur pa de / 
381b6(rgyud): smad pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / gos ma ngan gyi 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyud rus dang / rigs bzang po dang / yang ldan pa re 'gyur ro// 
381b7(rgyud): kun nas mdzes pa dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams la sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / 'grogs na bde ba dang
381b8(rgyud): mthong na dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rnams la mdzes dang / bskal ba dang ldan pa dang / tshig brtsan par yang 'gyur gang dang gang du skye ba de dang // 
382a1(rgyud): nam/ der yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// long spyod kya bani cheb dang 'khor mang ba dang / long spyod kyi bzhi mi zad par yang 'gyur ro// sems can thams
382a2(rgyud): cad kyi mchog/ yon tan mchog dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la yang gnas par
382a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dran pa shes bzhin dang / thabs dang / stongs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// bsten chos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang / smra mkhas
382a4(rgyud): par yang 'gyur ro// mi blun pa dang / tshig gsal ba dang / sgrin por yang 'gyur ro// ga shes gnyen ba can dang / le lo med pa dang / chog shes pa dang / nor mang
382a5(rgyud): ba dang / sred pa med/ par yang 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma bskur bar yang 'gyur// des/ 
382a6(rgyud): sngon ma mthong ba'i bzo dang / sgyu brtsal dang / mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / bsnyen chos thams cad kyang don dang / yi ge'i sgo nas shes par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims dang / 
382a7(rgyud): 'tshe ba dang / kun tu spyod pa'i dang / shin tu yongasasu dag par spyod pa dang / legs par rab tu 'byung ba dang / legs par bstan par brjod par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
382b1(rgyud): kyi sems kyang mi brjed par 'gyur ro// gnyan thos dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa sa rnams kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rdo rje 'chang de ltar yon tan dpag tu med
382b2(rgyud): pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tsho gas dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ don dam pa'i ming yang dag par brjed
382b3(rgyud): pa 'di/ yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag de ni/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs legs par 'asags shing / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams shin tu myur du bsgrubs
382b4(rgyud): na// ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ mngon par rdzogs par 'chang / de rgya bar 'gyur ro// bskal ba mngo bor yong
382b5(rgyud): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos su/ mi 'gyurabar sems/ can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos bston pa dang / phyogs bcur dam pa chos kyi
382b6(rgyud): rnga chen po rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// / oM sarba/ 
382b7(rgyud): d+harma/ a g+ha waswa b+ha wa/ b+hi shud d+he/ badz+ra tsak+ku a A/ a AM/ pra tri ti pa ri shud d+ha/ swa b+ha d+harma ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA gA tA/ dzA na ka ya man radzu shri pa ri shud d+he ta/ mu pa ta ya ti/ 
382b8(rgyud): a a sarba tathA ka ta/ hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hU hAM/ b+ha ga wan/ dz+nyA na mur ti/ b+ha ga sha ra ma ha pa tsa/ sarba d+harme ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ba ra shud d+ha/
